
1a1(mdo 'grel): sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba i gu dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur ro//
1b1(mdo 'grel): bkru sman dang skyugs sman la sogs pa nad sbyang ba'i sman sde sna tshogs 'dus par bshad pa'i le'u bco lnga
1b2(mdo 'grel): pa bshad par bya'o/ /skyugs sman gyi sde la/ sman po son cha dang/ shing mngar dang/ ka laM pa dang/ nimpa dang/ pispi dang/
1b3(mdo 'grel): bi sha la dang/ ga gon ro kha ba'i thor to dang/ 'bras bu dang/ in+d+ra ya ba dug mo nyung dang/ murba dang/ de ba ta li dang/ lto'i
1b4(mdo 'grel): srin bu gsod pa'i bi taM ka dang/ bi dul dang/ tsi tra ka kru trug tres dang/ pa to la'i sa bon dang/ karany+dza dang/ pi pi ling dang/
2a1(mdo 'grel): lce myang tshwa dang/ shu dag dang/ sug smel dang/ yungs kar dang/ 'di rnams ni skyugs sman du btang ba'i sman gyi
2a2(mdo 'grel): sde'i rnam grangs su gtogs so/ /de la bkru sman du gtong ba'i sman ni/ tri ba ti dang/ shing nye rong/ dan+ti dang/ 'bras bu gsum po
2a3(mdo 'grel): a ru ra dang/ ba ru ra dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ bi sha la'i rtsa ba dang/ shing gi khu ba sbu hag shi ra dang/ me tog shang gi ni dang/ ni
2a4(mdo 'grel): li dang/ ro d+ha seng phro ma dang/ dong ka dang/ ki bi lya ka dang/ sur bar na shi ra dang/ bya ra nu dang/ ba gcin dang/ 'di rnams
2b1(mdo 'grel): ni bkru sman du gtogs so/ /bkru sman mas btang ba'i sman gyi sna grangs ni/ po son cha dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ ru rta dang/ de ba ta li dang/ shing mngar dang/
2b2(mdo 'grel): shu dag dang/ rtsa ba'i sman sna bcu la/ sa la par+Ni dang/ priSh+Na par+Ni dang/ kaN+Ta kA ri dang/ bri ha tI dang/ gze ma thog drung rtsa thon dang/ 'di rnams ni sman
2b3(mdo 'grel): gyi rtsa ba phra mo lnga zhes bya'o/ /bil ba'i rtsa ba dang/ a grin man+tha dang/ syo na ka dang/ taM pa la dang/ pa ta li dang/ 'di lnga'i rtsa ba ni rtsa ba chen po lnga zhes bya ste/ rtsa
2b4(mdo 'grel): ba che phra gnyis gcig tu bsdus pa ni rtsa ba bcu zhes bya ba dang/ de ba da ru thang shing dang/ ra sna dang/ ya ba ni la la bud dang/ sha ta puShpa sha ti dang/ kri
2b5(mdo 'grel): ta be d+ha na dang/ rgya sran nag po dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ tsa myang tshwa 'am/ rgyam tshwa shing nye rong 'di rnams ni bkru sman mas btang ba'i sde tshan du gtogs so//
3a1(mdo 'grel): mgul pa yan chad mgo'i nad dang/ mig nad dang/ sna nad dang/ lkog nad la sogs pa ci na yang rung ste/ sman sna nas btang zhing nang sbyang ba'i sman
3a2(mdo 'grel): sde la/ bel la dang/ a pa marga dang/ tsha ba rnam pa gsum po na le sha ma dang/ li dong ra dang/ pi pi ling dang/ skyer pa'i rtsa ba dang/ su ra la'i sa bon dang/ shi ri sha'i
3a3(mdo 'grel): me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ rtsa ba dang/ bri ha ti'i lo ma dang me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ sdong bu dang/ rtsa ba dang sna lnga dang/ shi kru'i lo ma dang/ me tog dang/
3a4(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu dang/ sdong bu rtsa bar bcas pa lnga dang/ seng ldeng dang/ shing ma du ke'i me tog dang/ rgyam tshwa dang/ mig sman skyer khaN+Da dang/ pha bong gi dreg pa
3a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ sug smel dang/ ldum bu sris tsi ka dang/ sman sde 'di rnams ni mgul pa yan chad klad pa'i nad thams cad sel cing sbyong ba'i sman du gtogs so/ /de
3b1(mdo 'grel): la rlung nad sel cing zhi bar byed pa'i sman gyi rnam grangs ni/ de ba dA ru thang shing dang/ rgya sbos dang/ ru rta dang/ sman gyi rtsa ba bcu rnams dang/ ba bla dang/ a ti pa la dang/ sman bir ta ra'i
3b2(mdo 'grel): sder gtogs pa la sogs pa dang/ sman bi da ra'i sder gtogs pa rnams ni rlung nad sel to/ /mkhris pa'i nad tsha ba rnams sel ba'i sman gyi sde ni/ rtsa durba? dang/ pUr+Na rna ba dang/ nim+ba dang/ sman
3b3(mdo 'grel): ba sha ka'i lo ma dang/ rtsa ba'i bar du sna lnga dang/ at+ma gupta kha sral phre'u dang/ 'o ma se'i rtsa ba dang/ nye'u shi la dang/ shi ta pa ki dang/ gand+ha pri yaM ku dang/ shing n+ya go d+ha la sogs pa dang/
3b4(mdo 'grel): shing shug pa dang/ sman thi ra rnam gnyis dang/ pad+ma'i za ba dang/ thal tres la sogs pa 'di rnams ni mkhris pa'i nad sel to/ /bad kan gyi nad rgyas pa la ni dong ka la sogs pa dang/ shi
3b5(mdo 'grel): arka la sogs pa'i lo ma me tog sna lngar bcas pa dang/ shing mu ska ka la sogs pa rtsa ba dang 'bras bur bcas pa sna lngar bcas pa dang/ shing o sa na la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang/ 'bras
3b6(mdo 'grel): bu'i bar sna lnga dang/ bye'u dug pa la sogs pa dang/ gla sgang chen po la sogs pa dang/ in+d+ra ya dug mo nyung la sogs pa sman sde 'di rnams ni bad kan sel bar byed do/ /sman dzi ban+ta'i sder
4a1(mdo 'grel): gtogs pa la/ dzi ban+ti dang/ ram nye ba rnam gnyis dang/ me da dang/ mahA me da rnam gnyis dang/ mon sran sde'u mung+ga dang/ mon sran ma sha gnyis kyi lo ma dang/ ldum bu ri sha b+ha ga zangs
4a2(mdo 'grel): rtsi ba dang/ dzi ba ka dang/ shing mngar dang/ 'di bcu'i ming ni 'tsho byed ces bya'o/ /yang khar zhim la lus kyi sha mtshag tshon por byed cing rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i sman sde'i rnam grangs
4a3(mdo 'grel): la/ bi da ra dang/ dong ka dang/ 'bri lci ka li dang/ pur+Na rna ba dang/ de ba dang/ sa ha de ba dang/ pu pa par+N+ya dang/ kha sral dang/ dzi ba ti tsa phra mo sna bcu dang/ shing sha ri ba thal tres kyi rtsa ba dang/
4a4(mdo 'grel): lcug ma dang/ haM sa pa ti dang/ de ltar 'di rnams kyi spyir bi da ri'i grangs su gtogs te snying la phan/ sha mtshag? rta/ rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad sel/ lus skem pa sha skye/ /skyan dang lhu tshigs
4a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ nya bzhin pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lud pa lu ba dang/ 'di rnams sel cing phan pa'i grangs su gtogs so/ /yang lus tsha ba dang/ khrag dang mkhris pa rgyas te skom dang che zhing
4a6(mdo 'grel): rims kyis btab pa 'di rnams sel ba'i sman ni/ shing sha ri ra ba thal tres dang/ u shir dang/ ka ma ri tadwa la/ shing ma du ka zhes bya ba dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ dmar po sna gnyis
4b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ shing mngar dang/ ba ru sha ka dang/ 'di rnams tsha ba'i nad dang mkhris pa'i nang dang/ khrag rgyas pa dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ rims kyis btab pa la phan no/ /shing shug pa dang/ li kha ra'i shing pun+t+ra gnyis dang/ rid+d+hi dang/ b+h+rid+d+hi dang/
4b2(mdo 'grel): ri dags kaDka? ta'i rwa shing gi zhes bya ba dang/ sle tres dang/ rdzi ba na sna bcu dang 'di rnams ni nu zho skye/ rlung nad dang/ mkhris pa'i nad sel/ lus nyams chung zhing khong pa rmya ba lta bu la/ khong rta sha cher skye/ chong? bar byed/ bud med la nyal phod par
4b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /yang sman pa ru sha ka dang/ 'bras bu gsum po a ru ra dang/ ba ru ra dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ rgun 'brum dang/ shing ni hi ri kad pa la'i shun pa dang/ shing ka ta'i 'bras bu dang/ shing tog ra dza da na dang/ bal po se'u 'bras bu dang/
4b4(mdo 'grel): rgya sne'u dang 'di rnams skom dang che ba dang chu sri ba dang rlung nad sel to/ /yang lig bu mig dang/ ganda pri yaM gu dang/ spang spos dang/ me tog pad+ma dang/ me tog utpa la dang/ skyer khanTa dang/ sug smel dang/ shing mngar dang/ nA ga gser dang/
4b5(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams ni dug nad sel/ lus tsha ba dang/ mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad sel to/ /pa tol dang/ ka tu ka ro hi ni pu tsa shel dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ shing mngar dang/ sle tres dang/ shing pa tha dang/ 'di rnams ni/ bad kan dang/ mkhris pa dang
4b6(mdo 'grel): mdze dang/ rims dang/ dug dang/ rtag tu skyug bro ba dang/ zas yi gar mi 'od ba dang/ mig ser gyi nad dang 'di rnams sel to/ /yang gu ru rtse sle tres dang/ shug pa dang/ shing ni mpa dang/ 'u su'i 'bras bu dang/ tsan dan dmar po dang/ 'di
4b7(mdo 'grel): rnams ni mkhris pa dang/ bad kan rgyas pa dang/ rims kyis btab pa dang/ skyug bro ba dang /lus tsha ba dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ nad 'di rnams kyang sel/ zas 'ju pho ba'i drod skye/ dong ga dang/ in+d+ra ya ba dug mo yungs dang/ pa li'i me tog 
5a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ ka ka tik+ta dang/ nim+ba dang/ sle tre sa dang/ rtswa durba dang/ shing mngar dang/ ba tha dang/ tsi ra tik+ta zhes bya ba ci skrigs dang/ she'i rgya ga ni la puShpa dang ba na zhes kyang bya ba dang/ ba to la dang/ ka na dza rnam gnyis dang/ sapta tswa
5a2(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba dang/ shing gi 'dab ma rnam bdun dang/ tsi tra ka/ kru trug tres dang/ su sha bi dang/ po som cha dang/ shing ba na dang/ gon ta dang/ 'di rnams 'dra ste dong ka la sogs pa skyugs pa gcod/ mdze dang/ dug dang/ rims dang/ bad kan rgyas pa
5a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ g.yan pa dang/ gcin snyi ba dang/ rma de pa 'byad do/ /yang na sapta tsha dang shing lo ma bdun pa dang/ shing ti ni sha dang/ gro ba dang/ shwe ta ba ha dang/ sri ki ya ka dang/ shing seng ldeng dang/ shing ka ta ra dang/ b+hand+hi dang/ shing sha ba dang/ me sha
5a4(mdo 'grel): sh+rI ga dang/ tri hi ma dang/ ta la dang/ rgya skyegs kyi shing dang/ a ka ru dang/ rgya sne'u dang/ shing sA la dang/ shing d+ha ba dang/ ka bu ka dang/ ka li ka zhes bya ba dang/ in+d+ra ya ba dug mo nyung dang/ tsha ga karna dang/ a shwa karna tha dams dang/
5a5(mdo 'grel): de ltar a sa na la sogs pa sman 'di rnams ni/ sha bkra dang/ mdze dang/ bad kan gyi nang dang/ khong na srin bu yong pa sel/ nad skya rbab dang/ gcin snyi ba dang/ tsho ches pa'i tshil nang 'di rnams sel to/ /shing ba ra'i me tog dkar po dang/ shing
5a6(mdo 'grel): shi rgya ka'i me tog sngon po la na pa dang/ nyi 'u shing pa dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ mo ra ta dang/ shing bilba dang/ a bra shwa gi dang/ bri ha tI rnam gnyis ka rany+dza rnam gnyis/ dza ya rnam gnyis la/ ag ni man tha sna gnyis dang/ shing shi kru'i 'dab ma/ po'u ba
5a7(mdo 'grel): la ba dang/ rtswa ku sha dang/ ru rta 'di rnams ni shing ba ra na la sogs pa zhes bya ste/ bad kan gyi nad dang/ tsho ches te tshil skyes pa'i nad dang/ zas mi 'ju ste drod chung ba las/ rlung nad cher skyes pa sel klad pa na ba la phan/ skran dang/ an+ta bit+ta b+hi
5b1(mdo 'grel): khong 'bras 'di rnams sel to/ yang sman bri sha ka dang/ spangs ma dang/ shing kun dang/ nag tshur rnam gnyis te/ nag tshur dang/ rnag tshur bya bal ma dang/ rgyam tshwa dang/ shi la dza tu dang/ 'di rnams ni chu sri ba dang/ rde'u yod pa dang/ khong na skran yod pa dang
5b2(mdo 'grel): lus kyi tshil ches ba dang/ bad kan sel to/ /sman be lan+ta ra dang/ a ran+ni dang/ su ga dang/ bri she dang/ a sham be ta sru sru dang/ go kan+ta gze ma dang/ ka ta dang/ sa ha ra tsa dang/ ba na ni la phus pa dang/ rtswa durba dang/ brik+Sha da ni dang/ na la ku sha rnam gnyis
5b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ kun dang/ gun+d+ra dang/ ba lu ka dang/ mo ra ta dang/ ka ru ka ta dang/ shing ra ma pa dang/ ba rta dang/ sman sde 'di rnams ni/ rlung nang du gyur pa sel/ chu so na rde'u yod pa dang/ gcin sri ste/ 'od du mi rung ba dang/ 'di rnams sel to/ /yang sman sha
5b4(mdo 'grel): ba ra ka ro seng phrom dang/ pat+thi ka ro d+h+ra dang/ rgya skyegs skyi shing dang/ dzin+dzi ni dang/ thang shing brla dang/ shing katpa la'i shun pa dang/ kut+tsi ti ba dang/ ldum bu chu skyes kyi me tog dang/ me tog gi rtsa ba dang/ shing a shwa ka dang/ shing bi ta shwa ka dang/ e
5b5(mdo 'grel): la ba lu ka dang/ sa ri bel ba dang/ mo tsha rnams te/ de ltar sman ro d+hA la sogs pa 'di dag ni tshil che ba dang/ bad kan gyi nad sel bar byed/ bud med kyi mngal na ba la phan/ 'khru ba gcod/ sha mdog bzang bar 'gyur ro/ /dug nad sel to/ /shing
5b6(mdo 'grel): ar ka'i rtsa ba dang/ shing a larka dang/ na ga dan+ti dang/ bil shalya dang/ b+hargi dang/ ra sna dang/ bris tsi ka li dang/ sri kaM rgya dang/ shing a ba marg+ha'i me tog dang/ bi ta te la zhes bya ba ka ka da ni dang/ u da ki rya dang/ ma hA she da dang/ shing id+gu dang/
5b7(mdo 'grel): de ltar arka'i sder gtogs pa sman 'di rnams ni bad kan rgyas pa dang/ tshil ches pa dang/ dug nad rnams sel to/ /lto na srin bu yod pa dang/ mdze nad zhi bar byed/ lhag par ni rma red par 'byed ste 'che'o/ /bye'u rug pa rnam gnyis te nag po dang
6a1(mdo 'grel): ser po dang/ ku the ra ga zim thig le dang/ ka la ma la dang/ srin bu sel ba'i sman byi tang ga dang/ kha ra bat+ta dang/ bri sha karni dang/ katpa la zhes bya ba ro hi ni dang/ ka saM marda ka dang/ sha ba ka dang/ shing ka bi ta'i lo ma dang/ b+har
6a2(mdo 'grel): gyi ka bra'i rtsa ba dang/ rak+ta many+dzi ri dang/ ka ka ma tsi mon sne'u dang/ ku la ha ra dang/ bi sha mus+thi dang/ bu tri na dang/ bu ta ke shi baM po dang/ sman 'di rnams ni bye'u rug pa la sogs pa'i grangs su gtogs te/ bad kan rgyas pa dang/ tshil che ba dang
6a3(mdo 'grel): lto na srin bu yod pa dang/ 'di rnams sel/ cham ba na ba dang/ zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lud pa lu ba dang/ 'di rnams la phan te rma red pa 'byang/ muska ka dang/ su d+ha shi ri dang/ 'bras bu gsum ste/ a ru ra dang/
6a4(mdo 'grel): ba ru ra dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ rgya skyegs shing dang/ shing d+ha ba dang/ shiM sha ba dang/ 'di rnams ni skran dang/ gcin sri ba dang/ chu so na d+he'u yod pa dang/ skya rbab kyi nad dang/ tshil che ba dang/ gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang/ bad kan dang/
6a5(mdo 'grel): khu chu rnams sel bar byed do/ /dug mo nyung dang/ shing mur ba dang/ pu tse shel dang/ na le shaM dang/ albi sha dang/ gand+hi ra chu sgo ga dang/ sug smel dang/ ba tha sna gnyis dang/ dzi ra dang/ shing a ra la'i 'bras bu dang/ a dza mo da dang/
6a6(mdo 'grel): yungs kar dang/ shu dag dang/ zir nag po dang/ shing kun dang/ srin bu sman bi dang ka dang/ pa shu gan da dang/ pany+tsa ko la zhes bya ba/ pi pi ling dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba la brtse lag dang/ dbyi mo'i lo ma dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ li dong ra
6a7(mdo 'grel): 'di lnga dang/ sman de rnams ni rlung dang/ bad kan dang/ tshil ches pa dang/ cham pa dang/ skran dang/ rims na ba dang/ gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang 'di rnams sel bar byed do/ /shu dag dang/ gla sgang chen po dang/ thang shing dang/ sgron shing dang/ li dong ra
6b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ bong nga dang/ a ru ra dang/ skyer pa dang/ yung ba dang/ shing mngar dang/ kri sna par+Ni dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ sman 'di rnams ni shu dag dang skyer ba la sogs pa'i sman sde'i grangs su gtogs te/ zas ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs dang/ rab tu 'khru ba'i nad rnams
6b2(mdo 'grel): zhu zhing gcod do/ /tshil ches pa dang/ bad kan rgyas pa dang/ rlung nad dang/ bud med kyi nu ma na ba 'di rnams sel to/ ganda bri yang ku dang/ mig sman ra gan gyi dud pa dang/ lig bu mig dang/ stang zil dang/ me tog pad+ma'i ze ba dang/ lcim rtsa dang/ bcod
6b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ ya ba sha ka dang/ shing shalma shi li dang/ shing shalma li'i khu ba dang/ pu na na ga dang/ sa mad+ga dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ me tog d+ha ta ki dang/ am ba shtha dang/ shing mngar dang/ nam ska ri dang/ nam ti bri ga sha dang/ rgya skyegs shing dang/ ro d+ha
6b4(mdo 'grel): gser phrom dang/ mdza' ta ki dang/ shing pilpa dang/ be shing ka dang/ ka ti ga dang/ pad+ma'i ge sar ze ba dang/ sman 'di rnams ni sman sde rnam gnyis te/ gand+ha bri yang bu'i sde grangs su gtogs pa dang/ sman am bashtha la sogs pa de rnams ni kha zas zhu ba'i
6b5(mdo 'grel): tshang bar 'khru ba gcod do/ /sman 'di dag ni 'khru ba yang gcod/ nang gi sha tshad dang pags pa'i sha byung ba slar 'phros 'byor bar byed de phan/ mkhris pa rgyas pa la phan/ rma red pa yang 'tsho bar byed do/ /gla sgang dang/ shu dag dang/ tsi tra ka krug trug tres dang
6b6(mdo 'grel): skyer ba dang/ yung ba gnyis/ kha ba rnam gnyis la/ ka tu ka ro hi ni pu tse shel dang/ ka ka tik+ta dang/ go bye dang/ ba thA dang/ 'bras bu gsum po a ru ra dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ ba ru ra dang/ bong nga dkar po dang/ bong nga nag po dang/ khra bo dang/ ru rta dang/ sug
6b7(mdo 'grel): smal dang/ shu dag dang/ 'di rnams ni bud med kyi mngal na ba dang/ nu ma na ba dang/ dri ma bshang gci ba dang/ rdul dang/ rdu ma dang/ rna spabs la sogs pa sel cing 'byang ngo/ /shing nya gro dang/ shing a shwat+tha dang/ shing u dum ba ra dang/ pad ri ke?
7a1(mdo 'grel): ro d+ha sna gnyis 'dzam bu gnyis la/ bri had pha la dang/ d+ha swe pha la gnyis/ shing a dzun dang/ shing so ma balka dang/ shing bAk+Sha dang/ shing a mra dang/ shing many+dzu la dang/ shing bi la ya dang/ rgya skyegs shing dang/ shing
7a2(mdo 'grel): nan ti ki li dang/ shing bi ra la dang/ shing mngar dang/ shing ma du ka dang/ 'di rnams ni shing nya gro la sogs pa'i grangs su gtogs te/ rma 'tshe ste phan/ 'khru ba gcod/ chag thur byung na 'byor/ tshos te tshil ches ba dang/ mkhris pa rgyas
7a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ khrag rgyas pa dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ lus kyi khong tsha ba dang/ bud med kyi mngal na ba dang/ 'di rnams sel to phan no/ /sug smel dang/ ma he la dang/ tu ru ska dang/ ru rta dang/ gand+ha pri yaM ku dang/ spang spos dang/ ba laM b+hya ma ka
7a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ sprig ka 'bug sug dang/ zhog taM ku dang/ /tso tsa dang/ ganda pat+tra dang/ rgya spos dang/ sti ni ya dang/ spu ma zhes bya ba sri shing gi me tog gi khu ba dang/ nya phyis dang/ rgya mtsho nas byung ba'i chu srin gyi sen mo dang/ thang shing
7a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ a ka ru dang/ sh+ri ba sa ga dang/ gur gum dang/ tsan dan dang/ gu gul dang/ sa tsi ras dang/ pog kar po nu ma ka dang/ sunrA? ma dang/ nA ga ge sar dang/ 'di rnams ni sug smel la sogs te 'di dag dri zhim po'i sder gtogs te/ rlung
7a6(mdo 'grel): nad dang bad kan rgyas pa'i nad sel/ dug thub/ pags pa'i sha mdog bzang po sdug gur 'gyur ro/ /g.yan ba dang/ thor bu dang/ bas glags pa'i nad 'di rnams kun sel lo/ /sh+ya ma dang/ dan di dang/ dra ban+ti dang/ ka mu ka dang/ dri bid shing nye
7a7(mdo 'grel): rong dang/ shing khri ni dang/ pa ta la dang/ su bar+Na shi ri dang/ ga ba ga shi dang/ shi kha ri dang/ ki bi lya ka dang/ sle tres dang/ shing ka rany+dza dang/ ba stang tri dang/ bya d+hi ga ta dang/ b+ha la dang/ ba hu ra sa dang/ shing ro tsha ba rnams kyi 'bras bu ni smen
7b1(mdo 'grel): sha ma la sogs pa'i sder gtogs te/ skran dang/ dug 'thungs ba dang/ zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang/ bad kan rgyas pa dang/ snying na ba dang/ chu 'gags pa dang/ nad 'di rnams sel to/ /de ltar sman gyi sde grangs sum bcu rtsa gsum bshad pa la/ de dag gi
7b2(mdo 'grel): nang nas sman la la ma rnyed na yang/ sman gyi ro dang/ mthu dang yon tan 'dra ba las sman sna sbyor cig /bkru sman dang skyugs sman la sogs pa nad sbyang ba'i sman sna tshogs 'dus par bshad pa/ sman sde'i rnam grangs bshad pa'i le'u bco lnga pa rdzogs so// //
7b3(mdo 'grel): snum dpyad kyi cho gar bya ba bshad pa'i le'u bcu drug pa bshad par bya'o/ /snum gyi nang na mchog ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ zhun mar dang/ rkang dang/ tshil dang/ til mar dang bzhi'o/ /de ltar snum de dag ni spyir ni 'ju dka' ste lci/ bsil khong 'khru/ lus kyi khong snum
7b4(mdo 'grel): par byed/ 'jam par byed rtsa thams cad du 'gro bas na zhib mnyen/ lus kyi khong rlan par byed do/ /zas snum bag 'di dang 'dra ba'i sman snum bag can du gtogs pa phal cher yang de dang 'dra'o/ /snum dang sman de dang mi 'dra ba gzhan ni rtsub pa zhes bya'o
7b5(mdo 'grel): de la yang snum de dag gi nang yang zhun mar sman dang sbyar te bcos pa ni ji ltar sbyar ba bzhin du phan no/ /rkang dang tshil dang til mar gsum ni mkhris pa dang bad kan dang rlung sel to/ /de la zhun mar bas ni til mar 'ju dka' o/ /til mar bas ni
7b6(mdo 'grel): tshil 'ju dka' o/ /tshil bas kyang rkang 'ju dka' o/ /de la snum rnam gnyis zhes bya ba ni zhun mar dang til mar ro/ /snum rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni zhun mar dang til mar dang rkang mar gsum mo/ /snum rnam bzhi ni snum de bzhi la snum chen po bzhi zhes
7b7(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /de la snum gyi sman dpyad bya ba'i nad ni/ chang nang du gyur pa dang/ bud med kyis dub pa dang/ drag shul dang/ ngal ba'i las byas pa dang/ sems las chen po la zhugs pa dang/ mi rgan po dang/ byis pa dang nyams stobs chung ba dang/
8a1(mdo 'grel): skem po dang/ lus kyi khong na snum med de/ rtsub par gyur po dang/ khrag zad pa dang/ khu chu zad pa dang rlung nad kyis nyams thag pa dang/ mig rab rib khyer te rtul ba dang/ rna ba mi gsang ste legs par mi thos pa dang 'di rnams lta
8a2(mdo 'grel): bu la/ snum gyi bcud kyis lus brta bar bya'o/ /brta bar bya ba de la yang thog mar dugs byas la phyis bkru sman gyis bkrus te/ sbyangs nas de'i rjes la snum gyi dpyad bya'o/ /ha cang khong pa me'i drod ches pa dang/ lus sbom po dang/ nyams chung zhing ring ba
8a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ brla rengs pa dang/ tshad par rab tu 'khru ba dang/ ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs yod de mchin pa na ba dang/ lkog ma na ba dang/ dbyig dug gis phog pa dang/ lto ba'i nang du dmu rdzing lta bu dang/ brgyal ba dang/ rtag tu skyug pa dang/ zas yi gar mi 'ong ba
8a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ bad kan gyi nad yod pa dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ chang gis phog ste ra ro ba dang/ bud med bu btsas pa dang/ sman sna nas btang ba dang/ bkru sman gyis bkrus pa 'di lta bu la snum gyi dpyad bya zhing sbyin du mi rung ngo/ /de la zhun mar gyi yon tan ni sems
8a5(mdo 'grel): rno mi brjed cing dran pa dang/ yid gzhungs/ lus skem zhing ring pa 'di lta bu la phan no/ /til mar ni lton srin bu yod pa dang/ tshil ches pa dang/ rlung nad can du gyur pa 'di lta bu la til mar phan no/ /lus khong yang ba dang/ lus khong grims shing sha
8a6(mdo 'grel): mkhrang ba dang/ lto sra ba 'di lta bu la rkang zos na phan no/ /lus la rlung dang nyi tshin gyis gdungs pa dang/ lam ring por bgrong pas khong du dub pa dang/ smra mangs pa dang/ bud med la drags pa dang/ drag shul dang/ las ches pa dang/ srog
8a7(mdo 'grel): zungs bdun lta bu zad pa dang/ lus kyi khong na snum med de/ rtsub por gyur pa dang nyon mongs pa byas pas lus ring ba dang/ pho ba'i drod ha cang ches te zas ha cang 'ju ba dang/ rtsa sgo kun rlung gis 'gags shing chod pa 'di lta bu la tshil zos na phan no//
8b1(mdo 'grel): de la tshil ni lhag par rus pa'i tshigs kha bye ba dang/ rus pa chag pa dang snod bsnad pa dang/ lto ba'i nang grol na ba dang/ mes tshig pa dang/ lus rmas te rma byung ba dang/ rkang lag gi tshigs bur ba dang/ mo mtshan na ba dang/ rna ba na ba dang/ klad pa na ba dang/
8b2(mdo 'grel): 'di lta bu la tshil phan no/ /til mar ni lhag par dbyar zla tha chung dang/ ston zla ra ba'i ngo la phan no/ /zhun mar ni ston zla 'bring po dang/ tha chungs kyi ngo la phan no/ /rkang dang tshil ni dpyid ka phan no/ /snum 'di rnams gang yang rung dus tshigs dang mi sbyor bar
8b3(mdo 'grel): 'phral gang bab du gtong na/ tshes grangs kyi nyi ma bzang ba dang/ sprin dang yul ngan med cing yul bzang ba'i tshe thong zhig /til mar ni dgun zla grang lhags pa che ba'i tshe btang na phan no/ /zhun mar ni dbyar zla ra ba dang/ 'bring po tsha ba'i dus na mtshan mo
8b4(mdo 'grel): 'thungs na phan no/ /mkhris pa dang rlung nang du gyur na zhun mar ni mtshan mo yang btang du rung ngo/ /yang rlung dang mkhris pa lta bu nang sna gnyis 'dres par na na/ til mar dang zhun mar mtshan mo btang du rung ngo/ /rlung dang bad kan gyi nang du gyur na/ zhun mar dang sman dang sbyar ba nyin bar thong zhig /de bas na sman zhun mar dang sman
8b5(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar pa'i til dang kha zas la sogs pa rnams dang/ sman mas btang ba dang/ sman sna nas btang ba dang/ lus mar gyis bsku ba dang/ sman bskol ba'i khu ba khar blugs shing dbo? ba dang/ mgo dang rna ba dang mig tu sman pa sku zhing blugs pa la sogs pa
8b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyang ran pa tsam du btang ngo/ /ro rnam drug la sogs pa sna re re ba dang/ ro sna gnyis pa dang/ ro sna gsum pa dang/ sna bzhi pa dang/ sna lnga pa la sogs pa sman sbyar ba'i ro bro ba'i sna grangs drug cu rtsa bzhi la sogs par phye ba de las/ snum gyi dngos po mar la sogs
8b7(mdo 'grel): pa ro logs shig mtha dang pa ma yin te/ ji ltar zhe na/ sman mar sbyor ba yang/ sman sna mang po gsogs la/ mar nyung du byas pas na/ ma bgyi ro zil gyis gnon to/ /lhag par bro ba med pas na ro drug cu nyid kyi nang du 'dus so/ /dper na ji skad du bstan pa/
9a1(mdo 'grel): sman bskol pa'i khu ba dang dangs ma btung ba'i ro de yang chu'i ro tsa bro ba la logs shig na rgyu lhag pa med do/ /ro drug cu nyid kyi nang du 'dus so/ /yang ni sman mar myur du gang phan pa de bzang ste/ de la thun chung ngu zos na thun gnyis kyis 'ju'o//
9a2(mdo 'grel): tshong 'brid du zos na thun bzhis 'ju'o/ /tshod cher zos na nyin zhag gcig gis 'ju'o/ /de ltar sman dang sbyar ba'i til mar ram/ sman mar gang za yang rung ste/ mi nyam dang nad kyi dmigs la sbyor la/ sngar ni tshod chung ngu nas bza' bar bya'o//
9a3(mdo 'grel): yang bkru sman gyis bkru bar 'dod na kha rtsad lta bu zas zos la/ da nang lta bu zhu ste khong na yang/ zhun mar dang dangs ma 'ba' zhig tshod cher mang du bza' o/ /mar 'thungs pas nad zhi bar byas pa zhig la zas kyang cher ma zos te/ khong bkres na
9a4(mdo 'grel): mar 'bring tsam du zos na phan no/ /sman mar gyis nyams btsag brta zhing sha skye bar bya na/ dro khar sman mar nyung zad bzhu ste/ sha khu gdungs la dro tsha tsam gyi nang du blugs la 'thungs nas/ de'i rjes kha zas snum bag zos la chang gis mnan na phan no/ /yang byis
9a5(mdo 'grel): ba gzhon nu lta bu dang/ mi rgan po dang/ rtag tu skom dang che ba dang/ mar za ba 'am/ 'thung mi phod pa dang/ chang nad che ba dang/ rtag tu bud med dang phrad de/ rtag tu kha zas snum bag za ba lta bu dang/ drod chung ste kha zas mi 'ju ba lta bu dang/ skyid de bde bar
9a6(mdo 'grel): 'dug 'dug pa'i mi dang/ sman stobs chung ba'i nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa lta bu dang/ lto snyi ba dang/ nad dkyil mi che ba lta bu dang/ so ga tsha ba'i dus dang/ nad kyis ring par gyur pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mar btang ba ni/ dro ba sman
9a7(mdo 'grel): mar nyung shes bzhu ste cig tu 'thung ngam/ khu ba dron pos phul te 'thungs pa'i rjes la/ kha zas snum bag dang chang 'thung zhig /de la nad dmigs kyi rim pa dang sbyar te sman mar btang ba'i thabs ni/ lus kyi stong na nad yod na ni kha zas
9b1(mdo 'grel): zos pa'i rjes la mar phyis btung ngo/ /bod pa'i nang lus kyi bar na nad yod pa ni kha zas phyed zos nas sman mar btung ngo/ /lus kyi smad na nad yod na ni/ dro khar lto stong la sman mar btang na/ rjes la kha zas dang tshil nan 'thungs na nad sel to/ /sman
9b2(mdo 'grel): mar btang ba'i thabs rim pa 'di ltar byas na/ phan pa'i stobs mthu yang/ lus kyi rim pa bzhin du skye'o/ /de ltar sman mar 'thungs pa las mar cung zad ma zhu na/ chu tshan gdug du ba'i dangs ma khas bzod tsam 'thungs na/ mar bde blag tu 'jug par
9b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /sman mar la sogs pa zos te/ snum kha'i nang du chags na/ chu tshan gdus pa khas bzod tsam gyis kha bkru'o/ /e raN+Da'i khu ba gdus pa dang/ ba la ta ka zhes bya ba go ba dang 'di gnyis su bsdus pa'i khu ba ni btung du mi rung ngo/ /gal te kha  
9b4(mdo 'grel): rtsad dam/ khar nyin lta bu sman mar 'thungs pa las zhu 'am ma zhu gtol med de the tsom za na/ chu tshan gdu gdu ba yang 'thung zhig /de 'thungs pas khong du ma zhu la/ ma zhu ba'i gdung sgregs mnan po ma yin sgregs pa yang tha mal bar 'od/ /khong
9b5(mdo 'grel): yang zhing zas yi gar 'ong bar gyur na/ kha zas ran tsam du bza' zhing 'tshal nan kyang ci ran du 'thung zhig /de ltar sman mar 'thungs nas zhu ba'i rjes la/ kha zas bza' ba ni khu ba ro bag dang/ zas bad kan du mi 'gyur ba dang/ ha cang zas snum bag
9b6(mdo 'grel): nyid ma yin pa dang/ kha zas grang dro ma 'dres par bza' o/ /sman mar 'thungs pa lta bu la kha lag kyang chu dron pos bkru/ bud med dang 'phrad du mi rung/ mtshan mo yang gnyid bar nyal/ bshang ci 'ong na mi dgag go /brag shul gyi las mi bya/ khro zhing
9b7(mdo 'grel): tshig pa za ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ grang ba 'am/ nyi tshan la 'dug pa 'am/ rlung drag po lang pa'i khar 'gro ba 'am/ rta zhon te phan tshun 'khyam pa 'am/ lam du zhugs pa dang/ mang du smra ba dang/ stan ha cang mi mtho ba la 'dug pa dang/ sngas ha cang mtho ba
10a1(mdo 'grel): 'am/ dma' ba 'di rnams lta bu mi bya'o/ /nyin par nyal ba dang/ dud pa dku ba'i nad na 'dug pa dang/ rdul khrod na 'dug pa 'di rnams kyang mi rung ste/ de lta bas na sman mar ci srid 'thungs pa de srid kyi bar du/ cho ga de ltar
10a2(mdo 'grel): bya zhing mi rung ba rnams spang ngo/ /sman mar dang 'dra bar bkru sman btang ba dang/ sna nas btang ba dang/ sman mas btang ba rnams kyang tshul de dang 'dra bar nang byang gi bar du chog yun de srid du bsrung bar bya'o/ /de la nang zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ sman
10a3(mdo 'grel): mar btang ba'i chog bkru sman dang 'dra ste/ sman mar gyi cho ga yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /de la lto snyi na ni sman mar nyi ma gsum du btang ngo/ /lto sra na ni nyi ma bdun du btang ngo/ /sman mar btang bas nad rtse zhil te/ khod legs par snum par gyur
10a4(mdo 'grel): na/ de phan chad kha zas kyi chog bya'o/ /de ltar sman mar btang bas nang rtse zhil bar gyur na/ stong smad du dbugs dbyung ba tha mal par 'od/ pho ba'i me drod ches te 'bar/ bshad pa snum la mi sri ba 'byung/ mar dang snum bag mi 'dod da skyo/ /lus
10a5(mdo 'grel): snyom ste 'di ltar gyur na/ nad rtse zhil zhing lus kyi khong legs par sum por gyur pa yin no/ /lus kyi khong rtsub na ni tshul 'di dang 'dra ste/ 'di las bzlog ste blta'o/ /gal te sman mar dang snum gyi tshod ma zin tam/ phan pa ma yin par zos
10a6(mdo 'grel): sam/ btang ba'i dus ma yin par 'thungs sam/ kha zas log pa ha cang snum ches pa 'am/ bsil zhing rtsub pa 'am/ zas ma zhu bzhin du zos pa 'am/ mtshan mo mi nyal zhing nyin par phan tshun 'khyam pa dang/ mi mthun pa log pa byas pa 'di
10a7(mdo 'grel): lta bu las sman mar ma zhu ste/ snum dregs par gyur na/ gdong pa dang lus kyi sha mdog ser/ snabs dang mchil ma mang/ thur du tshad par 'khru ste/ de lta bu las nad ni lus skrangs pa dang/ gzhang 'brum khrag tshad du 'od do/ /khong rmya lus dgye rgu
10b1(mdo 'grel): mi shes te/ rengs bag du 'dug /sems myos te blong bag du 'dug /g.yan pa dang/ mdze dang rims nad rtag tu skyug pa dang/ khong na lto sbo/ /mgo 'khor la sogs pa dang/ 'di lta bu'i nang du 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu la dpyad bya ba ni zas dang skom
10b2(mdo 'grel): dbri zhing bsdams pa dang/ skyugs sman btad dugs bya/ zas dang skom rnams rtsub pa'i bag btang/ 'tshal nan dar ba dang/ a ru ra dang/ ba ru ra dang/ 'di lta bu mnan pa'i khu ba dang/ dar ba bskol ba dang/ nas dang/ ci ce dgod dang/ khre dgong dang
10b3(mdo 'grel): pi pi ling dang/ 'bras bu gsum po a ru ra dang/ ba ru ra dang/ skyu ru ra gsum/ sbrang rtsi la sbyar te btang ba 'am/ yang na a ru ra btags pa dang/ pa gcin dang gu gul bsres nas 'thungs na phan no/ /mdor na nang dmigs ji ltar mi bde ba dang
10b4(mdo 'grel): sbyar la dpyad byas na/ mar brags pa'i nad 'byang ngo/ /yang de lta bu la dpyad du bya ba ni kha zas mi bza' ba ni bza' bar smyung ba mi nus na yang/ /kha zas rtsub po bza' ba'i dpyad byas na smyung ba byas pa dang 'dra'o/ /gal te mar drags pa'i nad las
10b5(mdo 'grel): bkru sman btang dgos par gyur na/ nyi ma gsum gyi bar du kha zas snum pa khu ba drod bag dang/ yul ska ma sa nas byung ba'i sha las khu ba drod bag du byas pa dang/ kha zas drod bag zos la/ nang nub du dugs bya zhing/ nyi ma gsum du snum
10b6(mdo 'grel): bag gi drod dang/ dugs de ltar byas nas/ de'i rjes la bkru sman btang ngo/ /skyugs smon btang ba ni mi sha dang tshil ches/ bad kan mang/ drod ma snyoms te zas res 'ga' 'ju/ res 'ga' mi 'ju ba de lta bu ni nyin zhag gcig bad kan
10b7(mdo 'grel): skye ba'i kha zas byin la/ phyi de nyin skyugs sman thong zhig /yang zas snun bag gis bskyed bskyed pa/ bad kan can de lta bu la sngar zas rtsub po byin te/ de'i rjes la kha zas snum bag gis khong snum par byas nas bkru sman thong zhig /dpyad
11a1(mdo 'grel): de ltar byas na mar dang snum bag las nad du gyur pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /mar dang snum lta bur ma 'phrod de nang du gyur pa kha zas kyi dpyad byas pas ma byad na/ sman btang ba'i dpyad byas pas nad kyi dri ma phyin par 'gyur ro//
11a2(mdo 'grel): byis pa chung ngu dang/ rgan po la sogs pa mar dang snum bag spong mi nus la/ cho ga dka' na 'phral du snum gyi dpyad 'di skyo zhing gnod par yang mi 'gyur gyi gyis shig bya ba'i thabs ni mar brngos la sha khu las btang ngam/ thug pa'i
11a3(mdo 'grel): nang du btab la blug yang na til btags pa'i nang du mar btab la/ bu ram bskol ba'i lu bas btang ste btung ngo/ /yang na 'bras dang til mar dang sran ma sha dang/ sna gsum gyi thug pa nang du yang mar 'di bzhin du btab la btung ngo//
11a4(mdo 'grel): 'o ma bskol ba dron mo'i nang du mar btab pa'i thug pa 'am zho mngal ma zhog chu bor la/ bu ram gyis btab ste blud pa'i thug pa de lta bu rnam pa drug dang/ mar rkang tshil dang til dang sna bzhi 'bras dang sna lnga'i thug pa dang/ spyir
11a5(mdo 'grel): drug dang/ yang thug pa rnam pa lnga po 'di dag dang/ thug pa sna bdun po 'di rnams ni 'phral du lus kyi khong snum par 'gyur te/ lan tshwa cher gdab po/ /thug pa 'di dag ni bad kan du mi 'gyur ro/ /lus rtsub par mi 'gyur/ yang mdze nad dang
11a6(mdo 'grel): lus skrang bag dang/ gcin rtag tu 'ong zhing snyi ba 'di lta bu la bu ram dang yul gsher sa nas byung ba'i sha dang/ 'o ma dang til dang/ sran ma sha dang/ chang dang zho rnams bzar mi rung ngo/ /snum gyi cho ga dang/ dpyad byas gnod
11a7(mdo 'grel): par ma gyur na/ sman 'bras bu gsum po dang/ pi pi ling dang/ /a ru ra dang/ gu gul la sogs pa bskol la thong zhig /de ltar btang na nang rnying yang 'byar la/ lus kyi khong nas drod skye/ khong pa nang gi nad kun 'byang/ srog zungs
11b1(mdo 'grel): bdun 'phral du brta/ nyams stobs dang bzhin mdog bzang por 'gyur/ dbang po rnams brtan/ rgan sra/ lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/ mar rtag tu bza' ba'i yon tan de ni de ltar 'gyur ro/ /snum la dpyad kyi cho gar bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so// //de nas dugs
11b2(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /de la dugs kyi bye brag ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ dugs bya ba dang/ bag zan dang sman du sbyar bas lus la bcing zhing dugs bya ba dang/ dugs tha mal pa dang/ chu lums dang rnam pa bzhi'o/ /de la dugs zhes bya ba ni me las bsros pa yin te/ de
11b3(mdo 'grel): la yang ji ltar zhe na/ me mdag la gos sam thong lcags sam lag pa'i thal mo me la bsros pa la sogs pas dugs bya'o/ /bag zan dang sman du sbyar ba'i dugs lus la glan cing bcing ba ni bag phye 'am 'bru sna tshogs btags la sman shing tsha phabs dang nye'u
11b4(mdo 'grel): shing dang thang shing dang gur kum dang/ a ru ra dang/ ldum bur sna dang/ e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang/ yul gsher sa nas byung ba'i sha dang/ tshwa dang/ dar ba dang/ 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ 'di rnams kyis sla mor sprus la lan tshwa cher btab ste btsos la ras kyi steng du bdal te/ lus gar
11b5(mdo 'grel): na sar glan zhing bcings na dugs 'dis ni rlung nad 'byin bar 'gyur ro/ gal te bad kan dang 'dres pa'i nang du gyur na ni dugs de'i nang du bye'u rug pa la sogs pa dang sbyar la dugs bya'o/ /mkhris pa'i nad la ni shing shug pa dang sbyar ro/ /dugs glan te de ltar sbyar ba las
11b6(mdo 'grel): gal te sla bas lus la mi chags shing ras kyi mi thub na mar dang til mar la sogs pa snum gyis bsnan te/ yang dang yang bsro zhing pags pa ma rul ba dri mi zhim ba ma yin pas phyi rol nas dugs bya'o/ /pags pa de lta bu ma rnyed na sman rlung sel ba'i lo ma a
11b7(mdo 'grel): shwa ganda 'am/ e raN+Ta 'am/ dar ram bal sna 'am/ ras kyis g.yogs shing dkris la mtshan mo dugs byas na ni nyin par mi dgos kyi khrol cig /nyin par dugs byas na ni mtshan mo mi dgos kyi khrol cig /de la dugs tha mal pa zhes bya ba ni bag phye ba
12a1(mdo 'grel): dang mar chur sbyar te btsas pa'i bag zan sla mos/ gang na ba'i thog du glan cing 'dug pa dang/ gyo mo'i dum bu dang/ bag dum dang/ rdo ba dang/ sa phye ma dang/ gso ma'i lo ma dang/ 'bras la sogs pa 'bru rnams dang/ lug
12a2(mdo 'grel): gi ril ma dang bye ma dang/ phub ma la sogs pa thabs du mas bcos sam/ brngos pa'i dugs kyis yul gyi rnams dang dus dang sbyar zhing dugs bya'o/ /de la sman ku'i lums bya ba'i dpyad ni/ shing shi kru dang/ shi kru'i rtsa ba dang/ lo ma dang/
12a3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu la sogs pa ji snyed ba dang shing e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang/ lo ma la sogs pa dang/ ka rany+dza dang/ byi'u rug pa dang/ kardza ka dang/ shing shi ri sha dang/ ldum bu ba sha dang/ 'od ma dang/ shing a ra ka dang/ ma li ti dang/ d+hirg+ha bi n+ta dang/
12a4(mdo 'grel): gso ma'i lo ma dang/ shu dag la sogs pa dang yul gsher sa nas byung ba'i sha dang/ nya dang/ dang dur la sogs pa'i sha dang/ sman gyi rtsa ba sna bcu pa dang 'di rnams la sogs pa nad dmigs? dang sbyar la nad lci na sman 'di kun sna tshang bar gsogs te brdungs
12a5(mdo 'grel): la chang dang tshwa dang 'o ma dang chu la sogs pa dang sbyar te bcos la bum pa'i nang du blugs la gang na bar sman gyi rlangs pa dron pos gar na ba'i dmigs su bdug cing lums bya'o/ /yang na rlangs pas mi bdug par smin btso btso ba'i khu ba dro tsha
12a6(mdo 'grel): tsam bum pa'i khar phra mor bstod pa 'am/ sbub bu ring por bstod pa'i/ blugs pa'i kha nas sman gyi khu ba'i rgyun byung nas nad kyi steng du blugs shing sman khu'i lums bya'o/ /de ltar sman khu'i lums byed pa'i tshe lus la gos kyis kyang
12a7(mdo 'grel): g.yogs la de'i steng du sman khu'i chu lums kyis lus la bde ba ran par blugs shing lums bya'o/ /yang na sman khu dron mo de gzhong khung lus tshad chen po'i nang du gang bar blugs la de'i nang du lus zhugs na rlung nang thams cad la
12b1(mdo 'grel): phan par 'gyur ro/ /nad pa chu lums de lta bu'i nang du zhags te 'dug na gzhang 'brum khrag tshad du 'ong ba dang chus 'gags te gcin sri ba dang/ rlung nad la sogs pa la phan no/ /de lta bu'i lums bya zhing 'jug pa la kha zas snum bag bza' zhing ?zas zhu nas snga dro chu
12b2(mdo 'grel): lums bya'o/ /de ltar lums bya ba'i tshad ni nad pa'i nad dmigs che chung dang/ yul rnams dang dbyar dgun gyi dus dang sbyar la lums che chung 'bring gar ran pa tshod de las dpags te bya'o/ /de las bad kan gyi nad dmigs shas chen ni sman khong rtsub par 'gyur ba dang
12b3(mdo 'grel): sbyar la chu lums bya'o/ /mi rang bzhin rlung dang bad kan can zhig la rlung nad skyes te rtsub par gyur na sman rtsub pa dang snum bag yod pa gnyis ga dang sbyar ba'i chu lums bya'o/ /yang nad pa pho ba'i nang du rlung nad zhugs pa la/ long ga'i nang du bad kan gyi nang zhugs par
12b4(mdo 'grel): gyur pa 'di lta bu la ni sngar pho pa'i gnas la phan pa'i lums rtsub ma'i lums bya'o/ /long ga'i nang na bad kan yod pa ni so so'i nas kyi bye brag dang sbyar te snum bag yod pa'i lums bya'o/ /de la dugs dang lums gang byed kyang rung ste/ sta zur dang chu so'i bar dang/
12b5(mdo 'grel): mig dang rlig pa'i 'bras bu dang/ snying dang 'di rnams la dugs chung ngu bya'o/ /yang na ni ma byed cig lums legs par byas pa'i tshul ni khong drang zhing bsil ba kun med zug cing na ba byang lus dang rkang lag 'jam pa de lta bur gyur na lums legs pa yin te lums
12b6(mdo 'grel): kyi rjes su lus dal gyis mnye zhing de'i rjes la chu dron pos lus khrus byas nas de'i 'og tu snum btang ba'i cho ga gyis shig /yang lums ha cang drags na nyen du gyur pa'i nad dmigs ni/ mkhris pa dang khrag rgyas te tsha ba'i nad skye skom dang che/ myos shing rgyal ba 'am/ rog par
12b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ skad 'gags rkang lag na mgo 'khor/ rkang lag gi tshigs kun na rims tsha bas 'debs/ lus kyi sha tshig ste nag po dang dmar po thig thig por snang lums ha cang drags na skyug dro ba 'di lta bu'i nyen du 'gyur ro/ /lums de ltar ha cang drags te/ tsha ba dang/ mgo
13a1(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba dang/ skyug bro ba la sogs pa dang/ gzhan yang dug gis phog pa dang/ nas tshigs 'khus pa'i cha la sogs pa'i sman btang ngam/ me bca' btab bam/ mes tshig gam/ tshad pas btang bam/ skyug bro 'am/ snying mi dran te myos pa
13a2(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams lta bu la/ lums rtsi ze raN+Da dang/ nye'u shing lta bu dang/ nya dang chu bya sna tshogs lta bu ni/ bsil zhing lci ba'o/ /tsha zhing rno ba na le sham lta bu dang/ drod che ba'i sman tshid ka dang/ dbyi mo'i lo ma 'di lta bu rnams sbyor te so so'i nad dmigs las lums
13a3(mdo 'grel): ci rigs par byas na nad dmigs kyi nyen de lta bur mi 'gyur ro/ /lums rtsir bzang ba ni rlon zhing zhu ba yod pa sra te tshos dka' ba spyi bag dang/ 'byar bag du 'dug pa dang/ snum bag dang/ rtsub pa'i bag dang/ rtsa'i nang du 'gror rung ba zhib pa de lta bu'i sman
13a4(mdo 'grel): ni lums rtsir bzang po/ /lums kyis nang dang/ nyen du mi 'gyur ba'i sman rtsi ni 'jam pa dang/ rtsub pa dang/ zhib pa dang/ 'byar ba spyi bag 'dug pa dang/ zhub gsher bag can 'di lta bu la sbyar na lums legs te nang du gyur pa la rtse zhil te phan par
13a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /mdor na sman kha ba dang/ bska ba dang/ mngar bag 'di gsum yod pa phal cher sbyar na lums nyes pa'i nad thams cad rtse gzhi la cing phan par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar lums ha cang drags pa las nang du gyur pa de slad bcos pa'i thabs kyis nad rtse zhil
13a6(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur te/ phan pa'i rtags ni gong du lums drags pa'i nyen smos pa rnams bya nga la nyams stobs skye bar tshor na de ni lums drag pa'i nad phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /yang lums drag ches te nad du gyur pa de rtse zhil ba'i thabs ha cang
13a7(mdo 'grel): drags che sa na yang/ sha ma dangs kyi pags pa dang chu ba dang/ rkang lag rnams 'khums par 'gyur/ snying 'phar zhing na smra mi nus 'grams pa'i nya byung ste lhung mchu dang lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ pags pa rnams nag por 'gyur ba de lta ni
13b1(mdo 'grel): ha cang rtse gzhil drags pa'i nad yin no/ /de la dugs byar mi rung ba'i dmigs ni ha cang tshon po spom po dang/ rlung ches te khong rtsub pa dang/ ring par gyur te nyams chung ba dang/ brgyal ba dang sngar lums dags pa las slar gso zhing dpyad bya dgos pa dang/ glo na ba dang/ glo rdol ba dang/
13b2(mdo 'grel): srog gzungs bdun po zad de lus skam por song ba dang/ lus khur ram las kyis dub ba lta bu dang/ chang las nang du gyur pa lta bu dang/ mig rab rib za ba dang/ dmu rdzing du gyur te lto cher skyes pa dang/ shu ba mched pa dang/ mdze nad dang 'or nad skrang bag dang/ tsha ba mkhris
13b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i nad yod pa dang 'o ma dang zho dang mar 'thungs pa dang/ sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa dang kru sman btang ba dang/ lus snang ba dang gzhang 'brum khrag tshad 'ong ba dang/ sems 'khrugs pa dang/ mya ngan gyis btab pa dang/ 'jigs shing bag tsha ba lta bu yod pa dang/ bkres pa dang/ skom
13b4(mdo 'grel): ba'am mig ser gyis btab pa'am/ skya sbas kyi nang yod pa 'am gcin snyi ste rtag tu 'ong ba 'di lta bu dang/ spyir mkhris pa'i nad yod pas tsha ba'i nad che ba 'di lta bu la lums byar mi rung bud med sbrum ma dang/ zla mtshan zags pa dang/ bu btses pa lta bu dang/ 'di lta bu la
13b5(mdo 'grel): lums byar mi rung ngo/ /gal te sbrum ma'am zla mtshan zag pa dang bu btsas pa 'di lta bu la lums mi byar mi rung ba 'am/ dug gis phog ste lums bya dgos na yang lums mi drags pa 'jam por gyis shig /de la lums bya ba'i nad dmigs ni bad kan
13b6(mdo 'grel): ches te dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lung ba lu ba dang/ chams pas btab pa dang/ skyigs bus btab pa dang/ lto spos pa dang/ bshang gci gnyis ka 'gags te dbyung du mi rung ba dang/ mgul subs shing skad 'gags pa dang/ rlung nad kyi bag tu mi bde ba dang/
13b7(mdo 'grel): bad kan rgyas pa dang/ be'u snabs yod de mchin pa na ba dang/ lus dgye rgu mi shes te khong rengs pa dang/ lus lci ba dang/ rlig rlugs kyi nang yod pa dang/ /mtshan par rdol ba'i nad dang/ da rgan lus nang du rgyu ba 'am/ phyir dgye ba'i nad kyang rung rlung nad kyis zug
14a1(mdo 'grel): thabs su na ba dang/ chu 'gags pa dang/ thor bu chen po byung ba 'am/ rmen bu skrangs pa'am pags pa'i nang du thor bu 'byung la phyir rdol du mi rung ba lta bu dang/ skyes bu khu ba 'gags te 'ong du mi rung ba dang rlung nad che ba dang/ 'di rnams
14a2(mdo 'grel): lta bu la so so'i nad dmigs dang mthun par sman sbyar la lums dang dugs bya'o/ /yang mi la rlung nad yod pa 'am tshos te tshil ches pa'am/ bad kan rgyas pa de lta bu la lums btsos shing gdu gdu ba mi dgos par khang par rlung med pa dron po'i
14a3(mdo 'grel): nang du gos bsros la dron po gyon te rdul dbyung ba dang gos lci bar gyon cing rdul bar bya ba dang/ sdangs par bya zhing rdul gdon par byas na lums bya mi dgos par phan no/ /yang me la btsos pa'i lus btsan po chem yin par tha mal bar zan dang/ sman du
14a4(mdo 'grel): sbyar bas btsos pas lus la dkri zhing bdug pa dang/ tshad mang du blung la dugs byas nas phan no/ /rdul mang du dbyung ba'i thabs dang/ khro bar byas pas rdul dbyung ba dang/ bsres par byas pa dang/ skom par bya ba dang/ nyin tshan la bzhag pa 'di lta bus
14a5(mdo 'grel): kyang bad kan la sogs pa'i nad lums bya mi dgos par phyin par rung ngo/ /de lta bas ma lus dang khod pa nang gi nad yod pa la mar dang til la sogs pa snum gyi dpyad kyis ni nad bsrul lo/ /nad bsrul ba de khod pa nang khrol gyi nang du song yang rung
14a6(mdo 'grel): srog gzungs bdun gyi nang du song ngam rkang lag gi nang du song ngam nang rung ba'i nang du zhen kyang rung/ de lta bu la lums sam dugs byas na snum gyis bsrul ba'i nad de snyil zhing sla bar gyur nas khong du sdud do/ /khong du nang lus pa dang
14a7(mdo 'grel): bkru sman gyis bkrus te nad kyi dbyis 'byung ngo/ /dugs dang lums kyi cho ga ste le'u bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //skyugs sman dang bkru sman btang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bco brgyad pa bshad par bya'o/ /bad kan rgyas pa'i nad
14b1(mdo 'grel): dam bad kan rgyas pa rlung ngam/ mkhris pa dang 'dres kyang rung ste/ de lta bu'i sman la skyugs sman thong zhig/ tshul 'di dang 'bra bar mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad la ni bkru sman thong zhig /yang rims gsar ba dang/ tshad pa 'khru ba dang thur du mkhris pa dang
14b2(mdo 'grel): khrag tu 'khyu ba dang/ glo gcong chen po skam byed dang/ mdze dang gcin snyi ba dang/ 'brum chen dang thor bu 'byung ba'i nang dang/ rkang pa cher skrangs pa'i nad dang snying mi dran te myos par gyur pa dang/ lud pa lu ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ snying 'phar ba dang
14b3(mdo 'grel): bud med nu ma na ba dang/ ro stod yan chad kyi nad mi ba 'di rnams dang nad thams cad la skyugs sman btang na phan no/ /de la skyugs sman btang du mi rung ba'i nad dmigs ni bud med sbrum ma dang/ rlung nad yod de khong rtsub pa dang/ bkres pa dang rtag tu sdug
14b4(mdo 'grel): bsngal ba dang byis pa chung ngu dang/ mi rgan po dang skem po dang tshe ste sbom po dang glo sma na ba dang/ mtshon gyis rmas pa dang/ nyams chung ba dang/ rtag tu slon pa dang/ mcher pa na ba dang/ mig rab rib khyer ba dang/ lto na srin bu yod pa dang/ khar khrag dang
14b5(mdo 'grel): rlung du 'dres par 'byung ba dang/ son pa dang/ skad 'dzer ba dang/ chu sri ba dang/ dmu rdzing dang/ skran dang/ sman btang ba yang yang slon du mi rung ba dang/ ha cang drod che ba dang/ gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang/ rtug skam gyis btab pa dang/ mgo 'khor ba dang
14b6(mdo 'grel): rtse bas logs rdo bzhin sra bas rem rem por nad dkyel chags pa dang/ glo na ste rtsib logs su zug pa dang/ rlung nad kyi bag 'di lta bu la skyugs sman btang du mi rung ngo/ /yang khrag sman btang ru mi rung ba ni btsan dug 'thungs sam/
14b7(mdo 'grel): dbyig dug 'thungs sam kha zas ma zhu ba 'am/ kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa 'am/ be'u snams las rim su gyur tam/ rtag tu skyugs sman btang yang skyug tu mi rung ba la skyugs sman mi btang bar/ gong du smos kyang
15a1(mdo 'grel): dug 'thungs sam/ skyugs sman mi btang du mi rung ba'i nad dmigs zhig yin na 'di rnams lta bu la skyugs sman thong zhig/ nad dmigs gzhan dang sbyar te skyugs sman btang ba'i rjes la sman gyi dud pa spu gu gnas
15a2(mdo 'grel): btang ste bdug tu rung ngo/ /btsan dug dang dbyig dug gis phog pa dang/ zas ma zhu ba 'am/ kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa 'di rnams lta bu la skyugs sman btang ba'i rjes la dud pa spu gu nas btang zhing bdug pa dang/ zas kyi cho gas
15a3(mdo 'grel): bstan pa 'di rnams byar mi rung ngo/ /de la bkru sman gyis bkru zhing gsor rung ba'i nad ni skran dang gzhang 'brung khrag tshad 'brum bu dang gzhogs phyed na ste bskyod mi nus pa dang/ mig ser dang/ rims yun du lon te bying ba dang/ dmu rdzing
15a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /dbyig dug dang/ rtag tu skyugs pa dang/ mtshar ba na ba dang/ sha mdog ser por gyur pa'i nad dang/ mig rab rig za ba dang/ mig sngon por gyur pa dang/ mig rtsi bar za ba dang long ga na ste lte ba'i 'og tu na ba dang mo mtshan na ba dang/ pho mtshan na ba dang/ khong ba'i
15a5(mdo 'grel): nad kun na ba dang/ lto na srin mu yod pa dang/ rme red pa dang dreg gam khar khrag dang rlung 'dres par skyug gam/ mgo bo yan chad kyi nad dang/ khrag rgyas pa dang/ gcin 'gag cing sri ba dang/ rtug skam gyis btab pa 'di rnams lta bu la bkru sman gyis
15a6(mdo 'grel): bkrus na phan no/ /mdze nad dang/ gcin snyi ste za khur byung ba la ni/ skyugs sman btang na phan no/ /rims sar pa dang/ pho ba'i drod nyung ba dang/ mkhris pa dang/ khrag tshad du byung ba dang/ glo rdol taM/ lus rmas sam/ gzhang 'brum khrag tshad 'ong ba 'am/ khong
15a7(mdo 'grel): du mtshon lus te ma phyin pa dag lto sra ste 'khrur ma rung ba dang/ lus tsho ste tshil che ba dang/ skem po dang 'di rnams lta bu la bkru sman btang zhing bkrur mi rung ngo/ /de la skyugs sman dang bkru sman gnyis gang yang rung ba'i dus ni grang dro ran pa'i
15b1(mdo 'grel): dus la bya ste/ de yang dpyid zla 'bring po dang dbyar zla tha chung dang/ ston zla tha chung dang zla ba 'di rnams la bkru sman dang skyugs sman gang yang rung ba btang du rung ngo/ /dus 'di'i tshe snum btang ba'i cho ga bzhin du yang byas/ dugs dang lums
15b2(mdo 'grel): kyang cho ga bzhin du bsal sang skyugs sman gtong na deng bad kan bsleng ba'i kha zas nya dang til dang/ ma shi mon srin dre'u dang/ bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i zas rnams zos la/ mtshan mo gnyid log par byas nas kha zas legs par zhu ba dang
15b3(mdo 'grel): nad par lus bsrung ba'i bkra shis byas la kha zas gzhan mi za bar skyugs sman btang/ mi rgan po dang/ byis pa dang/ nyams chung du skye ba dang/ sman stobs chung zhing zhen pa 'di rnams so so'i rigs par btang ba'i thabs ni mkhris pa rgyas shing
15b4(mdo 'grel): tsha ba chen 'o ma dang bu ram shing gi khu ba 'am/ bu ram gyi khu ba las thong zhig /rlung nad la ni sha khu 'am/ mar khu 'am thug pa dang snum bag las thong zhig /bad kam rgyas pa la ni sbrang rtsi'i khu ba dang/ chang dang chu dron po las btang ngo/ /rgan gzhon dang nyams
15b5(mdo 'grel): che chung gi thabs kyang tshul 'di bzhin du sbyar ro/ /skyugs sman btang ba yang babs chen 'thungs te gre ba man chad gang bar gyis la slon no/ /so so'i nad dmigs dang sbyar te/ skyugs sman du gtong ba yang rung ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang/ rgyam tshwa dang/ lce myang tshwa yang
15b6(mdo 'grel): btab la mi'i tshod dang/ skyugs ba sra snyi'i drod du sbyor la sman bod zhig /sman gtong ba'i tshe nad pa'i kha shar phyogs su bltas la sman blud do/ /sngags kyis kyang gdab par bya'o/ /bramha dak+Sha shi pe/ bud dren dra/ b+ha tsan+d+ra arka nA la na la/ ri dir su ma b+hu ta sad+g+ha sa
15b7(mdo 'grel): tsa pany+tsu pa/ sa ra ya na me ba ri Shi na ma da bA me mer tam su d+he bod ta ma nA ga nA na b+he Sh+yad dzyam na mastu ste/ skyugs sman 'thungs la skad cig ci ran du bsdad la de nas slon bro ba'i sems bskyed la/ dang kar 'khyil cing khar mchil ma mang po 'ong bar gyur na bya sgro 'jam
16a1(mdo 'grel): po 'am/ chu ba snyi ba 'jam pos bkug cing dang ngo/ /bkug cing slon pa ni gre ba dang lce khyi ba'i drud ma smad par slon to/ /de la skyug yi bro bzhin du yang nan gyis skyugs shing slon du mi rung ngo/ /skyug bro bzhin slon par gyur na yang ma 'gebs par
16a2(mdo 'grel): slon cig /de ltar slon pa'i tshe na stan mthon po pus mo'i thad ka tsam du mtho ba'i steng du tsog pur 'dug la 'bral ba dang/ blo g.yas g.yon mi bsten nas slon to/ /de'i tshe slon pa de lte ba'i thad kar btsir/ rgyab nas btsir zhing gyen du phul la slon cig /de la bad
16a3(mdo 'grel): kan rgyas pa'i skyugs sman ni sman rno ba'i bag la na le sham lta bu dang/ bsil bag tu u shi ra'am/ tsan dan nam/ ga bur lta bu la sogs pa la sbyar ro/ /drod che ba'i bag la tsitra ka/ bi bi ling gi tsa ba la sogs pa lta bu dang/ tsha bar gtogs pa tshab rnam gsum dang
16a4(mdo 'grel): shi kru la sogs pa 'di lta bu las skyugs sman du sbyar te btang ngo/ /mkhris pa rgyas pa'i skyugs sman ni ro mngar bag shing mdar 'o ma 'am bu ram shing gi khu ba 'am/ kha ra 'am/ cun 'bru lta bu dang/ bsil bag tu u shi ra 'am/ tsan dan nam/ ga bur la sogs
16a5(mdo 'grel): ba la sbyar ro/ /rlung dang bad kan du 'dres pa'i nad la ni mngar bag dang skyur ba dang lan tshwa las sbyar la btang ngo/ /de ltar skyur du sbyar te gyen du phol nas nang phyin pa'i tshad ni bad kan 'byung ba zang nas mkhris pa snang gi bar du slon cing skyugs shig
16a6(mdo 'grel): gal te skyugs sman btang ba las sman gyi mthu shugs zhan te/ babs cher mi slon tam sman 'ga' zhig slar rgal na bsnan ba'i dpyad ni/ bi bi ling dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ yungs kar rnams shel tsha dkar po 'am lce myang tshwa'i chu sbyor la yang yod
16a7(mdo 'grel): slon cig sman gyis de ltar bsnan kyang slon du mi rung na/ skyugs sman nyes pa yin te/ de'i nyen ni mchil ma mang g.yan par 'gyur thor bu mang rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/ /skyugs sman btang legs na dang por
16b1(mdo 'grel): bad kan 'byung/ de'i rjes la mkhris par slon 'jug tu rlung gi tshul dbu ba lha bu 'byung ba ni skyugs sman legs pa yin no/ /de la ha cang skyugs sman drags pa 'am nang dkyel chen mang du slon pa'i rjes la dbu ba dang khrag tshon bag du byung na gso dka' ba yin no/
16b2(mdo 'grel): de ltar sman drags te ma legs sam nad dkyel chas te nyams chung la slon drags na khong rmya lus tshe/ gre ba skam/ mig gis mthong ste mun par snang rlung nad yang ba ldang/ khong nas srog ces bya ba'i khrag yod pa de slon cing 'byung na mi 'chi bar 'gyur ro//
16b3(mdo 'grel): skyugs sman btang legs ni de'i rjes la ci ran cig ngal gso ste/ de nas nad dmigs dang sbyar la/ dung pa rnam gsum gang yang rung ba cig gis bdugs la de'i 'og tu snum bag btang ba yang gong ma dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /de nas kha zas bza' ba ni khyi 'phred nus
16b4(mdo 'grel): ka 'am/ yang na sman legs par ma zhu 'am/ rjes ma chad na phyi de nad par tsam na gdong kha zas yi gar 'ong zhing bkres na chu dron po ran pas khrus byas la kha zas kyi rim pa 'bras bug rkyang rkyang po la rim pa bzhin du bza' bar bya'o/ /bza' ba'i rim pa de yang dang
16b5(mdo 'grel): po 'bras brngos pa'i thug pa rkyang rkyang pe blud do/ /de nas 'bras brngos pa'i thug pa phyar langs tsam du byas la blud do/ /de'i rjes la thug pa kha gzar gyis bcu rung ba blud do/ /de'i rjes la sran tshod yu sha zhes bya ba bal bo se'u 'bru dang sran bu dkar sbyar ba'i tshod ma
16b6(mdo 'grel): dang 'bras bu can du spags shing bza' de nas sran mu ga dang/ bal po se'u 'bru dang spos sna tshogs su sbyar ba'i tshad ma dang 'bras can du spags shing bza' / mjug tu ni khu sha dang 'bras can du spags shing bza' o/ /de ltar slon ba'i rjes la kha zas tshos
16b7(mdo 'grel): che chung bza' ba'i tshad ni skyugs sman legs te/ legs par slon la dang ka sang sang bor byas na thug pa dang/ sran tshad yu sha dang khu sha gsum char zos kyang rung ngo/ /'bring tsam du slon na ni 'bras thug dang/ sran tshod yu sha dang/ rnam pa gnyis ka bzar
17a1(mdo 'grel): rung ngo/ /slon pa'i babs chungs te/ chen por ma slon na ni khu sha dang/ kha zas sam 'bras dang sbyar zhing btsal lo/ /dper na me chung ste gso ba ni rtswa dang lci ba dang/ rta tsug dang/ rtswa la sogs pas bgas kyis gso zhing me khad kyis
17a2(mdo 'grel): sbar na le che ba brtan pa dang/ thams cad tshos nus bar byed nus pa de dang 'dra ste/ skyugs sman nad bsal te/ dang ka sal sal por bya ba la /thog mar kha zas drags na mi rung ste/ 'bras thug sla mol sogs pa ran par sbyin zhing drod che ba bya'o/ /de la skyugs
17a3(mdo 'grel): sman gyi lan bzhi bzhi slon na phabs chung ba'i tshong ngo/ /lan drug smon na slob pa'i 'bring tshang ngo/ /lan brgyad du slon na skyugs sman legs pa'i tshad do/ /de las bkru sman gyis bkrus pa'i chung thang ni/ lan bcu 'khrus pa'o/ /'bring tshad ni bcu gsum mo/ /me thar ni
17a4(mdo 'grel): lan lung 'dun no/ /de las 'khrus pa'i babs chung thang ni drug phul gang gi tshang ngo/ /'bring ni drug phul ngo'i tshad do/ /'khrus pa'i che ba ni drug phul bzhi 'gyur ro/ /de la skyugs sman gyis slon te che ga'i tshang ni 'khrus pa'i phyed tsam ste/ mjug tu mkhris pa byung na cho ga
17a5(mdo 'grel): ci phan pa'i tshad do/ /de la bkru sman gyis bkru ste/ bkrus pa'i 'jug tu bad kan byung na ran te chog go /bkru sman btang ba'i tshe dang po la thur du lan gnyis gsum tsam byung ba ni khong pa'i dri ma bshangs pa yin te/ 'khrus ba'i grangs su brtsi'o/ /skyugs
17a6(mdo 'grel): sman btab pa ni skyugs sman 'thungs nas bkrus te slon pa dang/ mjug tu mkhris pa 'byung ba'i tshad kyis gzung ngo/ /skyugs sman gyis slon pa'i 'og tu snam bag btang ba dang gdugs bya ba yang zhag gsum 'am lnga 'am bdun cho ga byas nas de'i rjes
17a7(mdo 'grel): la gdong bkru sman btang ste/ de yang nang par bad kan gyi dus yol te/ lto sra snying tsho dang zung la bkru sman btang ngo/ /de la mi'i rang bzhin mkhris pa che zhing mang la lto snyi ste 'o mas kyang 'khru bar 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rang bzhin rlung ni shas chen lto sra ste bkru sman dri bod dang
17b1(mdo 'grel): ngan ti la sogs pas kyang bkru dka' o/ /de la mkhris pa che ba la sman bkru sman ro bska ba dang mngar ba las btang ngo/ /bad kan che ba la sman tsha ba las btang ngo/ /rlung chen snum pa dang drod che ba dang lan tshwa las btang ngo/ /sman btang yang 'khrur mi rung na chu bskol bskol ba
17b2(mdo 'grel): dron mo blud do/ /lag pa'i thal mo me la bsros pa 'am/ gos me la bsros bsros pas dugs bya'o/ /bkru sman btang ba las de nyin bar chen po mi 'khru na thong de zan byin la phyi de nyin bkru sman thong zhig gal te nad ba zad yi gar mi 'ong ste/ kha zas mi tshud dam lto
17b3(mdo 'grel): sra ba zhig na snum btang ba'i cho ga zhag gsum 'am lnga 'am bdun du btang bar bshad pa de bas zhag grangs bskyed de zhag bcu'i bar du snum bag thong zhig /de'i rjes la lus la dugs kyi cho ga byas nas de'i 'og tu gdod bkru sman btang ngo/ /bkru sman btang
17b4(mdo 'grel): pa de yang sngar lan cig 'khrus pa'i tshe/ bkrur ma btub pa de dmigs kyis nyes pa dang/ ci las gyur pa legs par bltas te/ sngar cis nyes pa dran par byas la de las thabs ji ltar legs par bkru sman btang ngo/ /bkru sman btang ba las ma legs pa'i
17b5(mdo 'grel): nad dmigs snyi na lto ba nas zas mi 'jug ste/ gsung sgregs mnam por 'byung/ kha zas yi gar mi 'ong bad kan ma bris pa gnyis rgyas pa slon par 'gyur/ g.yas pas 'debs tsha ba skye lus la thor du 'byung cham pas 'debs thur du dbugs
17b6(mdo 'grel): mi 'byung bshang ba 'byung sra ba 'di lta bu 'byung bar gyur na bkru sman ma legs pa yin no/ /de las bkru sman legs pa'i tshul nam ma legs pa'i gnad bshad pa las bzlog par bya ste/ de la dang po'i khod pa'i dri ma bshad ba je 'byung ngo/ /de'i rjes la
17b7(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa de nas bad kan tha ma rlung 'byung zhing de ltar 'khru ba ni legs par blta'o/ /de la bkru sman babs che ste ha cang drags pa ni bad kan zad de med pa dang/ mkhris pa yang zad de med chu skya bor 'khru khrag rtsa nag por 'ong yang na sha bkrus pa 'dra ba rtsa snar
18a1(mdo 'grel): bag can nam chu ser lta bur 'byung tshil lta bu'i nar nar po 'am/ rus bu lta bu 'byung gzhang phyir 'byung zhing ltog kha skom klad pa 'khor mig chags te phugs su bros pa 'di lta bur gyur na bkru sman ha cang brags pa'i tshul yin no/ /bkru
18a2(mdo 'grel): sman drags pa dang skyugs sman btang ba'i zam gyi cho ga dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /skyugs sman ltar btang ba'i cho ga las dus pas btang ba'i cho ga mi dgos so/ /bkru sman gyi rjes la kha zas bza' ba'i rim pa yang skyugs sman gyi cho ga bshad pa dang 'dra ste/ kha
18a3(mdo 'grel): zas rims pas bza' zhing bgas kyis kha zas nar ma yang phyi nas bza' o/ /gal te bkru sman btang ba las drod chung bas bkru sman ma zhu zhing nad ma phyir la longs brnyas pa ni med nad dkyel ni che ba tsam ma yin na sman khong du ma zhi ba'i tshul de ltar gyur na
18a4(mdo 'grel): 'di lta bu la dpyad du bgyi ba ni/ bkru sman 'thung ba'i nyin thog thag zos mi za bar mtshan yal nangs su nam zhu zhu ba'i bar du bsdad cing kha zas mi za'o/ /yod ni sngar snum dang dugs kyi cho gar byas la phyis bkru sman btang ba nang cung la gnod par mi
18a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /bkru sman btang ste bkrus pa dang gtar ka btab pa dang/ snum gyi cho gar sbyar te btang ba dang/ zas mi za bar smung bar byas pa 'di rnams kyis ni drod chung zhing nyams par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na 'di lta bu la dpyad du bgyi ba ni 'bras thug rkyang rkyang po
18a6(mdo 'grel): dang 'bras thug sla ba la sogs pa blud cing bgas kyis btang ngo/ /bkru sman btang bas mkhris pa dang bad kan bri ste chung du gyur pa dang/ rlung dang mkhri ba che ba'i mi skom dang che ba de lta bu'i mi la ni thug pa blud du mi rung ste de dag la kha zas sod pa la sogs pa
18a7(mdo 'grel): khad kyis brta ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /nad ma smin pa la ni skyugs sman btang ngo/ /nad smin par gyur te bkru sman btang ba'i dus la bab na bkru sman btang ste nad bsal bar bya'o/ /skyugs sman btang ba ni bkru sman btang ba'i dus la bab ma bzab pa/ /nad ?
18b1(mdo 'grel): pa la bsdad mi dgos par rung ngo/ /yang mi nyams chung zhing nad mang ba de lta bu la ni nad nyin smin cing bkru sman btang ba'i dus la bab na bkru sman btang mi dgos par 'khru bar 'gyur ba'i kha zas kyi cho ga byas na 'khru bar 'gyur ro/ /sngar bkru sman btang ste
18b2(mdo 'grel): nyams chung ba dang nad kyang pri ste/ chung du gyur pa dang/ mi sha chung ste skem pa dang/ lto sra snyi tshod ma zin pa 'di lta bu la sman thun chung ba dang/ sman 'jam pa thang zhig de lta ba mches sman lan mang du 'thungs pa'i bla'o/ /dogs shing bag tsha bar gyur ba'i sman thun cher ni
18b3(mdo 'grel): btang du ma rung ngo/ /nad pa nyams chung ba lta bu la ni sman 'jam zhing thun chung bas nad zhi bar bya'o/ /nad pa nyams chung ba la de ltar dpyad bya ste/ nad mang po cung zad khad kyis brin de yang sman bgas kyis btang zhing nad khad kyis khad kyis bsal lo/ /nad dkyel
18b4(mdo 'grel): bas phyin phyin pas nad pa yun ring du nyon mongs pa de lta bu drod chung lto sra bar gyur pa yin te de la dpyad du bya ba ni thal sman rnon pas gsha' ra dang/ che tsha dang mar du sbyar ba btang na khong pa'i me drod skye ste/ zas 'ju rlung dang bad kan gyi nad kyang zhi nas
18b5(mdo 'grel): de nas bkru sman thong zhig /nad pa'i nyams che la khong rtsub rlung gi shas che lto sra la rtag tu rtsol ba'i ngang tshul can/ khong ba'i drod che ba de lta bu ni bkru sman btang ba yang sman zhu bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de lta bu la ni sngar sman ma btang ba
18b6(mdo 'grel): la nyams pa rtas nas phyis bkru sman 'jam po thong zhig gal te 'khrur mi rung ngam lan 'ga' zhig 'khrus nas sman rnon po cung zad dang sbyar ba'i sman re reng por mas bcug na/ nad thur du 'khrus te ma byin pas khong yang 'jam la bkru sman legs pa bde
18b7(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /gong du bkru sman btang nas sngar snum gyi cho ga bya bar bshad pa de yang dug gis babs pa'i ming dang mtshon gyis rmas ba lta bu dang thor bu byung ba dang/ mdze nad dang/ 'or nad dang/ me dpal dang/ mi gser dang/ skya sbab kyi rad dang/ za khu'i
19a1(mdo 'grel): nad yod pa dang/ 'di lta bu rnams la ni snum gyi cho ga ha cang cher mi bya ba dang/ bkru sman thong zhig de la snum bag gi cho ga bya ba dang/ bkru sman btang ba dang/ thams cad la nad med pa'i khong snum pa la snum gyi cho ga bya ste/ brtas
19a2(mdo 'grel): la skyugs sman dang/ bkru sman la sogs pa las bya zhing gang btang yang rung ste/ de dag gi bar dang/ skabs skabs su snum gyi cho ga dang/ dugs kyi cho ga bya'o/ /de ltar snum bag gi cho ga byas pa'i rjes la kha zas kyi nyams btsag brtan nas
19a3(mdo 'grel): bkru sman gyis nad bsal ba ni dper na gos zi ma can spangs la bkru ba dang 'dra'o/ /de la snum gyi cho ga dang dugs la sogs pa ma byas par rang ga bkru sman gtong ba de ni shing skam po 'gug tu mi rung ba bzhin du lus ma rung ba'i nyen du 'gyur ro//
19a4(mdo 'grel): de la cho ga tshul bzhin du byas pa'i bkru sman btang ba legs par bya ba ni sems gsal ba dang dbang po rnams dang/ srog gzungs rnams brtan ba dang khong chu dod che me 'bar zas myur du 'ju rgas sra bar 'ong ste/ bkru sman btang legs pa ni
19a5(mdo 'grel): de lta bu yin no/ /skyugs sman dang bkru sman btang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// //sman mas btang snyams brta bar bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u bcu dgu pa bshad par bya'o/ /rlung nad kyi shas che ba de lta bu la ni sman mas btang zhing
19a6(mdo 'grel): brta ste/ lus kyi khong snum par bya ba'i cho ga bzang ngo/ /de lta bas na sman dpyad kyi bya ba thams cad kyi nang nas sman mas btang zhing khong snum zhing nyam brta bar bya ba 'di ni dpyad kyi mchog yin no/ /de yang rnam pa gsum ste nad 'khrur rung ba khong
19a7(mdo 'grel): du bsdu ba'i sman mas btang ba dang/ bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang/ khong brta ba'i sman mas btang ba dang/ rnam pa gsum mo/ /sman mas btang ba'i cho ga 'di gsum gyis sman dang lto lbos pa dang/ rkang pa na te 'thengs pa dang/ mchar gan
19b1(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ rlung nad kyis lto 'khru ba dang/ lto na ba dang/ rims bying ba dang/ tsham pa na ba dang/ rlung nad kyis khu chu 'gags pa dang/ rlung nad las rtug skam du gyur te/ 'byung du mi rung ba dang/ rlig rlugs dang/ rde'u nad dang /khu chu la nad yod pa dang/
19b2(mdo 'grel): rlung nad dkyel chen po gyur pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mas btang ba rnam pa gsum gyis/ nad kun bsal bar bya'o/ /de la sman mas btang zhing bkrur mi rung ba'i nad dmigs ni snum bag btang ha cang drags pa dang glo rdol ba dang lus ha cang skem che ste
19b3(mdo 'grel): nyams chung ba lta bu dang/ mchin pa na ste be'u snabs su 'khru ba dang/ rtag tu slon bro ba dang/ bkru sman gyis bkrus zin pa lta bu dang/ sna nas sman btang zin pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ste rngam pa drag tu 'byung ba dang/ lud pa lu ba dang mchil ma med ste rtag tu
19b4(mdo 'grel): 'dor ba dang/ gzhang 'brum khrag tshad kyis btab ba dang/ skyigs bus btab pa lto sbos pa dang/ drod chung ste zas 'jur mi rung ba lta bu dang/ gzhang kha skrangs te na bas sman mas btang du mi rung ba lta bu dang/ kha zas zos zin ba lta bu dang/ dmu rdzing
19b5(mdo 'grel): gi nad kyis rtsa sgo kun 'gags pa dang/ mdze nad dang za khu can du gyur te gcin sbrang rtsi'i mdog tu 'ong ba dang/ bud med sbrum ma zla ba bdun las ma lon pa dang/ 'di rnams lta bu la ni sman mas btang zhing byar mi rung ngo/ /de la sman nas btang zhing
19b6(mdo 'grel): nyams brtas te khong snum par bya ba dang/ sman mas btang ba'i bkrur rung ba'i nad dmigs ni drod ha cang che ba dang/ long rtsab pa dang/ rlung nad 'ba' zhig na ba las dmu rdzing du gyur pa lta bu dang/ cham bas btab pa dang/ ha cang sbom ches pa dang/ lto na srin
19b7(mdo 'grel): bu yod pa dang/ rlung nad kyi shas ha cang ches pa dang/ dbyig dug 'thungs pa dang/ 'brum bus btab pa dang/ rkang 'dam gyi nad dang/ lba ba dang can dang/ 'di rnams lta bu'i nad la sman mas btang zhing bkrur rung ngo/ /sman mas btang ba de dag gi cha
20a1(mdo 'grel): dpyad sbu bu ni gser la sogs pa dang/ shing dang rus ba dang/ 'di rnams kyi gce'um gas pa drang la 'jam pa kha zlum por byas te/ tshad ni byis pa na gzhon te lo gcig ma lon na srid sor lnga'o/ /lo bdun ma lon na srid sor dug go/
20a2(mdo 'grel): lo bdun lon na sri sor bdun no/ /lo bcu gnyis lon na sor dgu'o/ /lo nyi shu lon pa phan chad la sor bcu gnyis so/ /de yan chad lo grangs kyi bye brag dang/ na tshod dang/ nyams stobs dang/ lus bod las sbu gu'i tshad bskyed do/ /sbu gu'i tshad kyi sboms ni mthe
20a3(mdo 'grel): bong shong ba'i tshad du bya'o/ /rtse mo'i sboms ni mthe'u chung gi tshang du bya'o/ /byis pa chung ngu lo gcig lon pa yan chad sor mo tshad las phyed phyed kyis de bskyed de/ zhabs kyi bu ga'i sboms rab tu che ba dang/ sor mo gsum gyis rtse mo nang du
20a4(mdo 'grel): shod ba tsam du bya'o/ /gce'u'i rtse mo'i bu ga'i tshad ni mon sran rde'u dang/ sran chung dang/ sran ma 'di rnams btsos ba shong ba dang/ rgya shug gi 'bras bu shong ba'i tshad che chung gi rim pa de ltar bya'o/ /gce'u'i rtse mo'i gong du log pa gdags pa'i
20a5(mdo 'grel): tshad ni gce'u'i bu ga spoms ba'i tshad dang mnyam par bya'o/ gce'u nas sman gtong ba'i tshe gce'u'i rtse mo'i kha bkal ba las/ bgas pa bcad de ma bor bar byas nas btang ngo/ /gce'u zhabs sbom po'i kha nas yang mor gnyis su gzhal bar khog
20a6(mdo 'grel): pa can de nas mar rim pa gnyis su brtags la/ bug pa gnyis kyi bar du sman blugs pa'i snod lugs dang ra dang ma he la sogs pa'i lgang pa legs par mnyes pa tshon gyis dmar bor btsos pa sra ba phur ma thag thug dang dri nga ba dang/
20a7(mdo 'grel): rtsa'i ri mo 'di rnams med cing 'jam la sra ba de lta bu'i gce'u dang sbyar te srad bus legs par bcings la sman blugs na bde bar bya'o/ /gal te lgang ba'i rkyal bu med na rkyal ba'i dpung ba 'am/ byin pa'i pags pa 'am/
20b1(mdo 'grel): ras stugs po thags bzang ba sgra tshil gyis byugs ba de lta bu la snod du bya'o/ /de la sman mas btang ste bkru ba'i tshad ni byis pa chung ngu la gcig lon ba la srad gcig btang ngo/ /byis ba chung ngu de lta bu las 'o/ re re lon zhing sman srad re re bskyed de/
20b2(mdo 'grel): lo drug yon nas srang bcu gnyis btang ngo/ /de yan chad kyang lo grangs las srang gnyis gnyis su bskyed de lo bcu gnyis lon pa dang/ lo bco brgyad lon pa nas bcu bdun yon pa man chad la spyir sman btang ba'i tshul ni thun rab tu che na yang srang
20b3(mdo 'grel): nyi shu btang ngo/ /sman mas btang ste bkru ba'i thun srang ji snyed cig btang ba de las dpags te nyams brta zhing khong snum par byas pa'i sman ma btang ba bzhi cha gcig gi tshad du bya'o/ /de lta bas na nyams brta ba'i sman mas btang du rung ba'i mi snum bag
20b4(mdo 'grel): btang ba dang/ dugs bya ba'i cho ga yang byas/ bkru sman btang ste/ nang gi kyang bsal 'bras thug sla mo dang gar po la sogs pas nyams btsag kyang brtas nas nyams brta ba'i sman btang du rung bar shes na thog ma nyid du nyams brta ba'i sman mas
20b5(mdo 'grel): btang bar bya'o/ /nyam brta ba'i yang dgun zla bzhi dang dpyid zla gnyis kyi tshe ni nyin bar thong zhig /kha cig na re zla ba 'di drug gi tshe mtshan mo yang btang du rung zhes zer ro/ /so ga dang dbyar dang ston gyi tshe ni mtshan mo thong zhig /de la khong snum zhing nyams brta
20b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i sman mas btang bar byan/ cho ga sngar bya ba la lus mar gyis bsku zhing lde gus dril la chu dron bos lus dag bar bkru/ dro'i kha zas kyi tshang snga na ci za ba'i thad las bzhi cha gsum ni bza' bzhi cha cig ni mi bza' / kha zas ci za ba yang phan pa yang ba/
20b7(mdo 'grel): snum ches ba yang ma yin/ rtsub ches pa yang ma yin pa de lta bu zos la khu ba la sogs pa skom gyi gor btud ba dang/ tshal nan yang btung ngo/ /kha zas zos pa'i rjes la bcag pa byas nas bshang gci brtsal la mal bde bar 'dug na sngas smad/
21a1(mdo 'grel): nas ro smad bstod de/ glo g.yon gyis phab nas rkang pa g.yas pa bskum rkang pa g.yon ni rkyong zhig/ de nas gce'u yi nang nas sman mas btang ste gce'u'i kha dang gzhang kha yang snum gyis bsku'o/ /gce'u yi lgang pa nang du sman blugs
21a2(mdo 'grel): la dbugs phyir phyung nas kha bcings la/ sman pa nang pa'i rgyab logs su 'dug nas/ rtabs bag tu sman myur du btang ba 'am/ ngal zhing thogs pa ma yin par bya zhing gce'u'i nang nas sman nang du btang zhing btsir ba'i shugs ha cang drags pa 'am/ ngal
21a3(mdo 'grel): ba yang ma yin/ ngan par cig car lan cig tu bcir cing thong zhig /lgang ba'i zhabs na rlung lus pa yod kyi sman gyi lhag ma ma lus par gyis shig /sman btang zin nas brla dang rkub tsos la thal mos brdab cing gran rkyal du bzhag la nang pa
21a4(mdo 'grel): nyid rang gi lam la rkang pa'i rting pas brdung bar bya'o/ /sman pa 'am/ nad g.yog gis nad pa'i rkang pa nas bteg ste lan gsum du bsigs shig /de nas nang pa sdas bcug nas brkyang ste/ nyal la rkang ba'i rting bar nad g.yog gis khu chur gyis
21a5(mdo 'grel): brdung ba 'am/ brla dang byin pa la yang khu tshur brdung zhing lus snum gyis bskus la mnye bar bya'o/ /lus la brdung zhing mnyes la mi bde bar byas pa des/ sman slar myur du phyir mi dbyung ngo/ /gal te sman slar myur du phyir byung bas phan mi byed par
21a6(mdo 'grel): gyur na/ sman mar phyi ma gzhan yang sbyar la btang ngo/ /khong pa'i drod che bas sman mas btang ba zhun nub kar kha zas kyang bza' o/ /zas zos nas de phan chad mtshan thog thag tu ci yang mi bza' mi btang bar nyol cig /gal te sman phyir 'byung du mi rung
21a7(mdo 'grel): na sman sbyar ba'i star bu 'am/ sman rnon po lgang? ba nas mas btang zhing khong na sman mar lus pa phyir dbyung ngo/ /gal te khong pa'i nang na ha cang rtsub ches bas sman ma zhu ste phyir ma byung ba dang/ khong pa'i drod chungs pas sman ma zhu ste/ phyir ma byung la
21b1(mdo 'grel): nang du gyur ba med na bsdad par bya zhing mtshan mos bzhin du 'dug par bya'o/ /nang bar li dod ra dang/ 'u su bskol ba'i chuAm yang na chu 'ba' zhig ga dus ba btung bar bya'o/ /nyam brta ba'i sman mas btang na nyi ma gsum 'am/ nyi ma lnga lon na yang thod
21b2(mdo 'grel): zhig /gal te 'ju ba'i drod che bas sman zhu ba 'am/ yang na rlung gi shes ha cang ches pa dang/ rtag tu rtsol zhing bcag pa byed pa dang/ me'i drod ha cang che ba dang/ khong pa'i nang rtsub pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mas btang ba'i nyi ma re re btang du rung ngo/ /de ltar
21b3(mdo 'grel): khong snum zhing nyams brta ba'i sman mas btang ba lan gsum lan bzhi btang nas lus kyi khong dang rtsa 'jam zhing snum par nad dbyung zhing bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ bkru ba'i sman mas btang zhing sbyar bar bya'o/ /snga na lus kyis khong rtsub pa las snum
21b4(mdo 'grel): par bya ba'i 'og tu nyi ma lnga lon na tshes grangs bzang po'i nyi ma cung zad phyed yol tsam na sman pas gtor ma bkra shis kyi tshig byas la nang pa lus til mar gyis byugs dugs byas bshang gci'i dri ma bsal la/ ha cang bkres pa tsam ma yin par
21b5(mdo 'grel): 'dug la nad kyi dmigs dang sman la sogs pa la mkhas pa'i mi dang/ gang de la mkhas pa mar pe dang/ lhan cig tu 'gro zhing sman mas btang ba'i bkru sman drag po de la sman gyi khu ba spangs pa chu srang brgyad bcu'i bzhi cha gcig ste srad nyi shu dang/ po
21b6(mdo 'grel): son cha'i 'bras bu 'brum bu brgyad dang sbyar te btso zhing de'i nang du mar ni sman gyi khu ba srang nyi shu'i bzhi cha cig nang du blugs te btso ma 'di ni rlung nang la btang na thabs de ltar sbyar ro/ /mkhris pa na ba la btang ba dang/ na ba med pa nyam tha mal pa la btang
21b7(mdo 'grel): na sman gyi khu ba srang nyi shu rtsa drug cha cig gi thang du blugs te/ btso bar bya'o/ /bad kan gyi nad che ba la btang na sman gyi khu ba srad nyi shu'i brgyad cha cig gi thad du mar blugs te/ btso bar bya'o/ /yang na nad thams cad la sman gyi khu ba'i brgyad cha gcig gi thad
22a1(mdo 'grel): du mar blugs te gtso bo/ /bkru ba'i sman mas btang ba btso ba de yang ha cang ma bska mi sla bar sbyar zhing btso'o/ /de'i nad du bu ram? srang gcig tsam dang sbrang rtsi dang/ lce tsha la sogs pa nang dmigs dang sbyar zhing ci rigs bar spags
22a2(mdo 'grel): te/ sman lhag ma sbyar te/ sman de thams cad snod cig tu blugs la/ bum ba chu tshan bskol ba'i rlangs pa'i khar bsro zhing/ sman dkrug dkrug la sman gtong ba'i gce'u rgyal ba'i nang du blugs te/ ha cang mi tsha mi grang ha cang mi snum mi rtsub ha cang
22a3(mdo 'grel): mi rno mi 'jam/ ha cang mi gar mi sla ha cang mi nyung mi mang che tsha med pa 'am tsha bar yang mi bya/ de dang 'dra bar 'bras tsam kyang/ mi mang mi nyung bar sbyar te/ sman mas btang zhes mkhas pa kha cig ni de skad zer ro/ yang sman pa kha cig na re mar dang
22a4(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi gnyis kyi tshad so sor srad gsum gsum dang na ba med cing nyam tha mal pa zhig la btang na lce cha zho gnyis po son 'cha' dang shu ti la sogs pa srang gnyis spangs pa'i khu ba dang sman lhag ma'i khu ba srang bcur sbyar te sman khu spangs spangs pa
22a5(mdo 'grel): mar dang btsos la sbrang rtsi dang lce tshar sbyar te/ rim pa 'di ltar byas sman btang ba'i rkyal bur blugs la/ bkru ba'i sman mas btang ba'i cho ga de ltar bya'o/ /de la rlung nad sel ba'i sman mas btang zhing bkru bar sbyar na shing nye rong dang lce cha se na nga ba
22a6(mdo 'grel): dang nyi'u shing pa dang/ a shwa ganda dang/ e raN+Ta'i lo ma sman dang zhing 'jam pa dang skyur ba dang dro ba'i khu ba dang ldan pa 'di lta bu'i sman rnams ni rlung nad sel ba'i sman mas btang bar bzad do/ /mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i sman mas btang zhing bkru ba'i
22a7(mdo 'grel): rnam grangs la gtogs pa la shing n+ya gro d+ha dang/ shing u dum+ba ra dang/ shing klag sha dang/ shakpa dang/ shing mngar dang/ 'o ma dang/ nye'u shing dang/ 'bri mar dang/ ro mngar zhing bsil ba rnams dang/ bu ram shing gi khu ba sbrang rtsi dang 'di rnams ni mkhris
22b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i nang sel ba'i sman mas btang zhing bkru bar bzang ngo/ /bad kan rgyas ba'i nang sel ba ni dong ka dang/ dug mo yungs dang ba ta li ga dang/ chis khrigs dang/ shing nim+ba dang/ sle tres dang/ pa Ta dang/ ka tu kha ro ha ni dang/ shing gi khu ba she le ya kha dang/
22b2(mdo 'grel): pu ti ka rany+dza dang/ rak+ta ka rany+dza dang/ sapta par+Na zhes bya ba tshigs re la lo ma bdun yod pa dang/ sbrang rtsi dang ba gcin dang/ sman ro tsha zhing rno ba dang drong che ba rnams dang tsha ba rnams sbyor te btsos la sman mas btang zhing bkrus na/ bad kan gyi nang sel to/ /de la rlung
22b3(mdo 'grel): nad dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum char gyi nad 'dus par gyur na yang/ de gsum gyi sman gong du bshad ba las nad so so'i sman ci ran du shas shas kyis bsdus ba btsos pa'i thun spyir mi che ba ran bar mas btang ba'i bkru sman drag po btang ngo/ brtas bkru
22b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i sman mas btang nas sngas kyis brten te gan rkyal du sems gud du mi g.yengs bar sman btang ba de la yid bzhag par bya'o/ de nas thur du bkru zhing 'ong bar gyur na langs te tsog pur 'dug la bshad bar gyis shig gal te khyim na skad cig thogs
22b5(mdo 'grel): te phol du ma rung na sman 'di nyen che ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta bu nyen du gyur pa la slar btsos shing dpyad du bya ba la mar dang nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal sman rnon po dang kha gcin dang 'bras kyi rtsabs kyi khu ba skyur mo dang sbyar la btsos ba 'jam zhing
22b6(mdo 'grel): rno la dro bar sbyar te/ sman mas btang ba'i rkyal bu gzhan du blugs te bshams la mas btang zhing tshir cig /yang na po son cha las sbyar ba'i sman gyis gdab mu las gzhug pa bya zhing sdang ba yang bya'o/ /yang na 'di ltar ma gyur te sman mas btang yang
22b7(mdo 'grel): 'ong bar gyur na sman phyi ma sbyar te/ rkyal bur blugs la lan gsum lan bzhi'i bar du yang sman drag po mas btang zhing legs par btang nas de'i rjes la kha zas kyi chog ni bkru sman btang ba'i cho ga dang 'dra bar shes bar byas la kha zas ma zos pa'i
23a1(mdo 'grel): sngon rol du chu dron bos khrus byas nas bza' ba'i thabs ni 'bras thug rkyang rkyang bo dang/ 'bras thug sla mo btung sha khu? sla mo dang 'bras chan du sbyor te bza' sman drag po mas btang ste bkrus bas khong pa'i dri ma nad kun phyin na/ khong pa nad 'phyang bag
23a2(mdo 'grel): tu 'dug ba dang/ nyams chung te khong rmya ba de lta bur gyur ba de la chu dron po bde bas khrus byas nas kha zas cho ga bzhin du zos na lus zhig cing rmya ba la phan te/ zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te sman de ltar mas btang ste/ bkrus pa las rlung nad kyi bar du khong
23a3(mdo 'grel): dpo bas grang bar 'gyur te/ mi bden yang de'i mod la 'phral du rlung zhi bar 'gyur ba'i sman btsos te mas btang zhing khong 'jam zhing snum par 'gyur bar bya'o/ /sman mas btang ste bkrus pa legs pa'i tshul dang/ ha cang drags pa dang thun chungs te ma
23a4(mdo 'grel): 'khrus bar gyur pa 'di rnams kyi tshul ni sngar snum gyi chog bya zhing btang ba legs ma legs bshad pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/ /sman mas btang ste bkrus pa'i rjes rlung nang du gyur pa la khong 'jam zhing snum par gyur pa'i sman mas btang ba cung
23a5(mdo 'grel): zad tsam zhig bsdad na khong ba'i dri ma bshad ba dang bcas te sman mar dang cig car 'gyur ro/ /thur du dbugs ba yang sman mar dang lhan cig 'ong bar gyur na/ khong snum zhing 'jam bar 'gyur ba'i sman mas btang ba legs pa yin no/ /yang bad kan gyi bag che na
23a6(mdo 'grel): de la khong brta ba'i sman mas btang ba lan gcig gam lan gsum gyi bar du thong zhig mkhris ba rgyas pa'i shas che na/ brta ba'i sman mas btang ba lan lnga 'am lan bdun gyis shig /rlung nad la brta ba'i sman mas btang ba lan dgu 'am bcu gcig
23a7(mdo 'grel): tu thong zhig /de ltar brta ba'i sman mas btang ba'i lan grangs zung du ma gyur par byas nas gal te de'i rjes la bkru ba'i sman mas gtong bar 'dod na yang thong zhig /de ltar sman mas btang ba'i rjes la bad kan dang mkhris pa dang/ rlung nad sel ba'i kha
23b1(mdo 'grel): zas mon sran de'u'i? tshong ma khu ba can dang/ 'o ma dang khu sha 'di gsum zos na nad kyi rim pa bzhin du phan no/ /de la rlung nad sel ba'i sman drag po mas btang zhing khong snum la brtas bar byan shing nye rong dang lce tsha sne brda dang sbyar te snum dang/ mngar dang 'bras
23b2(mdo 'grel): rtsabs skyur ba dang/ sha khu dang drod tshe ba'i bag sbyar te bskol la rkyal bur blugs te btang ba 'di ni rlung nad gcig pu la phan no/ /mkhris pa'i nad la ni/ /n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sman sde'i grangs su gtogs pa dang/ shug pa dang/ kha ra dang/ mngar bag
23b3(mdo 'grel): dang bsil bag dang mar dang 'o ma dang bu ram shing gi khu ba 'di rnams sbyar te/ gdugs la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ sman mas btang na mkhris pa'i med 'byang zhing me'i khong brta la snun bar 'gyur ro/ /bad kan gyi nad la dong ka la sogs pa dang/ dug mo yungs
23b4(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa dang/ sman rtsub ba rnams dang/ bag cin dang sman rno ba dang/ drong che ba dang/ ro tsha ba dang/ 'di rnams bskol ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ mas btong na bad kan gyi nad 'byad do/ /de la rlung nad la ni lan gcig btang ngo/ /mkhris pa'i nad la lan gnyis
23b5(mdo 'grel): btang ngo/ /bad kan gyi nang la lan gsum btang bar bya'o/ /rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa gsum 'dus pa'i nad la yang sman dpyad de gsum rim pas btang na 'dus pa'i nad 'byad bar 'gyur ro/ /sman dpyad kyi slob dpon spyad pa can na re/ yod mi'i nad gzhi ni rlung
