172b7(mdo 'grel): ma ka dang/ yungs kar dang/ sle tres dang/ e raN+Ta? rnam gnyis dang/ pa tU? ra dang/ ro hi sha dang/ ta ma la'i lo ma dang/ pU ti ka dang/ si la ka dang/ 'u su dang/ tidmu? sa dang/ shu ti dang/ rgya sran dang/ mon sran mo sha dang/ kru trug nges? dang/ bu ti
173a1(mdo 'grel): ka rany+dza dang/ na gu la rnam gnyis dang/ gzhan yang bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i sman rnams zhib tu btags te chang dang rtsa bas skyur po dang til mar dang lhan cig bskol te/ dro 'jam tsam byas pas bsku
173a2(mdo 'grel): ba 'am/ yang na zhib tu btags pa'i lnga gus byug pa byas na/ rims grang ba zhi bar byed do/ /yang na rgya spos la sogs pa gong gi sbyor ba nyid kyis blugs pa dang/ lus bcing ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /de bzhi du chang skur dang/ ba gcin dang/
173a3(mdo 'grel): zhog chu la sogs pa sman med pa'i nye cho blugs pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /yang na dod ka la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyis btung ba dang/ bsku ba dang byug pa la yang sbyar ro/ /a ka ru'i dud pa dang/ bal ka'i dud pa 'og nas smos pa
173a4(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa yang rims grang mo 'di la sbyar ro/ /me'i drod bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dugs kyi cho ga bstan par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rlung med pa'i khang par 'dug pa dang/ rtsol ba dang/ gos lci ba bgo ba la sogs pa yang bya'o//
173a5(mdo 'grel): rdul 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir mkhris pa skyed par byed pa'i sman bza' bar sbyar bar ste/ rgya sran ku la tha dang/ ma sha dang/ nis pa lpas zhes bya ba'i zas dang/ sha rnams sbyar ro/ /gnas ni khang pa'i dbus dang/ sa khang gi nang du rtswa
173a6(mdo 'grel): ku sha dang/ klam dang/ ra la ka zhes bya ba'i stan bya ste/ khang pa de'i nang du mdag ma dud pa med cing dmar ru ge ba zhugs ling gi nang du bcug ste bsro bar bya'o/ /grang ba'i dbang gis shin tu 'dar bar gyur pa la ni chang ngam dar ba 'am/
173a7(mdo 'grel): rgya sran dang/ khra dgong la sogs pa 'bru'i khu ba'i nang du che ba gsum btab pa 'am/ gzhan yang mkhris pa bskyed pa'i sman rnams bsten par bya'o/ /de bzhin du bud med shin tu num mdzes shing sha rgyas la lus la byug pa dang/
173b1(mdo 'grel): rgyan thams cad kyi brgyad pa lang tshor bab pa/ chang gis shin tu dregs pa yid du 'ong zhing shin tu 'gying bag dang ldan pa'i bud med dang/ thang sbyar ba'i dugs bya ste/ nam grang bar gyur pa'i dus na bud med de spang bar bya'o/ /'dus pa
173b2(mdo 'grel): las gyur pa'i rims la ni nyes pa gcig shas chung zhing gnyis shas che na ni gnyis zad par bya zhing/ gcig gso bar bya'o/ /gnyis shas che zhing gcig shas chung na ni gnyis bri zhing gcig bskyed par bya'o/ /nyes pa gsum cha
173b3(mdo 'grel): mnyam na ni dang po bad kan gso zhing de nas rlung dang mkhris pa rims bzhin gso/ /'dus pa las byung ba'i rims nad kyis lus zad cing sna rtsa gnyis su shin tu mi zad par na ba skrangs par gyur pa ni 'tsho bar dka' ste/ phal char 'chi
173b4(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur bas de la myur du khrag gtar ba dang/ mar blud pa dang/ bad kan dang mkhris pa 'joms pa'i sman gyi/ byug pa dang/ pas na nas btang pa'i sman dang/ mkhur bar bcad pa rnams byas na phan no/ /lus zungs rnams la brten pa'i
173b5(mdo 'grel): rims grang ba dang/ dro ba dang/ snum pa dang/ rtsub pa la sogs pa'i cho ga byas kyang ma zhin de la ni lag pa gnyis las rims kyis khrag dbyung bar bya'o/ /rims mi bzad pa la cho ga gong ma de dag kyang zhir mi 'dod na nad gzhi ji
173b6(mdo 'grel): lta ba pa min du/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang shas che ba brtags te/ so so'i bya ba bzhin du spang bar bya zhing 'og nas smos pa bzhin du gso bar bya ste/ de yang pa to la dang/ pu tse shel dang/ gla sgang dang/ a ru ra dang/ shing mngar
173b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'di rnams lan bzhi lnga bskol ba'i rjes blung na rims mi bzad pa rnams sel bar byed do/ /'bras bu gsum dang/ a ru ra dang/ sle tres dang/ pi pi ling dang/ 'di rnams gang yang rung ba'i khu ba dang/ bskol ba dron po 'am grang
174a1(mdo 'grel): mo yang rung ste/ de bzhin du mar dang/ lde gu dang/ phye ma dang/ ri lu la sogs pa re re'i sbyor ba bcud kyi len gyi cho ga bzhin du bya ba 'am yang na go bye gnyis dang sbyar ba byin na ni rims mi zad pa zhi bar byed
174a2(mdo 'grel): do/ /nyi ma gang la nyin bzhi pa'i rims la sogs pas btab pa'i dus su nad gzhi rnams brtags te/ lus 'phel bar bya ba'i cho ga tshul bzhin du bya'o/ /sgag? skya'i til mar dang bcas pa tho rangs sam kha zas kyi gong du btung ba
174a3(mdo 'grel): 'am de bzhin du mar rnying pa dang/ zho dang/ 'o ma dang/ dar ba dang/ srang drug pa zhes bya ba'i mar gcod chen po'i skabs su bshad pa dang/ dge pa'i sman mar smyo byed kyi skabs su 'byung ba dang/ ba'i sman lnga'i sman mar brjed
174a4(mdo 'grel): byed kyi skabs su 'byung ba dang/ tik+ta'i sman mar mdze nad kyi skabs su bshad pa dang/ ba sha ka'i sman mar khrag mkhris kyi nad nas 'byung ba 'am/ 'di rnams gang yang rung ba nad par ram zas kyi gong du rims mi zad pa la sbyar
174a5(mdo 'grel): par bya'o/ /'bru gsum dang/ rgya shug dang/ agni man+tha dang/ 'di rnams bskol ba'i nang du mar dang mar gyi nyis 'gyur gyi zho dang/ mar gyi bzhi cha'i seng? phrom gyi shun pags kyi phye ma btab ste/ yang bskol ba'i mar las ran
174a6(mdo 'grel): par 'thungs na rims mi bzad pa 'joms pa'i mchog yin no/ /'bras bu'i chad dang/ 'bru'i chang legs par smin pa dang/ rma bya dang/ sreg pa dang/ khyim bya'i sha gtsang bya dro ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa zas dang lhan cig tsi 'dod pa
174a7(mdo 'grel): tshim tshang du zos la/ zhag de nyid la gnyid log pa 'am/ yang na slon du gzhug go /yang na sman mar thun tshad chen po 'thungs la de'i 'og tu skyug sman bya'o/ /thog mar snum chos dang dugs byas la/ de nas ni li ni dang/ a dza ganda dang
174b1(mdo 'grel): dung byid dang/ bu tse shel dang/ 'di rnams btags pa'i phyi mchu dang bskyos te/ rims kyis btab pa'i zhag gtung ngo/ /ldong ros dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ pi pi ling dang/ til mar lhan cig sbyar ba'i mig sman yang gzhug go /shing kun dang/ stag gi
174b2(mdo 'grel): tshil cha mnyam pa rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba'i sna sman btang ngo/ /yang na mar rnying pa gcig pu 'am/ yang na seng+ge'i tshil rgyam tsha dang sbyar te sna sman btang ngo/ /yang na pa la ka sha dang/ nim pa'i lo ma dang/ shu dag dang/ ru rta dang/ a ru ra dang/ yungs kar dang
174b3(mdo 'grel): nas dang mar dang sbyar bas bdug par byas na rims ma rungs pa sel to/ /yang na byi la'i rtug pa'i bdug pa yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /bya ma ka dang/ shu dag dang/ sra rtsi pog dang/ nimpa dang/ a ka dang/ a ka ru dang/ thang shing dang/ 'di
174b4(mdo 'grel): rnams sbyar ba'i dung ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i bdug pa zhes bya ste/ rims thams cad la sbyar ro/ /gzhan yang 'jigs pa las rims su gyur pa dang sems sgyur pa las rims su gyur pa dang/ 'byung po dang smyo byed dang brjed byed kyi nang
174b5(mdo 'grel): du bshad pa'i bdug pa dang/ sna sman dang mig sman du bshad pa rnams skabs 'dir rims thams cad la sbyar ro/ /gzhan yang lha bsten pa dang/ nor bu bcad pa dang/ sngags dang/ gtor ma btang ba dang/ lha mchod pa dang/ sbyin sreg dang/
174b6(mdo 'grel): nye bar gso sbyong bya ba dang/ bde legs dang phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa byas na/ rims nad thams cad sel to/ /glo bur du byung ba'i rims mi bzad pa ni phal cher gdon las gyur pa ste/ de la ni lta la bsnyen cing mchod na de nyid sman
174b7(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /rims mi zad pa la grang ba dang/ dro ba la sogs par rang rang gyi gso ba rnam pa thams cad byas kyang ma zhi na/ khrag gtar bar bya'o/ /rlung dang me dbal dang/ 'brum bu las gyur pa'i rims nad la ni sman mar dang/ byug pa grang me dang
175a1(mdo 'grel): blugs pa dang/ sha khu dang/ bza' ba dang/ khrag du byung ba la sogs pa rang rang gi gso ba bzhin du bya'o/ /zhag gsum pa'i rims nam tshong gi rtsa las gtar ro/ /zhag bzhi pa la ni rgyab kyi nam tshong gi
175a2(mdo 'grel): drang thad kyi rtsa las gtar ro/ /dangs ma'i rims ma rungs pa zhugs pa la ni smyung ba dang skyugs sman btang ngo/ /rims de khrag gi nang du zhugs na ni khrag la phan pa'i sman bskol ba'i chus lus la gtor ba dang/ bsku ba dang
175a3(mdo 'grel): gtar ka rnams bya'o/ /rims de sha la gnas na ni bkru sman rnon po btang ngo/ /tshil la gnas na ni tshil dbri ba'i sman bya'o/ /rims de rus pa dang rkang la gnas na ni dugs dang mnye ba dang bsku byug dang/ rlung nad zhi ba'i sman
175a4(mdo 'grel): rnams bya ste/ khyad par 'jam rtsi mas btang na phan no/ /'byung po'i gdon las gyur pa'i rims la ni sngags dang gtor ma la sogs pa'i cho ga byas na phan no/ /sman bdug pa'i dris phog pa las rims su gyur pa la ni mkhris pa
175a5(mdo 'grel): zhi bar byed pa'i sman rnams byin na phan no/ /dug gis phog pa las rims su gyur pa la ni dug gso ba'i dpyad bya'o/ /khros pa las gyur pa'i rims la ni gang la dga' ba'i nor sbyin pa dang/ snying dga' ba'i gtam bya'o/ /des
175a6(mdo 'grel): ma zhin phan pa'i zas dang sman bsten par bya'o/ /des kyang ma zhin mi phan pa'i zas dang sman gyis gso'o/ /de dag gis ma phan na bkru sman btang na phan no/ /khro ba las rims byung ba la ni 'dod pa bsten pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod
175a7(mdo 'grel): pa la chags pa las rims su gyur pa la ni khro ba bskyed pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan dang 'jigs pa las rims su gyur pa la khro ba dang snying du sdug pa dang gnyi ga bsten pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dmod pa dang drag sngags kyi las
175b1(mdo 'grel): las rims su gyur pa la ni srid srung gi rig byed kyi cho ga 'am/ lha la sogs pa la mchod pa byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /glo bur du byung ba'i rims de rnams thog ma ni gcig pu byung ba yin na phyis ni nad gzhi 'dras nas byung ba yin te/ de
175b2(mdo 'grel): bas na glo bur du byung ba'i rims la ni sman dpyad nad gzhi dang ji ltar mthun par gso'o/ /rims de rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi mi ldan gyi bar du ni/ gting zug par mi 'gyur ro/ /rims ldang ba'i dus su sems pa las rims su gyur
175b3(mdo 'grel): pa la ni yul yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs mngon du byas na dran pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la yid dga' bar bya ste/ snying rjes sems brlan par gyur na rims 'joms so/ /skyes bu rims dang bral zhing nyams stobs
175b4(mdo 'grel): ma skyes pa la ni lus kyi rtsol pa dang/ mkhris pa dang/ de bzhin du kha zas lci ba dang/ ma goms pa dang/ tsha ba bskyed pa dang/ gzhan rims skye ba'i rgyu thams cad spang bar bya'o/ /rims las byang ba yin na yang kha zas thams
175b5(mdo 'grel): cad 'tshol bar mang du mi bza' ste/ nyams chung pas kha zas 'tshol bar zos na nad byang ba yin na yang phyir ldog par byed do/ /de bas na bag ma byas pa'i zas dang spyod lam bsten pa las ni srog 'phral 'phrogs par byed pa
175b6(mdo 'grel): yin pas khyad par du nad kyi skabs la brtags te/ smyung ba dang/ dugs dang/ nas kyi thug pa dang/ tik+ta'i khu ba dang/ smin par byed pa'i sman dang/ 'o ma dang mar la sogs pa gso ba thams cad sbyar bar bya'o/ /lha khyab 'jug gis
175b7(mdo 'grel): btang ba'i rims shin tu drag po la ni sman dang/ nor bu dang/ sngags rnams mgo la gdags so/ /gzhan yang pham la sogs pa dam pa rnams dang/ bla ma dang/ bram ze dang/ lha rnams la mchod pa dang/ yid dga' bar byed pa'i
176a1(mdo 'grel): yul rnams bsten par byas pas kyang rims rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gso ba'i gnas las rims nad gso pa'i le'u ste dang po rdzogs so// //de nas khrag mkhris gso ba'i le'u gnyis pa bshad par bya ste/
176a2(mdo 'grel): skyes bu stobs dang ldan zhing khrag stong du shugs mi drag par 'byung ba de yang gsar du dgun nam grang ba'i dus su brla gnyan med par 'byung na/ mdo'i gnas nad med par 'gyur ba'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u las khrag mkhris shas tshe bar 'gyur pa'i
176a3(mdo 'grel): gso ba 'dir sbyar ro/ /khrag mkhris thur du byung ba dang/ nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa las byung ba dang/ ldang dub byed pa dang/ stod du byung ba'i khrag kha dang sna dang/ mig dang/ rna ba'i bu gar 'pho zhing 'byung ba dang/ smad du byung ba'i khrag po
176a4(mdo 'grel): mtshan dang/ rkub nas 'byung ba dang/ yang na khrag bstod smad du phyin ci log tu 'byung ba rnams la ni rims pas/ khyad kyis brdal la gso'o/ /stod smad gnyis ka las khrag tshar 'byung zhing me drod chung ba dang/ nad gzhi gsum las gyur
176a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ stod smad gang yang rung ba las tshabs cher 'byung ba rnams ni spang bar bya'o/ /de la nad gzhi dang/ nyi ma ring thung nur ba'i dus dang/ khrag mkhris de nad gzhi gang dang 'brel nas stobs che chung du song ba dang/ yul dang dus la
176a6(mdo 'grel): sogs pa brtags nas khrag gong 'og gang nas byung ba la sogs pa bye brag shes par byas nas de'i 'og tu smyung ba 'am/ lus 'phel zhing rgyas par bya ba 'am/ lus sbyang ba 'am/ sman gyis zhi bar bya ba rnams gang rigs par bya'o//
176a7(mdo 'grel): kha zas dro ba dang/ rno ba la sogs pas mkhris pa'i nad skyes pa de yang/ nad gzhi mang po dang 'dres te nyoms stobs dang ldan la khrag stod du byung ba la ni bkru sman btang la/ smad du byung ba la ni skyug sman btang ngo/ /lus 'phel zhing
176b1(mdo 'grel): nyam stobs dang ldan na ni smyung ba bya'o/ /gal te lus smyung ba byas pa dang/ ring ba yin na ni nyams stobs skyed pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /khrag stod du byung ba la ni kha ba dang/ bska ba'i sman gyi khu bas zhi bar bya'o/ /smyung ba byas pa la ni bca' sga ma
176b2(mdo 'grel): gtogs pa'i yan lag drug pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /khrag thur du byung ba la ni mngar ba'i khu bcud kyis zhi bar bya'o/ /khrag stod du byung ba la ni thog mar skyo ma blud do/ /smad du byung ba la ni sman thug blud do/ /khrag mkhris can nyams
176b3(mdo 'grel): stobs yod cing sha ma zad pa la zas za nus pa de ni skyon gyi khrag byung du zin kyang dang por khrag bcad du mi rung ngo/ /bcad sngas na nad mang du skyed do/ /gzhan du na nyams zad cing zas za mi nus te/ nyes pa dag cing khrag mang du 'byung ba la ni khrag ma bcad na mes tshig pa bzhin du myur du
176b4(mdo 'grel): myur du 'chi bar byed do/ /dur byid dang/ sha ma dur byid gnyis bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du yang de gnyis brtags pa'i phye ma dang/ sha kha ra'i phye ma dang sbyar ba lag pa'i mthil du bzhag ste ba ldag go /dur byid dang/ sha ma dur byid dang/ 'bras
176b5(mdo 'grel): bu gsum dang/ pi pi ling dang/ sha kha ra dang/ sbyar ba'i ri lu byas te de las ran par zos na/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khrag stong du lus pa dang/ skrang ba dang/ rims rnams 'joms so/ /yang na dur bying dang sha kha ra cha snyams te/ kha ra'i bzhi
176b6(mdo 'grel): cha'i pi pi ling dang/ de rnams sbrang rtsi dang/ ri lur byas te zos na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/ /yang na khrag thur du 'byung ba la ni kyug sman btang ste/ chu dang skyo ma sbyar ba'i nang du/ po son cha dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ kha ras btab pa dang/ yang na
176b7(mdo 'grel): po son cha dang/ kha ra dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ chu dang sbyar ba btang ba 'am/ yang na shing mngar bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du po son cha btab pa 'am/ yang na bu ram chu po son cha dang sbyar ba 'am/ sbyor ba de dag las gang yang rung ba byas na skyug par
177a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /thur du 'byung ba'i khrag mkhris la bsngags so/ /de ltar slon khrus kyis lus ngag par byas nas/ nyams stobs bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang rang gi gso ba skyo ma dang/ thug pa la sogs pa'i rims bzhin
177a2(mdo 'grel): du sbyar ro/ /de la skyo ma ni rims nad gso ba'i nang nas 'byung ba'i rgun 'brum 'am/ shing tog ma du ka la sogs pa'i skyo ma 'am/ yang na mkhris pa 'joms pa'i 'bras bu'i rigs rgun 'bru dang/ skyu ru ra la sogs pa'i skyo ma
177a3(mdo 'grel): blud do/ /yang na bra go dang/ rgun 'bru dang/ ma du ka dang/ ba ru sha ka dang/ 'di rnams kha ra dang sbyar ba ni snying po lnga'i skyo ma zhes bya ste/ blud pa 'am/ yang na snying po lnga'i sman khu'i nang du mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ 'bras yos kyi phye ma
177a4(mdo 'grel): dang 'di rnams chu dang sbyar ba'i skyo ma blud do/ /gal te skyu ru ra la dga' zhing me drod chung ba yin na ni skyu ru ra dang/ se'u 'bru lta bur gdab po/ /de la thug pa ni pad+ma ge sar dang/ utpa la'i ge sar dang/ priSh+Na par+Ni dang/ pri yangku rnams
177a5(mdo 'grel): bskol ba'i thug pa 'am/ yang na pu shel ci 'am/ seng phrom dkar po dang tsan dan dang/ 'di rnams bskol ba'i thug pa'i nang du bca' sga btab pa 'am/ yang na ba la ka dang/ ta ka'i me tog dang/ bilba'i rkang dang/ byi tser ba dang
177a6(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams sbyar ba'i thug pa 'am/ yang na tik+ta dang/ pu shel tse dang/ gla sgang dang/ 'di rnams sbyar ba'i thug pa 'am/ yang na sran chung dang/ priSh+Na par+Ni sbyar ba 'am/ yang na sa la par+Ni sbyar ba 'am/ yang na sa la par+Ni dang/ mon rde'u dang
177a7(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba'i thug pa 'am/ yang na ba la dang/ a ri nu ka dang/ mar dang sbyar ba 'am/ gong gi thug pa'i sbyor ba de rnams bsil ba'i dus pa dang ldan pa srog chags thang la gnas pa'i sha khu las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa grang mo'i nang du
177b1(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi dang kha ra btab ste/ sbyar bar re nas de ltar sbyar ro/ /de bzhin bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i sha khu'i nang du mngar la dad pa yin na mar dang bsngos la sha kha ra dang ldan par sbyin no/ /skyur la dad pa yin na ni skyur la btab pa blud do//
177b2(mdo 'grel): kha zas kyi tshul brtag cing shes pa'i le'u las yang zhing bsil ba'i kha zas grang ba dang/ gang bu las skyes pa'i 'bru dang tshod ma yang sa bsil pa'i nus pa can/ khrag mkhris la rab tu bsngags so/ /btung ba ni gong du smos pa'i yan lag
177b3(mdo 'grel): drug pa'i sman las dong kra spangs pa'i btung ba 'am/ yang na rtsa ba chung ngu lnga bskol ba 'am/ yang na chu bskol ba bsgrangs pa 'am/ yang na sbrang rtsi'i chu 'am/ yang na mkhris pa 'joms pa'i 'bras bu rgun 'bru 'am/ bra go la sogs pa'i
177b4(mdo 'grel): chu blud do/ /rtugs pa 'gags pa la ni rgya sne'u dang/ ri bong gi sha sbyar ba phan no/ /rlung shas che ba'i rtug pa 'gags pa la ni sreg pa'i sha dang u dumpar bskol ba blud pa 'am/ yang na shing plaksha bskol ba'i nang du rma bya'i sha sbyar ba
177b5(mdo 'grel): 'am/ yang na n+ya gro d+ha dang khyim bya'i sha dang/ bskol ba blud do/ /mdor na khrag dang mkhris pa skye ba'i rgyu dro ba dang rno ba thams cad spang bar bya'o/ /ba sha ka bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du pri yangku dang sa nag po dang/ skyer khanTa dang/ ser phrom
177b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ sbrang rtsi sbyar ba 'thungs na khrag mkhris 'joms so/ /yang na ba sha ka nyi che bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/ yang na ba sha ka bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang/ kha ras btab pa 'thungs na de ma thag khrag mkhris 'joms so/ /khrag mkhris la ni
177b7(mdo 'grel): ba sha ka 'di las lhag pa med do/ /pa tol dang/ su ma na dang/ tsan dan rnam gnyis dang/ ninba dang/ shug pa dang/ de rnams lhan cig sbyar ba 'am/ yang na seng phrom dang/ ba sha ka dang/ mon sne'u me ru dang/ sa nag po dang/ ma du ya na ti ka
178a1(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba sen rtse rnams sbyar ba 'am yang na nye'u shing dang thal tres dang/ ram nye ba rnam gnyis dang shing mngar dang 'di rnams sbyar ba 'am/ sbyor ba de gsum gang yang rung ba bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du kha ra
178a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa 'thungs na/ khrag mkhris 'joms so/ /yang na rgya skyeg shing gi shun pa bskol ba'i nang du ka ras btab pa 'thungs na yang phan no/ /yang na ba glang gi lci ba dang/ rta rtug btsir ba'i khu ba'i nang du
178a3(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi dang mar btab pa btung ngo/ /khrag bska bar byung ba la ni bya phug ron gyi rtug pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te bldag go /khrag shas cher 'byung ba la ni skams na gnas pa'i bya dang/ ri dags kyi khrag sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa btung ngo//
178a4(mdo 'grel): yang na ra'i mtshan ma mkhris pa dang bcas pa btsos pa 'am ma btsos pa yang rung zos na phan no/ /yang na sman pa la ni bskol ba'i khu ba srang drug tsam gyi nang du tsan dan dang/ bu shel tsi dang/ gla sgang dang/ 'bras yos
178a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ mung+ga dang/ pi pi ling dang/ nas dang/ 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma bcug la spangs te/ nang par btsags la tshigs ma bor te/ dangs ma blud na khrag mkhris 'joms so/ /tsan dan dang/ pad+ma dang/ pu shel tse dang/ de
178a6(mdo 'grel): gsum gyi bu ba'i nang du bar ba bsregs pa dmar por gyur pa bcug ste/ spangs pa'i dang ma bsgrangs pa'i dang du sbrang rtsi dang kha ras btab pa blud na khrag mkhris shas che ba las rgyal lo/ /bu ram shing gi tshigs ma brdungs ba
178a7(mdo 'grel): chu dang mnyes pa'i khu ba rdza bsnod gsar ba'i nang du bcug la/ khang pa'i phyi rol du bzhag ste bsrungs la tho rangs ras la btsags te/ tshigs ma bor bar dangs ma sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa me tog pad+ma kha phye ba'i dris bsgos pa
178b1(mdo 'grel): 'thungs na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/ /mkhris pa'i rims 'joms pa'i sman dug mo yungs la sogs pa'i sman thams cad kyang khrag mkhris la sbyar bar bya'o/ /gong ma'i sman khu ba'i sbyor ba de dag gis me drod skyes te/ bad kan zad
178b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ khrag mkhris da rung ma zhi zhing/ rlung dang 'dres nas 'khrug pa la ni 'o ma 'am/ ba'i rnam lnga chu lnga 'gyur dang bskol la chu du ba dang blud na phan no/ /yang na rtsa ba lnga pa chu ngu dang/ ba'i rnam lnga dang/ ra'i 'o ma bskol ba sbrang rtsi dang/
178b3(mdo 'grel): kha ras btab pa btung ngo/ /yang na rgun 'bru dang/ bca' sga dang/ ba la dang/ gze ma dang/ dzI ba ka na dang/ zangs rtsi ba dang/ de rnams re re yang chu dang bskol ba'i nang du 'o ma dang mar btab la sbyar te btang ngo/ /yang na 'o ma dang kha ra dang bskol te
178b4(mdo 'grel): mar dang sbyar la btang ngo/ /gze ma dang nye'u shing 'o ma dang bskol ba 'am/ yang na 'dab ma rnam bzhi 'o ma dang bskol ba 'thungs na/ khrag nad myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing khyad par du gcin 'ong ba'i bu gnas khrag 'byung ba la phan no/ /khrag rkub
178b5(mdo 'grel): nas 'byung ba la ni chu shing gi khu ba dang 'o ma sbyar ba blud na phan no/ /yang na n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu dang 'o ma bskol ba 'am/ yang na bca' sga dang/ u di tsa dang/ utpal dang 'o ma bskol ba blud na phan no/ /yang na khrag tu 'khru ba'i gso ba dang/ gzhang
178b6(mdo 'grel): 'brum khrag chod can gyi gso ba ji snyed pa 'ang 'dir sbyar ro/ /sman khu 'thungs pa'i 'og tu bza' yang gong ma'i 'o ma bskol ba dang sbyar ro/ /yang na gong gi sbyor ba de dag mar dang sbyar ba btang ngo/ /ba sha ka'i lo ma dang/ sdong bu dang/ rtsa ba dang
178b7(mdo 'grel): bcas pa srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang de'i brgyad 'gyur gyi chu srang nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug dang bskol te/ brgyad cha lus pa dang/ tshigs ma bor ba'i nang du mar srang brgyad dang/ ba sha ka'i me tog srang gnyis phye mar bya ste btab pa yang bskol
179a1(mdo 'grel): te bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang ldan par 'thungs na/ khrag mkhris dang/ mkhris pa'i skran dang rims dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lud pa dang/ snying nad dang/ mig ser dang rab rib dang/ mgo 'khor ba dang/ me dpal dang
179a2(mdo 'grel): skad 'gag pa rnams 'joms so/ /rgya skyegs shing gi lo ma btsir ba'i khu ba dang/ de'i bzhi cha'i mar dang bskol ba'i nang du mar gyi bzhi cha blaksha rgya skyegs shing gi lo ma dang/ sbrang rtsi btab te 'thungs na khrag mkhris 'joms so/ /de bzhin du
179a3(mdo 'grel): byi? lce ba'i lo ma la yang sbyor ba de ltar byas na phan yon de dang 'dra'o/ /mgul pa nas khrag dbu ba can bad kan dang bcas pa ska bar 'byung ba la ni utpa la'i sdong bu bsregs pa'i thal ba dang/ mar dang sbrang rtsi rnams lde gur byas te sbyin
179a4(mdo 'grel): no/ /yang na utpa la dang/ pad+ma dang/ pri yangku dang/ shing ma du ka dang/ de rnams re re thal sbyor gong ma dang byas na yang phan no/ /rkub na mar khrag shas cher 'byung ba la ni ru ha dang/ khrag mkhris 'joms pa'i sman gyi 'jam rtsi bya'o//
179a5(mdo 'grel): sna nas khrag skyon med par 'byung ba la ni/ /sna nas gzhug pa dang blugs pa'i sman bya ste/ de yang gong gi sbyar sman bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du 'o ma dang/ bu ram shing gi khu ba la sogs pa dang bsres te blugs par bya'o/ /yang na 'o
179a6(mdo 'grel): ma la sogs pa de dag kha ra dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na chu nye che blugs na phan no/ /yang na so'u 'i me tog dang a mra dang/ shar du la/ de gsum gang yang rung ba'i sna sman btang ngo/ /yang na sman bsil ba'i sman rtswa dur ba dang/ byi tser ba la
179a7(mdo 'grel): sogs pa lus byugs pa dang/ bsku mnye dang/ rgyun blugs dang/ sman khu grang mo'i nang du lus 'jug pa la sogs pa yang bya'o/ /mkhris pa'i rims kyi nang du bshad pa'i lus kyi nang dang/ phyi rol nas sman du bya ba thams cad dang/ glo
179b1(mdo 'grel): 'drams pa dang/ zas byed kyis gos pa thams cad kyang khrag mkhris 'di la phan pa yin par sbyar ro/ /gso ba'i gnas las khrag mkhris gso ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so// //de nas lud pa dang glo nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya
179b2(mdo 'grel): ste/ de la rlung 'ba' zhig las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad la ni/ thog mar rlung la phan pa'i sman sna tshogs dang sbyar ba'i snum gyi cho ga spyad par bya ste/ de yang snum dang sbyar ba'i thug pa dang/ khu bcud btang ba dang/ lhag pa dang/ bsku ba dang/ dugs dang/
179b3(mdo 'grel): dud pas bdug pa dang/ de bzhin du bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ thams cad snum dang bcas par bya'o/ /gzhan rtug pa 'gags pa la ni 'jam rtsi mas btang bas bsal bar bya'o/ /rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa de mkhris pa dang bcas par gyur
179b4(mdo 'grel): na/ thog mar zas zos la de'i 'og tu mar dang 'o ma nyal khar btung ngo/ /rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa bad kan dang bcas pa yin na ni snum dang bcas pa'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/ /de la rlung la phan pa'i sman ni sle tres dang/ kan+ta ka ri gnyis
179b5(mdo 'grel): srang sum cu bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mar sum cu rtsa gnyis dang bskol te/ chu ni du mar lus pa dang de nas blud na rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel cing me'i drod skyed pa byed do/ /ya bak+Sha dang/ ra sna dang/ shu dag dang/ shing kun dang/ pA thA dang/
179b6(mdo 'grel): shing mngar dang/ 'u su dang/ cha ba rnam lnga dang/ de rnams zho re re dang/ mar khu bre gang dang/ rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang lhan cig bskol la/ mar lus pa dang/ de las ci ran tsam 'thungs pa'i rjes la 'bras thug blud na/ lud
179b7(mdo 'grel): ba lu ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ snying na ba dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ pho ba'i nad dang/ skran la sogs pa sel bar byed do/ /yang na rwa sna dang/ rtsa ba bcu pa dang/ nye'u shing dang/ 'di rnams srang bcu gnyis bcu gnyis dang/ rgya sran dang/ rgya
180a1(mdo 'grel): shug dang/ nas 'di rnams srang brgyad brgyad dang/ rwa sha srang bcu dang/ chu srang lnga dang/ 'di rnams lhan cig bskol te bzhi cha lus pa dang/ de dang mnyam pa'i mar dang/ mar gyi tshad kyi 'o ma dang/ dzi banhi'i sde tshan
180a2(mdo 'grel): lhan cig bskol te/ mar lus pa dang/ de la btud pa dang/ snar blugs pa dang/ 'jam rtsi mas btang ba la sogs pa byas na/ rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa'i lud pa rnam lnga dang/ mgo mdar ba dang mo mtshan dang/ brla dbrag gi nad
180a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ lus dang yan lag gang yang rung ba la rlung nad byung ste na ba dang/ mchin pa na ba dang/ ro stod man chad kyi rlung nad sel to/ /yang na bi dA ri'i sde tshan chu dang tshul bzhin du bskol ba bzhi cha lus pa dang/ khu ba'i bzhi cha'i mar
180a4(mdo 'grel): dang lhan cig bskol la/ mar lus pa dang/ bi da ri'i phye ma nyung zad btab ste/ de las ran par zos na lud pa'i nad sel to/ /yang na shing a sho ka'i sa bon dang/ shing mngar dang/ bi dang ka dang/ skyer khaN+Ta dang/ shug pa dang/ lan tsha
180a5(mdo 'grel): gyi? dang/ kha ru tsha dang bcas pa 'di rnams mar dang tshul bzhin du sbyar ba 'am/ yang na sman de rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin zhing de'i 'og tu 'o ma blud pas nad zhi bar byed do/ /yang na bi dang ka dang/ dong kra dang/ ra sna dang
180a6(mdo 'grel): pi pi ling dang/ shing kun dang lce myang tsha dang/ bar gyi zhes bya ba ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ ya bak+Sha ra dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma chu dron dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na mar ci ran tsam dang sbyar ba 'thungs na/ rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa
180a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ skyigs bu dang/ me'i drod chung ba rnams zhi bar byed do/ /yang na rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa la ni byi tsher ba dang/ sring ga bi ra zhes bya ba bca' sga dang/ zur ba dkar po dang/ rgun 'brum dang/ kha ra dkar
180b1(mdo 'grel): po dang/ sriM ga ta ka dang/ 'di rnams til mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na/ rlung las gyur pa'i rlung nad sel to/ /yang na dus pa ra sha zhes bya ba byi tsher ba dang/ pi pi ling dang/ mu ta zhes bya ba gla sgang dang/ ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ karka ti sriM gi ni
180b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ Sha Ti zhes bya ba zur ba dkar po dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma bu ram rnying pa dang/ til mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na/ rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/ /pi pi ling dang/ bca' sga dang/ karka ta sring ka dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma bu ram
180b3(mdo 'grel): rnying pa dang til mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na/ rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/ /pi pi ling dang/ senda pa gnyis kyi phye ma chu dron po dang sbyar ba rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa can la sbyin no/ /yang na bca' sga dang/ kha ra dkar po'i phye ma zho
180b4(mdo 'grel): ga chu'i nang du btab ste blud pa 'am/ yang na pi pi ling dang/ lce myang tsha gnyis kyi phye ma chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba'i nad mar khol ma thag chad pa cung zhig blugs te/ chang ngam zho ga chu gang yang rung ba dang bsres pa blud na/ rlung las
180b5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/ /lud pa dang bcas pa'i cham ba la ni thog mar 'o ma dang sha khu dang bcas pa'i bza' ba sbyin la/ de'i 'og tu snum dang bcas pa'i dud pa'i cho ga gong du bstan pa rnams bya'o/ /gzhan yang skyigs bu dang
180b6(mdo 'grel): dbugs mi bde ba'i nad la dud pa btang ba'i cho ga 'og nas bstan pa rnams la lud pa'i cham pa bzhin du/ thog mar 'o ma dang sha khu'i bcud byin la de'i 'og tu dud pa btang bar bya'o/ /kha zas ni dro ba dang/ thang dang chu la gnas
180b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i srog chags kyi sha khu dang/ mon sran gre'u dang/ at+ma kupta zhes bya ba kha sral phre'u'i khu ba gang yang rung ba 'bras sA lu dang/ nas dang gro dang/ zhag drug bcu pa'i zas gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba'i zas byin na/ rlung las gyur pa'i
181a1(mdo 'grel): lud pa sel to/ /yang na la la bud dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bilpa'i rkang dang/ dong kra dag tsi tra ka dang/ ra sna dang/ a dza dzi zhes bya ba zi ra dang/ priSh+Na par+Ni dang/ blak+Sha dang/ zur ba dang/ ma nu dang/ 'di rnams
181a2(mdo 'grel): bskol ba'i khu ba las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa'i nang du snum dang skyur dang lan tshar btab pa blud na/ rked pa na ba dang/ snying ba dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ lto na ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ skyigs bu rnams sel to//
181a3(mdo 'grel): lhag par yang rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa rnams sbyong ngo/ /rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i khu ba las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa'i nang du tsha ba lnga'i phye ma dang/ bu ram btab ste blud na/ rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/ /yang na til
181a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'bras sA lu dang/ skyur dang/ snum dang bcas pa'i thug pa 'am/ yang na 'bras kyi 'o thug rgyam tshas btab pa blud na/ rlung gi lud pa la phan no/ /gong du smos pa'i rked pa la sogs pa'i nang rnams zhi bar byed do/ /nya dang
181a5(mdo 'grel): khyim bya dang/ phag dang/ 'di gsum gang yang rung ba'i sha khu las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa mar dang/ rgyam tsha dang ldan par blud na phan yon gong dang 'dra'o/ /gzhan yang ba spru ka dang/ ba spu si zhes bya ba mon sne'u mi ?
181a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ kas g+ha na n+ti dang/ kaN+Da kA ri'i lo ma dang/ 'bras bu dang/ la bug gzhon nu dang/ skam po dang/ 'di rnams la g.yos su byas pa'i tshod ma rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa can la sbyar ro/ /zas ni snum chen po bzhi dang/
181a7(mdo 'grel): 'o ma dang/ bu ram shing gi khu ba dang/ bu ram las sbyar ba'i btung ba go d+hi ka zhes bya ba dang/ de rnams dang lhan cig sbyar ba bza' o/ /skom du ni zho ga chu dang/ rtsa ba mo dang/ se'u 'bru'i btung ba chu dang sbyar ba la sogs
181b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ chang dang skom 'di rnams rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa can la blud do/ /mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur pa la ni snum dang bcas pa'i skyugs sman btang na phan te/ de bzhin du po son cha dang/ taM pi la dang/ shing mngar dang/ 'di
181b2(mdo 'grel): gsum chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /slon par byas na phan no/ /yang na po son cha dang/ shing mngar gyi phye ma bu ram shing gi khu ba 'am/ bi da ri'i khu ba gang yang rung ba'i nang du btab ste blud na skyug par 'gyur te/ mkhris pa dang bad
181b3(mdo 'grel): kan las gyur pa'i lud pa sel te/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa bad kan shas chung na ni/ shing nye rong gcig pu rgyu ma 'brum la sogs pa'i mngar bag dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman btang ngo/ /ci ste bad kan gyi shas che na ni shing
181b4(mdo 'grel): nye yod sman kha ba'i bag dang sbyar la btang ngo/ /de ltar slon khrus kyis nad dag par byas nas/ thug pa'i rim pa sbyar bar bya ste/ de yang mkhris pa shas che zhing bad kan shas chung ba'i lud pa'i nad la ni mngar bag dang snum bag dang
181b5(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba'i thug pa grang mo blud do/ /bad kan shas che zhing mkhris pa shas chung ba'i lud pa la ni sman kha ba dang/ rtsub pa dang sbyar ba'i thug pa grang mo blud do/ /mkhris pa nye tshe las gyur pa'i lud pa la ni si da zhes bya ba'i khar dkar po
181b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ utpa la dang 'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang lde gur byas nas byin na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bad mkhris dang bcas pa'i lud pa la ni gong ma'i sman gyi steng du gla sgang na le sham gyis btab ste sbyin no/ /mkhris pa dang rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa la
181b7(mdo 'grel): ni gla sgang dang na le sham ma gtogs pa gong ma'i sbyor ba sman gyi steng du mar gyis btab pa'i lde gu ldag du bcug na phan no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa la ni gla sgang dang na la sham ma gtogs pa gong ma'i sbyor ba'i sman gyi
182a1(mdo 'grel): steng du mar gyis btab pa'i lde gu ldog tu bcug na phan no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa la ni rgun 'bru lnga bcu pa dang/ ka na li zhes bya ba pi pi ling sum cu dang/ sha kha ra srang gcig dang/ 'di
182a2(mdo 'grel): gsum sbrang rtsi dang lde gur byas te sbyin no/ /yang na be'u rtswa ma zos pa'i mtshan bu'i khu ba btsir ba dang/ sbrang rtsir sbyar ba zos na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/ /yang na rtag zhes bya ba'i shing cha dang/ rgun 'bru dang/ pi pi
182a3(mdo 'grel): ling gi rtsa ba dang/ ma nu dang/ 'bras yos dang/ gla sgang dang/ zur ba dkar po dang/ ra sna dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ sha kha ra 'di rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na snying nad dang/ lud pa'i nad sel to/ /yang na srog
182a4(mdo 'grel): chags thang la gnas pa'i mngar ba'i sha dang/ khred nag dgod kyi bza' ba dang/ mon sran rde'u la sogs pa'i khu ba dang/ tshod ma kha bar sbyar bzos na/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa bad kan shas che ba la ni sman kha ba dang sbrang
182a5(mdo 'grel): rtsi sbyar lde gu sbyin no/ /bad kan gyi shas chung ba la ni 'bras drug cu pa'i tshan 'o ma la sogs pa'i khu ba dang lhan cig sbyin no/ /btung ba ni sha kha ra dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na rgun chuAm/ bu ram shing gi khu ba 'am/ 'o ma bskol
182a6(mdo 'grel): la bsgrang ba blud par bya'o/ /ka ko li zhes bya ba ram nye'u pa rnam gnyis dang/ me da rnam gnyis dang/ pri ha tI rnam gnyis dang bri sha zhes bya ba rnam gnyis dang/ ba sha ka dang/ dong kra dang/ 'di rnams zhib tu btags te/ sha khuAm
182a7(mdo 'grel): 'o ma 'am/ thug pa gang yang rung ba 'u shar sbyar te blud na/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/ /rgun 'bru dang/ pi pi ling dang rtsa'i rtsa ba lnga chu bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ 'o ma dang yang bskol la tshu na 'o ma lus pa dang/
182b1(mdo 'grel): bsgrangs pa'i steng du sbrang rtsi dang sha kha ra btab pa 'thungs na/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa zhi bar byed do/ /yang na gong ma'i sman khu ba las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab pa blud pa 'am/ yang na zur pa 'am/ h+ri
182b2(mdo 'grel): bor zhes bya ba ud+di ca dang/ bri ha tI dang/ rtsa'i rtsa ba lnga chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ 'o ma dang yang bskol la chu ni du 'o ma lus pa dang/ bsgrangs pa'i steng du sbrang rtsi dang sha kha ra btab pa 'thungs na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa zhi bar
182b3(mdo 'grel): byed do/ /yang na gong ma'i sman khu las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab pa blud pa 'am/ yang na zur ba 'am/ h+ri ba ra zhes bya ba u ti tsa dang/ pri hwa tI dang/ sha kha ra dang/ bi sha be sha rtsa zhes bya ba bca' sga dang/ 'di
182b4(mdo 'grel): rnams chungs su byas te/ ras las btsags la tshigs ma bor ba'i khu ba'i nang du mar gyis bsres te 'thungs na/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad zhi bar byed do/ /sha kha ra dang/ dzi ba ka ra dang/ mutka ra dang/ ma sha par+Ni dang/ durba la zhes
182b5(mdo 'grel): bya ba byi tser ba dang/ 'di rnams cham chom brdungs te/ mar gyi brgyad 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang chu dang lhan cig bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa dang/ de las btung ba dang/ bza' ba dang bsku ba la sogs pa byas na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i lud pa las
182b6(mdo 'grel): rgyal lo/ /yang na sman gong ma de rnams kyis phyi ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/ yang na bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa 'thungs na phan no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad la thog mar lha shig zhes bya ba thang shing dang mar bskol la mar
182b7(mdo 'grel): lus pa'i nang du/ tsha ba gsum dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba'i phye ma btab pa'i mar gyi snum gyi cho ga bya ste/ de'i 'og tu skyugs sman dang/ bkru sman dang/ sna sman la sogs pa gong ma'i mar las gzhi blangs te/ nyams dang sbyar ba ci rigs
183a1(mdo 'grel): par btang ngo/ /nad pa nyams stobs chung ba la ni slon khrus dang/ sna sman drag po mi btang ngo/ /de ltar slon khrus byas pa'i rjes la/ nas dang/ mon sran rde'u dang/ rgya sran la sogs pa rtsub pa dang/ na le sham la
183a2(mdo 'grel): sogs pa tsha ba'i sman sbyar ba'i thug pa dron po blud do/ /ka sa mar dang/ brha ga zhes bya ba dang/ bya gri zhes bya ba kaN+Ta kA ri dang/ de rnams kyi tshod ma ya bak+Sha ra dang/ pi pi ling dang ldan par byas la sbyin no/ /srog chags thang la gnas
183a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ khung na gnas pa'i sha khu til dang/ yungs kar dang/ bilba dang/ de rnams gang yang rung ba mar dang sbyar ba'i khu ba sbyin no/ /skem du ni rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i chu 'am/ chu bskol ba 'am/ yang na rtag tu chang 'thung ba yin na
183a4(mdo 'grel): yang chang ngam/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba blud do/ /yang na ma nu'i rtsa ba dang/ dong ka'i rtsa ba dang/ pa to la'i rtsa ba dang/ de rnams cham chom brdungs la chu dang nub gcig sprangs te/ de'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'tshal nan du blud na bad
183a5(mdo 'grel): kan las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/ /yang na pi pi ling dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ sri kha be ra zhes bya ba bca' sga dang/ ba ru ra 'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang/ lde gur byas pa byin na bad kan gyi lud pa 'phrog go /yang na rma bya dang/
183a6(mdo 'grel): khyim bya'i sgro zhig kha bag can gyi nang du bcug ste bsres la/ snag tsha bzhin du dag por song ba dang/ nang tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang bsres la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na/ bad kan las gyur pa'i lus pa zhi bar
183a7(mdo 'grel): byed do/ /yang na bi sha la zhes bya ba shing nye rong dang/ inda ba ru ni dang/ pi pi ling dang/ gla sgang dang/ dri bi rtsa zhes bya ba shing nye rong dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba blud pa 'am/ yang na na le sham dang/ sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i
183b1(mdo 'grel): lde gu 'am/ yang na dzong ga ka zhes bya ba a ka ru dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na kaN+Da kA ri dang/ sbrang rtsi sbyar ba 'am/ yang na parpa ta dang/ sbrang rtsi sbyar ba 'am/ yang na pri ka ra dza dang/ sbrang rtsi sbyar ba 'am/ yang na ka sa ga na dang/
183b2(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsir sbyar ba 'am/ yang na stag po'i rtug pa btsir ba'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba 'am/ sbyor ba 'di rnams gang yang rung ba zos na/ bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa zhi bar byed do/ /thang shing dang/ grur pa dang/ /rta ka sh+ri gi dang/ byi tsher
183b3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ 'di rnams til mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba zos na/ bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa zhi bar byed do/ /yang na pi pi ling dang/ dong gra dang/ gla sgang dang/ a ru ra dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ kha ra dkar po dang/ 'di rnams sbrang
183b4(mdo 'grel): rtsi dang/ til mar dang/ sbyar ba dang/ yang na 'bras yos dang/ kha ra dkar po dang/ skyu ru ra'i shing gi myu gu dang/ 'di rnams mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sbyor ba gsum po de dag gang yang rung ba zos na/ rlung dang bad kan las
183b5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i lung pa sel to/ /yang na se'u 'bru srang gnyis dang/ bu ram srang brgyad dang/ tsha ba gsum srang re re dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma zos na yang yi ga 'bye zhing me'i drod skyed pa dang/ skad snyan par 'gyur ba dang/ cham pa
183b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lung pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na bu ram srang gnyis dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba zho gcig dang/ pi pi ling dang na le sham zho gnyis dang/ se'u 'bru srang phyed dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye
183b7(mdo 'grel): ma zos na/ lud pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba sel to/ yang na sems nad gso ba'i skabs su/ a rur la sogs pa'i sbyar sman bstan pa'i nang du karka ta sh+rim gi bstan la bskol ba'i khu ba blud na lud pa la rab tu phan no/ /yang na d+hi sya
184a1(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba la la bud dang/ dur byed dang/ bi sha la dang/ gla sgang dang/ puSh+ka ra mU la dang/ ngo pi ling dang/ 'di rnams ba gcin rnam tshab gang yang rung ba dang bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na bad kan las gyur pa'i

184a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i lud pa 'joms so/ /yang na rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i khu ba srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi nang du mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ puSh+ka ra mU la dang/ zur pa dang/ bilba dang/ byi'u rug pa dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ shing kun
184a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'di rnams zho gnyis gnyis dang lhan cig bskol te/ mar 'ba' zhig lus pa dang/ thog mar thug pa blud la de las ran par 'thungs na/ rlung dang bad kan gyi nad thams cad 'joms so/ /yang na ni dgu na thig le zhes bya ba shes
184a5(mdo 'grel): pa li'i lo ma bskol ba'i khu ba'i bzhi 'gyur gyi mar dang bskol te mar lus pa 'thungs na lung pa 'joms so/ /yang na byi thang ka bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mar dang tsha ba gsum bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na/ lud pa
184a6(mdo 'grel): bzhi bar byed do/ /yang na ba sgru ba me tog dmar po can dang byi'u rug pa dang/ ka sa marda dang/ a ru ra dang/ pa to la dang/ bri ha ti dang/ pha ni dza ka dang/ 'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mar dang/ 'o ma dang/ tsha ba
184a7(mdo 'grel): gsum dang/ yang legs par bskol nas mar lus pa dang/ de las ran par 'thungs na lus pa lu pa dang/ rims mi zad pa dang/ zad byed kyi nang dang/ gzhang 'brum la sogs pa las thar bar byed do/ /yang na kaN+Ta kA ri'i
184b1(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba dang/ 'o ma dang bcas pa chu dang tshul bzhin du bskol ba'i khu ba srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi nang du mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ sman pa la dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ bi dang ka dang/ brur ba dang/ bal po se'u dang/ se'u rtsa ba zhes
184b2(mdo 'grel): bya ba kha ru tsha dang/ ya bak+Sha ra zhes bya ba nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/ ma nu'i rtsa ba dang/ bri k+Shi ba zhes bya ba la spru ba dang/ pri ha sti rang/ a ru ra dang/ la la phud dang/ kru trug tres dang/ rgun 'brum dang/ dbyi mo dang/ pu na rna ba me to/
184b3(mdo 'grel): dmar po can dang/ byi tsher ba dang/ a ma la po ta sa zhes bya ba star bu dang/ karka ta sh+riM gi ni dang/ ta ma la ki dang/ b+har gi zhes bya ba ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ ra sna dang/ gzi ma dang/ 'di rnams cham chom brdungs pa dang/ 'di rnams
184b4(mdo 'grel): lhan cig bskol te/ mar lus pa'i ming ni kaN+Da kA ri'i sman mar zhes bya ste/ de las ran par 'thungs na/ lud pa'i nad rnam pa lnga dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i nang rnam pa lnga dang/ skyigs bu'i nad rnam pa lnga po rnams la rab tu
184b5(mdo 'grel): bsngags te/ bad kan 'joms par byed pa yang yin no/ /yang na kaN+Ta kA ri srid brgyad btags pa'i phye ma chu srang nyis stong bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang bskol te/ srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad lus pa'i nang du mar srang bcu drug dang/ kha
184b6(mdo 'grel): ra dkar po srang bzhi bcu dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ ra sna dang/ sle tres dang/ kru trug tres dang/ karka ta sh+ri gi dang/ ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ gla sgang dang pi pi ling mU la dang/ da nwa ya zhes bya ba byi tsher ba dang/ 'di rnams srang phyed phyed zhib tu
184b7(mdo 'grel): btags pa blugs la lhan cig bskol te/ khu ba du zhing mar lus te/ dril du btub pa dang/ phyir phyung ste snod kyi nang du bsgrangs pa dang/ pi pi ling srang brgyad dang/ smyug rkang srang brgyad dang/ sbrang rtsi rnying pa srang bcu drug dang/ 'di
185a1(mdo 'grel): rnams mnyes te lde gur byas nas/ ran par zos na/ skran dang/ snying nad dang/ skrangs pa dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lud pa thams cad nges par rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /bad kan las gyur
185a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i lud pa rtag tu 'byung ba la ni/ dud pa kha nas rdub pa'i cho ga bya ba dang/ yang na bkru sman btang na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na ldong ros dang/ ba bla dang/ shing mngar dang/ ganda mansi zhes bya ba spang spos dang/ gla sgang dang/
185a3(mdo 'grel): shing ing+gu da'i shun lpags dang/ 'di rnams dang dud pa rdub pa'i cho ga mdo'i gnas su bstan pa bzhin du ji srid lud pa so so kyi bar du bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu bu ram dang/ 'o ma dro 'jam tsam du sbyar ba skom du blud na lud
185a4(mdo 'grel): pa rtsa ba nas 'joms so/ /rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa ni sman khong pa'i dud pa rdub pa byas na/ rgyun gyi lud pa dang 'phral gyi lud pa 'joms so/ /bad kan gyi lud pa bar bar du mun pa bzhin snang
185a5(mdo 'grel): na ni mkhris pa dang 'brel pa yin pas/ de la ni mkhris pa dang/ bad kan gso ba'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/ /bad kan dang rlung 'dres pa'i lud pa'i nang la ni dang po bad kan 'ba' zhig gi gso ba'i dpyad gong du bstan
185a6(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin du bya'o/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'di gsum 'dus pa'i lud pa ni thog mar mkhris pa gso bar bya'o/ /rlung dang bad kan gyi lud pa skam po 'byung ste/ rlung shas che ba la ni snum gyi cho ga bya'o/ /de nyid phyis
185a7(mdo 'grel): sla bar 'byung ste/ bad kan gyi shas che ba la ni rtsub pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /mkhris pa'i shas chen ni kha ba'i bag bsten par bya'o/ /glo 'grams te khrag dang bcas pa'i lud pa 'byung ba la ni de ma thag rgya skyegs dang sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma
185b1(mdo 'grel): dang 'di gsum sbyar ba blud do/ /de zhu ba'i tshod tsam na 'bras chen 'o ma dang sha kha ra dang bcas pa sbyin no/ /lud pa lu ba'i tshe rtsib logs gnyis dang/ chu sor zug gzer byed cing mkhris pa'i me drod chung ba la ni rgya skyegs tshang dang sbyar
185b2(mdo 'grel): ba blud do/ /lud pa lu zhing phyis sla bar 'byung ba la ni me drod nyams chung na de la ni rgya skyegs dang/ gla sgang dang/ bo da dkar po dang/ pa ca dang/ dug mo nyung gi shing shun dang/ 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma chu dang sbyar ba blud do/ /lud pa
185b3(mdo 'grel): lu zhing me drod tshabs cher skyes pa la ni rgya skyegs dang/ mar dang spra tshil dang/ sman 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan dang/ mig rkang dang 'di rnams cha bsnyams te 'o ma bskol ba blud na phan no/ /glo 'grams te khrag mchod pa la ni/ a ti'i ka dang/
185b4(mdo 'grel): pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i tshigs dang/ pad+ma ge sar dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ 'di rnams cham chom brdungs te/ 'o ma dang bskol ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab pa 'thungs na khrag chod par byed do/ /yang na nas rdzin btags pa'i 'o ma dang
185b5(mdo 'grel): bskol ba'i thug pa mar dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na kha ra dkar po'i phye ma dang/ 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i thug pa blud na/ glo 'grams pa'i nad dang rims sel to/ /zad byed kyi lud pa la ni mngar ba'i sman rgun 'bru dang/ shing mngar
185b6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa sbyar ba'i mar byin na phan no/ /yang na bu ram chu bskol ba dang bsgrangs pa'i nang du na le sham dang sbrang rtsi btab pa blud pa 'am/ yang na skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang 'o ma dang bskol ba mar dang ldan par blud pa 'am/ yang na bcud
185b7(mdo 'grel): kyis len gyi skabs su pi pi ling gi cho ga bstan pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /lud pa lu ba dang/ tshigs dang rus par zug cing na ba la ni sbrang rtsi dang/ shing mngar dang/ shing tog ma du ka dang/ rgun 'bru dang/ tu ka sh+kri ra zhes bya ba'i smyig
186a1(mdo 'grel): rkang dang/ ba la dang/ pi pi ling 'di rnams mar dang sbyar ba sbyin na phan no/ /yang na tri dza tra zhes bya ba dri sna gsum zho re re dang/ pi pi ling srad phyed dang/ kha ra dkar po dang/ shing tog ma du ka dang/ khardzu ra zhes bya ba bra go
186a2(mdo 'grel): dang 'di rnams zho re re zhib tu btags la sbrang rtsi dang ri lur byas pa ni sug smel gyi ri lu zhes bya ste/ de las ran par zos na ro rtsa bar byed de/ khrag dang mkhris pa dang/ lud pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang
186a3(mdo 'grel): skyug pa dang/ brgyal ba dang/ skyugs bu dang/ rmongs pa dong mgo 'khor ba dang/ glo gcong zad byed kyi nad dang/ glo 'grams pa'i nad dang/ skad nyams pa dang/ mchin pa na ba dang/ skem byed dang/ dreg dang/ lud pa khrag du 'byung ba dang/
186a4(mdo 'grel): snying dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ skom dad che ba dang/ rims sna tshogs la yang phan no/ /lud pa khrag du 'byung ba la ni ba spru ba me tog dmar po can dang/ sha kha ra dang/ 'bras thug po che dang sA lu dmar po'i phye ma rgun chu dang/ 'o ma
186a5(mdo 'grel): dang chu bzhin du bskol ba'i nang du mar btab pa blud do/ /yang na shing mngar dang/ shing tog ma du ka dang/ 'bras thug po che dang/ 'o mar sbyar ba'i thug pa blud na phan no/ /glo 'grams te kha dang sna la sogs pa las khrag mang po lud pa la
186a6(mdo 'grel): ni khrag dang mkhris pa'i gso thabs thams cad bya'o/ /blo 'grams pa'i lud pa rlung gsil lam gzhan du song ste/ lud pa ma thon zhing 'gags pa la ni/ ra'i tshil ran par bzhus la chang gis nang du rgya tshar ldan par bya ste blud na phan
186a7(mdo 'grel): no/ /glo 'grams pa dang/ nyams stobs chung ba dang/ glo gcong zad byed dang/ gnyid mi 'ong ba dang/ me drod rno ches pa la ni 'o ma bskol te/ spris pa ska bar gyur pa'i nang du sha kha ra dang sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang sbyar ba'i bza' ba sbyin no//
186b1(mdo 'grel): yang na sha kha ra dang/ nas dang/ gro dang dzi ba ka dang/ zangs rtsi ba dang/ 'di rnams kyi phyi ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am 'o ma sbyar ba'i btung ba sbyin no/ /khrag dang sha zad pa'i nad la ni srog chags sha za'i sha bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mar khu
186b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ sbrang rtsi dang pi pi ling sbyar ba zos na sha khrag skye bar byed do/ /glo 'grams pa dang/ glo gcod zad byed dang/ sa bon dang/ dbang po rnams nyams pa la ni n+ya gro d+ha dang/ u dum+ba ra dang/ shing a shwat+tha dang/ plak+Sha dang/ sha sa la dang/ gand+ha
186b3(mdo 'grel): pri yangku dang/ shing ta la'i rtse mo dang/ shing 'dzam+bu'i shun pa dang/ shing pi ya li dang/ shug pa dang/ shing a shwa kar+Na dang/ 'di rnams 'o ma dang lhan cig bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ mar dang 'bras chan dang bcas pa zos na phan no/ /rlung
186b4(mdo 'grel): dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i glo 'grams pa'i nad btsugs pa ltar na ba la ni lus la mar gyis bsku byug bya'o/ /rlung las gyur pa'i glo 'grams shing btsugs pa snyam byed pa'i nad la ni/ rlung 'joms pa'i sman sna tshogs dang/
186b5(mdo 'grel): til mar du sbyar bas bsku byug bya'o/ /snying dang rtsib logs su zug pa'i nad la ni sman 'tshe byed sna bcu bskol ba'i khu ba mar dang/ yang bskol la mar 'ba' zhig lud pa blud do/ /yang na snying dang rtsib logs su zug pa na rlung dang mkhris

187a6(mdo 'grel): 'thungs na/ sa bon nyams dang/ glo gcong dang/ glo 'grams pa dang/ nad ma rungs pa rnams kyis lus nyams chung ba dang/ nyal po mi nus pa dang/ mdog dang skad nyams pa 'phel ba dang/ lud pa dang/ skyigs bu dang/

187b3(mdo 'grel): kupka dang/ dzI ban+ti dang/ me de rnam gnyis dang/ brangs rtsi ba dang/ dzi ba ka dang/ rad+d+hi dang/ rgun 'bru rnam gnyis dang/ sha kha ra dang/ sra ma na dang/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang/ 'di rnams zho drug cham chom brdungs te lhan cig bskol te/ mar

187b7(mdo 'grel): ling srang brgyad dang nas kyi phye srang nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang/ sha kha ra dang/ sbrang rtsi srang brgyad brgyad zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas btab ste lde gur byas nas de las ran pas zos na glo gcong zad byed dang/ glo 'grams pa dang/ khrag

188a3(mdo 'grel): po'i nad dang/ mkhris pa dang/ khrag dang lud pa dang/ skem byed dang/ zang byed rnams la phan te/ gzhan yang tshe ring ba dang/ na tshed brtan pa dang/ sha dang/ bu chu dang/ stobs 'phel bar byed do/ /gzhan yang sman par gyi lde gu des ni
188a4(mdo 'grel): rlung dang mkhris pa'i shas che ba yin na/ yang sman mar nyung dus zhi bar byed cing zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /gong du bshad pa'i sman mar gsum po sug sman mar dang/ bdud rtsi'i sman mar dang/ skyu ru ra'i sman mar 'di

188b6(mdo 'grel): bar shes par bya'o/ /mahA ba la srang brgya/ chu srang brgya lnga bcu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du bskol te khu ba bzhi cha lus pa dang/ de'i nang du khu ba dang mnyam pa'i mar dang/ de dang mnyam pa'i 'o ma dang/ ba la dang/ i ta ba la dang/ shing mngar dang/

189b3(mdo 'grel): bcud kyis len gyi mchog tu drang srong chen po ri Shis bshad pa yin no/ /rtsa ba bcu pa dang/ ba la dang/ murpa dang/ ser po rnam gnyis dang/ pi pi ling dang/ ha sti pi pi ling dang/ pa tha dang/ a shwo g+hand+ha dang/ a pa marga dang/ ba sral phre'u dang/
189b4(mdo 'grel): bong nga dkar po dang/ sle tres dang/ ba la dang/ bilba dang/ tri bi ta zhes bya ba shing nye rong dang/ dan+ti dang/ tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba dang/ lo mar bcas pa dang/ pa yassya zhes bya ba k+Shi ri ni dang/ dug mo nyungs dang/ spang spos dang/ bis ka zhes bya ba a
189b5(mdo 'grel): sa na'i shing gi snying po dang/ lo mar bcas pa dang/ bra yas+tha bir zhes bya ba'i shing dang/ go bye dang/ bi dang ka dang/ nye'u shing dang/ bu ti ka rany+dza dang/ sha mya ka zhes bya ba dong ka dang/ tsan tra ma ka dang/ sa ha ra tsa zhes bya ba pa spru ba dang/ shing ku
189b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ nimpa'i shun pags dang/ bu ram shing gi khu ba dang/ 'di rnams srang re re dang/ a ru ra stong tshig brgya dang/ nas srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ sman de rnams kyi brgyad 'gyur chu dang bskol ba gong ma ltar nas tshos pa dang phyung ste/ khu ba
189b7(mdo 'grel): btsir a ru ra ma gtogs pa'i snyigs ma bor te/ yang? a ru ra tshos pa de dang/ bu ram rnying pa srang brgyad dang/ til mar dang/ mar dang/ skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang/ 'di rnams srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang/ me mi che ba dang yang bskol te/ dril
190a1(mdo 'grel): bu 'dod pa tsam na gyur ste/ bsgrangs nas de'i nang du sbrang rtsi srang drug cu rtsa bzhi dang/ pi pi ling skam po srang bzhi dang/ dri sna gsum srang re re zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma btab ste/ de rnams legs par bsres
190a2(mdo 'grel): nas dkrugs te/ snod rdza ma rnying pa'i nang du bcug nas zla ba gcig gi bar du nas kyi phung po'i nang du bzhag ste/ de nas gong ma bzhin du a ru ra gnyis gnyis lde gu dang bcas par zos na/ drang srong chen po gnas mchog gis
190a3(mdo 'grel): bshad pa'i bcud kyis len gyi lde gu zhes bya ste/ gong du smos pa'i lde gu thams cad pas khyad par du yang phan yon lhag pa yin no/ /nad med pa rnams la yang cho ga bsrung mi dgos par dus thams cad du sngags so lce myang
190a4(mdo 'grel): tsha dang/ bca' sga srang re re dang/ kha ru tsha srang re gnyis dang/ da trig dang/ se'u 'bru dang/ ardza ga zhes bya ba zi ma thig le dang/ de rnams srang brgyad brgyad dang/ na le sham dang/ go snyod zho re re dang/ 'u su zho gnyis dang/ 'di rnams
190a5(mdo 'grel): zhib tu btags te bza' ba dang/ btung ba'i nang du btab ste zos na/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ me drod nyams pa dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lud pa rnams la phan no/ /'u su zhe gnyis dang go snyod dang/ la
190a6(mdo 'grel): la bud dang/ bal po se'u dang/ da trig dang/ 'di rnams dang srang phyed phyed dang/ kha ru tsha srang gnyis dang/ bca' sga zho gnyis dang/ ka pit+ta dang/ a ru ra srang phyed dang gsum gsum dang/ sha khar srang bcu drug bsres pa ni ka
190a7(mdo 'grel): pit+ta ro drug pa'i phye ma zhes bya ste/ bza' ba dang btung ba dang lhan cig zos na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/ /glo gcod zar byed la ni/ gcong chen po gso ba'i cho ga ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/ /gong du bstan pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba
190b1(mdo 'grel): de dag gis glo gcod zad byed kyi nad zhi ste/ nyams stobs dang ldan zhing bad kan skyed par gyur na/ de'i rtags ni mgo bo dang/ brang na bar gyur bde la ni dud pa rdub pa'i cho ga rnams bya ste/ de yang med rnam gnyis dang/ ba la rnam
190b2(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa/ shing mngar dang/ bco ma'i shun pags dang/ 'di rnams chu dags su bya ste/ reng bur byas nas bskams te me la bsregs te dud pas rdub po/ /de'i 'og tu dzi banda'i sde tshan gyi sman mar 'u sha dang lhan gcig btung ngo/
190b3(mdo 'grel): yang na ldong ros dang/ shing plak+Sha dang/ a dza ganda dang/ cu gang dang/ dong kra dang/ 'di rnams yang btso ma'i shun lpags dang/ chu dags su bya ste/ reng pu'i dud pa rdub par byas nas de'i 'og tu sha kha ra'i chu 'am/ bu ram shing gi khu
190b4(mdo 'grel): ba 'am/ bu ram gyi chu gang yang rung ba blud do/ /yang na ldong ros dang/ n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu rlon pa cha bsnyams te btags la mar dang sbyar nas/ reng bu byas te dud pa rdub bo/ /de'i 'og tu sreg pa'i sha khu dang bza' ba dang btung ba sbyar la

190b6(mdo 'grel): rgun chu dang/ mar dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na seng phrom bskol ba'i khu ba mar dang sbyar ba 'am/ bi da ri'i rang gi khu ba rang gi mar dang sbyar ba 'am/ 'di gsum gang yang rung ba lus zad byed dang nyam chung ba dag par bya ba'i phyir bkru sman

194b1(mdo 'grel): dang karka ta sriM gi dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bca' ba'i rtsa ba dang/ sle tres dang/ bca' sga dang/ de rnams bskol ba'i khu ba blud la/ de zhu ba'i tshod na de rnams las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa sbyin no/ /'bras drug cu pa dang/ gro dang nas dang mon sran sde'u dang/

194b6(mdo 'grel): kru tru ga tres rnams zhib tu btags pa'i lde gus phru ba snum can gyi nang du bskus la cung red par gyur pa dang/ dar ba chu ma reg pa'i nang du bcug la/ zla ba gcig gi bar du bzhag pa las ran par 'thungs na/ me'i drod skyed pa dang/ lud
194b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba las nges par rgyal lo/ /yang na pa tha dang/ murga dang/ thang shing gi 'bras bu dang/ sa ra la go trod? rtse dang/ 'di rnams zhib tu btags nas chang gi nying khu'i nang du btab ste/ lan tsha dang bcas par nub gcig
195a1(mdo 'grel): bzhag la/ zhag re khyo re blud na dbugs mi bde ba dang skyigs bu sol to/ /yang na ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ bca' sga dang/ 'di gnyis btags pa'i phye ma chu 'jam tsam btung ba 'am/ yang na ya baksha ra dang/ na le sham gyi phye
195a2(mdo 'grel): ma chu dron dang btang ngo/ /yang na ba'i shu ba bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du ba'i shu ba dang de dang mnyam pa btags pa'i phye ma dang skyo mar byas te blud do/ /yang na sapta par+Na'i khu ba'i nang du pi pi ling dang/ sbrang rtsi dang ldan par byas te
195a3(mdo 'grel): btung ba 'am/ yang na sh+ri sha'i me tog gi sbrang rtsi dang ldan par byas ste blud na/ mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur pa'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel to/ /cu gang dang pi pi ling dang 'bras kyi bye brag ma du zhes bya ba dang/ dong kra dang/
195a4(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma mar dang sbyar ba glan pa'i dugs zan thabs su byas ste zos na/ des skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba dang/ mkhris pa dang ldan pa rnams la phan no/ /skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba dang ldan pa la mi sha
195a5(mdo 'grel): bi tsa zhes bya ba'i sha dang/ ri bong gi sha dang/ pi pi ling dang mar dang/ ri dags shal lye ka zhes bya ba'i khrag dang/ 'di rnams gong ma ltar byas la zos na phan no/ /yang na lcam pa'i khu ba dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ mar dang sbyar ba'i 'bras
195a6(mdo 'grel): chan zos la/ skom du 'o ma 'thungs na/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang bcas pa'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel bar byed do/ /yang na ra'i 'o ma bzhi 'gyur gyi chu dang bskol la/ 'o ma lus pa dang/ bu ram dang/ dong kra'i phye ma btab
195a7(mdo 'grel): pa btang ngo/ /pi pi ling mu la dang/ shing mngar dang/ bu ram dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma glang dang/ rta rtug gnyis btsir ba'i khu ba dang/ mar dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig zos na/ skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel to/ /yang na rta dang/ glang po che
195b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ glang dang/ phag dang/ rnga mo dang/ bong bu dang/ lug dang/ ra dang/ 'di rnams yang rung ba'i rtug pa btsir ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu bya ste/ de las ran par zos na bad kan shas che ba'i skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel
195b2(mdo 'grel): to/ /yang srog chags rkang bzhi pa'i pags pa dang/ rus pa dang/ spu dang/ smig pa dang/ rwa dang/ de las 'byung pa dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu bza' ba 'am/ yang na a shwa gand+ha btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na/
195b3(mdo 'grel): bad kan shas che pa'i dbugs mi bde ba sel to/ /yang na zur pa dang/ puSh+kar mu la dang skyu ru ra btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na ma nu dang/ pi pi ling dang/ sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/
195b4(mdo 'grel): yang btsag yug snam dang/ dngul rngo dang/ pi pi ling dang/ 'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na ka pit+tha'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na ka pit+tha bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du skyu ru ra dang/ pi pi ling dang/ rgyam tsha'i phye ma
195b5(mdo 'grel): btab pa'i lde gu byas pa 'am/ yang na a ru ra btags pa'i phye ma dang mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/ yang na na le sham dang/ bi dang gang dang/ pi pi ling btags pa'i phye ma mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/ yang na
195b6(mdo 'grel): rgya shug dang/ 'bras yos dang/ rgun 'bru dang/ pi pi ling dang/ dong kra dang/ 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na yung ba dang/ pi pi ling dang/ rwa sna dang na le sham btags pa'i phye ma dang/ bu ram dang/ til
195b7(mdo 'grel): mar dang/ sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/ sman gyi sbyor ba de dag las nad gzhi legs par brtags te/ so so dang mthun pa'i khu ba dang/ chu dron dang/ chang dang/ dar ba dang/ zho ga chu dang/ rtsab mo la sogs pa gang dang mthun pa'i nang du mnyes te
196a1(mdo 'grel): btang na/ bad kan shas che ba'i skyigs bu dang/ dbugs ma bde ba sel to/ /dzi ban+ti dang/ gla sgang dang/ bye'u rug pa dang/ da cha dang/ sug smel rnam gnyis dang/ tsan tra dang/ ta ma la ki dang/ a ga ru dang/ ga bra'i
196a2(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba dang/ dong kra dang/ ba la ka dang/ karka ta sriM gi dang/ zur ba dang/ pi pi ling dang/ na ga ge sar dang/ tsa rong dang/ de rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma'i gnyis 'gyur gyi sha kha ra dang sbyar ba bza' ba dang btung ba'i nang du btab
196a3(mdo 'grel): te ci 'dod ba zos na rtsib logs na ba dang/ rims na ba dang/ lud pa dang/ skyigs bu dang/ dbugs mi bde ba sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /dong kra dang bu ram cha mnyam pa bza' ba 'am/ yang na sna sman du btang ba'am/ yang na sgog skya dang/ kun dong dang grin
196a4(mdo 'grel): dza na zhes bya ba sgog pa'i rigs dang/ de dag gi rtsa ba chu dang bskol te snar blugs pa 'am/ yang na tsan dan bdar ba snang blug ba 'am/ yang na sbrang ma'i rtug pa bud med kyi nu ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang le brgan rtsi dang/ sbrang ma'i
196a5(mdo 'grel): rtug pa sbyar ba snar blugs so/ /yang na mar gyi snying khu dang rgyam tshas btab pa 'am/ 'o ma dang/ mar bskol nas mar lus pa dang des snar blugs par bya'o/ /sman mngar ba rnams cham chom brdungs te bskol ba'i khu ba btung ba 'am/ yang
196a6(mdo 'grel): na snar blugs so/ /sbrang rtsi dang kha ra dkar po sbyar ba dang thigs pa grang mo blugs la/ de nas dron mo blugs te/ de bzhin du res kyis snar blugs pa bya'o/ /rtsa ba bcu pa tshul bzhin du bskol ba'i khu ba 'o ma dang bskol te mar lus pa
196a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ des gong bzhin du dro ba dang grang ba re mos kyis snar blugs so/ /pi pi ling dang/ kha ru tsha dang/ ya baksha ra dang/ ku ru tshe dang/ shing kun dang/ tsong? ga dang/ byi'u rug pa dang/ 'di rnams mar dang/ zho ga chu dang/ rtsa bar bcu bskol ba'i
196b1(mdo 'grel): khu? ba dang bsres te/ yang bskol nas/ mar lus pa dang/ de las ran par 'thungs na/ skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba sel to/ /yang na 'tsho byed sna bcu cham chom brdungs te/ mar dang tshul bzhin du bskol la/ mar 'ba' zhig lus pa'i
196b2(mdo 'grel): nang du sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i lde gu 'thungs na phan no/ /te dzo ba ta dang/ a ru ra dang/ ru rta dang/ pi pi ling dang/ pu tse shel dang/ b+hu ti ka dang/ ma nu'i rtsa ba dang/ plak+Sha dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ zur ba dang/ lan tsha rnam gnyis dang/ ta ma la ki dang/
196b3(mdo 'grel): dzi ban+ti dang/ bilba'i snying pa dang/ shu dag dang/ bal bu'i lo ma dang/ 'di rnams zho gnyis gnyis dang/ shing kun zho phyed dang/ 'di rnams mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang bskol te mar 'ba' zhig lus par 'thungs na/ rkang lag du rlung zhen
196b4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ pho ba'i nad dang/ skyigs bu dang/ snying dang rtsib logs su zug pa rnams myur du zhi bar byed do/ /yang na ya bak+Shar dang/ lan tsha dang/ lan tsha'i nyis 'gyur gyi mar dang bsres pa 'thungs na phan no/ /drang srong chen
196b5(mdo 'grel): po thang la 'bar gyis gcin nad kyi skabs su bshad pa'i sman mar dang/ ba shi ka'i mar khrag mkhris gso ba'i le'u yi nang nas 'byung ba dang/ tra dri ka zhes bya ba dang/ ha pu sha zhes bya ba spa ma'i 'bras bu'i sman mar skran gso ba'i le'u
196b6(mdo 'grel): las bshad pa dang/ sman mar de rnams kyang lud pa dang/ skyigs bu'i nad la sbyar ro/ /dbugs mi bde ba'i nang rngam pa drag tu 'byung ba la ni blo bur du yang dang yang du chu grang gis gtor zhing sdangs su gzhug pa 'am/ lus drag tu g.yengs
196b7(mdo 'grel): shing sbrug pa dang/ 'jigs su gzhug pa dang/ yang na dgar gzhug pa dang/ gzhan gyi yon tan brjod de phrag dog skyed pa dang/ dbugs bsngam du gzhug pa dang/ spre'u so 'debs su bcug na phan no/ /gzhan yang rlung dang bad kan la phan pa'i
197a1(mdo 'grel): sman dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ dro ba thams cad brten bar bya'o/ /skyigs bu dang/ dbubs mi bde ba'i nad thams cad la ni/ lus nyams stobs dang ldan pa yin na ni gso sla'o/ /nyams stobs med cing
197a2(mdo 'grel): rid pa ni gso dka' o/ /de bas na nyams stobs bskyed cing nang zhi bar bya ba yang dang yang du bcad cing 'bad par bya'o/ /gzhan yang lud pa dang dbugs mig de ba dang/ glo gcod zad byed dang/ skyug pa dang/ skyigs bu dang/ 'di rnams gang
197a3(mdo 'grel): yang rung ba gcig gsos na thams cad la phan pa yin no/ /skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba gas pa'i le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de las rgyal po'i nad ces bya ba gcod chen po gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /gcod chen
197a4(mdo 'grel): po'i nang pa nyams stobs dang ldan zhing nad bzhi mang po yod pa la mi thog mar snum bcos dang/ dugs byas la/ de'i 'og tu slon khrus kyis lus sbyang bar ste/ snum la sogs pas lus nyams chung bar mi 'gyur bar bsrung bar
197a5(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /de la skyug sman ni 'o ma dang/ mngar ba'i sha khu dang/ skyugs sman las gzhi blangs pa'i nas thug mar dang ldan pa dang/ de gsum gang yang rung ba'i nang du/ po son cha'i phye ma btab ste blud nas slon du gzhug go /de la
197a6(mdo 'grel): bkru sman ni sham dur bying dang/ dod kra sbrang rtsi dang/ sha kha ra dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na 'o ma dang mar phye dang ldan pa'i skyo bar sbyar ba 'am/ yang na rgun 'bru dang/ bi da ri dang/ ti pa la rnams las gang yang rung ba sha khu dang
197a7(mdo 'grel): ldan par sbyar ba gong ma'i sman dang bcas par 'thungs na 'khru bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar slon khrus kyis khong dag par byas pa'i 'og tu nyams 'phel cing rgyas pa dang drod skyed pa dag sbyar ro/ /gzhan yang bza' ba dang btung ba yang
197b1(mdo 'grel): shar? 'ong ba dang/ rung la phan pa rnams dang yang ba rnams sbyar te/ 'bras drug bcu pa dang/ gro dang/ nas dang/ mung ga rnams las gang yang rung ba spangs pa 'am/ chan du byas te bza' ba dang tshong mar sbyar te sbyin no/ /gzhan yang
197b2(mdo 'grel): ra'i 'o ma dang/ mar dang srog chags sha za ba'i sha dang/ bya rog dang/ 'ug pa dang/ glang po che dang/ ba dang/ rta dang ne'u le dang/ sbrul dang/ bya rgod dang/ khra dang/ bong bu dang/ rnga mo dang/ de rnams kyi sha gang yang rung ba nad pal gsang
197b3(mdo 'grel): ste sbyin no/ /ci ste nad pas tshor na ni skyug pa dang/ nyams stobs dang/ gzi mdangs 'bri bar 'gyur ba'i skyon yod do/ /mkhris pa dang/ bad kan las gyur pa'i nad la ni/ ri dags dang bya la sogs pa'i sha g.yos su byas pa
197b4(mdo 'grel): byin no phan no/ /rlung las gyur pa la ni phag rgod la sogs pa ri dags chen po rnams kyi sha rnams las g.yos su byas pa phan no/ /yungs kar gyi mar gang yang rung ba nad gzhi stobs ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar ba'i nang du snum dang/
197b5(mdo 'grel): lan tsha dang/ sge'u gsher dang/ bca' sga la sogs pa legs par sbyar te ro dang ldan pa zhim por byas te nyung shas sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o/ /thug pa dang khu bcud la sogs pa'i tshong mar ram/ de bzhin du la phug skam po dang/ rgya
197b6(mdo 'grel): sran gyi khu bcud la na tsha dang sgre'u gsher dang legs par sbyar ba blud na phan no/ /ra sha'i khu ba dang/ pi pi ling dang/ nas dang rgya sran dang/ dod kra dang/ se'u 'bru ma dang/ skyu ru ra dang ldan par snum cher btab pa blud na/ cham
197b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ lud pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ klad pa na ba dang/ skad 'gags pa dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ 'di rnams la phan no/ /mkhris pa la sogs pa'i gcod chen po la ni chang shin tu rnying pa rtsa'i rgyun spyod nus par
198a1(mdo 'grel): blud do/ /khyad par du rgun chad dang/ a ris shwa'i chang dang/ chang rnams btung ba blud do/ /yang na rtsab chung ngu lnga bskol ba 'am/ bca' sga bskol ba 'am/ yang la lo ma rnam bzhi bskol ba 'am/
198a2(mdo 'grel): yang na 'u su dang bca' sga bskol ba blud do/ /yang na rtsa ba lnga chung ngu shin tu 'bad ba dang bcas pas gtsang sbra cher bya ste/ bza' ba dang sbyar la btang na gcod chen po dang rjes su mthun pa yin no/ /rtsa ba bcu 'o ma 'am yang na
198a3(mdo 'grel): sha khu'i nang du btsis la/ ba la'i phye mas btab pa mar dang sbyar ba bza' ba 'am/ yang na srog chags sha za'i sha khu'i nang du ba la'i phye ma btab pa btung 'am/ yang na mar dang mar gyi bcu 'gyur gyi 'o mar lhan cig
198a4(mdo 'grel): bskol ba'i nang du ba la'i phye mas btab ste/ sgrang rtsi dang ldan par blud do/ /dzi ban+ti dang/ shing mngar dang/ rgun 'gru dang/ dug mo yungs kyi 'bras bu dang/ ma nu dang/ zung pa dang/ pi ling/ kaN+Da kA ri dang/ gze ma dang/ ba bla
198a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ utpa la dang/ skyu ru dang/ khyi lce ba dang/ byi tsher ba dang/ 'di rnams phye mar byas te/ sman gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi mar dang/ mar bzhi 'gyur gyi chu dang bskol te/ de las ran par 'thungs na/ nad kyi rgyal po rtsa ba nas 'joms so//
198a6(mdo 'grel): pra go dang/ rgun 'bru dang/ ma du ka'i me tog dang/ pa ru sha dang/ pi pi ling dang/ 'di rnams mar dang tshul bzhin bskol ba las ran par 'thungs na/ skang 'gags pa dang/ lud pa dang/ rims rnams 'joms so/ /rtsa ba bcu
198a7(mdo 'grel): ba bskol ba'i khu ba 'o ma dang yang bskol ba'i yar sar pa pi pi ling dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba zos na skad 'gags pa dang/ klad pa na ba dang/ rtsib logs su zug pa dang glo dang/ lud pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ rims rnams
198b1(mdo 'grel): la phan no/ /rtsa ba che chung lnga gang yang rung ba dang/ de'i bzhi 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang/ 'o ma'i bzhi cha'i mar dang tshul bzhin du bskol ba'i mar dang/ yang na rtsa ba lnga dang/ de'i gzhi 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang yang bskol ba'i mar las ran par
198b2(mdo 'grel): 'thungs na cham pa la sogs pa'i gcod chen po'i nad kyi stobs bdun 'joms par byed do/ /tsha ba rnam lnga dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/ 'di rnams srang re re dang/ mar pre gang dang mar dang mnyam pa'i 'o ma dang/ 'o
198b3(mdo 'grel): ma'i sum 'gyur gyi chu dang bskol te/ de las ran par 'thungs na/ rtsa rgyun rnams sbyong zhing/ skran dang/ rims dang/ dmu rdzing dang/ mcher ba dang/ pho ba'i nad dang/ skya rbab dang/ cham pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lud pa dang/ me
198b4(mdo 'grel): drod nyams pa dang/ skrang ba dang/ rlung stod du zhugs pa rnams las rgyal lo/ /yang na ra sna dang/ ba la dang/ gze ma dang/ sa la pardzi dang/ ba sbru ba rtsa ba dkar po can dang/ de rnams bskol ba'i nad du/ dzi ban+ti dang/ pi pi ling dang/ 'o ma
198b5(mdo 'grel): mar dang tshul bzhin bskol ba 'thungs na/ glo gcod skem byed las rgyal lo/ /yang na a shwa gand+ha dang/ 'o ma bskol ba dkrugs te/ mar byung ba de 'o ma dang/ kha ra dkar po sbyar ba 'thungs na/ glo gcod zad byed rnams sel bar byed do//
198b6(mdo 'grel): srog chags sha ran pa khung na gnas pa dang/ gzhan yang sha ran pa rnams kyi sha srang brgya dang/ chu srang stong nyi shu rtsa brgyad bskol te/ bzhi cha srang rgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad lus pa'i nang du/ 'tsho byed sde bcu srang re re phye mar byas nas
198b7(mdo 'grel): mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bcug ste/ tshul bzhin bskal la mar dang sha lus pa dang/ de las ran par zas na rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcod chen po dang/ rlung nang ma lus pa dang/ dbug mi bde ba dang/ snying dang/
199a1(mdo 'grel): rtsib logs su zug pa dang/ lus skems par byed pa dang/ skad 'gags pa dang/ 'di rnams las rgyal bar byed do/ /sug smel dang/ tingmu sa dang/ 'bras bu gsum/ rgyam tsha dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/
199a2(mdo 'grel): tsi tra ka dang/ sa ra na dang/ nim+ba dang/ seng ldeng dang/ sa la bi dza dang/ bse shing gi 'bras bu dang/ pi dang ka dang/ 'di rnams srang brgyad brgyad bdang/ chu srang nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug dang bskol te/ srang bcu drug lus
199a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ de'i nang du yang mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang yang bskol te/ mar 'ba' zhig lus pa'i nang du cu gang srang drug dang/ kha ra srang cu dang sbrang rtsi srang srug cu rtsa bzhi dang/ dri sna gsum srang re re dang/ 'di rnams
199a4(mdo 'grel): kha gzar gyis dkrugs te/ bcud kyi len bzhin du cho ga med par snga dro de las ran par zos la btung bar 'o ma blud na/ blo dang/ mig gsal ba dang/ tshe ring ba dang/ me drod skyed pa dang/ de bzhin du gcin nad dang/ skran
199a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ glo 'gram pa'i nad dang/ skya rbab dang/ mtshan bar rdol ba rnams 'joms so/ /gang glo 'grams pa'i nad la mar dang bu ram bshad pa 'dir yang glo gcod zad byed pa yang sbyar ro/ /shing tsha dang/ sug smel dang/ pi pi ling
199a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ cu gang dang/ li kha ra dang/ de rnams yams kyi rims bzhin du nyis 'gyur gyis bskyed pa'i phye ma bza' ba 'am/ yang na mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu ldags na/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ skad 'gags pa dang/ lud
199a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ glo gcod zad byed dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ bad kan rnams 'joms par byed de/ khyad par du glo gcod la phan no/ /skad 'gags par 'gyur bas sna sman dang/ dung bas bdug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de la rlung
199b1(mdo 'grel): las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa la ni ka sam+bar ka dang/ kaN+Ta kA ri dang/ bring ga ra dza dang/ 'di rnams kyi rang gi ku ba mar bskol ba las ran par 'thungs na/ lud pa dang skad 'gags pa las rgyal bar byed do/ /yang na aM ta ra ka
199b2(mdo 'grel): lam zhes bya ba'i mar 'thungs na yang phan yon de dang 'dra'o/ /yang na rgya shug kyi lo ma btags pa'i phye ma mar dang brdos pa'i nang pu lce myang tsha btab pa zan gong du 'thungs na phan no/ /yang na ma du ka dang rgun 'bru dang/ pi pi
199b3(mdo 'grel): ling dang/ bi dang ka dang/ han sa pa da'i rtsa ba dang/ 'di rnams btags pa'i til mar bskol ba snar blugs so/ /'bras chan mar dang bu ram du bcas ba 'am/ yang na 'o thug mar dang bu ram du sbyar ba bza' ste/ de'i 'og tu chu dro 'jam
199b4(mdo 'grel): tsam btung ste/ snum bcos dang/ dugs byas na rlung gis skad 'gags pa sel to/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa la ni/ shing 'o ma can gyi myu gu cham chom brdubs pa 'am/ yang na btags pa'i phye ma mar dang tshul
199b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin bskol te bsgangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab te byin la skom du 'o ma bskol ba grangs pa blud do/ /yang na shing mngar dang sbyar ba'i 'o thug btung ba 'am/ yang na ba lang sa la pa Ni la sogs pa sbyar ba 'am yang na bi da ri
199b6(mdo 'grel): 'am shing mngar du sbyar ba bskol ba'i mar dang lan tsha dang bcas pa snar blugs pa byas na skad gsal bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /yang na pra puN+Da rI ka dang/ shing mngar dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bri ha tI dang/ ba la rnams 'o ma dang mar
199b7(mdo 'grel): du sbyar ba bskol ba snar blugs na yang mkhris pa'i skad 'gags pa sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /yang na mngar ba'i sman dzi ban+ti'i sde tshan btags pa'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na yang phan no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i skad
200a1(mdo 'grel): 'gags pa la ni sman tsha ba na le sham la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang ba gcin btung ba dang/ rtsub pa rnams sbyar ro/ /katpa la dang skyu ru ra dang/ tsha ba gsum dang de rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang/ sbrang rtsi
200a2(mdo 'grel): dang lde gur byas pa 'am/ yang na tsha ba gsum dang/ ya bak+Shar dang/ kru trug tres dang/ dbyi mong dang/ ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ a ru ra dang de rnams sbrang rtsi lde gur byas pa 'am/ yang na nas kyi thug pa pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra dang
200a3(mdo 'grel): skyur ba 'am yang na nas thug gcig bu mar dang til mar dang sbyar ba 'thungs na/ bad kan gyi skad 'gag pa zhi bar byed do/ /yang na pi pi ling dang/ bca' sga sngar zos la/ de'i 'og tu sman rno ba dang sbyar ba'i skyug sman btang ngo//
200a4(mdo 'grel): skad drags pa las skad 'gags pa la ni sman mngar ba'i sde tshan 'o ma dang bskol ba'i nang du kha ra dang sbrang rtsi btab pa blud na phan no/ /yi ga 'chus pa la ni phan pa dang/ mi phan pa sna tshogs bsres la sbyin no/ /de bzhin du phyi
200a5(mdo 'grel): nad gnyis ka nas khrus byas te/ sems dga' bar bya ba dang/ yi gar 'ong ba'i sman sbyin no/ /de nas dus gnyis so shing bca' zhing bska ba'i sman tin du ka la sogs pas kha bkru zhing mur bar bya'o/ /yod na khar sman gyi
200a6(mdo 'grel): dud pa'i sbyor ba bdug go/ yang na bal bu'i phye ma'i sbyor ba'i ri khung byas pa 'am/ yang na zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i zas khar dkar po dang ga bur dang ldan par byas te zos na/ yi ga 'byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /de la rlung las gyur
200a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i yig 'chus pa la ni/ ha re nu ka dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bi dang/ dang/ rwa sna dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ dong kwa dang/ sug smel dang/ ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/ shang kun dang 'di rnams kyi phye mtshang gi dangs
200b1(mdo 'grel): ma 'am/ yang na mar dang sbyar te btang ngo/ /yang na shu dag gi chus sman du sbyar ro/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i yi ga 'chus pa la ni bu ram dang chu sbyar bas khrus bya'o/ /yang na kha ra dang/ mar dang lan cha'i mchog dang sbrang rtsir
200b2(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba'i lde gur sbyin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i yig 'chus pa la ni nimpa bskol ba'i chus slon bya'o/ /btung bar ni tingmu sa dang/ dong ka bskol pa'i chu 'am/ yang na sman rno ba dang sbyar ba'i a ri shTa'i chang ngam/ rgun chang ngam/
200b3(mdo 'grel): sbrang chang rnams las gang yang rung ba blud do/ /yang na gong du bshad pa'i ha re nu dang/ pi pi ling la sogs pa'i phye ma chu dron po dang sbyar ba blud do/ /sug smel dang/ shing tsha dang/ na ga puShpa dang/ na la sham dang/ pi pi ling dang/
200b4(mdo 'grel): bca' sga dang/ 'di rnams yas kyi rims bzhin du cha res skyed pa phyi mar byas la ci dang mnyam pa'i kha ra dang bcas pa zos na/ cham pa dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ snying na ba dang/ lud pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ mgul pa'i
200b5(mdo 'grel): nad rnams 'joms so/ /la la bung dang/ da drid dang/ star bu dang/ bca' sga dang/ se'u 'bru dang/ rgya shug dang/ de rnams zho gnyis gnyis dang/ kha ra srang bzhi dang/ 'u su dang/ kha ru tsha dang/ go snyod dang/ shing tsha dang/ 'di rnams zho re re dang/ pi pi
200b6(mdo 'grel): ling 'bru brgyad dang/ na le sham nyis brgya dang/ de rnams kyi phye mas ni yi ga 'phyed me drod skyed/ phyi sa 'gags ba dang/ lud pa dang/ snying ga dang/ rtsib logs su zug pa mcher ba dang/ gzhang 'gram dang/ pho ba'i nad sel to/ /bal bu'i lo
200b7(mdo 'grel): ma dang/ na lo sham dang/ dod gra dang/ pi pi ling dang/ de rnams go rim bzhin du dang po'i cha res skyer pa dang/ shing tsha dang/ sug smel bal bu'i phye ma dang/ pi pi ling gi brgyad 'gyur gyi kha ra dkar po dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma ni/ yi ga 'chus
201a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ me drod skyed pa dang/ lud pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang/ skyug pa dang/ mcher pa na ba dang/ snying na nga dang/ rtsib logs su zug pa dang/ skya rbab dang/ rims dang/ 'khru ba
201a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ nad de rnams las rgyal bar byed do/ /na ga puShpa srang phyed dang/ shing tsha dang/ sug smel zho gnyis gnyis dang/ ganda pa tra srang phyed dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma bu ram rnying pa srang nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan cig bskol ba zho
201a3(mdo 'grel): gnyis tsam gyi ri lu byas te zos na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/ /shing arga dang/ sle tres bsres pa'i thal ba chu dang bsres pa'i nang du/ nang nub gcig spangs te cham pa can la zan du byas te sbyin no/ /nad pa nyams stobs dang
201a4(mdo 'grel): ldan pa yin na slon bya'o/ /slon byas pa'i 'og tu srog chags thang la gnas pa'i sha sman tshab dang kha ba sbyar ba thur ma la bsregs te/ skam pa dang yang ba'i zas btung ba ni sran ma tsa na ka la sogs pa yang sbyar ro/ /bad kan las
201a5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i cham pa ni/ rlung gis bad kan bskyod pa yin te/ de bas na de la ni sman pa mkhas pas snum ba dang dro ba nyid kyis zhi bar bya ste/ cham pa'i nad gso ba dang/ skyug bro ba'i nad kyi gso ba dang mthun pas gang gi sbyor ba byas kyang
201a6(mdo 'grel): phan no/ /khyad par du cham pa la ni/ lhag par snum bcos dang/ sku mnye dang dugs bsten par bya'o/ /dugs ni zan gyi lhan pa'i dugs bya ste/ sha khu dang snum dang/ lan tsha dang/ sman rnon po skur dang sbyar ba'i zan dugs kyis mgo dang mgul
201a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ rtsib logs su na ba rnams la ni/ nad gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du gso ba'i cho ga de ltar bya'o/ /chu dang thang gnyis ka la gnas pa'i sha rnams lan tsha snum bzhi dang legs par dugs bya'o/ /bad kan dang mkhris par ldan pa'i nad la ni/
