264a3(mdo 'grel): sbyar ro/ /mig ser gyi nad kyis btab pa la ni mkhris pa la phan pa'i sman nam/ skya rbab la phan pa'i sman gang yang rung ba sbyin no/ /a ru ra rdog ma brgya bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ a ru ra lnga bcu btags pa'i phye ma dang/ mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang tshul bzhin du
264a4(mdo 'grel): bskol te/ mar lus pa las ran par 'thungs na/ skran dang mig ser dang/ skya rbab thams cad sel to/ /dong ka dang/ tsha ba gsum gyi phye mar bu ram shing ngam/ bi da ri 'am/ skyu ru ra'i khu ba gang yang rung ba'i nang du btab ste/ srang gcig tsam 'thungs na mig ser gyi
264a5(mdo 'grel): nang 'joms so/ /yang na dan+ti btags pa'i phye ma de'i nyis 'gyur gyi bu ram dang bcas pa chu grang dang btung ba'am gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba sbyin/ yang na 'bras bu gsum dang/ sle tres dang ni bim+ba 'di rnams kyi khu ba gang yang rung ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab ste/ nad rin por
264a6(mdo 'grel): sbyar te 'thungs na/ mig ser gyis nyams thag pa la phan no/ /skyer pa dang/ btsag yug snam dang/ skyu ru ra rnams sbyar ba'i mig sman du sbyor ba yang mig ser rnams 'joms so/ /mig ser gyis btab pa'i nang pa phyi sa til btags pa'i phye ma 'dra ba dkar
264a7(mdo 'grel): po 'byung zhing bad kan gyis lam 'gags pa la ni bad kan dang mkhris pa 'joms pa'i sman gyis gso 'o/ /kha zas rtsub pa dang/ grang ba dang/ lci ba dang/ mngar ba dang/ rtsol ba byas pa'i rgyu rlung gis bad kan 'khrug par byas te/ mkhris pa'i phyi rol nas
264b1(mdo 'grel): bton pa'i dbang gis skyes bu de'i mig dang pags pa rnams ser por gyur cing phyi sa dkar por 'byung la nad 'khrugs te/ phyi sa 'gags pa dang/ snying lci ba la sogs par gyur te/ de'i dbang gis lus rdzud pa dang/ me drod chung ba dang/ rtsibs logs su zug pa dang/ skyigs bu dang/
264b2(mdo 'grel): lud pa dang/ yig 'chus pa dang/ rims kyis 'debs te/ mkhris pas yan lag thams cad du khyab pa yin la/ de la ni rims kyis brdal la gso'o/ /de ltar mig ser gyis khyab pa'i nad pa la ni/ rma bya dang/ khyim bya dang/ sreg pa'i sha khu dang/ yang na la phug skam po dang/
264b3(mdo 'grel): rgya sran gyi khu bcud gang yang rung ba'i nang du rtsub pa dang/ tshwa ba dang/ skyur ba dang sbyar ba'i zas sbyin no/ /gzhan yang shin tu tsha ba dang/ skyur ba dang/ rno ba dang/ lan tsha dang/ shin tu dro ba rnams bsngags so/ /kha lung gi khu ba tsha ba gsum dang sbyar ba'i lde gu ldag par bya'o/ /de ltar gong ma'i
264b4(mdo 'grel): gso ba de dag byas na/ mkhris pa rang gi gnas su 'jug ste/ des na phyi sa yang mdog tha mal par 'gyur zhing/ rlung sgra dang bcas pa yang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mdog 'gyur te/ snga ma las log pa ltar snang na yang de brtan par bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ de la mig ser gyi
264b5(mdo 'grel): nad gso ba 'phyis nas de khong du zhugs te dkyel du gyur pa la ni brag zhun dang/ mak+Shi ka da ru dang/ gser gyi dri ma gang yang rung ba gcin dang sbyar ba zla ba gcig gi bar du bsten par bya'o/ /ha li ma ka zhes bya ba'i nang la ni/ sle tres kyi rang gi khu ba dang/ 'o ma dang/ ma he'i mar
264b6(mdo 'grel): 'o ma'i phyed dang/ 'di rnams bskol ba'i mar gyi btung ba la sogs pa lus kyi snum chos bya ste/ de nas skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang dung byid dang sbyar bas bkru sman bya'o/ /kha zas ni mngar ba dang/ rlung dang mkhris pa 'joms par btang ngo/ /de bzhin du gong bu smos pa'i rgun 'bru'i
264b7(mdo 'grel): lde gu dang/ mngar ba'i sman dang sbyar ba'i mar bza' zhing 'og nas smas pa'i 'o ma'i 'jam rtsims btang ba rnams yun ci ring du bya'o/ /btung bar ni rgun chang dang/ a ri ta'i chang me drod dang sbyar te ci rigs su sbyin no/ /yang na a ru ra'i lde gu lud pa gso ba'i skabs las
265a1(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba'am/ yang na pi pi ling dang/ shing mngar dang/ ba la dang/ de rnams gang yang rung ba 'o ma dang sbyar te nad gzhi dang me drod dang dpags la btang ngo/ /de bzhin du sman pa mkhas pas skrang nad gso ba'i dpyad ji snyed pas skya rbab kyi nang thams
265a2(mdo 'grel): cad la sbyar ro/ /gso ba'i gnas las skya rbab kyi gnad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so// //de nas 'or nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ de la nad gzhi thams cad 'dus pa 'am ldan pa 'am/ nad gzhi re re las gyur pa'i skrang nad gang yang rung ba
265a3(mdo 'grel): ma zhu ba dang bcas pa de la ni thog mar lus sha sri zhing smyung ba bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu kha zas kyang yang ba bza' zhing skom du ni/ dong kra dang/ bong nga dkar po dang/ thang shing dang/ byi dang ga dang/ dug mo yungs dang/ na le sham bskol ba'i chu dron po blud do/ /yang na a ru ra dang/
265a4(mdo 'grel): bca' sga dang/ thang shing dang/ ba spru ba dang de rnams bskol ba'i khu ba blud pa 'am/ yang na skya rbab kyi nang du bshad pa'i lcags phye cha dgu pa bskol ba blud do/ /'or nad shas che ba la ni de dag par bya ba'i phyir a ru ra'i phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba blud do/ /yang na 'bras
265a5(mdo 'grel): bu gsum bskol ba'i nad du pu tse shel dang/ dur byid dang/ tsha ba gsum gang yang rung ba'i phye ma btab pa blud pa 'am/ yang na 'bras bu gsum gang yang rung ba'i nang du gu gul lam brag zhun btab pa blud pa 'am/ 'or nad skrangs pa de me drod chung zhing ma zhu bas
265a6(mdo 'grel): khyab ste/ rtug pa 'gags pa 'am/ yang na phyi sa sla bar 'byung ba la ni kha ru tsha dang/ tsha ba gsum sbrang rtsi dang/ dar ba dang sbyar ba bza' ba 'am/ yang na a ru ra dang bu ram sbyar ba 'am bca' sga sbyar ba zos pa'i 'og tu dar ba btung bar bya'o/ /yang na sge'u gsher dang/
265a7(mdo 'grel): bu ram cha mnyam pa sbyar te/ dang po'i zhag srang phyed zos la/ de nas zhag bcu'i bar du srang phyed phyed kyis skyed de/ zhag bcu gcig pa nas srang phyed phyed zhag bcu'i bar du ma bri ste/ srang phyed du phyin pa dang/ yang zhag bcu'i bar du srang phyed phyed
265b1(mdo 'grel): zhag re bskyed de/ de ltar zla ba gcig gi bar du zos la sman de zhu ba'i tshod tsam na/ btung bar ni/ ma sha ka'i khu ba dang/ 'o ma dang/ sha khu gsum bad kan dang/ mkhris pa dang/ rlung gang yin pa btags te/ nad gzhi dang re re nas sbyar te 'thungs na skran dang/ dmu rdzing dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/
265b2(mdo 'grel): 'or nad dang/ gcin nad dang/ dmug mi bde ba dang/ cham pa dang/ lus snyoms pa dang/ 'ju stobs chung ba dang/ mig ser dang/ skem byed dang/ rjed byed dang/ smyo byed dang/ lud pa dang/ bad kan rnams sge'u gsher dang/ bu ram gyi sbyor ba 'di byas na myur du rgyal bar byed do/ /sge'u gsher gyi khu
265b3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ dong kra'i phye ma dang/ 'o ma dang mar lhan cig bskol te/ ran par 'thungs na 'or nad dang/ dmu rdzing dang/ me drod nyams pas nyam thag pa rnams zhi bar byed do/ /ma zhu ba med bzhin du phyis 'gag cing 'or nad kyis nyam thag pa la ni/ tsha ba gsum dang/ dur byid dang/ dan+ti dang/
265b4(mdo 'grel): kru trug tres dang/ de rnams 'o ma dang bskol te blud do/ /ba 'am ma he gang yang rung ba'i gcin dang/ 'o ma btung zhing bza' ba yang 'o ma dang bcas par bya'o/ /zhag bdun nam zla ba gcig gi bar du rnga mo'i 'o ma nyi tshes nyams lta bar bya'o/ /ting mu sa dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/
265b5(mdo 'grel): la la pud dang/ tsha ba rnam lnga dang/ na 'o sham dang/ se'u 'bru dang/ pa tha dang/ 'u su dang/ star bu dang/ ba la dang/ bilpa dang/ de rnams zho gnyis gnyis dang/ chu srang lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis dang mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang bskol te/ mar lus pa dang de las ran par 'thungs na 'od nad dang/ gzhang
265b6(mdo 'grel): 'brum dang/ skran dang/ gcin nad rnams 'joms so/ /tsi tra ka'i phye mas 'o ma'i nang du btab ste/ zhor red pa dang/ de las byung ba'i mar sar dar ba dang bcas pa'i nang du yang tsi tra ka'i phye mas btab ste bskol la/ mar lus la las ran par 'thungs na/ phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/ /nad kyi stobs
265b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'du shes pa'i sman pas thang la 'bar gyi sman mar gcin nad kyi skabs las 'byung ba dang/ tik+ta chen po'i sman mar mdze nad gso ba las bshad pa dang/ dge ba'i rkyen mar smyo byed smin nas 'byung ba dang/ a ru ra'i sman mar dmu rdzing las bshad pa rnams ci rigs par sbyar ro/ /rtsa ba
266a1(mdo 'grel): bcu pa srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ mar gyi bcu drug 'gyur gyi chu dang/ a ru ra dang bu ram srang brgyad dang/ 'di rnams bskol ba'i nang du dri sna gsum dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba cung zad tsam dang/ 'di
266a2(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi phye ma btab ste lde gur gyur pa dang/ bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi srang bcu drug btab ste/ de las ran par bldags na/ 'or nad tshabs che ba dang/ rims dang skran dang/ gcin nad dang lus skem zhing ring pa dang/ ma zhu ba dang/ khrag dang mkhris pa dang/ ma zhu ba dang rlung dang/
266a3(mdo 'grel): sgregs ba skyur bor 'byung ba dang/ mdog 'gyur ba dang/ gcin dang/ rlung dang/ khu chu'i nad dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ mcher ba na ba dang/ sbyar ba'i dug dang/ dmu rdzing rnams sel te/ /nas dang 'bras rnying pa'i kha zas rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu ba la gzhi blangs la/
266a4(mdo 'grel): lan tsha dang snum nyung shas btab ste/ byin na 'or nad la phan no/ /rgya sran ku lat+tha dang/ mon sran rde'u'i khu bcur thal sman dang/ tsha ba gsum dang ldan pa dang/ de bzhin du srog chags thang la gnas pa ru sbal dang/ go da dang/ sha ya ka dang/ 'di rnams kyi sha khu pi pi ling dang sbyar ba
266a5(mdo 'grel): zos na yang 'or nad 'joms so/ /btung bar ni dar ba mi skyur ba 'am yang na rgun chad dang/ a riSh+Ta'i chang dang/ a sa ba'i chang gang yang rung ba tsha ba gsum dang ldan pa sbyin no/ /yang na tha we dang zur ba dang ji ban+ti dang/ ka ra bi dang/ ma nu dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ bilba'i rkang dang/ a bak+Sha ra
266a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ da trika dang/ 'di rnams re re yang rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshad dang ldan pa'i thug pa mar dang til mar sbyar te 'thungs na/ 'or nad dang/ skrangs pa la phan pa'i mchog yin te/ de bzhin du 'khru ba dang/ snying nad dang/ skran dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ me drod chung ba dang/ gcin
266a7(mdo 'grel): rnams la phan no/ /de bzhin du tsha ba rnam lnga rgya shug gi tshad tsam dang/ mar dang til mar du brdos pa'i thug pa 'thungs na yang phan yon de dang 'dra'o/ /yang na rdo dreg dang/ du rta dang/ sto'u ne ya dang/ he nu ka dang/ a ka ru dang/ shug pa dang/ sh+ri bi sha ka dang/ chu srin sen
266b1(mdo 'grel): mo dang/ bu su hang dang/ thang shing dang/ pri yaM ku dang/ spang spos dang/ pi pi ling dang/ dbyi mo dang/ ku Ta na Ta dang/ bya ma ka dang/ ba li ku dang dri srang bzhi dang/ balbu'i lo ma dang/ gla sgang dang/ ganda bAk+Sha dang/ 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma til mar dang sbyar ba'i bsku ba dang phye ma chu dang sbyar ba'i khrus dang/
266b2(mdo 'grel): lde gu'i byug pa rnams bya'o/ /yang na nim+ba dang/ ba spru ba me tog dmar po can dang/ nasta ma la dang/ arka bskol ba'i chus khrus bya'o/ /yan lag phyogs gcig skrangs pa la ni ba spru ba dang/ ka ra bi ra dang/ rgya skyegs shing byi sha la dang 'bras bu gsum dang/ seng phrom dang/ na li ka zhes bya
266b3(mdo 'grel): ba ka po da tsa ra na dang/ thang shing dang/ spang spos dang/ ko sha ta ki dang/ bong nga dkar po dang/ ta la'i lo ma dang/ dza yan+ti zhes bya ba taM gi ra dang/ 'ol ma se dkar po dang/ ka ka da ni dang/ sA la'i shing dang/ dbyi mo dang/ bri sha kar+Ni dang/ bri ti dang/ rid+d+hi dang/ hasti kar+Na zhes bya ba e raN+Ta dang/ 'di
266b4(mdo 'grel): rnams btags pa'i phye ma chu dro 'jam tsam dang lde gur byas te bskus na phan no/ /rlung las gyur pa'i 'or nad skrangs pa la ni zla ba phyed kyi bar du dur byid dang mar sbyar ba 'am yang na e raN+Ta'i mar 'ba' zhig btung ngo/ /rlung gi rtug pa 'gags pa la yang sbyor ba da nyid bya'o/ /e
266b5(mdo 'grel): raN+Ta'i mar 'o ma 'am sha khu dang ldan par zas kyi gong du bza' o/ /rlung gi skrangs nad la ni rlung 'joms pa'i stan gyis bsku byug bya'o/ /yan lag phyogs cig skrangs pa la/ kha lung dang/ agni man+ta dang/ spang spos dang/ bca' sga dang/ thang shing dang/ de rnams kyi lde gus bsku'o/ /mkhris
266b6(mdo 'grel): pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad la ni tik+ta'i sman mar ram/ n+ya gro d+ha'i sde tshan mar dang bskol bas bsku'o/ /skom dang che ba dang/ rmong bag du 'dug pa dang/ lus tsha ba la ni 'o ma dang mar dang byug pa dang ba rku ba grang mo byas pa rab tu phan no/ /yang na pa to la'i rtsa ba dang/ khyi lce ba dang/ shing
266b7(mdo 'grel): mngar dang/ pu tse shel dang/ a ru ra dang/ thang shing dang/ skyer pa dang/ tsandan dang/ dan+ta dang/ bi sha la dang/ lcang ma dang/ pi pi ling dang/ 'di rnams mar dang lhan cig bskol te 'thungs na khong pa tsha ba dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ mgo 'khor ba dang/ 'dus pa'i nad dang/ me dpal dang/ skrang ba dang/
267a1(mdo 'grel): lus tsha ba dang/ rims mi zad pa rnams sel to/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i 'or nad la ni dong ka'i sde tshan til mar dang bskol ba blud do/ /rtsa rgyun 'gags pa dang me drod chung ba dang yi ga 'chus pa dang/ rmongs bag du 'dug pa la ni thal sman a sa la'i
267a2(mdo 'grel): chang dang/ a ri sha'i chang dang/ ba gcin dang/ dar ba dang lhan cig bskyos te btang ngo/ /pi pi ling dang/ til mar la sogs pa'i tshigs ma rnying pa dang/ shi kru'i shun pa dang/ zar ma dang 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma ba gcin dro 'jam tsam dang sbyar te byug pa dang/
267a3(mdo 'grel): lus dril ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /rurta dang/ agni man+tha dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ rgya sran dang/ dong kra rnams ba gcin dang chu dang tshul bzhin bskol ba'i chus lus khrus bya'o/ /tsan+d+ra dang/ a ka ru'i lde gus lus byug go /ka la zhes bya ba ni ga ba la dang/ a dza sh+ri gi dang/ ko nyon tsa
267a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ any+dza ganda dang/ a shwa gand+ha dang/ a ma bashTa dang/ 'di rnams sbyar ba'i lde gu ni yan lag phyogs cig skrangs pa la rab tu bsngags so/ /yang na rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi shes par byas la/ nyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du gtar ka byas te/ brag dbyung ngo/ /nad gzhi rnams
267a5(mdo 'grel): 'dres nas gang shas che ba brtags te thog mar de gso bar bya'o/ /tha we dang/ pa tha dang/ gla sgang dang/ tsha ba rnam lnga dang/ kaN+Ta kA ri dang/ skyer pa dang/ de rnams chu dron dang sbyar te btang ba 'am/ yang na tik+ta dang/ bca' sga dang de gnyis chu dron dang sbyar te 'thungs na/
267a6(mdo 'grel): nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa'i 'or nad yun ring du lon te tshabs che ba yang zhi bar byed do/ /bdud rtsi rnam gnyis zhes bya ba/ sle tres dang/ a ru ra dang/ ba spru ba/ thang shing dang/ gu gub dang/ de rnams ba gcin dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ skrangs pa dang/ dmu rdzing dang
267a7(mdo 'grel): mdze dang/ skya rbab dang/ srin bu'i nad dang/ bad kan dang rlung stod du zhugs pa rnams 'joms so/ /gong du smos pa de dag ni nad gzhi las 'or nad du skrangs pa'i gso ba bshad pa yin no/ /de la snad pa las gyur pa la ni khrag dbyung bas nad sbyang bar bya ste/ de nas
267b1(mdo 'grel): sman bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa dang/ mar bsres pas bsku ba dang/ byug pa rnams bya'o/ /dug gis phog pa'i 'or nad la ni dug gi gso ba rnams 'dir sbyar ro/ /srog chags chu dang thang gnyis ga la gnas pa dang/ rjud pa'i sha dang/ pa ta la sogs pa tshed ma'i lo ma skam po
267b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ til dang bu ram las byas pa'i kha zas dang/ 'bras la sogs pa btags pa'i zas dang/ zho dang lan tshar bcas pa dang/ zas kyi mi bag can dang/ chang skyur dang/ spos dang/ sha skams dang/ phan gnod bsras pa'i zas dang/ zas lci ba dang/ zas mi bsod pa dang/ lus za bar
267b3(mdo 'grel): byed pa'i zas dang nyin par nyal ba dang/ nyal po rnams spang bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang skrang bar 'gyur ba'i bza' btung thams cad spang zhing dor ro/ /gso ba'i gnas las 'or nad gso ba'i le'u bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //de nas me dpal gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ de
267b4(mdo 'grel): la thog ma me dpal byung ba la ni smyung ba dang/ rtsub btsos dang/ khrag dbyung ba dang/ skyugs sman dang/ khrus sman rnams bya'o/ /kha cig du ni snum btsos bya zhes zer ro/ /skyugs sman ni po son cha dang/ dug mo yungs dang shing mngar sbyar ba 'am/ yang na til dang/ nim+ba'i lo ma dang/
267b5(mdo 'grel): po son cha sbyar ba rnams kyi skyugs sman btang na me dpal la phan no/ /me dpal nang du zhugs pa la ni khyad par du khyi lce ba dang/ rgun 'brum dang 'bras bu gsum med dang/ de rnams kyi khu ba gang yang rung ba'i nang du dur byid btab pa 'am/ yang na 'o ma dang mar dang/ dur
267b6(mdo 'grel): byid kyi phye ma sbyar ba'i bkru sman bya'o/ /nad gzhi chung ste slon khrus mi dgos pa la ni/ tsan dan dang utpa la sbyar ba 'am/ yang na gla sgang dang/ nim+ba dang/ pa to la dang/ pu tse shel gyi sde tshan dang lhan cig sbyar bas zhi bar bya'o/ /yang na thal tres dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ pu shel tsi dang/ gla
267b7(mdo 'grel): sgang rnams lhan cig bskol ba'i chus zhi bar bya'o/ /me dpal gyi nang skom dang che ba la ni/ byi tsher ba dang/ parpa ta dang/ sle tres dang/ bca' sga dang/ de rnams bskol ba'i khu ba 'am yang na grangs pa blud do/ /yang na skyer ba dang pa to la dang/ pu tse shel dang/ sran chung dang 'bras bu
268a1(mdo 'grel): gsum dang/ nim+ba dang shing mngar dang/ khyi lce ba bskol te mar dang lhan cig 'thungs na me dpal gyi skom dang che ba la phan no/ /me dpal gyi nad yan lag rnams su nad khrag yod pa la ni thog ma nad gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du lce la srin bu pad+ma sku ba rnams
268a2(mdo 'grel): kyis khrag dbyung ngo/ /gal te gtar ka ma byas na ni khrag rnag tu 'gyur te/ pags pa dang sha dang rus pa rnams su zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba de dag gis me zhu ba med cing bad kan za ste/ mkhris pa dang rlung shas che bar gyur pa la ni tik+ta chen po'i sman mar mkhris pa'i mdze
268a3(mdo 'grel): nad kyi skabs su bshad pa 'am/ khyi lce'i sman mar rnams btang ngo/ /de ltar gtar ka dang slon khrus kyi khod pa'i me dpal dag ste/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi'i dbang gis pags pa dang sha la brtan pa la ni phyi rol nas byug pa byas nas me dpal de ma thag zhi bar byed do//
268a4(mdo 'grel): de yang rlung las gyur pa'i me dpal la ni shu ti dang/ gla sgang dang/ ba ra hi dang/ 'od ma dang/ an+ta ra ga la dang/ 'u su dang/ thang shing dang pi pi ling dang/ shig tru dang/ ru rta dang/ 'di rnams kyi byug pa byas na phan no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa la na n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan nam/
268a5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du pad+ma dang/ utpa la dang/ nya lcibs dang/ chu'i nang gi 'dam pa ga dang/ pad+ma'i rtsa lag dang/ srim ga ta ga dang/ sha kha ra dang/ tsan dan dang/ ba la ka la dang/ mu tig dang/ nor bu dang/ btsag yug snam dang/ pa yassya dang/ pra puN+Ta ri ka dang/ shing mngar dang/ shug pa dang/
268a6(mdo 'grel): mar dang 'o ma dang/ de rnams sbyar ba'i byug pa bya ba 'am/ n+ya gro d+ha rtsi ba gzhon nu dang/ chu shing gi snying po rnams mar lan brgya sprus pa'i mar dang lde gur byas pa 'am/ yang na pad+ma'i tshogs mar dang/ sbyor ba gong ma ltar byas pas byug pa bya'o/ /yang na pad+ma skyes pa'i
268a7(mdo 'grel): 'dam bag grang mo 'am/ yang na mu tig dang/ dur dang byu ru dang/ nya phyis dang/ btsag yug snam dang/ 'di rnams gang yang rung ba btags pas byug go /bad kan las gyur pa'i me dpal la ni 'bras bu gsum dang shug pa dang/ pu shel tsi dang/ btsong dang/ ka ra bi ra dang/
268b1(mdo 'grel): ldam bu'i rtsa ba dang/ a nan+ta'i rtsa ba dang 'di rnams kyi lde gus bskus na phan no/ /yang na da ba la dang/ lo ma bdun pa dang/ seng ldeng dang/ thang shing dang/ kus sman da ka dang/ gla sgang dang/ dong ka 'di rnams kyi lde gu 'am/ yang na ba na'i sde tshan gyi lde gus bsku'o/ /yang na dong ka'i lo ma dang/ sle sman ta
268b2(mdo 'grel): ka'i shun pa dang/ en+d+ra ni dang/ ka ka hwa dang/ shi ri sha'i me tog dang/ 'di rnams kyi lde gus byug go /gong du smos pa'i byug pa sbyor ba sman sha puShpa la sogs pa de dag nyid kyi so so'i nad gzhi bzhin du byugs pa dang/ bsku byug dang/ sman mar dang/ phye ma rnams kyang de las bya'o/ /gang yang
268b3(mdo 'grel): rlung shas che ba la ni sman mar shas cher btang ngo/ /bad kan gyi gnas su me dpal ma zhu ba dang/ bcas pa la ni dro ba dang/ rtsub pa cher sbyar ro/ /mkhris pa'i gnas su zhugs pa la ni bsil ba dang mar dang ldan par sbyar ro/ /shin tu bsil bag dang ldan pa'i shing mar dang sbyar bas byugs te/ ras srab mos
268b4(mdo 'grel): phyi rol nas dkris la de ltar yang dang yang du brje zhing lan mar du bya'o/ /gal te bar bar du thag khyer na ni nus pa chung bar 'gyur ro/ /ldan pa'i nad la ni gong gi sbyor ba gnyis gnyis bsres te btang na phan pa'i mchog yin no/ /me dang 'dra ba'i me dpal la ni mar lan brgya bcu dang/ bkrus
268b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i nyi rtses bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na mar gyi snying khu 'am/ shing mngar bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/ kha re dkar po bskol ba'i chu 'am/ pad+ma 'am/ utpa la'i chu 'am/ 'o ma 'am/ bu ram shing bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/ de rnams gang yang rung ba grang mo'i rgyun blugs so/ /tik+ta chen po'i sman mar ni me
268b6(mdo 'grel): dang 'dra ba'i me dbal la btung ba dang/ byug pa blugs pa rnams byas na phan pa'i mchog yin no/ /mdzer pa lta bu'i me dpal la ni khrag mkhris gso ba'i bya ba ji sgang bshad pa bzhin du gso ba ltar bya'o/ /de bzhin du bad kan dang rlung 'joms pa'i sman dang zan dugs dang/ byug pa la sogs
268b7(mdo 'grel): pa byas na phan no/ /yang na mdzer pa lta bu'i me dpal zug gzer dang bcas pa la ni rtsa ba bcu pa dang/ til mar bskol ba dron po 'am ba gcin dron po 'am/ chu dron po gang yang rung bas blugs pa bya'o/ /yang na shig bkru 'am nak+ta ma la dang/ la phug skam po dang/ ba ru ra dang de rnams
269a1(mdo 'grel): gang yang rung ba'i phye ma chu dron dang lde gur byas te/ mdzer pa lta bu'i me dpal la bsku'o/ /dan+ti dang tsi tra ka dang/ shing tshwa dang/ shi ri khaN+Ta dang/ arka'i lo ma dang/ bu ram dang/ go bye'i rus pa dang/ nag tshur dang/ 'di rnams lde gur byas pas bskus na
269a2(mdo 'grel): phyi rol gyi rdo yang 'bigs par 'gyur na bad kan las gyur pa'i me dpal mdzer pa lta bu'i phyi rol pags pa la brten pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mdzer pa lta bu'i me dpal yun ring du gnas pa la ni la phug dang rgya sran kha la tha dang/ sa'u 'bru dang bcas
269a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i khu bcud sbyin na/ /rtag tu gro dang nas kyi zas bza' o/ /rgun chang dang/ bu ram chang dang/ sha kha ra'i btung ba dang/ de bzhin du chang gi snying po sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du kha lung gi khu bas bcug pa 'am/ yang na 'bras bu gsum gyi sbyor ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba
269a4(mdo 'grel): 'am/ yang na pi pi ling gi sbyor ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na thang shing gi sbyor ba dang/ sle tres kyi sbyor ba dang/ yang na brag zhun gyi sbyor ba 'am/ yang na gla sgang gi sbyor ba dang/ go bye'i sbyor ba 'am/ yang na sbrang rtsi'i sbyor ba 'di rnams kyi btung ba gang
269a5(mdo 'grel): yang rung ba sbyar ro/ /mdzer pa lta bu'i me dpal nam tshod yan chad du zhugs pa la ni mgo'i bkru sman dang/ dud pa rdub pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /gzhan yang skran gyi gso ba thams cad kyang 'dir sbyar ro/ /gzhan yang lcags dang/ gser dang/ lan tshwa
269a6(mdo 'grel): dang rdo dang de rnams gang yang rung bas bsreg go /gong du bstan pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs pa de dag gis ma zhi ste/ mdzer pa lta bu'i me dpal rdo bzhin du sra ste nye bar ma zhi na/ thal sman dang/ rim gyis me dang/ gser gyis bsregs na phan no/ /mdzer
269a7(mdo 'grel): pa lta bu'i me dpal rgyu de dag gis smin par byas pa dang/ mtshon gyis dral ta dbyung bar bya'o/ /me dpal gyis khrag rang gi gnas las nyams te/ 'khrug pa la ni khrag dbyung ngo/ /de ltar yang dang yang du gtar ka byas pa'i 'og tu rlung dang bad kan 'joms pa'i sman
269b1(mdo 'grel): btang? ngo/ /bsregs pa dang/ smin pa'i dbang bsi rul zhing nyams pa la ni phyi nang gnyi ga nas rma gso ba'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin bya'o/ /skyer pa dang/ bi dang ga dang/ kam pi lya dang de rnams til mar dang sbyar bas bskus na rma la phan no/ /bad kan dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i me
269b2(mdo 'grel): ?? la ni/ dud ba'i rang gi khu ba dang mer sbyar ba phan no/ /me dpal la ni slon khrus kyi las thams cad kyang bya bar 'os pa yin la/ /brag dbyung ba nya tshe yang de dang 'dra bar las byed de/ da yang me dpal gyi nad de khrag mkhris dang ldan na ni khrag dbyung ba la mi ldan na ni
269b3(mdo 'grel): mi dbyung ste/ me dpal de nyid khrag la brten pa yin pas lan mang du khrag dbyung bar 'os pa yin no/ /nad gzhi mang po 'dus pa'i me dpal la ni mar nyi tshe mi sbyin te/ gal te gtong na yang bkru sman dang sbyar la btang ngo/ /ci ste mar nyi tshe byin na ni khrag de nyid ska zhing
269b4(mdo 'grel): tshos par byas te skyon du 'gyur ro/ /gso ba'i gnas las me dpal gso ba'i le'u bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// //de nas mdze nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ de la mdze nad thams cad la ni thog mar snum gyi btung ba nye bar spyad par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i
269b5(mdo 'grel): mdze nad la ni rtsa ba bcu pa dang/ sle tres dang/ e raN+Ta dang/ sh+riM ga ta dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma mar ram til mar gang yang rung ba dang/ bskol ba 'thungs na phan no/ /pa to la dang/ nimpa dang/ pu tse shel dang/ skyer pa dang/ pa ta dang/ byi tsher ba dang/ skra lo dang/ khyi lce ba dang/ de rnams srang
269b6(mdo 'grel): re re chu srang nyis brgya rtsa bcu drug dang/ bskol te brgyad cha lus pa'i nang du khyi lce ba dang/ gla sgang dang/ tik+ta dang/ dug mo yungs dang/ pi pi ling dang/ tsan dan dang/ de rnams zho gnyis gnyis dang/ mar srang bcu gnyis dang/ yang bskol la mar lus pa ni tik+ta'i sman mar zhes bya
269b7(mdo 'grel): te de las ran par 'thung na mkhris pa dang/ mdze dang/ me dbal dang/ 'brum bu phra mo dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ skom dad che ba dang/ mgo 'khor ba dang/ g.ya' ba dang/ skya rbab kyi nad dang/ 'bras dang/ rma 'drams pa dang/ 'brum bu dang/ khong 'bras dang/ skran dang/ skem byed kyi nad dang/
270a1(mdo 'grel): smyo byed dang/ myos pa dang/ snying nad dang/ rab rib dang/ ngos shig dang/ pho ba'i nad dang/ sha bkra dang/ mig ser dang/ mtshan bar rdol ba dang/ brjed byed dang/ bud med kyi zla mtshan gyi nad dang/ sbyar ba'i dug dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ khrag mkhris rnams la
270a2(mdo 'grel): phan te/ gzhan yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad shin tu gso dka' ba yang 'byang bar byed do/ /lo ma bdun pa dang/ parpa ta dang/ dong ka dang/ pu tse shel dang/ shu dag dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ shug pa dang/ pa thA dang/ ser po rnam gnyis dang/ thal tres rnams dang/ pi pi
270a3(mdo 'grel): ling dang/ nimpa dang/ tsan dan dang/ shing mngar dang/ bi sha la dang/ dug mo yungs dang/ sle tres dang/ tik+ta dang/ pu shel tsi dang/ ba sha ka dang/ murpa dang/ shing dang/ pa to la dang/ bong nga dkar po dang/ gla sgang dang/ khyi lce ba dang/ byi tsher ba dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma dang/ mar dang/ mar gyi brgyad
270a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur gyi chu dang/ skyu ru ra'i khu ba mar gyi nyis 'gyur dang/ 'di rnams tshul bzhin bskol ba'i mar ni tik+ta chen po'i sman mar zhes bya ste/ phan yon gong ma bas kyang shas che ba bzang bar 'dod do/ /mdze nad bad kan las gyur pa la ni nim+ba dang/ lo ma bdun pa dang/ tsi tra ka dang/
270a5(mdo 'grel): ru rta dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ shing sA la bi la la dang/ dong ka dang/ 'di rnams mar dang tshul bzhin bskol ba blud do/ /mdze nad thams cad la ni ba la ta'i mar ram/ yungs kar gyi mar mchog tu bsngags te blud par bya'o/ /yang na bi dang ka dang/ a ru ra dang/ go bye rnams tshul bzhin
270a6(mdo 'grel): bskol ba'i mar blud do/ /yang na dong ka ri rtsa ba mar dang lan brgya bskol ba'i mar blud cing seng ldeng gi chu bsten te 'thungs na/ mdze nad las myur du rgyal lo/ /gong du bstan pa'i mar gyi sbyor ba de dag gis bsku byug la sogs pa yang des bya'o/ /de ltar snum chos byas pa'i
270a7(mdo 'grel): 'og tu me dpal gyi nad la smos pa'i slon khrus kyi sman 'dir yang sbyar te slon khrus bya'o/ /de nas sman bas nad pa'i nyams stobs brtags te/ dpral ba dang lag pa dang rkang pa rnams las khrag dbyung bar bya ste/ de yang ji ltar gtar ka bya zhe na/ mdze nad shas chung ba la ni
270b1(mdo 'grel): zhal zhal gyi khrag dbyung ba dang/ gzhan yang rba la sogs pas ji ltar khrag dbyung ba ni nad gzhi dang sbyar nas gtar ka'i le'u las bltas te bya'o/ /khrag phyung ba dang/ slon khrus byas pas khong pa stong pa la ni rlung 'joms pa'i sman dang sbyar ba'i snum rim gyis sten na lus 'jig
270b2(mdo 'grel): par byed pa'i rlung zhi bar byed de mi 'jigs shing srung bar byed do/ /plak+Sha dang sle tres dang/ nimpa dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ pa to la dang/ kaN+Ta ka ri dang/ ka rany+dza dang/ 'di rnams chu dang tshul bzhin bskol ba'i nang du sman de nyid kyi phye ma dang/ mar dang yang bskol te mar lus pa ni rdo
270b3(mdo 'grel): can zhes bya ba'i sman mar yin te de las ran par 'thungs na/ me dpal dang/ rims dang/ mig ser dang/ khrag lud pa dang/ mdze nad rnams 'joms so/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum dang/ kaN+Ta kA ri rnam gnyis dang/ pu tse shel dang/ dur byid dang/ dan+ta dang/ dong ka dang/ bong nga
270b4(mdo 'grel): dkar po dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ pa thA dang/ de rnams zho gnyis gnyis zhib tu btags pa dang/ shu dag sh+ki ra'i 'o ma sar pa srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang bskol te mar lus pa las/ ran par btung ba dang/ snum chos dang bkru sman du sbyar na/ mdze ma rungs pa dang/ sha zi gu dang/ mcher
270b5(mdo 'grel): ba na ba dang/ rgyu rlugs dang/ rde'u 'gags ba dang/ skran dang de rnams gso dka' ba yang rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'dis zhi bar byed do/ /yang dan+ti srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad chu srang lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis dang/ bskol te bzhi cha lus pa'i nang du mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
270b6(mdo 'grel): ba marga zhes bya ba go shaSh+Ta ki'i phye ma srang gcig btab te ran par 'thungs na gong 'og gnyis kar dag par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ya brta ka zhes bya ba sA tya ba srang brgya chu srang lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis kyi nang du bskol te brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi lus pa'i nang du a brta ka'i phye ma dang/
270b7(mdo 'grel): mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ yang bskol la mar lus pa las ran par 'thungs na/ de yang zhag mi bza' bar zhag res bar bcad cing zos la sman de zhu ba'i tshod tsam na khre rgod kyi zas dang/ rtsa bas kyi rang skyur dang lhan cig zos na mdze dang/ sha bkra dang/ a ba pi rnams
271a1(mdo 'grel): la phan te/ gzhan yang 'bras kyi phreng ba las rgyal ba 'dod pa dang/ bu mang po skye bar 'dod pa dang/ dran pa 'dzin par 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang bsten par bya'o/ /le li ka'i ba sa sbrang rtsi dang/ dzA ti'i khu ba dang ldan pa 'am/ yang na mar dang li li
271a2(mdo 'grel): ta ka cha bsnyams pa 'am/ yang na seng ldeng dang/ a ba san bskol ba'i chu dzA ti'i khu ba dang ldan par 'thungs na mdze nad 'joms so/ /bza' ba ni 'bras dmar po la sogs pa dang/ nas dang gro dang ci rtse dang/ khre dang sran mung+ga dang/ sran chung dang/ tu ba ri dang tshod ma kha ba rnams dang/
271a3(mdo 'grel): skam sa na gnas pa'i sha khu 'bras bu gsum dang/ pa to la dang/ seng ldeng dang/ nimpa dang/ go bye rnams sbyar ba sbyin no/ /btung bar ni chang sman 'thun pa dang sbyar ba 'am/ dar ba'i nang du so ma ra dzas btab pa blud do/ /bza' ba dang btung ba de dag kyang mi skyur ba dang/ mi tsha
271a4(mdo 'grel): ba dang mi rno ba byin na mdze nad la phan no/ /gzhan du na zho dang 'o ma dang bu ram dang chu dang thun mong du gnas pa'i sha dang/ til dang/ mon sran rde'u rnams ni mdze na ba rnams kyis thag ring du spang bar bya'o/ /pa to la'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu gsum dang/ bi sha la dang/ lnga po de
271a5(mdo 'grel): dag re re yang ma sha bcu drug bcu drug dang/ khyi lce ba dang pu tse shel zho phyed phyed dang dong kra bzhi cha dang/ de rnams spyir srang gcig yod pa de btags la chu dang tshul bzhin bskol ba 'thungs na rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi sbyong bar byed do/ /sman de zhu ba'i tshod tsam na skam
271a6(mdo 'grel): sa la gnas pa'i ri dags dang/ bya rnams kyi sha khu 'bras rnying ba'i char dang sbyar te zos na mdze nad thams cad dang/ skrang ba dang pho ba'i nad dang/ gcin sri ba dang ha lim ka zhes bya ba'i nad rnams la phan te/ zhag drug tu sbyor ba de ltar byas na snying dang chu sor zug pa dang/
271a7(mdo 'grel): rims kyis mi bzad pa rnams kyang zhi bar byed do/ /bi da bka' i nang gi snying po dang/ skyu ru ra dang a ru ra dang/ de dag srang re re dang/ na ti srang gsum dang/ bu ram srang bcu gnyis dang/ 'di rnams ri lur byas te byin na mdze dang sha bkra dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang lud
271b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ gzhang 'brum dang gcin nad dang/ mcher pa na ba dang thor bu'i nad dang tshigs kyi steng na gnas pa'i 'brum bu'i nad dang/ skran rnams 'joms te sbyor ba 'di ni gnod sbyin nor bu bzang po zhes bya ba des nyan thos kyi dge slong gcig nad gyis srog 'dor du nye ba dang/ de'i
271b2(mdo 'grel): don du sbyor ba 'di bshad pas/ ril bu 'di'i ming yang nor bu bzang po zhes grags pa yin no/ /tik+ta dang nim+ba dang 'bras bu gsum dang/ shug pa dang/ bong nga dkar po dang pi pi ling dang/ murba dang/ pa to la dang/ ser po rnam gnyis dang/ bu tse shel dang/ in+d+ra ba ru ni dang/ dug
271b3(mdo 'grel): mo yungs dang/ shu dag dang 'di rnams cha bsnyams pa dang/ dan+ti dang/ de'i nyis 'gyur gyi dur byid dang/ de'i nyis 'gyur gyi bramha mi dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang lde gur byas pa ran par? zos mdze dang gcin nad dang/ rmongs bag tu 'dug pa rnams la phan pa'i mchog
271b4(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bi dang ka dang/ 'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang/ til mar dang/ mar dang lde gur byas pa 'am/ yang na ka ko u dum ba ra dang/ bi dang ga dang nim+ba dang/ gla sgang dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma briksha bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du
271b5(mdo 'grel): btab ste 'thungs na pags pa'i nad thams cad 'joms so/ /dug mo nyung dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ nimpa dang thang shing dang seng ldeng dang/ a sa na dang/ lo ma bdun pa dang/ 'di rnams bskol ba'i nang du mar dang/ a ru ra'i phye ma dang/ sbrang rtsi dang ldan par zos na mdze nad 'joms so/ /seng
271b6(mdo 'grel): ldeng dang/ nimpa dang/ sle tres dang/ pa to la'i rtsa ba dang/ byi tsher ba dang 'di rnams bskol ba ni seng ldeng la sogs pa sman gyi sbyor ba drug ces bya ste/ ji ltar lha ma yin khyab 'jug gis bcom pa bzhin du/ mdze nad thams cad 'joms so/ /skyer ba dang/ nimpa dang/ seng ldeng dang/
271b7(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams kyi shun lpags bskol ba 'thungs na mdze nad sel to/ /yang na skyer pa 'bras bu gsum pa dang/ nimpa dang/ pa to la'i rtsa ba dang/ pu tse shel dang/ shu dag dang btsod dang 'di rnams bskol ba 'thungs na bad kan dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mdze nad gcod de/ dam pa'i
272a1(mdo 'grel): chos yang dag par bsten pas 'khor ba'i 'ching ba gcod pa bzhin no/ /gong gis sman de dag ba mar dang bskol ba'i mar ni rlung las gyur pa'i mdze nad sel ba'i mchog yin te myur du rgyal bar byed do/ /de bzhin du seng ldeng dang/ nimpa dang/ skyer pa dang/ sle tres
272a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ thang shing dang/ 'di rnams re re nas ba mar dang sbyor ba gong ma ltar byas na phan no/ /pa thA dang skyer ba dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ dan+ti dang/ dug mo nyung dang pu tse shel dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang/ chu dron po gang yang rung ba las zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thungs na mdze'i nad
272a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ gzhang 'brum dang gcin gyi nad dang/ skrang ba dang/ skya rbab dang/ ma zhu ba dang/ srin bu'i nad la phan no/ /rgya skyegs dang/ dan+ti dang/ murpa dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ tsi tra ka dang pa thA dang bi dang ga dang/ a pa marga dang tsha ba gsum dang/ skyer pa dang/ lo ma bdun pa dang/
272a4(mdo 'grel): ba sha ka dang bcod dang/ nimpa dang/ thang shing dang rtsa ba lnga pa che chung dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba zla ba gcig gi bar du btung zhing phan pa'i zas dang lhan cig bsten na/ mdze nad thams cad 'joms so/ /skyer pa dang/ pi pi ling dang/ dong gra dang bi dang ga
272a5(mdo 'grel): dang to ba ri dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ ta sya dang/ 'di rnams yas kyi rims bzhin du cha res skyed pa'i phye ma ba gcin dang bcas pa 'thungs na/ mdze nad shin tu mi bzad pa rnams kyang 'joms so/ /tsha ba gsum dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang til dang/ go bye dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma mar
272a6(mdo 'grel): dang sbrang rtsi dang khar dkar po dang/ sbyar ba'i ri lu ni tshwa ba gsum la sogs pa'i cha bdun pa'i ri lu zhes bya ste/ de las ran par zos na/ mdze nad las rgyal zhing bcud kyi len du 'gyur la/ bud med la nyal phod par 'gyur ro/ /so ma ra dza dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ skyer pa dang/ bi dang
272a7(mdo 'grel): ga dang/ tu ba ra'i rus pa dang/ go bye dang 'bras bu gsum dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang ri lur bya ste rtag tu goms par byas na mdze nad thams cad sel to/ /bi dang ka dang/ go bye dang/ so ma ra dzA dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ ba ra hi dang/ a ru ra dang/ laM ga li dang/ pi pi ling
272b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ til nag po dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang ri lur byas te zas na mdze nad 'joms so/ /so ma ra dzA dang/ bi dang ka'i snying po dang/ pi pi ling dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang lde gur byas te zos na mdze nad gso dka' ba yang 'joms so//
272b2(mdo 'grel): yang na a ru ra dang/ go bye dang til mar dang de rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang ri lur byas te zos na mdze nad las rgyal bar byed do/ /'dir bu ram dang/ sman gyi tshad ma smos pa rnams ni sman spyi'i nyis 'gyur gyi bu ram dang sbyor cig yang na go bye dang/ byi dang ga dang/ so ma ra dzA
272b3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang/ ri lur byas te zos na phan yon yang de dang 'dra'o/ /yang na bi dang ga dang/ seng ldeng dang/ brag zhun gyi phye ma las ran par zos na 'brum bu phra mo dang/ sha gzi gu dang/ shu ba rnams 'joms so/ /bi dang ga dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ lcags kyi phye ma dang/ pi pi
272b4(mdo 'grel): ling dang/ khar rnams btags pa'i phye ma til mar dang btags pa'i lde gu bldags na mdze nad gso dka' ba las rgyal bar byed do/ /gla sgang dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ btsod dang/ thang shing dang/ rtsa ba lnga pa rnam gnyis dang/ lo ma bdun pa dang/ nimpa dang/ shing tshwa
272b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ bi sha la dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ mur ba rnams btags pa'i phye ma dang/ sman sna gcig gi dgu 'gyur gyi nas phye dang/ sbrang rtsi'i cha gcig dang/ mdze 'joms pa'i sman rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang bskyos te rtag tu 'thungs na mdze nad zlog par byed do/ /de bzhin du 'or nad dang/ skya
272b6(mdo 'grel): rbab kyi nad dang/ sha bkra dang/ pho ba'i nad dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ rlig rlugs dang/ mtshan par rdol ba dang/ 'brum bu phra mo dang/ 'brum bu dang/ 'brum chen gyi nad 'joms so/ /tu bar zhes bya ba a ta ka'i rus pa dang/ go? bye dang/ so ma ra dza dang/ tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba dang/ 'di rnams re re yang
272b7(mdo 'grel): bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba bzhin du sbyar te bsten par bya'o/ /gong ma'i sman gyi sbyor ba gong du bstan pa de dag gis khong pa nang gi mdze nad dag ste/ pags pa'i phyi rol du byung ba la ni sman gyi byug pa phan te/ lus dri ma dang bcas pa la sman rnon po'i byug pas bskus pas mdze
273a1(mdo 'grel): nang tshab cher thu bar snang ste/ mdze nad 'khor ling can dang gting zug pa dang/ sra ba rnams la ni 'brum bu'i thum bu la sogs pas dugs bya ste/ snyi zhing mthon por gyur ba dang/ mtshon gyis zhal zhal bya zhing phyi ste/ de'i 'og tu sman gyis byug pa bya'o/ /
273a2(mdo 'grel): mdze nad gang lus kyi dbang po rnams nyams shing pag pa mtshon gyis zhal zhal byar mi rung ba de la ni dang po khrag phyung ste/ de'i 'og tu thal sman snon pos bsreg par bya'o/ /mdze nad sra ba dang/ rtsub pa dang/ bem bem por mi tshor bar 'dug pa dang/ yun ring du lon
273a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ brtan pa rnams la ni mdze nad 'joms pa'i sman gyis byug pa dang btung bar blud do/ /de'i 'og tu dug 'joms pa'i sman dang dug sngags kyis btab pa bsres te sbyin no/ /mdze nad gang lus rengs shing gyong ba dang/ tshor bag med pa dang/ rdul mi 'byung ba dang/ shin tu
273a4(mdo 'grel): g.ya' ba rnams la ni ba lang gi lci ba skam po dang/ rgya mtsho'i dbu ba 'am/ mtshon gang yang rung bas bzhar te/ de'i 'og tu sman gyis byug par bya'o/ /gla sgang dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ po son cha dang/ ka rany+dza dang/ dong ka dang/ dug mo yungs dang lo ma bdun pa dang/ ru sta dang/ bri
273a5(mdo 'grel): yang ku dang/ skyer ba dang/ yungs kar dang/ 'di rnams tshul bzhin bskol ba ni yungs kar gyi sbyor ba zhes bya ste/ lus bkru ba dang/ byug pa dang/ des bzhar ba dang/ slon khrus kyang byas na/ pags pa'i nad dang/ mdze dang/ skrang ba dang/ skya rbab kyi nad rnams kyang 'joms so/ /ka ra ba ri dang/
273a6(mdo 'grel): nim+ba dang/ dug mo yungs dang/ dong ka dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ 'di rnams kyi rtsa ba dang ba gcin dang lhan cig bskol te/ dril du btub pa tsam phyung ste/ de'i lde gus bskus na mdze nad 'joms so/ /kar bi ra dkar po'i rtsa ba dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ ka ranyza'i 'bras bu dang/ skyer pa'i shun pa
273a7(mdo 'grel): su ma na'i lo ma dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma lde gur byas pas bskus na yang mdze nad 'joms pa kun gyis mngon sum du mthong zhing grags pa yin no/ /sh+ri sh+ri'i shun pa dang/ ras bal gyi me tog dang/ dong ka'i lo ma dang/ mon sran sne'u mi ru'i rtsa ba dang/ lo mar
273b1(mdo 'grel): bcas pa dang/ 'di bzhi btags pa'i phye ma'i lde gus bskus na phan no/ /niba dang ser po rnam gnyis dang/ bye'u rug pa dang/ ba to la dang/ ru rta dang/ a shwa gand+ha dang/ thang zhing dang/ shi tru dang/ yungs kar dang+g.yer ma dang/ 'u su dang/ sla ba zhes bya ba ku Tan+naTa dang/ tsan+d+ra dang/ 'di rnams
273b2(mdo 'grel): cha bsnyams pa'i phye ma dang ba dang btags te/ thog mar til mar gyis lus byugs la/ de nas lde gu dril ba byas na mdze nad g.ya' ba dang/ 'brum bu dang/ 'brum bu phra mo dang/ mdze dang skrang ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na gla sgang dang/ skyer khaN+Ta skam po dang/ skyer pa dang/ nag tshur
273b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ gam pa lya dang/ ru rta dang/ seng phrom dang/ mu zi dang/ sra rtsi pog dang/ bi dang ga dang/ ldong ros dang/ ba bla dang/ ka ra bi ra'i shun ba dang/ 'di rnams phye mar byas la sngar til mar gyis sus bsgus pa'i steng du btab na/ shu ba dang/ g.yan pa dang/ 'brum bu sh+ra mo dang/ khyi rdo dang/
273b4(mdo 'grel): rkang shu la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i nad sel bar byed do/ /sh+ri khaN+Ta'i shing gi sdong bu'i nang du yung kar btags pa bcug ste/ rdza slang gi nang du me mi che ba la btsos la/ de las lde gur byas pas bskus na rkang shu sel bar byed do/ /ji ltar 'dod khams kyis zil gyis non pa
273b5(mdo 'grel): dag ngo tsha spangs pa bzhin no/ /ldong ros dang/ ba bla dang/ na le sham dang/ de rnams til mar dang/ shing arka'i 'o ma dang/ sbyar ba bskus na/ mdze 'phrog par byed do/ /de bzhin du ka rany+dza dang/ tsakra banda dang/ ru rta dang/ de rnams ba gcin dang btags pa 'thungs na yang phan no/ /yang na
273b6(mdo 'grel): gu gul dang/ na le sham dang/ bi dang ga dang/ yungs kar dang/ nag tshur dang/ gra tsi pog dang/ gla sgang dang/ ko nyon tshe'i thang dang/ bab la dang/ mu zi dang/ ldong ros dang/ ru rta dang/ kam pi lya dang/ ser po gnyis dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma tsakra mar da'i mar bsres pa'i lde gur byas la/
273b7(mdo 'grel): thog mar mtshon gyis bzhar la/ de'i steng du bskus pa nyi ma la bzhag ste 'dug na/ mdze nad gtan du zhi bar byed do/ /yang na ne le sham dang/ shing ta la'i lo ma dang/ ru rta dang/ ldong ros dang/ ? tshur dang/ 'di rnams til mar dang sbyar ba zangs ma'i snod la zhag bdun bzhag ste
274a1(mdo 'grel): des zhag bdun gyi bar du nyi ma tshab la bsku zhing bsten na sha bkra 'joms so/ /sha bkra sar pa la ni lus kyi phyi khrus mi bya bar slon khrus byas la de'i sbyar ba gong ma zla ba gcig bsten na phan no/ /a pa marga bsregs pa'i thal ba chu nang du bskyos te/ lan
274a2(mdo 'grel): bdun btsags la pri yang ku'i mar dang sbyar la bskol bas lus bsku byug byas na sha bkra sel to/ /ka ka dzangka'i rtsa ba dang/ ra bal gyi 'dab ma dang/ la phug gi sa bon dang/ de rnams dar ba dang btags te sbyar ba/ gza' mig dmar la bab pa'i dus su bskus na/ sha
274a3(mdo 'grel): bkra sel bar grags pa yin no/ /dzi ban+ti dang/ btsod dang/ skyer pa dang/ kam pi lya dang/ spangs ma dang/ de rnams cham chom brdungs te mar dang til mar dang/ mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang bskol ba'i nang du sra rtsi pog dang/ pra tshil btags pa bskus na 'bras byer
274a4(mdo 'grel): ba 'jig par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du pags pa gcig pa'i mdze dang/ 'brum bu phra mo'i mdze dang/ 'bras mi 'byor pa rnams kyang zhi bar byed do/ /lo ma bdun pa'i rtsa ba dang/ sh+ri sh+ri'i shun lpags dang/ a shwa ma ra dang/ a ra ka dang/ su ma na dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ thal
274a5(mdo 'grel): tres dang/ bim+ba dang/ 'di rnams kyi shun lpags dang/ ka rany+dza'i 'bru dang/ yungs kar dang/ tsakra mar da dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ bi dang ga dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ ser po rnam gnyis dang/ 'di rnams phye mar byas la til mar dang/ de'i bzhi 'gyur gyi ba gcin dang
274a6(mdo 'grel): bskol te/ mar 'ba' zhig lus pa ni rdo rje can zhes bya ba rdo rje dang mnyam pa'i lde gu yin te/ de bas na bsku byug byas na/ pags pa'i nad thams cad dang/ rma 'drams pa dang/ rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i mdze nad sel to/ /e raN+Ta dang/ skyer khaN+Ta dang/ ga
274a7(mdo 'grel): pur dang/ shing nim+ba dang/ ka tam pa dang/ ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ kam pi lya dang/ bi dang ga dang/ in+d+ra ba ru ni dang/ nirgun+thi dang/ go bya dang/ thang shing dang/ khom bu dang/ shing ko nyon tse'i thang chu dang gu gul dang/ ldong ros dang/ lan tsha dang/ shing ta la dang/ bca' sga dang/ 'di
274b1(mdo 'grel): rnams btags pa'i phye ma dang/ til mar bskol ba'i nang du snum ha k+Shi ra zhes bya ba sh+ri ri khaN+Da'i 'o ma dang/ a ra ka'i 'o ma dang cha mnyam pa dang lhan cig lde gur byas pa ni/ rdo rje chen po'i lde gu zhes bya ste/ des bskus na phan yon rdo rje can dang 'dra ste/ lhag par yang 'dis ni
274b2(mdo 'grel): sha bkra dang/ 'bras kyi phreng ba dang/ gzhang 'brum rnams 'joms so/ /ru rta dang/ a shwa ma ra zhes bya ba te dzo ba ti dang/ su dak+Shi ra dang/ rgya tsha dang/ 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma ba gcin dang til mar dang sbyar ba'i nang du cung zhig btab ste 'thungs na mdze nad las rgyal ba'i
274b3(mdo 'grel): mchog yin no/ /yungs kar gyi mar pra tshil dang/ shak+tru? dang/ gu gul dang/ spangs ma dang/ skyer khaN+Ta dang/ 'di rnams bskol ba'i mar gyis bskus na mchan khung gi nad dang/ rkang shu rnams myur du zlog par byed do/ /rgya skyegs dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ tsa kra marta dang/ ko nyon tse'i thang
274b4(mdo 'grel): chu dang/ ru rta dang/ yungs kar dang/ la phug gi sa bon dang/ ser po rnam gnyis dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma dang dar ba dang sbyar ba'i lde gu bskus na/ shu ba thams cad la phan no/ /zhes drang srong rnams kyis gsungs so/ /tsa tra ka dang/ shi kru dang/ sbyar ba 'am/ yang na sle tres dang/ a pa
274b5(mdo 'grel): marga dang/ thang shing zho ga chu dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na seng ldeng dang/ shing d+ha ba 'am/ yang na dan+ti dang/ dra ban+ti 'am/ yang na rgya skyegs dang/ skyer khaN+Ta 'am/ yang na sug smel dang/ pu nan? ba 'am/ sbyor ba drug po de rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma zho ga chu dang sbyar ba bskus na/
274b6(mdo 'grel): rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i mdze nad sel to/ /dza la zhes bya ba bA lu ka dang/ b+ha bya zhes bya ba ru rta dang/ nA ga ge sar dang/ gand+ha pa tra dang/ tsan dan dang/ u shi ra dang/ de rnams gong ma'i cha res bskyed pa'i phye ma lde gur byas te bskus na/ bad kan dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i
274b7(mdo 'grel): mdze nad sel to/ /mdze nad lus tsha ba dang bcas pa la ni/ gong du smos pa'i tik+ta'i sman mar dang/ mar lan brgya bkrus pa dang/ til mar tsan dan dang/ shin mngar dang pra puN+Ta rI ga dang/ utpa la dang/ tshul bzhin bskol ba 'am/ 'di rnams gang yang rung bas bskus na phan no/ /
275a1(mdo 'grel): gang gis lus 'drul zhing yan lag chad pa dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ 'brum bu byung ba dang bags pa myags pa dang bcas pa la ni bsil ba'i byug pa dang/ blugs pa dang/ gtar ka dang/ bkru sman dang tik+ta'i sman mar rnams byin na phan no/ /seng ldeng dang/
275a2(mdo 'grel): ba sha ka dang/ nim+ba dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ bi dang ga dang/ sle tres dang/ 'di rnams ba gcin dang sbyar bas nang dang phyi rol nas btung ba dang/ blugs pa la sogs pa byas na/ srin bu las gyur pa'i mdze nad 'joms so/ /de la rlung shas che ba'i mdze nad
275a3(mdo 'grel): la ni thog mar sman mar bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur ba'i mdze nad la ni thog mar skyugs sman btang ngo/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni/ dang po gtar gas khrag dbyung ba dang bkru sman rnams bya'o/ /de la mdze nad thams cad la khrag gi nyes pa med cing/ slon khrus kyis
275a4(mdo 'grel): khong dag na ni/ gong du smos pa'i sku byug la sog pa'i sman byas na/ de ma thag par phan par 'gyur gyi khrag gi nyes pa dang bcas shing khong ma dag na ni de ltar ma yin no/ /de ltar khrag gi nyes pa yang med/ khong pa yang dag par byas gong du smos pa'i snum la sogs
275a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sman dus dang mthun par sbyar na/ mdze nad thams cad nges par zlog te gso sla'o/ /de la nad gzhi mang po 'dus pa'i mdze tshabs che ba la ni slon khrus la sogs pas khong pa yang dang yang du sbyang bar bya'o/ /de ltar sbyang ba byas bas nad pa nyams stobs chung
275a6(mdo 'grel): zhing rlung gis nyams thag par gyur na/ srog myur du 'jig par 'gyur bas de bas na sman pas srog bsrung ba la 'bad do/ /de ltar gso ba thams cad kyi mdze nad gsos par gyur te/ phyis mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir lus kyi ro stod dag pa'i ched du zla ba phyed phyed cing
275a7(mdo 'grel): glo sman bya'o/ /lus kyi rma dag par bya ba'i phyir zla ba re re zhing bkru sman bya'o/ /mgo bo dag par bya ba'i phyir zhag gsum gsum zhing mgo bo'i bkru sman bya'o/ /de bzhin du zla ba drug cing gtar ka bya ste khrag dbyung bar bya'o/ /gal te mdze nad las slon khrus ma
275b1(mdo 'grel): legs shing khong dag par ma gyur na/ phyir nad gzhi cher 'khrugs te/ nad slar skye zhing gsor mi rung bar 'gyur bas de bas na mdze'i nad gzhi ma lus par rtsad bcad cing drungs dbyung bar bya'o/ /gso ba'i gnad las mdze nad gso ba'i le'u bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// //
275b2(mdo 'grel): de nas sha bkra dang srin bu'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ de la sha bkra'i nad ni mdze nad pas kyang shin tu smad pa yin no/ /de bas na myur du gso ba'i cho ga 'bad dam byas na gsor mi rung bar 'gyur te me nyung du bas 'bar bas khyim tshig pa dang 'dra'o/ /de bas na khyad
275b3(mdo 'grel): par du lus kyi sha bkra la thog mar slon khrus kyis lus dag par bya'o/ /sha bkra la ni sh+ri khaN+Da dang/ so ma ra dza bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/ yang na rang gi khu ba bu ram dang bcas pa blud nas/ de'i 'og tu nyams stobs ji lta ba bzhin du bsku byug bya la/ nyi ma la ji srid bzod kyi
275b4(mdo 'grel): ba rdu bzhag par bya'o/ /sbyor ba de dag zhag gsum gyi bar du bsten la/ skom dang skyes par gyur na thug pa blud do/ /de ltar nyi ma la zhag gsum bzhag pas chu skyes pa la ni tshor mas brtol la gzag bar bya'o/ /de nas so ma ra dza dang/ a sa na dang/ pri yang ku dang/ su ti dang/ 'di rnams
275b5(mdo 'grel): cho ga bzhin nang re nang re bzhin zla ba phyed kyi bar du btang ngo/ /yang rgya skyegs shing gi khu ba dang/ hwags dang sbyor ba'i chu gong ma ltar nyams stobs dang sbyar te btang ngo/ /shing pal gu dang skyu ru ra'i shing dang dug mo nyung gi shing gi shun pa btags pa so ma ra dza'i khu ba'i nang du btab
275b6(mdo 'grel): pa 'thungs pa dang/ lus dro bar 'gyur te chu bur byung na tsha ba med pa'i zas dar ba dang lhan cig bza' o/ /yang na ba gcin gyi nang du tsi tra ka dang/ tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba snod snum can gyi nad du zla ba phyed kyi bar du bzhag la de las ran par btung ngo//
275b7(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang btung ba la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad mdze nad kyi cho ga ltar bya'o/ /yang na bri ga ra dza til mar dang brdos te/ lcags snod kyi nang du bcug pa bza' zhing a sa na'i sa bon 'o ma dang bskol ba 'thungs na sha bkra 'joms so/ /yang na b+hu d+hi ka rany+dza dang/
276a1(mdo 'grel): dong ka dang arka dang/ sh+ri khaN+Ta'i shing dang/ dzA ti dang/ de rnams kyi shun pa btags pa ba gcin dang sbyar ba'i lde gus bskus na/ sha bkra dang gzhang 'brum dang/ shu ba dang/ g.yan pa dang/ 'brum bu dang/ rma 'drams pa rnams 'joms so/ /yang na tsi tra ka dang/
276a2(mdo 'grel): glang po che'i pags pa bsregs pa'i thal ba til mar dang sbyar bas bskus na sha bkra sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /yang na sbur ba nag po'i sna dang dong ka'i 'o ma dang/ lde gur byas te bskus na/ de gcig pus kyang sha bkra 'jig par byed do/ /chu bur phyir dbyung ba'i phyir
276a3(mdo 'grel): ba gcin dang nub gcig spangs te grib ma la bskams la de bzhin du lan gsum byas la/ de'i 'og tu zhib tu btags te sh+ri khaN+Ta'i 'o ma dang sbyar bas bskus na sha bkra 'joms so/ /sbrul nag po'i sha dza'u kha sbyar gyi nang du dud pa ma shor bar bsregs te/ snag
276a4(mdo 'grel): tsha 'dra bar song ba'i thal ba ba ru ra'i mar dang sbyar bas bskus na yang sha bkra 'joms so/ /de bzhin du rma bya'i mkhris pa nyi tshe 'am/ yang na ba bla ka bsregs pa'i thal a rma bya'i mkhris pa dang bsres pas bskus na sha bkra sel to/ /so ma ra dza srang bzhi dang/
276a5(mdo 'grel): ba bla srang gcig btags pa ba gcin dang sbyar ba bskus na yang sha bkra'i mdog bsgyur cing pags pa'i mdog tha mal par bskyed pa'i mchog yin no/ /glang po che'i rtug pa legs par bsregs te thal bar gyur pa dang glang po che'i gcin dang bskyos te
276a6(mdo 'grel): btsags pa srang brgya rtsa bcu gnyis dang/ de'i bcu cha gcig gi so mar dza'i phye ma btab ste bskol la ska bar gyur pa dang/ sha bkra'i pags pa'i phyi rol bzhar ba'i steng du bskus na sha bkra 'joms so/ /mdor na mdze dang pags pa'i mdog nag
276a7(mdo 'grel): po snag tsha 'dra ba dang/ thig le lta bu chags pa dang/ rma'i sha rnying pa phyir 'bur ba dang/ de rnams la thog mar bzhar la de'i 'og tu bsku byug byas na sha bkra la sogs pa 'joms so/ /go bye dang/ tsi tra/ /dang/ shing su dak+Shi ra dang/ arka'i rtsa ba dang/ 'ol
276b1(mdo 'grel): ma saM? dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ dung dang/ spangs ma dang/ lan tshwa rnam lnga dang/ thal ba rnam gnyis dang/ lang ga li dang/ 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma su dak+Shi ra dang/ arka'i 'o ma dang bskol te ska bar gyur ba dang/ lcags snod kyi nang du bcug ste/ de las thur ma dang bskus
276b2(mdo 'grel): na mdze dang/ sha bkra dang/ sme ba dang/ pags pa'i mdog snag tsha 'dra bar gyur ba dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ pag pa'i sha mdzer dang/ 'di rnams 'joms par byed do/ /mdor na sha bkra yod pa'i nad pa la ni slon khrus kyis lus dag par bya ba dang/ gtar gas khrag dbyung ba
276b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /ba ba dang/ bska ba'i zas kyis lus rtsub pa dang/ phye'i zas rnams bsten to/ /gal te de dag sdig pa zas pa lta na sos pa srid kyi de lta ma yin na ni gso dka' o/ /de nas srin bu gso ba bshad do/ de la khong pa'i srin bu bad kan las gyur pa la ni thog mar snum btsos dang
276b4(mdo 'grel): dugs byas la/ bu ram dang 'o ma dang sbyar ba btung ba 'am/ yang na nya sha la sogs pa bza' ste/ nub mo bde bar bsnyal la srin bu kun rang gi gnas las byung bas/ zas mngar bag can la 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu byi'u rug pa'i sde tshan ba gcin dang chu dang bskol
276b5(mdo 'grel): ba de'i nang du pi pi ling dang/ bo son cha dang/ bi dang ga dang/ pra rtsi ka'i thal ba dang/ 'di rnams phye mar byas la til mar dang sbyar nas bkru sman drag po mas btang bar bya'o/ /de ltar ni ru ha mas btang ba'i rdzas las bkru sman btang bar bya ste/ tra bi ti dang/ po son cha dang/ pi pi
276b6(mdo 'grel): ling dang/ 'di gsum gyi phye ma byi'u rug pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i nang du btab la blud do/ /khor ba'i nang dag par bya'o/ /de ltar slon khrus byas pa'i rjes la tsha ba lnga btab pa'i 'bras thug sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas sman tsha ba dang/ ba ba bskal ba'i chus lus la blugs par bya'o//
276b7(mdo 'grel): slon khrus kyis lus dag par byas nas/ bi dang ka'i mar gyi 'jam rtsi mas btang bar bya'o/ /mgo bo'i srin bu la ni mgo khrus kyi sman du bshad pa btang bar bya'o/ /bza' ba ni shin tu tsha ba dang/ kha ba dang snum cung zad dang bcas pa sbyin no/ /de nas dar ba las gzhi blangs pa'i
277a1(mdo 'grel): thug pa'i steng du/ bi dang ga dang/ pi pi ling dang/ na le sham dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ na le sham dkar po dang/ sra tsi ka'i thal ba rnams kyi phye mas btab pa blud par bya'o/ /yang na sh+riM sha ka dang/ ki ni hi dang/ pa ri pra ta ka dang/ ke b+hu ka dang/
277a2(mdo 'grel): ba la sha ri sa bon dang/ mardzu ra dang/ pu ti ka dang/ 'di rnams gang yang rung ba bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba blud do/ /yang na bye'u rug pa'i sde tshan las sman gang yang rung ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sde gu ldag par bya'o/ /yang na bye'u rug pa'i sde tshan dang/ tri
277a3(mdo 'grel): bi rtsa'i phye ma dang bi dang ga dang chu dang bskol ba'i nang du btab pa blud do/ /srin bu can la gong gi sde tshan gyi sman dang/ tri bi rtsa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba bldag pa 'am/ yang na 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba'i nang du bye'u rug pa'i sde tshan dang/ tri bi ta btags pa'i
277a4(mdo 'grel): phye mas btab pa blud do/ /mgo bo'i srin bu la ni rta rtug btsir ba'i khu ba dang/ bye'u rug pa'i sde tshan las sman gang yang rung ba dang/ tri bi ta'i phye mas btab pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang srin bu'i nang kun la dra ban+ti'i ge sar legs par btags
277a5(mdo 'grel): la bag phye dang bsres la btsos pa'i snum khur bza' bar bya'o/ /de nas 'bras kyi skyur po 'am tshwa blud do/ /yang na tsha ba lnga dang/ lan tshwa btab pa'i dar ba ming sla tsam sbyin no/ /yang na sman a ba marga dang/ ni rgun tha'i lo ma btags la bag phye dang bsres la
277a6(mdo 'grel): btsos pa'i snum khur bza' o/ /btung ba ni gong ma dang 'dra yang na bi dang ka'i phye ma dang/ bag phye bsres pa'i snum khur bza' o/ /yang na bi dang ga shun pa bor ba'i nang gi 'bru btags la/ ba la ka'i mar dang cha bsnyams te bsres la phyed ni kha nas btung/ phyed
277a7(mdo 'grel): 'jam rtsi thabs su mas btang la nyi ma tsha ba la 'der gzhug go /yang na sar la dang/ thang shing gi mar cha bsnyams la bsregs te gong ma'i cho ga bzhin bya'o/ /bshad pa 'am mi gcing ba'i nang du skyes pa'i srin bu la ni khrus dang 'jam rtsi btang ba la 'dar ba
277b1(mdo 'grel): ba med do/ /nges par btang bar bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i srin bu la ni mgo bkrus pa'i sman dang smon dang khong du zhi ba'i sman btang ngo/ /khrag las gyur pa'i srin bu la ni mdze nad gso ba'i cho ga ltar bya'o/ /khrag las gyur pa'i srin bu dang/ skra rtsa za bar byed pa'i srin bu ni
277b2(mdo 'grel): in+d+ra pupta? zhes bya ba mgo gso ba'i cho ga 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin gso'o/ /rnag las skyes pa'i srin bu la ni rma 'drams pa'i dpyad 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin bya'o/ /srin bu yod pa rnams kyis kha zas 'di dag spang bar bya ste/ 'o ma dang/ sha dang mar dang/ bu ram dang
277b3(mdo 'grel): zho dang/ rdo rngad kyi tshod ma dang/ 'di rnams mi bza' ste/ mdor na mngar ba dang/ skyur ba rnams spang bar bya'o/ /gso ba'i gnas las sha bkra dang srin bu'i nang gso ba'i le'u nyi shu pa rdzogs so// //de nas rlung nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /de la rlung nad 'ba' zhig
277b4(mdo 'grel): bad kan dang/ mkhris pa ma 'dres pa la ni tshil dang/ mar dang/ rkang dang/ til mar te bzhi po de dag las btung ba la sogs pa'i snum btsos sbyar ro/ /de nas rlung nad can gyi nad pa de khong snum gyis zhen par gyur nas bar der mngal bsos la de'i 'og tu snum chen
277b5(mdo 'grel): po bzhi 'o ma dang lhan cig sbyar te snum btsos su bya ba dang/ de bzhin du grong dang thang dang/ chu la gnas pa'i srog chags kyi sha khu gang yang rung ba snum chen po bzhi dang sbyar ba btang ba dang/ gzhan yang 'bras kyi 'o thug dang/ kri sa ra skyur dang/ lan tsha dang ldan par btung
277b6(mdo 'grel): zhing de'i 'og tu snum dang ldan pa'i 'jam rtsi mas btang ngo/ /sna sman dang skyo ma dang/ kha zas rnams kyang snum dang sbyar ba sbyin no/ /de ltar khong snum gyis zhen par gyur na/ snum chen po bzhi btang zhing gding ba'i dugs la sogs pa yan lag brgyad pa bsdus pa
277b7(mdo 'grel): las 'byung ba rnams 'dir sbyar ro/ rlung nad kyis lus yang yang por gyur pa dang/ rengs pa dang/ nad dang bcas shing zug pa la yang snum dang bcas pa'i dugs byas na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du lus kyi bya ba nus par 'gyur te/ ji ltar shing skam po yang dugs dang
278a1(mdo 'grel): snum la sogs pa'i cho ga byas na/ cing gar mnga' la sogs pa byar yod na/ lus can rnams la smos kyang ci dgos/ de ltar dugs byas pa'i yon tan ni ba spu langs pa dang/ na ba dang zug gzer che ba dang/ rtsol ba mang ba dang/ lus skem pa
278a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ rengs pa la sogs pa myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing lus sha mnyen par 'gyur/ rlung na ba'i nad pa la snum bcos sbyar ba'i yon tan ni/ dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams myur du 'phel zhing lus kyi nyams stobs dang/ me'i drod 'phel
278a3(mdo 'grel): zhing 'tsho ba yang yun ring du gnas par byed do/ /de ltar rlung nad can gyi skyes bu la lan cig ma yin par phogs mang du snum bcos dang dugs yang dang yang byas na/ khong snum zhing 'jam par 'gyur te/ rlung nad gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te snum
278a4(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa gong ma'i sbyor ba de dag gis ma zhin ni nges par nad gzhan dang 'dres pa yin te/ de nas bkru sman 'jam po snum dang bcas pa btang te/ de yang seng phrom dang/ sa ta la gang yang rung ba mar dang bskol ba blud pa 'am/ yang na e raN+Ta'i mar
278a5(mdo 'grel): 'o ma dang bskol ba blud na/ nad 'phrog cing zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /snum pa dang/ skyur ba dang/ dro ba dang/ lan tsha la sogs pas dri ma gsogs zhing rtsa rgyun 'gags te/ rlung tshul bzhin mi 'byung ba la ni bkru sman btang na/ rlung lugs bzhin 'byung ngo/ /skyes bu
278a6(mdo 'grel): rlung nad can nyams stobs chung zhing bkru sman btang bar mi 'os pa la ni drod skyed pa dang/ smin pa'i zas dang bcas pa'i ni ru hams btang ba 'am/ yang na drod skyed pa dang/ smin pa'i sman dang/ zas lhan cig btang ngo/ /de ltar slon khrus byas pa'i 'og
278a7(mdo 'grel): tu me drod tshabs cher skyes par gyur pa la yang snum bcos dang dugs bya'o/ /skyugs sman byas pa'i 'og tu thug pa la sogs pa'i rim pa ma byas par kha zas ran par zos pas pho ba'i nang du rlung zhugs pa la ni mdze nad kyi skabs su bshad pa'i sman
278b1(mdo 'grel): drug pa'i phye ma 'am/ yang na shu dag gi sde tshan gyi phye ma gang yang rung ba chu dro 'jam tsam dang sbyar ba blud do/ /thug pa la sogs pa'i rim pa byas pas me drod shas cher skyes pa la ni rlung nad nyi tshe'i cho ga bzhin bya'o/ /lte ba'i phyogs su rlung zhugs pa la ni bilpa gzhon
278b2(mdo 'grel): nu dang/ nya sh+ra g.yos su byas pa sbyin no/ /lte ba'i 'og tu khu ba'i gnas su rlung zhugs pa la ni/ 'jam rtsi'i las byas na rab tu bsngags so/ /yang na dang po mar ram til mar 'thungs la/ de'i 'og tu zas zos na phan no/ /khong pa'i nang du rlung zhugs pa la ni thal sman dang
278b3(mdo 'grel): phye ma la sogs pa drod skyed cing smin par byed pa'i sman bsten na phan no/ /snying gi nang du rlung zhugs pa la ni sa la par ni 'o ma dang sbyar ba blud do/ /mgo bo'i nang du rlung zhugs pa la ni sna nas sman na ra btang ngo/ /de bzhin du snum dang bcas pa'i sna sman dang/ dud pa
278b4(mdo 'grel): rdug pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /rna ba la sogs pa gzhan rnams la rlung zhugs na yang so so dang mthun pa'i sman sbyar na phan no/ /rlung nad pags pa la bsten pa la ni dugs dang bsku byug dang rlung med pa'i gnas su 'dug pa dang/ zas yi gar 'ong ba bsten na phan no//
278b5(mdo 'grel): rlung nad khrag la gnas pa la ni bsil ba'i byug pa byug pa dang/ bkru sman khrag dbyung ba rnams byas na phan no/ /rlung sha dang tshil la bsten pa la ni bkru sman byas na phan te/ de bzhin du ni ru ha dang zhi ba'i sman rnams byas na phan no/ /rlung rus pa dang rkang la gnas pa
278b6(mdo 'grel): la ni phyi nang gnyi ga la snum bcos byas na rgyal bar byed do/ /rlung khu chu la gnas pa la ni sen sa dga' bar bya ba dang/ nyams stobs skyed cis bu chu 'phel bar bya ba'i zas bsten na phan no/ /rlung gi kha chu 'gags nye 'byung du ma ster ba lta na ni bkru sman byin na phan
278b7(mdo 'grel): te/ de'i 'og tu bza' ba la sogs pa'i rim pa gong du smos pa ltar byas na phan no/ /rlung khu chu la gnas par gyur na khu tsha yang sha skem par 'gyur ro/ /de sha skem pa'i bu la ni kha ra dkar po dang/ tam pa la dang/ shing mngar rnams 'o ma dang sbyar ba blud na sha skye
279a1(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung rgyus pa dang tshigs dang rtsa rnams su zhugs pa la ni snum pa dang tsha ba'i sman bsten pa dang/ chu lums kyi dugs bya'o/ /rlung gis yan lag 'khums pa la ni mon sran gre'u dang rgya tsha til mar dang sbyar bas bskus na
279a2(mdo 'grel): phan no/ /khrag phyung bas lus skyes te bem bem por gyur cing tshor ba med pa la ni/ khyim gyi dud pa dang/ lan tsha dang/ til mar dang sbyar bas bskus na phan no/ /tshor ba dang bcas pa yin na ni chu lums kyis dugs bya'o/ /a pa ta na rang dbang can zhes bya
279a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i rlung nad yod de/ de'i mtshan nyid ni mig 'gul mi shes bskyod mi nus shing 'dod pa'i rtsol ba mi shes la khu chu mi 'byung ba rnams yin te/ de la ni myur du gso bor bya ste/ thogs mar dugs dang snum bcos byas la/ de'i 'og tu mgo khrus kyis sna
279a4(mdo 'grel): sman rnon po btang ngo/ /de nas bi da ri'i sde tshan bskol ba dang/ zho dang 'o ma dang sha khu dang mar cha bsnyams te bskol la mar lus te 'dug pa blud do/ /de nas thug pa rkyang rkyang po la sogs pa rim gyis byin na rlung gis khyab par 'gyur te/ de ma thag phan no/ /
279a5(mdo 'grel): rgya sran dang/ nas dang/ rgya shug dang rlung 'joms pa'i sman thang shing gi sde tshan la sogs pa dang skam gsher gnyis ka na gnas pa'i sha dang lhan cig bskol te bzhi cha lus pa'i nang du rang skyur dang/ 'o ma dang mngar ba'i sde tshan gyi phye ma dang/ nu ma chen
279a6(mdo 'grel): po bzhi bcug ste bskol la snum lus pa dang/ de las blugs pa dang bsku byug dang lus gzhug pa dang bza' ba dang btung ba dang/ rnar blugs pa dang 'dzam rtsi la sogs pa byas na/ rlung nad 'joms par byed do/ /de dag la sogs pa snum bcos dang
279a7(mdo 'grel): dugs kyi cho ga'i nang nas 'byung ba'i rlung la phan pa rnams 'dir sbyar ro/ /de la a pa ta ra ka zhes bya ba rlung nad kyis nyams thag pa'i skyes bu la ni mgo khrus kyi sna sman lan mang du yang dang yang du bya ste/ de yang bad kan sel cing rno ba'i sman gyis
279b1(mdo 'grel): spu gu nas 'bud pa 'am/ yang na sman gyi phur ma sna sgo nas btsir zhing blugs na/ rlung legs par spubs su rgyu zhing de bzhin du 'du shes rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /kha ru tsha dang/ a ru ra dang tsha ba gsum mar dang bskol te byin na rlung shas che ba la phan no/ /yang seng phrom
279b2(mdo 'grel): dang 'bras bu gsum srang brgyad dang/ rtsa ba chen po lnga srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ e raN+Ta dang/ bri hi da dang/ du rbid srang re re dang/ chu srang lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis dang bskol te/ bzhi cha lus pa'i nang du no srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/ bilpa
279b3(mdo 'grel): srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang yang bskol te/ mar 'ba' zhig lus pa las ran par bsten na/ rlung nad ma rungs pa dang/ yan lag thams cad la gnas pa dang/ mo mtshan gyi nad dang/ rgyu rlugs kyi nad dang sgran dang/ dmu rdzing rnams sel bar byed do/ /gong du gseng phrom
279b4(mdo 'grel): gyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du ram mya ka dang/ a sho ka yang bkru sman gyi don 'dir sbyar ro/ /gso ba de dag ni rlung nad a pa na ta ka gzhan dbang can nyi tshe la sbyor ba yin no/ /a pa tan ka zhes pa'i rlung nad bad kan dang ma zhu ba dang mkhris pa dang 'dres pa yin na yang gso ba de
279b5(mdo 'grel): ltar bya ste/ de yang rlung de bad kan dang bcas shing snying dang rtsib logs na bar gyur pa la ni g.yer ma dang/ a ru ra dang/ shing kun dang/ ma nu dang/ lan tsha rnam gsum brtags pa'i phye ma nas bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba btung ba 'am yang na shing kun dang bca' sga kha ru
279b6(mdo 'grel): tsha dang/ se'u 'bru dang/ star bu dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma nas bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ sbyar ba 'thungs na phan no/ /bad kan dang rlung 'joms pa'i gso ba snying nad kyi skabs su bshad pa 'dir sbyar na rab tu bsngags so/ /da rgan? zhes bya ba'i rlung nad lus nang du gug pa dang/ phyir dgye ba
279b7(mdo 'grel): rnam gnyis yod de/ de la ni glang po gzhog phyed na ba'i gso ba ji lta ba bzhin du bya ste/ de bzhin du shing sgrom bu ram gyis bkang ste/ lus bcing bar bya'o/ /da rgan gyi rlung nad mang du zhugs pa ni gso dka' / gzhu ltar rengs pa'i da rgan zhes bya ba'i nad yod de de'i mtshan nyid ni so so'i
280a1(mdo 'grel): mdog 'gyur zhing gdong dang yan lag rnams zhig pa dang dran pa nyams pa dang rdul rtag tu 'byung ba yin te/ de ni zhag bcu las mi 'tsho ste/ gzhan du na shugs zhan cing 'tsho ba lta na yang lus gzhu ltar rgu ba dang/ glen pa dang 'thang ba dang/ lag pa zha ba
280a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang/ 'phye bo dang/ dbang po ma tshang ba la sogs pa rnams su 'gyur ro/ /'bram pa rang gi gnas nas nyams pa zhes bya ba'i rlung nad yod de/ de la ni snum bcos dang dugs bya ste/ de'i 'og tu snum sman pa mkhas pas gzhug par bya'o/ /kosko phyir 'byung ba 'am
280a3(mdo 'grel): nang du zhugs par gyur na yang de bzhin du chud par gzhug go /rlung nad kyis lce ldib ste smra mi nus pa la ni rlung nad kyi gso ba byas pa bzhin du bya'o/ /rlung nad klad pa gzhogs phyed na ba la ni mgo til mar gyis bsku zhing rna ba dang mig brta bar bya'o/ /klad pa gzhogs phyer skrang ba
280a4(mdo 'grel): yin na ni skyug sman btang ngo/ /tsha ba che zhing dmar la nyams stobs yod na ni gtar kas khrag dbyung ngo/ /rlung gzhogs phyed na ba zhes bya ba'i nad yod de/ de la ni thog mar snum chos bya ste snum dang ldan pa'i bkru sman bya'o/ /dpung ba 'jam pa zhes bya ba'i rlung nad la ni sna sman btang
280a5(mdo 'grel): zhing ma zhu ba med pa yin na zas kyi khong du snum bag sbyin no/ /brla rengs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung nad la ni/ snum tshos dang/ slon khrus dang lus dag par bya ba'i cho ga mi phan te/ phal cher bad kan dang tshil dang ma zhu ba las gyur pa yin te/ de la ni rtsub pa dang ldan pa'i tshogs
280a6(mdo 'grel): bad kan zad par bya ste/ de yang bza' ba ni nas dang/ khre yang khre rgod rnams bsngags so/ /tshod ma ni lan tsha dang 'bru mar nyung zad bcas pa 'am/ yang na srog chags thang las skyes pa'i sha khu mar dang mi ldan pa'i tshod ma'ang mi'i zas dang lhan cig zos na rab tu bsngags so/ /rlung nad
280a7(mdo 'grel): brla rengs pa zhes bya ba phyug po'i nad la ni dug mo yungs kyi sde tshan nas/ shu dag gi sde tshan gang yang rung ba bskol ba lan tsha dang bcas pa dro 'jam tsam nyi tshe blung pa 'am/ yang na mdze nad kyi skabs su bshad pa'i sman drug pa'i phye mas btab pa blud do/ /yang na 'dras bu gsum
280b1(mdo 'grel): dang dbyi mo dang/ bu tse shel dang/ pi pi ling dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/ yang na dbyi mo dang/ a ru ra dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ thang shing btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba bldag par bya'o/ /a ru ra dang/ gu gul dang khrag zhun gang yang rung ba ba gcin dang
280b2(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba btung bar bstan to/ /tsha ba gsum dang tsi tra ka dang/ gla sgang dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ bi dang ga dang/ dgu po de dang spyi dang mnyam pa'i gu gul rnams lhan cig btags pa'i phye ma zos na/ brla rengs pa'i nod tshil dang bad kan ma zhu ba las gyur pa dang/ rlung thams cad las
280b3(mdo 'grel): rgyal bar byed do/ /gong du smos pa'i sbyor ba de dag gis bad kan dang tshil du bcas pa'i rlung nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin no/ /brla rengs pa'i nad la ni/ thal sman ba gcin dang sbyar bas dugs dang blugs pa dang dril ba rnams bya'o/ /bad kan pags pa'i phyir byung ba la ni/ yungs
280b4(mdo 'grel): kar dang ka rany+dza'i 'bras bu ba gcin dang sbyar bas bskus na phan no/ /arka dang/ agni man+tha dang/ nim+ba dang/ de rnams kyi rtsa ba dang/ thang shing dang/ yungs kar dang/ bong ba bsregs pa dang/ grog mo'i sa phur dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus bskus na phan no/ /brla?
280b5(mdo 'grel): rengs ba'i nad kyis btab pa'i nad pa des bad kan zad par bya ba'i phyir lus kyi rtsol ba dang ngal ba'i las bstan to/ /de bzhin du thang la mchong ba dang/ ci nus kyi bud med la nyal po bsten par bya'o/ /de bzhin du mtsho mi g.yo ba la bde bar 'jug pa dang/ chu bo rgyun las zlog ste rgal du
280b6(mdo 'grel): gzhug go /de ltar sbyor ba de dag gis bad kan dang tshil zad par byas pa'i 'og tu/ rlung la phan pa'i sman snum la sogs pa sbyar bar bya'o/ rlung nad lhag ma krita la sogs pa rkang pa yan chad la gnas pa la yang nyams stobs dang/ dus kyi bye brag dang/ gang na yod pa btags
280b7(mdo 'grel): te/ gong du smos pa'i gso ba bzhin du bya'o/ /sa ha ra tsa dang/ thang shing dang/ dong kre dang/ de rnams kyi phye mar byas pa til mar dang sbyar ba 'thungs na/ rlung gis lus gzir te 'gro mi nus pa yang de ma thag thogs pa med par 'gro nus par 'gyur ro/ /ra sna dang/ dong kre dang/ tsi tra ka
281a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ pi pi ling dang/ zur ba dang/ ma nu dang/ 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma mar dang sbyar ba 'thungs na rlung nang 'doms pa'i mchog yin no/ /nimpa dang/ sle tres dang/ ba sha ka dang/ pa to la dang/ kaN+Ta ka ri 'di rnams srang bcu bcu chu srang lnga brgya rtsa
281a2(mdo 'grel): bcu gnyis dang bskol te/ khu ba brgyad cha lus pa'i nang du mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ pa tha dang/ bi dang ga dang/ thang shing dang/ ha sti pi pi ling dang/ dong kra dang/ skyer pa dang/ shu ti dang/ dbyi mo dang/ ru rta dang/ te dzo ba ti dang/ na le sham dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ tingmu sa dang/
281a3(mdo 'grel): kru trug tres dang/ pu tse shel dang/ go bye dang/ shu dag dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ btsod dang/ bong nga dkar po dang/ bong nga ser po dang/ la la pud dang/ sman 'di rnams zho gnyis dang/ yungs ma'i sa bon phub ma dang/ phral ba srang lnga dang/ 'di rnams btags pa'i
281a4(mdo 'grel): phye ma btab te/ yang bskol la mar 'ba' zhig lus pa las ran par 'thungs na/ rlung nang chen po rus tshigs dang rkang rnams su zhugs pa yang zlog par byed de/ de bzhin du mdze nad rus pa dang/ rkang rnams su zhugs pa la yang phan no/ /gzhan yang rma'i spubs 'drams pa
281a5(mdo 'grel): dang lba ba dang/ mtshan bar rdol ba dang/ 'bras kyi phreng ba dang/ nang tshod yan chad kyi nad thams cad dang/ skran dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ gcin nad dang/ gcong chen po dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ sna chu 'dzag pa dang/ lud pa dang/ skrangs pa dang/ snying nad
281a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ skya rbab dang/ myos pa dang/ khong 'bras dang/ rlung nad dang/ khrag nad rnams sel to/ /rlung mgar zhugs pa la ni bilba gzhon nu dang/ 'o ma bskol ba'i khu ba mar gyi snying khu dang yang bskol ba'i mar las srang phyed tsam snar blugs na phan no/ /yang na bil ba gzhon nu dang/
281a7(mdo 'grel): 'o ma bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du chu srin nag kra dang/ nya dang rus sbal dang/ 'ug pa dang/ de rnams gang yang rung ba'i zhag dang yang bskol la/ zhag lus pa las srang phyed ngam srang cig snar blugs na/ khyad par du rlung nye tshe sel bar byed do/ /til gyi tshigs ma rnying ba dang rtsa ba
281b1(mdo 'grel): chen po lnga so sor bskol la/ de nas gcig tu bsres pa'i nang du 'bru mar dang/ de'i brgyad 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang yang bskol te/ mar 'ba' zhig lus pa las ran par 'thungs na/ khyad par du rlung nad dang/ bad kan dang bcas pa 'joms so/ /sman bras ra ri srang brgya bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du
281b2(mdo 'grel): mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ 'o ma de dang mnyam pa dang me d+ha rnam gnyis dang/ sha ta puShpra dang/ btsod dang/ ru rta dang/ rwa sna dang tsan dan dmar po dang/ dzi ba ka dang/ zangs rtsi ba dang/ ram nye ba rnam gnyis dang/ thang shing dang/ sman 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma btab ste yang bskol te
281b3(mdo 'grel): mar lus pa las ran par 'thungs na rlung nad thams cad 'jig par byed do/ /sa ha tsa ra'i tsa ba dang/ yal ga dang bcas pa srang brgyad dang/ de dang mnyam pa'i rtsa ba bcu pa dang/ nye'u shing srang lnga bcu tham pa dang/ chu srang nyis stong bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bskol te/ bzhi cha srang lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis
281b4(mdo 'grel): lus pa'i nang du dbyi mo dang/ chu srin sen mo dang/ ru rta dang/ tsan dan dang/ sug smel dang/ gur kum dang/ pri yaM ku dang/ na li ka dang ba li ka dang/ rdo dreg dang/ btsod dang/ spang spos dang/ a ka ru dang/ thang shing dang/ tsan+d+ra dang/ sha ti dang/ du ru ka dang/ rgya spos dang/ 'di rnams srang re re btags
281b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i phye ma dang/ gong gi sman khu dang mnyams pa'i ra'i 'o ma dang/ til mar de dang mnyam pa rnams lhan cig bskol te/ mar 'ba' zhig lus pa las ran par 'thungs na rlung nad gso ba yang 'jig par byed de/ gzhan yang rlung gis 'dar ba dang/ sha 'gul ba dang/ lus rengs pa dang/ skem
281b6(mdo 'grel): byed la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i rlung nad dang/ skran dang/ smyo byed dang/ cham pas btab pa dang/ mo mtshan gyi nad rnams 'joms par byed do/ /ha sa tsar srang brgya bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du til mar srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ 'o ma til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang/ sa ha tsa ra'i rtsa ba srang bcu'i phye
281b7(mdo 'grel): ma dang/ yang na sa ha tsar med na rgya spos dang/ shu dag dang/ sa la par ni dang/ ru rta dang/ thang shing dang/ sug smel dang/ rdo dreg dang/ spang spos dang/ shu ti dang/ tsan dan dmar po dang 'di rnams srang re re'i phye ma btab ste bskol ba'i nang du sha kha ra srang bco brgyad bcug pa ni drang srong
282a1(mdo 'grel): gzings can gyi sman mar zhes bya ste/ de las ran par 'thungs na rlung nad gso dka' ba dang/ rlung nad khong du 'khyil ba dang/ smyo byed dang/ skran dang/ rlig rlugs las rgyal bar byed do/ /ba bla srang brgya dang/ sle tres srang nyi shu rtsa lnga dang/ ra sna srang
282a2(mdo 'grel): phyed dang bcu gsum chu srang khri nyis stong brgyad brgya dang bskol te/ brgya cha gcig srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad lus pa'i nang du zho dang/ zho ga chu dang/ bu ram shing gi khu ba dang/ tshwa dang til mar dang de rnams srang re re yang srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad brgyad dang/ ra'i 'o ma srang
282a3(mdo 'grel): drug cu rtsa bzhi dang/ zur pa dkar po dang/ ko nyen che dang/ skyer ba dang/ sug smel dang/ btsod dang/ a ga ru dang/ tsan dan dang/ shug pa dang/ a ti ba la dang gla sgang dang/ mung+ga'i lo ma dang/ ha re nu ga dang/ shing mngar dang/ bye'u rug pa dang/ bya khran kha zhes bya ba rgya mtsho
282a4(mdo 'grel): nas byung ba'i chu srin sen mo dang/ zangs rtsi ba dang/ dzi ba ka dang/ rgya skyegs shing dang/ bo la dang gla rtsi dang/ na li ka/ zhes bya ba ka po ta tsa ra na dang/ dza ti pa ta dang/ b+hugsug? wa dang/ gur kum dang/ rdo dreg dang/ dza ti pha la dang/ katpa la dang/ ba la dang shing tshwa dang/
282a5(mdo 'grel): pog dkar po dang/ ga phur dang/ tu rus ka dang/ shi ni ba sa ka dang/ li shi dang/ chu srin sen mo dang/ ka ko la dang/ ru rta dang/ spang spos dang/ pri yang ku dang/ sto ni ya dang/ rgya spos dang/ bya ma ka dang/ shu dag dang/ dman gan dang/ sla ba zhes bya ba gu tran+na Ta dang/
282a6(mdo 'grel): nA ga ge sar dang/ 'di rnams srang re re btags la btab ste yang bskol la phyir byung ste tshig ma bor ba'i nang du gnad pa tra btags pa'i phye ma btab ste cho ga bzhin sbyar te sbyin na/ lud pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ rims dang/ brgyal ba dang skyug pa
282a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ skran dang/ zad byed dang/ glo 'drams pa dang/ mcher ba na ba dang/ skem byed dang/ brjed byed dang/ bkra mi shis pa rnams 'jig par byed de/ 'di ni ba la'i til mar bzang po zhes bya ba yin te/ rlung nad 'joms par byed do/ /gong du bstan pa'i
282b1(mdo 'grel): sman? mar de dag gis btung ba dang/ sna sman dang/ bsku byug rnams dus su legs par snum tshos byas na/ rlung nad ma rungs pa rnams myur du zhi bar byed cing bud med bu med pa yang bu skyed par byed do/ /gang gi tshe bad kan dang mkhris pa smin pa'i gnas na
282b2(mdo 'grel): 'dug pa las gang gi snum bcos dang/ dugs la sogs pa byas pas cung zhig snyi ba 'am sla bar gyur pa lta na yang 'jam rtsis zhi bar bya'o/ /gso ba'i gnas la rlung nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// //de nas
282b3(mdo 'grel): dreg nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ de la dregs nad can gyi nad pas thog mar snum bcos byas la rlung bsrung zhing khrag nyung ngu nyung ngu dbyung ngo/ /gzhan du na nad gzhi'i stobs dang/ nyams stobs che chung brtags te lan mang du dbyung ngo/ /de la dreg
282b4(mdo 'grel): nad na zhing mdog dmar ba la ni/ srin bu pad+mas khrag dbyung ngo/ /dreg nad can gyi lus bem bem por song zhing lus g.ya' ba dang/ na zhing tsha ba che ba la ni/ rwa dang sku bas khrag dbyung bar bya'o/ /phyogs kun du gnas 'pho zhing na pa la ni rtsa nas khrag gtar
282b5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ zhal zhal thabs su khrag dbyung bar bya'o/ /phyogs kun du gnas 'pho zhing na ba la ni rtsa nas khrag gtar ba dang/ lus na zhing rlung shas che ste lus rtsub pa la ni khrag dbyung du mi rung ngo/ /gal te de lta bu la gtar ka byas na/ khrag zad de rlung
282b6(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs nas zab tu skrang ba dang/ lus rengs pa dang/ 'dar bu dang/ chu ba dang rtsa rnams la nad 'byung zhing lus dri ma dang bcas la nad gzhan rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la thog mar snum chos bya ste de'i 'og tu snum dang ldan pa'i khrus bya'o//
282b7(mdo 'grel): rlung shas che ba'i dreg nad la ni mar snying ba btang ngo/ /sra ba zhes bya ba shing sha ra ka dang/ k+Shir ka ko la dang/ pa yassya dang/ dzi ba ka dang/ zangs rtsi ba dang/ 'di rnams cha bsnyams te btags pa'i phye ma mar dang/ 'o ma dang lhan cig bskol te/ de las ran
283a1(mdo 'grel): par 'thungs na dreg nad thams cad 'joms so/ /rgun 'brum dang ma du ka bskol pa'i khu ba'i nang du mar dang/ kha ra dkar pos btab ste bskol ba'i mar btung ba 'am/ de bzhin du 'o ma dang sle tres kyi khu ba'i nang du mar dang
283a2(mdo 'grel): sha kha ras btab ste bskol ba'i mar yang btung ngo/ /yang na til mar dang/ li kha ras bsres pa blud do/ /ba la dang nye'u shing dang rwa sna dang/ ba lu dang rtsa ba bcu pa dang/ dur byid dang/ e raN+Ta dang de rnams 'o ma dang tshul bzhin bskol ba blud na/
