283a3(mdo 'grel): rlung gis nyam thag pa 'joms so/ /yang na 'o ma bzhos ma thag pa dron po ba gcin dang bsres pa blud na nad gzhi'i lugs bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mkhris pa shas che ba'i dreg nad la ni nye'u shing dang/ pu tse shel dang/ pa to la'i rtsa ba dang/
283a4(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu gsum dang/ sle tres dang 'di rnams sam yang na sman kha ba dang mngar ba rnams dang 'di rnams gang yang rung ba mar ram 'o ma gang 'byor pa dang bskol ba 'thungs na phan no/ /dreg nad gzhi shas che ba la ni 'o ma dang e raN+Ta sbyar ba'i
283a5(mdo 'grel): bkru sman btang ngo/ /de zhu ba'i tshod tsam na 'bras dang 'o ma lhan cig bza' o/ /yang na a ru ra bskol te mar dang brngos pa btung ngo/ /yang na tri bin gyi phye ma rgun chu 'am lo ma gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba blud do/ /yang na dreg nad can gyi nad pa
283a6(mdo 'grel): la ni 'o ma'i 'jam rtsi mar dang/ bcas pa btang ste dri ma sbyang bar bya'o/ /gang gi phyir dreg nad la ni 'dram rtsi mas btang ba las lhag pa med de khyad par du gzhang dang rtsib logs dang/ rus tshigs dang dmu rdzing gis nyam thag pa rnams la
283a7(mdo 'grel): phan no/ /bad kan shas che ba'i dreg nad la ni gla sgang dang/ rgun 'brum dang/ skyer ba dang/ 'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/ yang na sle tres bskol ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang
283b1(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba blud na phan no/ /bad kan gyi dreg nad can la ni thog mar ji ltar 'os par snum chos byas la skyug sman btang ste/ de'i 'og tu 'jam chos dang rtsub chos gang rigs par bya'o/ /'bras bu gsum dang tshwa ba gsum dang pa to la dang/ shing tsha dang/ cu gang
283b2(mdo 'grel): dang tsi tra ka dang shu dag dang/ pi dang ga dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ spang spos dang/ ba sha ka'i shun lpags dang ri d+hi dang/ lang gi la dang/ dbyi mo dang/ 'di rnams cha bsnyams pa'i phye ma dang lde gur byas te lcags snod kyi nang du bcug la nub gcig
283b3(mdo 'grel): bzhag ste/ phye de nyi ma phyed tsam na de las ran par zos na dreg nad nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa dang/ zug gzer shin tu tshabs che ba la phan no/ /ko ki la k+Sha zhes bya ba bskol ba'i khu ba btud zhing de nyid kyi tshod ma dang lhan cig zas zos na dreg nad
283b4(mdo 'grel): 'jil bar byed de/ ji ltar snying rje la goms pas khro ba sel ba bzhin no/ /rtsa ba chen po lnga dang/ skyu ru ra'i khu ba le li ta ka'i zhag dang lhan cig 'thung zhing tshangs par spyod na/ lus la dreg nad gting zug pa las rgyal bar byed do/ /gong du bstan
283b5(mdo 'grel): pa de dag ni nad gi gso ba bstan pa yin la/ de ni phyi rol gyi dreg gi gso ba bshad par bya ste/ de yang skyur tshabs brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ til mar dang/ de'i bzhi cha'i sra rtsi pog dang chu mang du bskol te de las ran par 'thungs na rims dang
283b6(mdo 'grel): tshwa bas nyam thag pa rnams 'jig par byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /yang na til mar btsong dang sbra tshil dang bcas pa gong bur byas pa 'am/ sra rtsi bog dang thal tres dang til mar gong bur byas pas lus la bskus na dreg nad 'joms so/ /rtsa ba bcu
283b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ 'o ma lhan cig bskol ba 'am/ yang na mar dang chu dron po lhan cig sbyar te blugs pa byas na rlung shas che ba'i dreg nad de ma thag 'joms par byed do/ /lus rengs pa dang brkyang bskum byed 'dod pa dang na bas nyam thag pa la ni snum
284a1(mdo 'grel): bzhi po sman mngar ba dang sbyar te blugs pa byas na phan no/ /lus tshan ni grang mo'i rgyun blugs so/ /ba'i 'o ma dang lug gi 'o ma dang ra'i 'o ma til dang bsres pa 'am/ yang na 'tsho byed sde bcu bskol ba 'am/ rtsa ba chung ngu  
284a2(mdo 'grel): lnga bskol ba'i blugs pa yang rab tu phan no/ /blugs pa'i ched du rgun chu dang/ bu ram shing gi khu ba dang/ chang dang/ zho kha chu dang tsab mo skyur po dang/ 'bras bkrus pa'i chu dang/ sbrang rtsi'i chu dang/ sha kha ra'i chu 'di gang yang rung ba blugs na
284a3(mdo 'grel): dreg nad tsha ba che ba la bsngags so/ /bud med snying du sdug cing snyan par smra ba lag pa dang nu ma tsan dan gyi lde gus bskus pas thang sbyar na lus tsha zhing na ba dang dub ba sel te bsil zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/ /dreg mdog dmar nad dang bcas la tsha
284a4(mdo 'grel): ba dang ldan pa la mkhrig phyung la lde gus bskus te de yang bra puN+Ta rI ka dang/ btsod dang/ shing mngar dang/ skyer ba dang/ tsan dan dang kha ra dkar po dang/ e na ka'i phye ma dang/ sran chud dang/ pu shel tsi dang/ shug pa dang 'di rnams kyi lde gus
284a5(mdo 'grel): bskus na tsha zhing na ba dang/ shu ba mched pa dang skrangs ba rnams zlog par byed do/ /kri sa ra ti la dang/ mung+ga la sogs pa las byas pa rlung 'joms pa'i sman dang lhan cig bsgrubs pa'i snum gyis glan na zug gzer 'joms so/ /de bzhin du mur
284a6(mdo 'grel): ga dang/ 'o ma rlung la phan pa'i sman dang snum du sbyar ngas bsku ba 'am/ yang na til dang yungs kar snum dang bcas pa'i zan gyis glan na yang zug gzer 'joms so/ /srog chags chu las skyes pa dang/ mthu rtsal gyis gzas tshol ba'i sha
284a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ chu 'gram na gnas pa'i sha zhib mor gtubs pa lan tsha dang legs par sbyar ba 'tsho byed sde bcu'i sman dang snum dang bcas pas/ bla na byas na rengs pa dang/ zug cing na ba dang/ skrangs pa dang bya myong dang yan lag 'khums
284b1(mdo 'grel): pa rnams myur du 'joms so/ 'tsho byed sde bcu'i sman 'o ma dang zhag dang btsos te bskus na phan yon de dang 'dra'o/ /yang na sa ha tsa ra'i rtsa ba dang/ dzi ban+ti dang mar dang ra'i 'o ma dang/ lde gus glan pa 'am/ de bzhin du til 'o mas bran te bskams la
284b2(mdo 'grel): bsngos mas btags pa'i 'o ma dang sbyar ba'i lde gus bsku ba 'am/ yang na zar ma btags te 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na nye'u shing gi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am sbyor ba de dag gang yang rung bas glan na/ rlung shas che zhing zug gzer dang bcas
284b3(mdo 'grel): pa 'joms so/ /yang na ba gcin dang thal sman dang chang dang mar rnams bskol bas byug pa byas na/ zug gzer dang bcas pa sel to/ /mar rgun tsha dang lhan cig bskol bas blugs pa dang bsku byug byas na bad kan shas che ba'i dreg la phan no/ /khyim
284b4(mdo 'grel): gyi dud pa dang/ ru rta dang/ nye'u shing dang/ ser po rnam gnyis dang de rnams kyi bsku ba sbyar na rlung dang bad kan shas che ba sel to/ shing kru dmar po'i sa bon btags pa'i phye ma 'bras kyi rang skyur dang ldan pa'i lde gus yang yang bsku zhing tshwa la
284b5(mdo 'grel): sogs pas blugs pa byas na rlung dang bad kan shas che ba'i dreg nad la phan no/ /rtogs par sla ba'i dreg nad la ni byug pa dang bsku ba dang blugs pa dang chu nang du 'dug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya la rtogs par dka' ba'i dreg nad la ni bkru
284b6(mdo 'grel): sman drag po dang snum gyi btung ba rnams sbyar ro/ /rlung dang bad kan shas che ba'i dreg nang la ni byug pa dron po btang ngo/ /gal te grang mo byas na ni lus tsha ba dang/ skrang ba dang/ na pa dang/ g.ya' ba dang rangs par 'gyur ro/ /khrag dang mkhris pa shas che
284b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i dreg nad la mi byug pa la sogs pa bsil bar bya ste/ gal te dro ba byas na ni skem byed dang/ mdog dmar ba dang rdul 'byung bas lus gas par 'gyur ro/ /shing mngar srang brgya tshul bzhin bskol te bzhi cha lus pa dang/ de'i nang du til mar
285a1(mdo 'grel): srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ til mar dang mnyam pa'i 'o ma dang bsres pa'i nang du sti ra dang/ bca' ba'i 'bras bu dang/ murba dang/ pa yassya dang nye'u shing dang/ a ka ru dang/ tsan dan dang/ hansa pa ti dang/ spang
285a2(mdo 'grel): spos dang/ me d+ha rnam gnyis dang/ sle tres dang/ ram nye ba rnam gnyis dang/ 'tsho byed dang/ dzi ba ka dang/ zangs rtsi ba dang/ shing tshe dang/ gand+ha pa tra dang/ chu srin sen mo dang/ ba la ka dang/ pra puN+Ta rI ka dang/ btsod dang/ thal tres dang/ in+d+ra
285a3(mdo 'grel): ba du? ni dang/ pi tun+na ka dang/ 'di rnams srang re re btags pa'i phye ma btab ste bskol la mar 'ba' zhig lus pa las sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi po btung ba dang snar blugs pa dang/ bsku byug dang 'jam rtsi mas btang ba rnams byas na/
285a4(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa dang cha ba dang rims kyis nyam thag pa la phan no/ /yang na sman bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du ba bla'i phye ma dang til mar dang de dang mnyam pa'i 'o ma dang/ yang bskol la/ de bzhin du til mar de 'o ma dang lan brgya stong gi bar du
285a5(mdo 'grel): bskol te/ de las ran par 'thungs na dreg dang rlung zhi bar byed de/ khyad par du bcud kyi len gyi mchog tu 'gyur zhing dbang po rnams gsal bar byed de/ tshe dang lus 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang/ skad snyan pa dang/ khu chu dang/ khrag gi nad rnams
285a6(mdo 'grel): 'joms par byed do/ /rlung 'khrugs shing tshil dang bad kan lhag par skyes pas rtsa'i nang du rgyur mi ster te 'gags na thog mar snum pa sten cing nyams brta ba'i cho ga mi bsngags so/ /de la ni dang po brla rengs pa'i cho gar bshad pa rnams
285a7(mdo 'grel): bya ste/ de'i 'og tu sman snum dang ldan par sbyar ro/ /ji ltar khrag gi skyon med par 'gyur ba'i bya ba'i cho ga thams cad bya'o/ /de la srog ces bya ba'i rlung la sogs pa rnam lnga 'khrugs par snang na/ ma nor bar rlung nang gso ba'i skabs su bshad
285b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i gso ba'i rim pa dang/ rlung lnga po re re gang 'khrugs pa brtags te de nyid kyi stobs che chung las gso bar bya ba'o/ /rlung nad ma zhi ba dang bcas pa la ni thog mar dugs dang/ smyung ba dang smin par bya ba dang/ rtsub pa'i sman dang byug pa dang/ blugs pa la
285b2(mdo 'grel): sogs pa ma zhu ba med par byas la de'i 'og tu rlung nyi tsa'i gso ba bya'o/ /skem byed dang/ bya rmyang dang rkang lag 'khums pa dang/ rengs pa dang/ tshor ba med pa dang/ 'dar bu dang/ 'gram pa'i tshigs byer ba dang/ kha yo ba dang/ 'theng ba dang/ zha ba dang/ dreg nad dang/
285b3(mdo 'grel): tshigs 'khrul pa dang/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang/ gzhan yang tshil dang/ rkang dang/ rus pa'i nang du zhugs pa'i nang 'di rnams tshabs cher na ba yin pas yun mi ring na ni 'bad pa dang bcas pas gsor rung ste/ de bas na nad gsar zhing nad pa nyams stobs
285b4(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa zhig na/ myur du gso bar bya'o/ /rlung nad mkhris pa dang bcas pa yin na ni res kyis dro ba dang grang ba'i gso ba lan mang du bya'o/ /yang 'tsho byed sde bcu dang mar bskol ba blud do/ /rlung nad mkhris pa dang ldan pa la ni srog chags thang las skyes
285b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sha dang/ nas dang/ 'bras sA lu'i zan byin te/ 'o ma dang ldan pa'i bkru sman 'jam po yang btang ngo/ /rtsa ba chen po lnga dang ba la bskol ba 'o ma dang ldan pa'i 'jam rtsi mas btang ngo/ /til mar sman mngar ba dang sbyar ba'i 'jam rtsi dus su btang na ban
285b6(mdo 'grel): no/ /yang na shing mngar dang til mar ram/ yang na mar 'o ma 'am yang na rtsa ba lnga ba bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/ yang na chu grang mo dang de rnams gang yang rung bas blugs pa byas na/ mkhris pa dang ldan pa'i rlung nad la phan no/ /bad kan dang ldan
285b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i rlung nad la ni nas kyi zan dang/ skam sa na gnas pa'i ri dags dang/ bya'i sha dang/ dugs dang/ bkru sman drag po rnon po dang/ slon khrus kyang phan te/ mar snying pa dang/ til dang/ yungs kar gyi 'bru mar rnams sbyar na phan no/ /rlung bad kan
286a1(mdo 'grel): dang mkhris par ldan pa la ni dang po mkhris pa gso zhing de nas bad kan rim gyis gso'o/ /rlung dang khrag 'dres pa la ni/ dreg nad kyi gso ba ji skad bshad pa rnams bya'o/ /rlung shas rgyas pa dang bcas pa la ni dugs
286a2(mdo 'grel): dang bsku byug dang/ sha khu dang/ 'o ma dang snum rnams sbyor ba bzhin byas na phan no/ /rlung nad brla rengs pa dang bcas pa la ni gcin nad dang/ tshil rgyas ba dang/ rlung nad kyi gso ba rnams 'dir sbyar ro/ /rlung nad rus pa dang/ rkang la gnas pa la
286a3(mdo 'grel): ni snum chen po rnams sbyar ro/ /rlung khu chu la gnas pa la ni gong du bshad pa'i cho ga byas na phan no/ /rlung pho ba'i nang du byung ba la ni zas 'ju bar byed pa dang/ me drod skyed pa'i sman dang skyugs sman dang/ kha zas yang ba tshod zin par byas na phan no//
286a4(mdo 'grel): rlung gcin gyi gnas su byung ba la ni gcin 'phel ba'i sman dang dugs dang/ pho mtshan nas sman mas btang na phan no/ /rlung bshang ba la gnas pa la ni e raN+Ta'i mar phan te/ de bzhin du snum dang ldan pa'i bkru sman dang 'jam rtsi phan no/ /lus
286a5(mdo 'grel): zungs kun tu rlung gis khyab pa la ni bad kan dang rlung mi 'khrug cing rlung dang rjes su mthun pa'i sman myur du byas na phan no/ /yang de la ni gang thur du 'khru bar mi 'gyur ba dang snum pa dang/ rtsa rgyun dag pa'i sman dang de dag gang yang rung ba bza' 
286a6(mdo 'grel): btung kun la sbyar ro/ /phal cher lgang pa nas sman mas btang ste/ de yang mngar ba dang/ snum pa'i 'jam rtsi mas btang ngo/ /de nas lus kyi nyams stobs brtags te/ stobs dang ldan pa yin na ni bkru sman 'jam po btang ngo/ /de bzhin du bcud
286a7(mdo 'grel): kyis len gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa byas na yang rab tu bsngags te khyad par du brag zhun dang/ 'o ma'i sbyor ba dang/ de bzhin du gu gul nyi tse dang b+harga pas bshad pa'i tshangs pa'i bcud kyis len zhes bya ba'i nang du kha ra dkar po srang stong tshig brgya dang
286b1(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba'i lde gu yang rab tu phan no/ /gzhang kha'i nang du thung du sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlung yod de/ de nad gzhi gang yang rung ba dang 'brel cing na ba la ni me drod skyed pa dang/ phyi sa ska bar 'gyur ba dang/ rlung bde bar 'byung bar bya zhing gcin spyad pa'i phyir yang
286b2(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba de dag bya'o/ /de dag ni rlung dang ldan pa'i nad kyi gso ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ srog ces bya ba'i rlung la sogs pa rlung rnam pa lnga po yang sman pas gang dag ldan pa brtags te/ so so'i gso ba bzhin du bya'o/ /de la stong du rgyu ba'i rlung ni sman
286b3(mdo 'grel): pas stong du drang zhing gso'o/ /thur du sel ba'i rlung ni smad du drang zhing gso'o/ /me dang mnyam du gnas pa'i rlung ni mnyam pa nyid du gso zhing bzhag go /khyab byed kyi rlung nad ni gsum ka'i sbyor ba bya'o/ /bzhi po de dag pas kyang srag ces bya ba'i
286b4(mdo 'grel): rlung khyad par du bsrung bar bya ste/ rlung de gnas na lus gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar nad gzhi de dag rang gi gnas spangs te lam gzhan du zhugs par gyur na/ de las slan te so so'i gnas su bzhag te gso'o/ /rlung nad khrag mkhris dang ldan pa ma gtogs
286b5(mdo 'grel): pa lhag ma'i nad gzhi gang dang ldan yang bcud kyis len gyi cho ga bzhin du sgog pa bsten na phan no/ /stong du rgyu ba'i rlung la sogs pa mkhris par ldan pa yin na ni thog mar mkhris pa gsos la de'i 'og tu rlung gso bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du khrag dang
286b6(mdo 'grel): ldan pa yin na ya thog mar khrag dang dreg nad kyi gso ba bya zhing/ de'i 'og tu rlung gso'o/ /khrag mkhris dang rlung 'dres pa'i nad la yang bcud kyis len gyi cho ga sna tshogs brtags te 'dir sbyar ro/ /nad gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du gso ba yang
286b7(mdo 'grel): ma nor bar bstan pa yin te/ tshe'i rig khyed kyi 'bras bu ni gso ba'i gnas yin te/ nad rnams kyi nyam thag pa 'phral du 'jig par byed pa yin no/ /de lta bas na 'di ni gso ba zhes kyang bya/ phan pa zhes kyang bya/ sbyor ba zhes kyang bya/ sman pa
287a1(mdo 'grel): zhes kyang bya/ sman zhes kyang bya/ zhi bar byed pa zhes kyang bya/ bsngags pa zhes kyang bya ste/ de dag ni ming gi rnam grangs yin no/ /gso ba'i gnas las dreg nad gso ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa ste tha ma rdzogs so// //
287a2(mdo 'grel): sman pa'i bdag pho seng ge spas pa zhes bya ba'i bu/ sman pa chen po pha gol zhes bya bas/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po mdzad pa las/ gso ba'i gnas zhes bya ba le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs te/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po gnas
287a3(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa'o// //sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po las cho ga grub pa rnam pa drug ces bya ba cho ga grub pa'i gnas lnga pa brjod par bya ste/ de la gso ba'i gnas de yang cho ga grub pa la bltos dgos pa yin pas gso
287a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'og tu cho ga'i gnas bshad par rigs so/ /de la thog mar skyug sman btang ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ de yang drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pas bshad pa na re/ de la bo son cha dang dur byid gnyis ni slon dang khrus kyis
287a5(mdo 'grel): nad thams cad la phan pa'i mchog yin te/ nad kyi bye brag re re la/ bzang ba dzi mu la sogs pa gzhan ni yod na thams cad la khyab par bsngags pa ni/ de gnyis las lhag pa med do/ /de la skyug sman btang ba'i dus ni/ dpyid dang
287a6(mdo 'grel): sos ka'i mtshams kyi zla ba dang/ tshes grangs dang/ nyi ma shis pa la btang ngo/ /de la skyug sman po son cha btang ba ni bo son cha'i 'bras bu/ ha cang mdog ser po yang ma yin zhing skya bor song ba ni smin pa'i tshad yin te/ de blangs la
287a7(mdo 'grel): phyis nas rtswa ku sha las snod du byas pa'i nang du bcug ste the gus bcings nas ba lang gi lci bas phyi rol nas byug ste/ de nas 'bru'i phung po'i nang du zhag brgyad kyi bar du bzhag ste/ de yang gu shas dkris pa'i yon tan ni/ 'jam
287b1(mdo 'grel): zhing ma bar? la dri zhim bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar zhag brgyad lon pa dang phyung la nyi ma la bskams pa dang/ pi pi ling yang de ltar byas te bskams la/ til gyi tshigs ma btags pa'i phye ma zho dang mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas bskus te de bskams
287b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang khum pa'i nang du bcug ste ji tsam na dgos pa'i dus su sbyar ro/ /de nas bo son cha dang pi pi ling gi sbyor ba de mthe bong nang du bcug pa'i chang pa gang tsam phye mar byas la shing mngar dang/ ko bi da ra dang/ karbu da ra zhes bya ba sle rma ta ka dang/ bimpa
287b3(mdo 'grel): dang nimpa dang/ lcang ma dang/ sha na pushishu? zhes bya ba dang/ sa da puShpa zhes bya ba arka dang/ a pa marga dang/ 'di rnams gang yang rung ba zhig cham chom brdungs te/ nub gcig spangs la bskol ba'i khu ba snyim pa gang gi nang du btab ste bskol la
287b4(mdo 'grel): blud do/ /mdo'i gnas su bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin du legs par skyug du gzhug go /khyad par du bad kan gyi rims cham pas btab pa dang/ skan dang khong 'bras rnams la skyug sman bya ste mkhris pa byung na bcad do/ /pi pi ling dang/ po son cha bskol
287b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i khu ba 'am/ yang na ko bi da ra'i khu ba gang yang rung ba'i nang du pi pi ling dang/ po son cha'i phye ma'i sbyor ba dang/ phye ma de'i sum cha'i 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma btab ste blud na rims dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ lba ba dang/ thor bu dang/ 'brum
287b6(mdo 'grel): chen dang/ dmu rdzing rnams la phan no/ /gal te mkhris pa bad kan gyi gnas su zhugs pa la ni/ dzi mu ta dang/ ko shata ki rnams gnyis dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ 'di rnams gang yang rung ba zhig bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du gong gi po son cha dang/ pi pi
287b7(mdo 'grel): ling gi sbyor ba'i phye ma btab ste blud do/ /snying tsha ba khrag mkhris rgyas pa la ni/ pi pi ling brgya 'o ma dang bskol ba'i nang du po son cha'i sbyor ba btab ste blud do/ /yang na po son cha'i sbyor ba gong ma'i phye ma 'o ma dang bskol te zhor gyur pa dang/
288a1(mdo 'grel): de'i zho 'am zho'i spris ma 'thungs na bad kan las gyur pa'i skyugs pa dang/ cham pas btab pa dang/ mun thibs zhes byed pa la phan no/ /lus skem zhing me drod kyis nyam theg pa la ni po son cha dang/ de ba ta li dang/
288a2(mdo 'grel): ko sha da ki dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ khu ba kha bo dang/ 'di rnams 'o ma tshul bzhin bskol ba'i nang du gong du smos pa'i sman gyi phye ma dang/ bo son cha dang/ pi pi ling gi sbyor ba'i phye ma btab ste/ 'o ma dang yang bskol la/ de las byung ba'i mar
288a3(mdo 'grel): blud do/ /yang na pi pi ling dang/ po son cha'i 'bras bu'i khu ba go bye'i/ go cha bzhin du bya ste/ lde gu skya ba la dril du btub pa tsam gyi tshod byin la/ bde bar skyug du gzhug go /yang na lde gu de nyid bza' ba dang bza' ba'i nang du btab ste/ bza' 
288a4(mdo 'grel): ba 'am/ yang na gong gi pi pi ling dang/ po son cha'i sbyor ba bskol ba dang lhan cig btang ngo/ /yang na po son cha dang/ pi pi ling dang/ nimpa dang/ arka ka dang/ de dag gang yang rung ba bskol ba'i nang du dug go nyung gi bde tshan btags pa'i phye
288a5(mdo 'grel): ma btab ste/ blud na nyams brta drags pa las gyur pa'i nad gting zug pa yang zhi bar byed do/ /byis pa gzhon nu bad kan dang mkhris pa yod cing skyugs sman btang mi bzed pa la ni thog mar 'drangs par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu po son
288a6(mdo 'grel): cha'i me tog gam 'bras bu gang yang rung ba legs par btags la me tog kyi phreng ba la phye mas bsgos te sna sgor mnams na bde bar skyug par 'gyur ro/ /yang na thug pa 'am sha khu 'am/ kri sar la sogs pa'i nang du po son cha'i phye
288a7(mdo 'grel): mas btab ste blud na yang skyugs par 'gyur ro/ /yang na dzi mu ta la sogs pa'i gong du smos pa'i sman drug po yang po son cha'i sbyor ba bzhin du byas la khyad par du dzi mu ta'i sbyor bas ni rims dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang lud pa dang/
288b1(mdo 'grel): skyigs bu la sogs pa nad la yang sbyar ro/ /yang na dzi mu ta'i me tog gam med na 'bras bu 'am/ yang na 'bras bu spu dang bcas pa 'am/ de dag gang rnyed kyang rung ste 'o ma dang bskol ba dang sbyar la skyugs sman gyi don du btang ba 'am/ yang na dzi mu ta'i 'bras bu ma smon
288b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang zho'i spris ma sbyar la sbyin na skyug par 'gyur ro/ /yang na dzi mu ta'i 'bras bu ser skyar song ba'i phye ma 'o mar bskol la zho skyur por gyur pa la btab na skyug par 'gyur ro/ /as pa'i chang gi dangs ma'i nang du dzi mu ta'i rtsa ba mnyes te blud do/ /dzi mu ta'i sbyor
288b3(mdo 'grel): ba de dag gi bad kan dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ lud pa lu ba dang/ skya rbab dang/ gcong chen po rnams la sbyor ba 'di btang na phan no/ /sku ba dang ko sha ta ki rnam gnyis dang sbyor ba gong ma bzhin 'o ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin bya'o/ /yang de
288b4(mdo 'grel): gsum legs par smin par blangs te skam po btags pa'i phye ma btsags bsrang phyed 'o ma'i nang du bskyos pa blud na mkhris pa la phan no/ /ba to la'i rtsa ba bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/ yang na dong ka'i sde tshan las ba tha yan chad sman dgu las gang yang rung ba'i khu
288b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i nang du dzi mu ta'i 'bras bu gnyis sam gsum cham chom brdungs te 'thungs na mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi rims nad can la phan no/ /yang na dzi mu ta btags pa'i phye ma mkhris pa'i rims la ni chu grang mo dang sbyar te btang ngo/ /bad kan dang 'dres pa'i
288b6(mdo 'grel): rims la ni chu dro 'jam tsam dang sbyar ba byin no/ /lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba dang/ dug dang/ skyugs pa dang/ rims dang/ bad kan shas che ba dang/ mun thibs zhes byed pa'i nad dang/ de rnams ldan pa'i skyes bu la ni sku ba kha bo'i skyugs sman rab tu bsdugs so
288b7(mdo 'grel): skul kha bo'i 'bras bu dang/ me tog med pa'i dus su ni myu gu dang/ lo ma gsar pa'i 'o ma dang bsgrubs pa mkhris pa dang bad kan du ldan pa'i rims mkhris pa shas che ba la btang ngo/ /sku ba kha bo legs par smin pa'i nang gi 'bras bu phyung ste/ 'o ma'i nang du
289a1(mdo 'grel): bcug ste zhor gyur ba dang/ bad kan las gyur ba'i lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba dang/ skyugs sman gyi don du blud do/ /yang na skya rbab dang/ mdze dang/ dug gis nyams thag pa la ni sku? ba kha bo yi sa bon zho ga chu dang sbyar ba sbyin no/ /yang na spu
289a2(mdo 'grel): ba kho bo yi sa bon dar ba bskol ba'i nang du btab ste/ rgyam tsha dang/ sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa blud na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/ /yang na sku ba kha bo'i sa bon rwa'i 'o ma'i nang du bran te rwa'i 'o ma de nyid dang bcas pa 'thungs na dug dang/ skran dang/ dmu rdzing dang/ thun du
289a3(mdo 'grel): dang 'bras dang/ rkang bam rnams la phan no/ /nas phye 'am yang na khu ga ba bo'i sa bon gang yang rung ba'i sku ba'i rang khus bsgos te skyo mar byas ba blud na bad kan las gyur ba'i rims dang/ lud pa dang/ lkog ma'i nad dang/ ma zhu ba rnams la phan no/ /skran dang
289a4(mdo 'grel): rims rling ba ba ni sku ba kha bo'i phye ma sha khu dang lhan cig blud na legs par skyug cing nyam chung bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /sku ba kha bo yi 'bras bu dang/ me tog rang gi khu ba bskams te btags pa'i phye ma me tog gi phreng ba la bsgos te mnams na bde bar skyug
289a5(mdo 'grel): bar byed do/ /skyid de ba'i skyug sman du sbyor ro/ /lud pa dang/ skran dang/ dmu rdzing dang/ lkog ma'i nad dang/ de bzhin du rlung bad kan gyi gnas su zhugs pa dang/ kha dang mgrin par bad kan gnas pa dang/ bad kan gsogs shing brtan pa'i nad rnams la sman d+ha mar
289a6(mdo 'grel): ka'i skyug sman 'dod ma yin te/ zangs rtsi ba dang/ kha sral phre'u dang/ nye'u shing dang/ ram nye ba rnam gnyis dang/ sra ba ni dang/ med rnam gnyis dang/ ma du la gi dang/ 'di rnams gang yang rung ba'i phye ma dang/ ra dzA ko sha ta ki zhes bya ba d+ha mar ka'i phye ma dang/
289a7(mdo 'grel): bcas ba sbrang rtsi dang sha khar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na lud pa dang snying tsha ba la rab tu bsngags so/ /mkhris pa tsha ba dang bad kan dang ldan pa la yang gong gi sbyor ba gang yang rung ba chu dro 'jam dang sbyar ba btang ngo/ /'u su dang g.yer ma bskol ba'i khu ba'i
289b1(mdo 'grel): nang du d+ha marga'i phye ma btab ste blud na dug nad 'joms so/ bim+ba dang/ ba spru ba dang/ ka sa mard+ha ka gang yang rung ba bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du d+ha marba'i 'bras bu gcig gam gnyis mnyes la tshigs ma por te dangs ma blud na snying nad la phan no/ /d+ha marga'i 'bras
289b2(mdo 'grel): bu 'o ma dang lhan cig bskol te/ de las byung ba'i mar btung ba 'am/ yang na bo son cha dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ dzi mu ta'i 'bras bu dang/ 'di rnams re re nas sbyor ba de ltar byas na skyug sman du bzad do/ /mdze dang/ skya rbab kyi nad dang/ mcher
289b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i nad dang/ skrangs pa dang/ skran dang/ sbyar ba'i dug dang/ 'di rnams la ni tsha ba dang/ rno ba dang/ dro ba'i skyugs sman bsngags so/ /bo son cha dang/ sku ba kha po dang/ d+ha margra dang/ dug ma nyung dang/ dzi mu ta dang/ kri ta be d+ha ka de rnams gang yang rung ba gcig dang/ ko sha
289b4(mdo 'grel): ta ki cha bsnyams te bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ yul ser che ba nas byung ba'i sha khu dang lhan cig bskol te/ lan tsha dang bcas pa blud do/ /yang na po son cha la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gang yang rung ba gcig dang/ pi pi ling cha mnyam pa ko sha ta ga'i khu ba dang sbyar ba
289b5(mdo 'grel): 'am yang na ko sha ta ki bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba blud do/ dug mo nyung gi sbyor ba'i skyugs sman ni byis pa shin tu gzhon pa la btang ba yin te/ de bzhin du bad kan khrag mkhris dang bcas pa dang/ rims dang/ shu ba mched pa dang/ snying nad dang/ dreg nad dang
289b6(mdo 'grel): mdze dang/ 'di rnams la rab tu bsngags so/ /yungs kar dang/ ma dug dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ de rnams gang yang rung ba bskol ba 'am/ yang na dug mo nyung gi sa bon kri sa ra dang ldan pa skyugs sman gyi don du blud do/ /dug mo nyung gi sa bon arka'i 'o
289b7(mdo 'grel): ma'i nang du zhag bdun gyi bar du bsgos shing bran te/ bskams la btags pa'i phye ma po son cha dang/ dzi mu ta dang/ sku ba kha bo dang/ dzi ban+ti dang/ dzi ba ka dang/ de rnams gang yang rung ba gcig bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du btab te blud do/ /slon sman gyi sbyor
290a1(mdo 'grel): ba bo son cha la sogs pa 'di dag ni gtsor smos pa tsam du zad kyi/ skyes bu blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis gzhung gzhan las 'byung ba rnams kyang ci rigs su sbyor cig cho ga grub pa'i gnas las le'u dang po rdzogs so// //
290a2(mdo 'grel): de nas bkru sman btang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ de la dur byi dang po zos shing ma zhu ba'i tshe na ni ro bskal mngar zhing rtsub pa yin te zhu nas ni ro tsha ba yin la bad kan dang mkhris pa 'joms shing rtsub pas ni rlung 'khrugs par byed do/ /dur
290a3(mdo 'grel): byid de sman dang sbyar na ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum 'joms te/ khyad par du cho ga bzhi ldan par byas na nad gzhi thams cad las rgyal bar byed do/ /dur byid de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ rtsa ba smug nag du 'dug pa dang/ dur byid dkar po dang gnyis su
290a4(mdo 'grel): bshad de de gnyis kyang dur byid dkar po ni mchog tu bsngags te/ cho ga bsrung mi dgos shing bgu sman 'jam po yin te/ skyid de bsdug ma myong ba rgan po dang rgyu snyi ba rnams la btang ba yin no/ /dur byid mug nag ni brgyal zhing rmong bag du byed la/
290a5(mdo 'grel): mgrin bgra mas gang zhing blud pa ltar byed la/ rno zhing myur du 'khru ba'i bdag nyid yin bas lto shin tu sra ba dang/ nad gzhi mang bos nyam thag ste lus shin tu zad pa la bsngags so/ /dur byid de btung ba'i dus su yang rtsa ba g.yas g.yon du ma 'phros
290a6(mdo 'grel): shing bzabs su drang por 'dug pa de phyung la dbus kyi snying po bor te shun pa bskams la sbas nas snod du gzhug go /de bkru sman du sbyar ba ni slud nad can la ni dur byid phye mar bya ste/ rgyam tsha dang/ bca' sga zad dang/ skyur dang sbyar te blud do/ /mkhris
290a7(mdo 'grel): pa las gyur pa'i nad la ni dur byid mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang khar dang bcas pa 'o ma dang rgun chu dang bu ram shing gi khu ba dang tam ba la dang sman mngar ba'i sde tshan dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ de rnams kyi khu ba gang yang rung ba dang sbyar la blud do/ /bad
291b1(mdo 'grel): kan las gyur ba'i nad la ni sA lu'i khu ba dang/ ba gcin dang/ rtsa bas skyur po dang/ tsha ba rnam pa lnga'i khu ba dang bad kan 'joms pa'i sman nyung shas dur byid kyi phye ma dang sbyar ba blud do/ /dur byid bskol ba'i khu ba grangs pa'i nang du khar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ dri
291b2(mdo 'grel): sna gsum dang sbyar ba blud pa'am/ yang na dur byid kyi phye ma kha ra dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu bldags na bkru sman yid du 'ong ba yin na/ /a dzA gand+ha dang/ smyig rkang dang khi da ri dang sha khar dang/ 'di rnams dang dur byid kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar
291b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i lde gu bldogs na 'dus pa dang/ rims dang/ lus rengs pa dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ skom dad kyis gzir ba legs par 'khru bar byed do/ /yang na bu ram shing gi sdong bu bkas te/ dum bu gnyis su byas pa'i nad ngos dur byid kyi phye ma lde gur byas te/
291b4(mdo 'grel): bskus te slar sbyar bas snod kha sbyar gyi nang du cho ga bzhin du tshos par byas nas zos na 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad legs pas 'khru bar 'gyur ro/ /shing cha dang sung smel cha mnyam pa dang/ de gnyis dang cha mnyam pa'i ni li ni dang/ sman gsum po de dag dang
291b5(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa'i dur byid dang/ sman de bzhi dang mnyam pa'i sha kha ra dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma rgun 'bru'i khu ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang phyes btab pa'i skyo ma 'thungs na rlung dang/ mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur pa'i nad dang/ me'i drod chung ba dang/ skyes bu skyid de ba dang/
291b6(mdo 'grel): shin tu gzhan ba rnams la cho ga bsrung mi dgos par 'khru bar byed do/ /bi dang ga phub ma med pa dang 'bras bu gsum dang/ nas tshig 'khus ba'i thal ba dang/ pi pi ling dang/ sman sna gcig gi gsum 'gyur gyi ? ? tsa dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi 'am/ mar/
291b7(mdo 'grel): ram bu ram de rnams gang yang rung ba'i lde gu bldags na yi ga 'chus ba dang/ skran dang mcher ba dang/ mdu rdzing dang/ lud pa dang/ nad d+ha li ma ka dang/ gzhan yang bad kan dang/ rlung las gyur pa'i nad myur du sbyor bar byed do/ /bi dang ka dang/ pi pi ling mu la dang
291a1(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu gsum dang/ 'u su dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ na le sham dang/ dug mo yungs dang/ zir dang/ pi pi ling dang/ hasti'i pi pi ling dang/ ting mus dang/ lan tsha rnam lnga dang/ 'di rnams zho gnyis gnyis phye mar byas pa dang/ tri bi tsa srang brgyad kyi
291a2(mdo 'grel): phye dang/ til mar srang brgyad dang/ skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu'i khu ba srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ bu ram srang sum brgya lnga bcu dang/ de rnams lhan cig me mi che ba dang bskol ba ni dge ba'i bu ram zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba yin te/ dus thams cad du sbyor ba 'di byang
291a3(mdo 'grel): yang rung ste/ cho ga bsrung mi dgos bar 'di las ran par 'thungs na mdze dang/ mig ser dang/ gcin nad dang/ skran dang/ mdu rdzing dang/ mtshan bar rdol ba dang/ pho ba'i nad dang/ skya rbab kyi nad rnams 'joms shing bud med bu med pa la bu yang skye bar
291a4(mdo 'grel): byed do/ /tsha ba gsum dang/ dri sna gsum dang/ gla sgang dang/ bi dang ga dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ spyi dang mnyam pa'i dur dang/ de dang mnyam pa'i khar dkar po btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang ri lur byas ba zos na gcin sri ba dang/ rims dang/ skyug pa'i nad
291a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ lud pa dang/ skem byed dang/ mgo 'khor ba dang/ zad byed kyi nad dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ skya rbab kyi nad dang/ me drod chung ba dang/ dug thams cad la rab tu bsngags so/ /dur byid dang dug mo yungs dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bca' sga 'di rnams kyi phye ma
291a6(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi dang rgun 'bru'i khu ba dang sbyar te/ dbyar gyi dus su bkru sman btang bar bzang ngo/ /dur byid dang/ byi tsher ba dang/ gla sgang dang/ khar dang/ ba la ka dang/ tsan dan dang/ shing mngar dang sa ha la dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma rgun chu dang sbyar ba ston gyi dus su
291a7(mdo 'grel): bkru sman du bzang ngo/ /tri ba ta'i dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ pa tha dang/ zir dang/ sa ra la dang/ shu dag dang/ rtsa sman khron bu dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma chu dron dang sbyar ba gun gyi dus su bkru sman du bzang ngo/ /dur byid dang khar cha mnyam ba ni so ga'i bkru sman du bzang ngo/
291b1(mdo 'grel): dur byid dang/ khyi lce ba dang/ spa ma'i 'bras bu dang/ pu tse shel dang/ khron bu dang 'di rnams kyi phye ma zhag gsum gyi bar du gcin gyi nang du sbang zhing snum bcos byas pa'i me la btang na dri ma thams cad 'byin par byed do/ /sha ma dur byid dang/ phyi tsher ba dang
291b2(mdo 'grel): ha to pi pi ling dang/ dug mo yungs dang/ ni li ni dang/ pu tse shel dang/ gla sgang dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang 'di rnams kyi phye ma sha khu dang mar dang/ chu dran gang yang rung ba las dus thams cad du btang na khong rtsub pa la rab tu bsngags so/ /bkru sman dong ka
291b3(mdo 'grel): dzi bkru sman 'jam zhing ro mngar la bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa yin pas rims dang/ snying nad dang dreg nad dang/ phyis 'gags pa la sogs pa'i nad la rab tu phan no/ /dod ka na 'jam zhing nyen med pa'i bkru sman gyi mchog yin te byis pa dang/
291b4(mdo 'grel): rgan bo dang lus skem zhing zad pa dang/ shin tu bzhon pa la yang sbyar ro/ /de yang dong ka'i 'bras bu legs par smin pa'i dus su blangs na dong ka de yang skyon med cing srin bus ma zos ba khur gcig tsam blangs te phye ma'i nang du gzhug go/ nub bdun
291b5(mdo 'grel): lon pa dang phyung la nyi ma la bskam par bya'o/ /de nas shun pa dang 'bras bu bal te/ snying po snod gtsang ma'i nang du bzhag gor byis pa lo bzhi nas bcu gnyis kyi bar du lon pa dang/ mi skyid de ba lus tsha bas gdungs shing rtug skams kyis btab
291b6(mdo 'grel): pa la ni dong ka'i snying po rgun chu dang sbyar la btang ngo/ /dong ka'i snying po bskol ba grang mo chang gi dangs ma 'am/ zho ga chu 'am/ skye ru ra'i 'bras bu 'am/ skyur bo gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig sbyar ba'i nang du tri bid kyi phye mas btab pa blud do/ /danda
291b7(mdo 'grel): bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du dong ka'i snying po dang bu ram bcug ste zla ba phyed dam gcig gi bar du bzhag pa'i chang btung bar bya'o/ /seng phrom gyi rtsa ba'i nang du shun bor te phyi shun blangs te skams la phye mar bya ste de'i phye ma'i sum cha gnyis ni seng
292a1(mdo 'grel): phrom bskol ba'i nang du spangs te/ kha cig ni rtsa ba bcu ba bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du spangs pa yang bskams te/ yang phye mar byas pa'i zho ga chu dang/ ba gcin dang/ chang gi snying po dang/ rgya shug dang/ skyu ru ra'i khu ba rnams las gang yang
292a2(mdo 'grel): rung ba dang sbyar te/ lag mthil du bzhag la btung ngo/ /yang na nas bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du de nyid kyi phye ma dang/ sha kha ra dang/ mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu de yang bkru sman gyi dam pa yin no/ /de la su dak+Shi ra ni nad gzhi sha cher gsogs shing gso dka' ba yang myur
292a3(mdo 'grel): du 'jig bar byed la/ shin tu drag cing rtsub pa yin bas lto sti ba dang/ byis pa dang/ rgan po dang/ nad snying can nyam chung ba la btad du mi rung ngo/ /su dak+Shi ra te skran dang/ dmu rdzing dang/ sbyar ba'i dug dang/ pags pa'i nad dang/ gcin sbrang rtsi lta bu byung ba'i nad dang/
292a4(mdo 'grel): skya rbab dang/ dug 'joms pa dang/ skrangs pa dang nad gzhis sems mi dran pa la yang su dak+Shi ra zhes bya ba spu hi sbyar na phan no/ /su dak+Shi ra'i shing de yang tsher ma rno ba mang pos khyab pa rab tu bzad do/ /shing de yang lo gnyis sam gsum lon par dpyid kyi
292a5(mdo 'grel): dus su mtshon gyis dral te lo ma dbyung bar bya'o/ /bilpa la sogs pa rtsa ba chen po lnga dang/ pri ha ste rnam gnyis dang/ de dag gang yang rung ba re re bskol ba'i khu ba dang mnyam pa'i su dak+Shi ra dang bsres te/ me'i mngag ma lam reg ba tsam du bskams la ri
292a6(mdo 'grel): lur byas la zho ga chu dang/ ba gcin dang/ chang gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te blud do/ /dur byid dang/ dong ka dang/ shang ki ni dang/ dan+ti dang/ dra ban+ti dang/ sa ta la dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang khron bu dang/ de rnams gang yang rung ba gcig gi phye ma su dak+Shi ra'i 'o ma'i nang du
292a7(mdo 'grel): spang zhing bskam par bya ste/ de'i 'og tu sha khu 'am mar gang yang rung ba sbyar te blud do/ /de bzhin du tsha ba gsum dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ tri bi tsa dang/ dan+ti dang/ kru rdug tres dang/ de rnams kyang re re na su dak+Shi ra'i 'o ma dang/ gong ma bzhin du byas pa bu ram
292b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ chu dang sbyar te gtong ngo/ /sman shang khi ni'i 'bras bu tig ta zhes bya ba ha cang mi skam ba blangs te phub ma med par byas pa dang/ sa ta la'i rtsa ba yang de ltar byas la de gnyi ga yang rno bar 'khru bar byed pa yin te/ bad kan gyi nad dang/ dmu rdzing dang/ sbyar ba'i dug dang/ skrangs pa
292b2(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /snying nad dang/ bad kan dang rlung las gur pa'i nad dang/ de bzhin du khrag la yang byas ?? khi na dang/ sa ta la gnyis chang dang lan tsha dang bcas pa zho gnyis tsam gyi ri lur byas te sbyar bar bya'o/ /dan+ti'i tsa ba blang po che'i sha ltar brtan
292b3(mdo 'grel): zhing sbom ba dang dra banda'i rtsa ba dmar la cung zad gnag bar 'dug pa dang/ gnyis ni rno ba dang/ drod che la myur du 'khru bar byed la/ mkhris pa dang bad kan ni 'ju bar byed do/ /dan+ti'i rtsa ba glang po'i so ltar brtan zhing spom pa dang/ tra ban+ti'i rtsa ba dmar la cung zad
292b4(mdo 'grel): gnag par 'dug pa dang gnyis ni rno ba dang/ drong che la myur du 'khru bar byed pa yin pas/ rlung lci ba ni 'khru bar byed la mkhris pa dang/ bad kan ni 'ju bar byed do/ /dan+ti dang tra ban+ti'i rtsa ba de gnyis sbrang rtsi dang pi pi ling gi lde gus phyi rol lngas byugs la rtswa dur
292b5(mdo 'grel): bas dkris te/ de'i phyi rol nas 'jim pas bskus nas me chung ngu nyi ma la skam mo/ /de ltar bya ba ni lus zung zad pa'i nus pa zhil bar bya ba'i phyir bya ba yin no/ /de ltar bskams pa dang/ zho ga chu dang/ chang dang dar ba dang/ a sa ba'i chang dang/ pi lu'i khu ba gang
292b6(mdo 'grel): yang rung ba dang lhan cig sbyar te btang na skran dang/ gcin nad dang/ dmu rdzing dang/ sbyar ba'i dug gis lus nyam thag pa la phan no/ /yang na de gnyis kyi phye ma dang/ ri dags dang/ ra'i sha khu dang sbyar te btang na skya rbab dang/ lto ba'i srin bu dang/ mtshan bar rdol ba la phan
292b7(mdo 'grel): no/ /rtsa ba bcu pa dang/ dan+ti dang/ tra dan+ti gnyis kyi phye ma cho ga bzhin yang bskol la mar lhag ma lus pa las 'thungs na me dpal dang/ me dpal phra mo dang/ khong 'bras dang/ mtshan khung tsha ba dang/ 'di rnams las rgyal bar byed do/ /cho ga de bzhin du til mar
293a1(mdo 'grel): bskol ba dang sbyar na yang/ gcin nad dang/ skran dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ rtug pa 'gags pa dang/ bad kan dang/ rlung las rgyal bar byed do/ de bzhin du snum chen po bzhi cho ga de ltar byas nas 'thungs na/ rtug pa dang rlung 'gags pa dang
293a2(mdo 'grel): rtsa? bzhin du rlung ga go nad par gyur pa la yang phan no/ dur byid la sogs pa sman gong du bstan pa dgu po de dag ni bkru sman gyi nang na mchog tu bshad do/ /a ru ra yang dur byid kyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar brtag cing dpyad par bya'o/ /bu ram srang brgyad
293a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ a ru ra rngog ma nyi shu dang/ dan+ti dang/ tsi tra ka srang re re dang/ pi pi ling dang/ dur byid zho gnyis dang/ 'di rnams lhan cig sbyar te ri lu ba cur byas la zhag bcu bcu zhing ri lu re re zos te de'i rjes la chu dron po 'thungs zhing ri lu bcu po zad kyi bar la
293a4(mdo 'grel): thabs de ltar byas na/ cho ga bsrung mi dgos par nad thams cad zlog bar byed do/ /khyad par du pho ba'i nad dang/ skya rbab dang mdze nad thig le dmar po can dang/ gzhang 'brum dang g.ya' ba 'di la phan no/ sman gyi dngos po nus chung pa yin na sman rnon po dang sbyar
293a5(mdo 'grel): na las chen po byed do/ /sman thun che ba yin na yang sman rno ba dang ma sbyar na ni las nyung ngu byed pa yin no/ /dus kyi bye brag las brtags te rna ba dang 'jam pa'i sman legs par sbyar te btang ngo/ /de ltar legs par sbyar na ni sman rno ba yang 'jam por
293a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur la/ 'jam po yang rno bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar gong du bshad pa'i bkru sman de dag kyang yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i sman shing tsha dang/ nA ga ge sar dang/ a mra ta ka dang se'u 'bru dang/ sug smel dang/ kha ra dkar po dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ kha lung dang chang la
293a7(mdo 'grel): sogs pa dri zhim pos bsgos shing btab la ldan par byas la blud par bya'o/ /cho ga grub pa'i gnas las bkru sman btang ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so// //de nas skyugs sman dang bkru sman dang de grub bar bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u
293b1(mdo 'grel): bshad par bya ste/ gal te skyugs sman de lto snyi ba dang/ shin tu ltogs pa dang/ bad kan chung ba la btang ngam/ yang na sman shin du rno ba 'am/ grang ches pa 'am thun chung ba 'am/ zas ma zhu ba 'am/ mnyam chung ches ba la blud na/ slon gyen du mi 'byung bar thur du 'gro
293b2(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur te/ nyes pa phyir sogs par 'gyur bas/ de bas na de ni yang snum pa sogs pa gong ma'i rim pa byas na slon sman yang btang ngo/ /bkru sman yang zas ma zhu ba dang/ bad kan dang ldan pa la btang ngam/ yang na bkru sman de nyid shing du rno ba dang/ dro ches pa
293b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ lan tsha mang zhi sman thun ches pa dang/ yi gar mi 'ong bzhin du byin na slar stod du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la ni gong du bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du bkru sman yang bya'o/ /bkru sman de btang yang legs par ma gyur te pho ba la brten cing 'khrur ma de tub
293b4(mdo 'grel): pa la ni goms shing yi gar 'ong ba spangs la/ gang gnod pa mi skyed pa'i bkru sman gyis bsnan no/ /skyes bu gang gi lus snum btsos dang dugs kyis zhen par byas pa la sman rnying pa rtsub pa'i bkru sman btang bas nad rang gi gnas nas skyong cing 'khrum nus
293b5(mdo 'grel): pas mgo 'khor ba dang/ skrang ba dang/ skyigs bu dang/ mun par mthong ba dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ byin pa'i nyan ba dang/ lus g.ya' ba dang/ mgo bo tsha ba che zhing mdog 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i nad de rnams skyed par byed do/ /nad pa de snum dang dugs kyis legs
293b6(mdo 'grel): par byas kyang me dros che ba las sman rnying pa thun chung ngu btang ba 'am/ yang na grang ba dang/ ma zhu bas khong 'khril la gtam zhing dri ma 'byung mi nus te/ sbyor ba la sogs pas gong gi nad de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la ni til mar dang/ lan tshas lus bsku byug
293b7(mdo 'grel): byas la gding ba'i dugs dang sha kha ra zhes bya ba'i dugs bya ste/ de'i 'og tu ni ru ha btang zhing zas su srog chags thang las skyes pa'i sha khu sbyin no/ /de'i 'og tu po son cha dang/ pi pi ling dang thang shing dang/ til mar dang sbyar ba'i 'jam rtsi btang ngo/ /de nas rlung
294a1(mdo 'grel): 'joms pa'i sman gyis snum bcos byas la/ bkru sman rnon po btang ngo/ /nad gzhi stobs che zhing khong rtsub la me drod tsha ba la sman thun nyung ngu btang bas nad glongs khong du 'khyil zhing nad gzhis lam bkag nas lte ba'i phyogs su
294a2(mdo 'grel): shas char sbo zhing/ rgyab dang/ rtsib logs dang/ mgo bo rnams su zug pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ phyis dang/ gcin dang/ rlung rnams mi bzad par 'gags par byed de de la ni bsku byug dang/ dugs dang/ red bu mas btang ba dang/ bkru sman drag bo dang/
294a3(mdo 'grel): 'jam rtsi mas btang ba rnams bya'o/ /yang na gzhang 'brum gyi skabs su bshad pa'i rtug skam gso ba'i cho ga byas na rab tu bsngags/ /rtsa ba lnga pa dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/ shu dag dang/ pu ti ka rany+dza dang/ lce myang tsha dang/ 'di rnams nas kyi
294a4(mdo 'grel): thug pa dang legs par sbyar ba 'thungs na zug gzer dang/ rtug pa 'gags pa dang/ lto sbo ba rnams 'joms so/ /pi pi ling dang/ se'i'u 'bru dang/ thal sman dang/ shing kun dang/ bca' sga dang/ star bu dang/ lce myang cha dang 'di rnams chang ngam mar ram chu dron
294a5(mdo 'grel): po gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba btang na/ tshad pa dang bad kan du 'khru ba dang/ rtag tu 'dzag pa dang/ zug cing na ba dang/ mkhreg pa rnams la phan no/ /sman 'thungs nas dri ma ci bder ma btang ste 'gags na/ nad gzhi gsum 'khrur te snying gi phyogs su nad log
294a6(mdo 'grel): nas ro stong shin tu mi bzad par 'dzings par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du rtsibs logs su zug pa dang/ skyigs bu dang/ lud pa dang nyams chung ba dang/ kha chu 'dzag pa dang/ mig mi brtan par 'gul ba dang/ lce 'cha' ba dang/ dran pa nyams pa dang/ so krig krig
294a7(mdo 'grel): bdar bar 'gyur te/ de la ni sman pa rmongs pa med par byas te/ nad mkhris pa yin pa ltar snang na ni sman mngar ba dang sbyar ba'i skyugs sman btang ngo/ /bad kan ltar snang na ni sman tsha ba dang/ lhan cig skyugs sman btang ngo/ /de nas nyas ba'i lhag ma lus
294b1(mdo 'grel): pa lta na me drod skyed pa'i sman btang la nad smin par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu nad pa de'i me drod dang/ nyams stobs skyed pa'i phyir sman dang btung ba rnams bya'o/ /sman gyi sbyor ba drags te shas cher skyug pa la ni rlung gis snying gzer cing na bar 'gyur ro/ /de la ni snum pa
294b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ skyur ba dang/ lan tsha sbyin no/ mkhris pa dang bad kan gyis snying na bal ni rang rang gi sman sbyar ba btang ngo/ /de la sman 'thungs nas bad kan gyis rlung bkag ste 'byung du mi ster ba 'am/ yang na nad tsha bas cher 'byung ste rlung 'khrugs nas yan lag 'khums
294b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ rengs pa dang/ 'dar ba dang/ zug gzer byed pa dang/ lus zhigs pa dang/ lus rdung ba snyam byed pa dang/ zug par 'gyur te de la ni rlung 'joms pa'i sman thams cad dang snum bcos dang/ dugs dang 'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang/ bsku byug dang/ chu lums
294b4(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa byas na rab tu bsngags so/ /lto snyi zhing shin tu bkres pa las bkru sman thun che zhing rno ba byin na/ myur du bad kan dang mkhris pa yang 'dren zhing lus brungs rnams 'byin zhing zad bar byed do/ /de ltar bkru sman gyi sbyor ba drags pa de la ni sman lhag
294b5(mdo 'grel): ma khong na 'dug pa de skyug sman gyis yang drang bar bya'o/ /skyugs sman gyi sbyor ba drags bas mang du skyugs pa la ni bkru sman 'jam po btang ngo/ /gzhan yang sbyor ba drags pa de la ni/ lus la blugs pa grang mo dang/ chu grang gi nang du lus gzhug pa dang/ bza' 
294b6(mdo 'grel): ba dang btung ba la sogs pa yang grang mo sbyar na 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /tsan dan dkar po dang/ stang zil dang/ pu tse shel dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma dang/ ra'i khrag dang/ sha kha ra'i chu'i nang du 'bras yos kyi phye ma btab pa'i skyo ma 'thungs na/ 'khru pa'i sbyor ba
294b7(mdo 'grel): drags pa gcod cing phan pa'i mchog yin no/ /slon sman gyi sbyor ba drags pa la ni chu grang mos blugs pa dang/ rgun 'bru la sogs pa'i khu ba mar dang sbrang rtsi dang kha ra dang ldan pa'i skyo ma blud do/ /sgregs pa dang bcas pa'i slon tshabs cher 'byung ba la
295a1(mdo 'grel): ni mur ba dang/ 'u su dang/ gla sgang dang/ mdu ka dang/ stang zil rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang lde gur sbyar ba byin no/ /skyug bzhin du lce nang du 'khums pa la ni snum pa dang/ skyur ba dang/ lan tsha dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba'i sman ma khur bar
295a2(mdo 'grel): bcad ba dang/ de bzhin du yid du 'ong ba'i mung+ga la sogs pa'i khu bcud dang sha khu phan no/ /lce nang du 'khums pa'i nang pa'i drung du skyes bu gzhan zhig shing tog skyur ba zar bcug na phan no/ /lce phyir phyung ste sdud mi nus pa la ni til dang rgun 'brum btags
295a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i lde gus bskus te slar gzhug par bya'o/ /skad 'gag sa shing rlung nad skyes pa la ni dus shes pa'i sman pas nas thug mar dang sha khu las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa sla mo byin te/ de bzhin du snum bcos dang dugs sbyar bar bya'o/ /de la sman
295a4(mdo 'grel): gyi sbyor ba thun ches te drags pas khrag dbyung ste/ de'i ming ni srog stong pa zhes bya bar bshad de/ 'di ni srog dang bcas par 'byung ba yin no/ /de ltar 'byung ba'i khrag dang zas su bsres te khyi 'am bya rog la byin la des zos par gyur
295a5(mdo 'grel): na nad pa 'tsho ba yin la/ ma zos na ni mkhris pa srog ces bya ba 'byung ba yin pas 'chi bar ston to/ /yang na ras dkar po la khrag gis bsgos te bskams la de'i 'og tu chu dron gyis bkrus na/ mdog 'gyur ba tsam las ma dag par gyur na
295a6(mdo 'grel): srog ces bya ba'i mkhris pa byung ba yin pas 'chi ba yin la dag cing rjes med pa yin na ni khrag yin te 'tsho bar bstan no/ /sbyor ba drags pa las skom dang che ba dang/ brgyal ba dang/ ma zhu bas nyams thag par 'gyur te/ de la ni mi 'chi bar bya ba'i gso ba
295a7(mdo 'grel): myur du khrag dang mkhris pa'i 'khru ba gcod pa'i sman gyis srog bsrung bar bya'o/ /ri dags dang/ ba lang dang/ ma he dang/ ra dang 'di rnams gson pa'i khrag phyung ma thag blud na srog slar rnyed de brtan par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de bas khrag de srog ces bya ba'i mkhris
295b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i gnas su song ste brtas par byed do/ ri dags la sogs pa'i khrag de nyid dkrugs te khrag gis 'jam rtsi mas btang bar yang bya'o/ /yang na pi pi ling dang/ tam pa la dang shing mar dang/ dur ba dang/ pu tse shel dang/ 'di rnams 'o ma dang lhan cig bskol ba'i nang du mar
295b2(mdo 'grel): gyi nying khu dang stang zil dang bcas pa grang mo'i 'jam rtsi mas btang bar bya'o/ /yang na 'khru ba gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i bid rtsa'i 'jam rtsi shin tu grang ba 'am/ yang na mar gyi nying khu 'jam rtsi mas gtang bar bya'o/ /gzhang phyir byung ba'i nad la ni dang po sman bskol
295b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i khu bas 'khru ba bcad la de nas slar gzhug go /dran pa nyams pa la ni snyan tshig gi rig byed dang/ gling bu dang/ glu dbyangs la sogs pa snyan pa'i sgra thos par byas na dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /skyug sman dang bkru sman de grub par bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u gsum pa rdzogs so/
295b4(mdo 'grel): de nas sman mas btang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ ba bla dang sle tres dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ ra sna dang/ rtsa ba bcu pa dang/ 'di rnams srang re re dang po son cha'i rdog ma brgyad dang/ ra'i sha srang lnga bcu dang sman de rnams kyi bcu drug 'gyur gyi chu srang nyis
295b5(mdo 'grel): brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug dang bskol te btsags la/ tshigs ma bor te bzhi cha srang drug cu rtsa bzhi lus pa'i nang du/ la la pud dang/ po son cha dang/ bilba dang/ ru rta dang/ she ta puShpa dang/ shu dag dang/ gla sgang dang/ pi pi ling dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma dang bu ram dang sbrang rtsi
295b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ mar dang/ til dang/ lan tsha dang ldan par bya ste/ dro 'jam tsam las cho ga bzhin du 'jam rtsi mas btang na mchog yin te/ nad thams cad 'joms par byed de/ nad med pa la btang na yang tshe ring ba dang lus brta bar byed do/ /phye ma dang bskol ba'i tshad ni
295b7(mdo 'grel): sman skol ba'i khu ba'i brgyad cha'i phye ma dang/ bu ram srang gcig dang/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi bzhi cha dang lan tsha ci ran tsam btab te skol la btang ngo/ /'jam rtsi btang ba'i chang gzhan du ma smos pa rnams kyang thabs 'di bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /rtsa ba bcu pa dang
296a1(mdo 'grel): ra sha lhan cig cho ga bzhin bskol ba'i nang du til mar dang/ mar dang/ zhag dang/ snum po gsum btab te/ mas btad na ni ru ha'i mchog tu drang srong rnams kyis bshad de rlung nad thams cad 'phrog go /ba la dang/ pa to la dang/ rtsa ba chung ngu dang/ e raN+Ta dang/
296a2(mdo 'grel): nas dang/ sman de rnams tshul bzhin du bskol ba'i khu ba srang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du ra'i sha khu srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bcug la yang bskol te khu ba srang sum cu rtsa gnyis lus ba'i nang du pri yang ku dang/ pi pi ling dang/ gla sgang gsum gyi phye mas sman khu'i
296a3(mdo 'grel): brgyad cha dang/ til mar dang/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ rgyam tsha rnams lhan cig bskol te 'jam rtsi mas btang na de ma thag me drod dang nyams stobs dang/ sha skye bar byed cing mig gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /e raN+Ta'i rtsa ba srang gsum dang/ pa la sha srang gsum
296a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ rtsa ba lnga chung ngu dang/ rwa sna dang/ ba la dang/ sle tres dang/ a sha gand+ha dang/ ba spru ba dang/ dong kra dang/ thang shing dang/ de rnams srang re re dang/ po son cha rdog ma brgyad dang/ de rnams chu srang nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug dang bskol te brgyad cha lus pa'i nang du shu
296a5(mdo 'grel): dag dang/ shu ti dang/ spa ma'i 'bras bu dang/ pri yang ku dang/ shing mngar dang/ pi pi ling dang/ dug mo yungs kyi sa bon dang/ gla sgang dang/ skyer khaN+Ta dang/ 'di rnams zho gnyis zhib du btags pa dang/ lan tsha ci ran tsam dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ til mar dang/ ba
296a6(mdo 'grel): gcin dang/ 'di rnams dang sbyar ba'i 'jam rtsi mas btang na stong du skyugs pa dang/ me drod skyed pa dang/ byin pa dang/ brla dang/ rkang ba dang/ mjug do dang/ rgyab dang/ lto ba dang/ snying dang/ pho mtshan rnams su zug ba dang/ lus lci ba dang/ rlung dang bshang gci 'gags
296a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang skran dang/ rde'u chags pa dang/ rlig rlugs dang/ pho ba'i nad dang gzhang 'brum dang/ de dang de la sogs pa bad kan dang/ rlung las gyur pa'i nad thams cad las rgyal bar byed do/ /shing mngar dang/ seng phrom dang/ a ru ra dang tsan dan dang/ pad+ma dang/ utpal
296b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'di rnams 'o ma'i mchog pa'i 'o ma dang/ tshul bzhin bskol te bsgrangs pa'i nang du 'tsho byed sde bcu'i phye ma dang/ kha ra dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang sbyar ba'i 'jam rtsi mas btang na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad la phan no/ /ra sna dang/ ba sha ka dang/ bcod dang/
296b2(mdo 'grel): byi tsher ba dang/ ba bla dang/ rtsa'i rtsa ba lnga zhes bya ba dur byid dang/ ku sha dang/ bu ram shing dang/ 'dam bu dang/ 'bras sA lu dang 'di rnams kyi rtsa ba dang/ rtsa ba chung ngu dang/ thal tres dang/ tsan dan dang/ shug pa rnams gnyis dang/ shing mngar dang/ gseng phrom rnam gnyis
296b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'di rnams srang phred phyed chu dang/ tshul bzhin bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ 'o ma srang drug cu rtsa bzhi dang yang bskol te 'o ma nyi tshe lus pa dang/ de'i nang du dzi ban+ti dang me da rnam gnyis dang/ nye'u shing dang/ bi da ri dang/ ram nye ba rnam gnyis dang/ rgun 'bru dang kha ra dkar po
296b4(mdo 'grel): dang dzi ba ka dang/ pad+ma ge sar dang/ pra puN+Da ri ka dang/ utpal dang/ puN+Ta rI ka dang/ seng phrom dang/ khra tra ma phre'u dang/ shing mngar dang/ nA ga ge sar dang/ muny+dza ta ka dang/ tsan dan rnam gnyis dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma btags pa dang/ mar dang sbrang rtsi dang rgyam tsha dang ldan bar bya
296b5(mdo 'grel): ste/ bsgrangs pa'i ni ru ha mas btang ngo/ /ni ru ha btang nas slar byung ba lta na srog chags thang la gnas pa'i sha khu 'am/ yang na 'o ma dang lhan cig 'bras chen byin la de'i 'og tu lus khrus byas lus tsha ba dang/ 'khru ba'i nad dang/ khrag dang mkhris pa rgyas pa dang/ snying
296b6(mdo 'grel): nad dang/ skya rbab kyi nad dang/ rims mi bzad pa rnams dang/ skran dang gcin 'gags pa dang/ mig ser la sogs pa mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad do cog sel to/ /ko sha ta dang/ dong ka dang/ thang shing dang/ mur ba dang/ gze ma dang/ dug mo cung dang/ arka dang/ pa
296b7(mdo 'grel): tha dang/ rgya sran dang/ bri ha tI dang/ 'di rnams srang lnga de drug 'gyur gyi chu srang brgya bcu dang bskol la/ bzhi cha srang nyi shu lus pa dang/ de'i nang du yungs kar dang/ sug smel dang po son cha dang/ ru rta dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis dang/ sbrang rtsi
297a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ po son cha'i mar dang thal sman dang/ yungs kar gyi mar de rnams srang gnyis gnyis dang ldan pa'i ni ru ha mas btang na me drod chung ba dang/ zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang/ bad kan las gyur pa'i nad thams cad 'joms so/ /de nas
297a2(mdo 'grel): shin tu gzhon pa 'am skyid de ba'i mi la ni snum zhing 'jam pa'i sman srang gnyis gnyis tsam gyi tshad tsam btang bar bya ste/ de yang 'o ma srang bzhi dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ til mar dang/ mar srang gnyis gnyis dang/ 'di rnams kha gzar dang dkrugs
297a3(mdo 'grel): te 'jam rtsi mas btang na rlung nad 'joms so/ /stobs 'phel zhing mdog gsal bar byed do/ /til mar dang chang gi dangs ma dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang/ de dag khyor re re dang/ bilba la sogs pa rtsa ba chen bskol ba'i khu ba srang bzhi dang/ 'di rnams
297a4(mdo 'grel): mas btang na rlung nad rnams las rgyal bar byed do/ kha? tol dang/ nim+ba dang/ pu ti ka dang/ ra sna dang/ lo ma bdun ba dang/ 'di rnams srang re re bskol ba'i khu ba srang gnyis gnyis dang/ mar srang gnyis kyi nang du yungs kar gyi phye ma btags pa'i khu ba lnga
297a5(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba yin te/ mas btang na mig nad dang/ srin nad dang/ mdze nad dang/ gcin nad rnams 'joms so/ /til mar dang/ ba gcin dang/ zho kha chu dang/ rtsabs skyur po de rnams srang gnyis gnyis yungs kar btags pa'i phye ma dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar
297a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i 'jam rtsi byas na bud med la phod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i 'og tu sbyar ba mas btang na rtug pa 'gags pa dang/ lto spo ba 'jig par byed do/ /pa? yassya dang/ bu ram shing dang/ sa la bar+Ni dang/ ra sna dang 'di rnams gang yang rung ba bskol ba'i nang
297a7(mdo 'grel): du pi pi ling btags pa'i phye ma dang/ sbrang rtsi dang mar dang bsres pa'i 'jam rtsi byas na bud med la phod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i 'og tu kun la 'bras bu mngon du grub cing gnod pa med la stobs dang lus 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang/ bde bar
297b1(mdo 'grel): byed pa'i 'jam rtsi dus thams cad du sbyar bar bya ba bshad par bya ste/ de yang sbrang rtsi dang/ til mar cha mnyam pa dang/ rgyam tsha zho gnyis dang/ shu ti zho bzhi dang/ 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma e raN+Ta'i rtsa ba bskol ba'i nang du sbyar ba ni/ sbrang rtsi dang
297b2(mdo 'grel): til mar cha mnyam pa zhes bya ba yin te/ de la ni ru ha mas btang na bcud kyi len du 'gyur te/ gcin nad dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ srin bu'i nad dang/ skran dang/ rgyu cher skyes pa'i nad sel to/ /sbyor ba gong ma'i nang du shing mngar gyi phye mas bsres na mig la
297b3(mdo 'grel): phan te khrag dang mkhris pa la phan no/ /gla sgang btang ba'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang til mar dang sha khu dang mar sbyar ba ni ya ba na zhes bya ste/ de'i 'jam rtsi byas na gzhang 'brum dang/ brla dang/ rlig pa dang/ pho mtshan rnams su zug pa las rgyal bar byed do/ /yang na sbrang rtsi
297b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ mar dang/ zhag dang/ til mar srang gnyis gnyis kyi nang du rgyam tsha zho gcig dang/ spa ma'i 'bras bu srang phyed kyi phye ma dang sbyar ba ni de yang ya bas zhes bya ste/ 'jam rtsi mas btang na phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/ /yang na a raN+Ta'i rtsa ba bskol ba'i khu
297b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i nang du shu dag dang/ pi pi ling dang/ po son cha gsum pa'i phye ma dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ til mar dang/ rgyam tsha ci ran tsam btab pa yuk+ti ra tha zhes bya ste/ de'i 'jam rtsi mas btang bar bya'o/ /yang na e raN+Ta'i rtsa ba bskol ba'i nang du shu dag dang/ shu ti dang/
297b6(mdo 'grel): shing kun dang/ rgyam tsha dang thang shing dang/ ra sna dang/ de rnams btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang/ sbyar ba ni nyes pa 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i 'jam rtsi yin te/ 'jam rtsi mas btang na dge bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na rtsa ba lnga bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du pi pi ling dang/ rgyam tsha
297b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ shing mngar dang/ de rnams btags pa'i phye ma dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ til mar btab pa ni grub pa'i 'jam rtsi zhes bya ba yin par shes par bya'o/ /yang na rtsa ba bcu pa dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ po son cha dang/ bilpa dang/ de rnams ba gcin dang tshul bzhin
298a1(mdo 'grel): bskol ba'i nang du pa tha dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ gla sgang dang/ po son cha dang/ lan tsha dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang/ til mar dang/ mar dang thal sman btab pa ni yuk+ti ra tha zhes bya ste/ de las ran par mas btang na/ bad kan
298a2(mdo 'grel): gyi nad dang/ skya rbab dang/ gsung pa dang/ khu chu dang/ rlung 'gags pa dang/ khong 'khrugs pa rnams la rab tu bsngags so/ /gla sgang dang/ pa thA dang sle tres dang/ e ran dang/ ba bla dang/ ra sna dang/ ba spru ba dang/ btsod dang/ do dag dang/ pu tse shel dang/ khyi lce
298a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ ba ru ra dang/ pu tse shel dang/ rtsa ba lta ba chung ngu dang/ de rnams srang re re dang/ de rnams chu srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang tshul bzhin bskol te bzhi cha lus pa dang btsags te/ tshig ma por ba'i dangs ma 'o ma srang drug cu rtsa bzhi dang yang
298a4(mdo 'grel): bskol te/ 'o ma lus pa dang/ 'o ma'i bzhi cha'i srog chags thang la gnas pa'i sha khu dang mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ shing mngar dang/ shu ti dang/ pi pi ling dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ skyer khaN+Ta dang/ 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma btab
298a5(mdo 'grel): ste bsres pa'i 'jam rtsi dro 'jam tsam mas btang na/ lus kyi sha dang me drod dang/ stobs dang/ khu chu rnams 'phel zhing dreg nad dang/ rmong bag du 'dug pa dang/ gcin nad dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ skran dang/ bshang gci 'gags pa dang/ rims
298a6(mdo 'grel): mi bzad pa dang/ shu ba mched pa dang/ rgyu rlugs dang/ bad kan tshad par 'khru ba rnams 'joms te/ de bzhin du brla dbrag dang/ brla dang rked pa dang/ dku dang/ gnya' rengs dang/ rna ba dang/ mgo bo rnams su na zhing zug pa dang/ zla mtshan gyi nad dang/
298a7(mdo 'grel): smyo byed dang/ skrang ba dang/ lus pa dang/ rde'u chags pa dang/ rlung 'khyil pa rnams sel to/ /gzhan yang mig la phan zhing bu skye bar byed de/ ya ga na zhes bya ba'i 'jam rtsi'i mchog yin te/ bcud kyi len du 'gyur ro/ /ri dags gdong chung ba ri bong dang/
298b1(mdo 'grel): phag la sogs pa'i sha rtsa ba bcu pa dang lhan cig bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du spa ma'i 'bras bu dang/ shu ti dang/ gla sgang btags pa'i phye ma dang/ snum chen po dang/ ldan pa'i ni ru ha mas btang na/ shin tu bud med la nyal phod par 'gyur ro/ /rma bya'i gshog pa dang/
298b2(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa dang/ rgyu ma dang/ rkang pa dang mchu dang/ rtug pa rnams bor ba'i sha 'ba' zhig dang/ rtsa ba chung ngu lnga srang re re dang/ sman gyi brgyad 'gyur gyi chu dang/ 'o ma lhan cig bskol te 'o ma lus pa'i nang du/ bi da ri dang/ pi pi ling dang/ shing mngar dang/ shu ti
298b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ po son cha btags pa'i phye ma dang/ mar dang sbrang rtsi dang/ lan tsha cung zad btab te/ de las 'jam rtsi mas btang na lus kyi stobs dang khu chu 'phel bar byed pa'i mchog yin te/ rma bya'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du sregs pa la sogs pa khron rko bas
298b4(mdo 'grel): kha zas tshol ba thams cad dang/ bye'u la sogs pa mchus zas thu ba thams cad dang/ seng ge la sogs pa mthu rtsal gyis zas tshol ba thams cad kyi sha re re la yang cho ga de lta bya ste/ de bzhin du chu la gnas pa dad? pa dang/ ro ha ste la sogs
298b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sha rnams rma bya'i cho ga ltar bya ste/ nya sha la ni 'o ma spang ngo/ /srog chags go nga dang/ sre mo dang/ byi la dang/ sha lya ka dang/ byi ba dang/ de rnams kyi sha srang bcu bcu dang/ rtsa ba lnga pa de dang mnyam pa dang tshul bzhin bskol la 'o ma lus pa'i nang du/
298b6(mdo 'grel): po son cha dang/ pi pi ling dang/ lan tsha rnam gnyis kyi phye ma dang/ khar dang/ til mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang ldan pa'i 'jam rtsi sbyar te btang na bcud kyis len du 'gyur te/ lus kyi rtsol bas glog 'grams pa dang/ dbang po rnams mi gsal ba dang/
298b7(mdo 'grel): stobs dang/ gzi mdangs nyams pa dang/ khu chu dang bshang gci 'gags pa dang dreg nad la phan zhing de bzhin du rta dang glang po che dang/ shing rta la sogs pa las lhung zhing rkang lag chag cing grugs pa rnams la 'jam rtsi btang na slar 'tsho bar
299a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ ro rtsa bar byed pa'i yul yin no/ /bza' ba ni kha sral dang/ byi tsher ba las gzhi blangs pa'i 'o thug sbyin no/ /e raN+Ta la sogs pa'i 'jam rtsi mas btang ba'i sbyor ba de dag ni cho ga bsrung mi dgos par grung ba'i sman du
299a2(mdo 'grel): bshad pa yin no/ /da ni rlung nad 'joms shing bsrung ba dang bcas pa'i 'jam rtsi mas btang ba brjod par bya ste/ de yang rtsa ba bcu pa dang/ ba la dang/ rwa sna dang/ a sha gand+ha dang/ ba spru ba dang/ sle tres dang/ e raN+Ta dang/ tik+ta dang/ ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ ba sha ka dang/
299a3(mdo 'grel): b+hu ti ka dang nye'u shing dang/ sa ha tsa ra dang/ ka ka na se dang/ de rnams srang re re dang nas dang/ mon sran gre'u dang/ zar ma dang/ rgya shug dang rgya sran dang/ 'di rnams srang gnyis gnyis chu srang nyis stong bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang tshul bzhin bskol te bzhi cha khu ba srang
299a4(mdo 'grel): lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis lus pa'i nang du a ru ra dang/ 'tsho byed sde bcu srang re re'i phye ma dang til mar srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig bskol te/ 'jam rtsi mas btang na rlung nad thams cad sel bar byed do/ /yang na thang la gnas pa'i srog chags kyi zhag
299a5(mdo 'grel): 'tsho byed sde bcu dang/ goms pa bzhin byas pa'i 'jam rtsi btang na rlung nad thams cad sel to/ /yang na shu ti dang/ nas dang/ bilba dang/ rang skyur dang/ til mar de rnams tshul bzhin bskol ba'i til mar ni rlung nad can la sbyar ro/ /yang na rgyam tsha me'i nang du sregs te dmar por
299a6(mdo 'grel): gyur ba dang/ mar gyi nang du bsnyugs te/ de bzhin du yang dang yang byas pa'i mar gyi 'jam rtsi mas btang na rlung nad las rgyal bar byed do/ /dzi ban+ti dang/ po son cha dang/ me da rnam gnyis dang/ sra ba ni dang/ shing mngar dang/ ba la dang/ shu ti dang/ zangs rtsi ba dang/ pi
299a7(mdo 'grel): pi ling dang/ ka ka na se dang/ nye'u shing dang/ kha sral dang/ ram nye ba 'o ma can dang/ ka? ha sriM gi dang/ zur ba dang/ shu dag dang 'di rnams btags pa'i phye ma dang/ mar dang/ til mar dang/ de'i gzhi 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang sbyar te 'jam rtsi mas btang na/ nyams rta ba
299b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ rlung dang mkhris pa 'joms shing nyams stobs dang me drod dang khu chu 'phel bar byed de/ khrag dang khu ba'i nad phrog cing bu skyed par byed do/ /yang na rgyam tsha dang po son cha dang ru rta dang/ shu ti dang lcang ma dang/ shu dag dang/ ba bla ka dang/ shing mngar dang/ ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ thang shing dang/
299b2(mdo 'grel): katpa la dang/ dong gra dang/ ma nu dang/ me da dang/ dbyi mo dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ zur ba dang/ bi dang ga dang/ bong nga dkar po dang/ tri ba tsa dang/ ha re nu ga dang/ ni li ni dang/ thi ra dang/ bilba dang/ ting mu sa dang/ pi pi ling dang/ dan+ti dang/ ra sna dang/ 'di rnams cha mnyam ste e raN+Ta'i mar ram/ til
299b3(mdo 'grel): mar dang/ bskol ba las 'jam rtsi byas na/ bad kan las gyur pa'i nad thams cad 'jams te/ de bzhin du rlig rlugs dang/ phyi sa 'khyil ba dang/ skran dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ mcher ba na ba dang/ gcin nad dang/ brla rengs pa'i nad dang/ lto sbo ba dang/ rde'u chags pa rnams
299b4(mdo 'grel): myur du sel bar byed do/ /yang na bilpa la sogs pa'i rtsa ba lnga til mar dang bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi mas btang na rlung nad dang bad kan gyi nad 'joms so/ /yang na bad kan la phan pa'i sman tsha ba lnga la sogs pa dang til mar lhan cig bskol te 'jam rtsi byas na yang phan? no?/ /yang na
299b5(mdo 'grel): til mar dang de'i brgyad 'gyur gyis bskyur dang lhan cig bskol ba'i nang du/ po son cha'i phye mas btab pa'i 'jam rtsi bad kan can la btang ngo/ /rmod dag tu gyur pa la ni mas btang ba rno ba 'jam po 'dod do/ de rno ba btang ba'i rjes la ni/ 'jam pa'i sman btang ste/ de yang 'jam
299b6(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ snum pa dang mngar ba dang/ bsil ba rnams so/ /'jam pa'i rjes la ni rnon po btang ste/ de la rno ba'i sman ni ba gcin dang/ bi lu dang/ kru trug tre sa dang/ lan tsha dang/ thal sman dang/ yungs kar rnams so/ /de yang dug dang gnas skabs shes par byas nas 'o ma dang
299b7(mdo 'grel): mar la sogs pa ni 'jam pa la sbyar ro/ /thog mar sman pa blo dang ldan pas nad pa'i nyams stobs dang dus kyi bye brag dang/ nad gzhi dang/ rang bzhin gyi bye brag shes par byas nas nad bzhi so so dang mthun pa'i sman gyi sde mtshan gang yin pa dang sbyar ba'i
300a1(mdo 'grel): 'jam rtsi mas btang bar bya'o/ /nad pa tsha bas nyam thag pa la ni bsil ba'i 'jam rtsi btang zhing nyams brta ba'i kha zas la sogs pa bsil bag sbyar ro/ /grang bas nyams thag pa la ni sman dang ldan pa'i 'jam rtsi kha zas la
300a2(mdo 'grel): sogs pa drod bag sbyar ro/ /skyes bu gang gi mdze nad dang tshil rgyas pa'i nad dang/ gcin nad rnams la ni bkru sman sbyar bar rigs kyi nyams brta ba'i 'jam rtsi mi bya'o/ /lus zad pa dang/ glo 'grams pa dang/ nyam chung ba dang/ brgyal ba dang/ lus
300a3(mdo 'grel): rjud pa dang/ skem pa dang/ slon khrus kyis lus dag zin pa rnams la ni/ skyug sman mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du gang gi srog zungs phyi sa brtan par 'dzin pa la yang bkru sman mi btang ngo/ /cho ga grub pa'i gnas las sman mas btang ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi
300a4(mdo 'grel): pa rdzogs so// //de nas sman mas btang ba'i cho gas nad phyin te sos par bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ de la nad pa snum dang dugs ma byas pa dang lto shin tu lci ba mas btang ba'i sman grang mo dang/ snum dang/ lan tsha nyung ba dang
300a5(mdo 'grel): sman thun tshad chungs pa dang/ yang na bska ba mas btang na sman gyi stobs chung bas nad gzhi 'khrugs nas mi 'byung ste sbyor ba log pa des ni rung dang phyi sa dang gcin 'gag cing chu so dang lte ba na ba yin la/ lus tsha zhing dang ka mer mer por byad
300a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ gzhang skrang ba dang/ g.ya' ba dang/ 'bras byung ba dang/ mdog 'gyur ba dang/ gnas la ming dang ba dang/ me drod chung bar 'gyur te/ de la ni 'khru ba gso ba'i le'u las 'byung ba'i sman bu tika dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bca' sga dang/ shu dag dang/
300a7(mdo 'grel): 'u su dang/ a ru ra bskol ba 'am/ yang na bilpa dang/ 'u su dang/ gla sgang dang/ bca' sge dang/ ba la ka dang/ de rnams bskol ba 'am/ sbyor ba de gnyis gang yang rung ba dron po 'thungs na rab tu bsngags so/ /yang na rtug pa 'gags te zug gzer che ba
300b1(mdo 'grel): la na po son cha li reng bu btang zhing dugs bya ba dang/ dus tshod shes par byas la bkru sman yang btang ste/ bilba'i rtsa ba dang/ du rbid dang/ thang shing dang/ nas dang/ rgyu shug dang/ rgya sran dang/ 'di rnams btags pa'i chang dang ba gcin dang/ lhan cig mas btang na phyi
300b2(mdo 'grel): sa 'gags bsel bar 'gyur ro/ /de la nad gzhi stobs che ba 'am/ khong du rtsub pa 'am/ lto sra ba la sman thun chung ba 'am/ nus pa chung ba'i sman mas btang na/ nad gzhi rnams slong te/ rlung rgyu ba'i rgyu srang 'gags nas/ rlung la ma log par song ste/ lto sbos
300b3(mdo 'grel): shing gnad rnams kyang shin tu gzir cing na bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lus tsha ba dang/ gzhang dang/ lto ba dang/ rlig pa dang/ chu so rnams su zug cing na ba dang/ rlung de snying la brten cing lus thams cad du 'pho ste/ na bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni bsku byug dang dugs bya ste/ po
300b4(mdo 'grel): son cha'i reng bu sbyar bar bya'o/ /yang na bilba la sogs pa gong du smos pa'i sman bskol ba'i nang du pi lu'i 'bras bu dang/ dug mo nyung gi phye ma dang/ ba gcin du sbyar ba ni ru ha mas btang na phan no/ /yang na ko nyon tse dang/ thang shing dang/ til mar dang sbyar ba'i
300b5(mdo 'grel): 'jam rtsi mas btang bar bya'o/ /mas btang ba de bar du bcad cing btang ba 'am/ yang na btsir drags pa 'am/ thun ches pa 'am/ lan tsha dang snum med pa 'am/ grang ba 'am/ sman nyung ba 'am/ 'jam po btang bar gyur na ni rlung gis gyen tu phul te kha 'am/
300b6(mdo 'grel): sna nas 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de'i dbang gis brgyal ba dang/ brang che zhing kha nas chu 'byung ba dang/ skom dad che ba dang/ lus tsha ba la sogs pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar brgyal ba la sogs par gyur na/ de ma thag tu chu grang mos gdong la gtor ro/ /brgyal ba
300b7(mdo 'grel): des? dub bar gyur pa la ni/ rlung yab kyis g.yab cing dbugs bsdams te rdub du gzhug go /de nas nad ba de kha bub du bzhag ste/ rgyab dang rtsib logs dang lto ba rnams su lag pa la sogs pa dron pos mnye zhing dugs bya'o/ /de nas rgyal bu'i skyes bus
301a1(mdo 'grel): tshig spyo ba dang bcas pas skra las drangs shing drud pa dang/ mtshon dang me mched pa dang/ sbrul dang/ mche ba can la sogs pas 'jigs par byas na mas btang ba de tshul bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /des kyang ma thub na ji
301a2(mdo 'grel): ltar yang mi 'chi ba'i thabs bya ste/ lag pa gnyis sam ras kyis mgul ba dam du bcings na srog ces bya ba dang/ gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung gis lam 'gags te/ thur du sel ba'i rlung zhes bya ba des rang gi gnas su 'og tu myur du 'dren par byed do/ /
301a3(mdo 'grel): yang na ru rta dang gseng phrom gnyis kyi phye ma rang skyur dang bskol te blud na dro ba dang/ rno ba dang/ 'khru ba'i rang bzhin yin pas/ mas btang ba'i sman de lugs bzhin 'byung ngo/ /yang na dur byid dang/ a ru ra'i phye ma ba gcin dang bskyos pa 'thungs
301a4(mdo 'grel): na thur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhu ba'i gnas su mas btang ba'i sman 'dug pa la ni thog mar dugs byas la/ de'i 'og tu rtsa ba bcu pa dang nas dang rgya shug dang rgya sran rnams pa gcin dang lhan cig bskol te ni ru ha mas btang ngo/ /yang na sle tres dang
301a5(mdo 'grel): smyug ma'i lo ma dang/ pu ta ka rany+dza'i shun pa dang/ lo ma dang/ zur ba dang/ thang shing dang/ b+hu ti ka dang/ 'di rnams ba gcin dang bskol la/ til mar dang bu ram dang/ rgyam tsha dang bcas pa'i nang du bkru sman gyi phye mas btab pa mas btang ngo/ /mas btang
301a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i sman de brang gi nang du byung ba la ni bilba la sogs pa rtsa ba lnga bskol ba mas btang ngo/ /mgo bor byung ba la ni snar blugs pa'i sman dang dud pa btang ba dang/ yungs mar gyi lde gus mgo bo bsku'o/ /mas btang ba'i sbyor ba drod ches pa dang/ rno ches
301a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ sgyur drags pa dang/ bska ches pa'i sman nad pa dugs ma byas pa dang/ nad gzhi chung ba dang/ rgyu snyi ba la btang ba 'am/ yang dang yang btang na ni sbyor ba drags pa yin te/ khong pa'i nang du nad skyed par byed do/ /mas btang ba'i sbyor ba drags te mang du
301b1(mdo 'grel): 'bru na bkru sman drags pa'i gso ba ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/ /yang na mas btang ba'i sman dang/ thal sman dang/ skyur ba dang/ do ba dang lan tsha rnams mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can la sbyar la/ gzhang gi nang du tsha ba skyes te zus pa snyam byed cing gnod pa dang bcas
301b2(mdo 'grel): ? par 'khru bar byed do/ /'khru ba de yang khrag bcas pa lta bu 'byung la mkhris pa yang shugs drag pos shas cher 'byung ste/ yang nas yang du dran pa stor bar 'gyur ro/ /de la ni khrag dang mkhris pa'i 'khru ba'i gso ba rab tu bsngags so/ /de bzhin du gzhang
301b3(mdo 'grel): tsha ba la sogs pa'i nad de la ni/ dur byid kyi phye ma rgun chu'i nang du bskyos pa blud do/ /ji ltar mkhris pa'i 'khru ba gso ba bzhin du/ rlung dang mkhris pa gso ba'i cho ga byas na yang gnod pa sel bar byed do/ /de ltar skyes bu de'i khong dang/ ba lta na/ thug
301b4(mdo 'grel): pa grang po kha ra dang bcas pa blud do/ /de ltar 'khru ba'i 'og tu bshad pa zad par 'gyur ba dang/ bza' bar ni mon sran gre'u'i khu bcud dang/ mon sren rde'u la sogs pa'i chan dang lhan cig sbyin no/ /btung bar ni zho dang chang blud do/ /de rtsub por gyur pa'i
301b5(mdo 'grel): sbyor bas nad phyin te sos par bya ba bstan nas/ da ni snum bcos kyi 'jam rtsi mas btang bas nad phyin te sos par bya ba bshad par bya ste/ de yang rlung las gyur pa'i nad 'jam rtsi grang ba'am/ nyung ba btang ba dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni shin
301b6(mdo 'grel): tu rno ches ba btang ba dang/ bad kan las gyur pa la 'jam pa dang de bzhin du dangs pa la 'jam rtsi 'ju dka' ba dang/ hi ma mang du gsogs pa la sman nus stobs chung ba btang na/ snum rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi dang 'dres nas nang du 'khyil te slar 'byung
301b7(mdo 'grel): bar mi 'gyur te/ de ltar rlung dang 'dres te phyir mi 'byung ba des ni/ rengs pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni/ brla stobs zhan pa dang/ skyigs bu dang/ rims dang/ gzer ba dang/ yan lag brtung brtung ba snyam byed pa dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ 'dar
302a1(mdo 'grel): bu rnams 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /de lta bu la ni snum pa dang/ lan tsha dang/ dro ba dang/ rno ba'i sman ko nyon tsi'i mar dang/ ra sna dang/ rang skyur dang/ tshang dang/ rgya shug dang/ rgya sran dang/ nas rnams bskol ba 'am yang na ni ru ha
302a2(mdo 'grel): mas btang na sel bar byed do/ /de nas zas zos la gong gi ni ru ha'i sman gyi sbyor ba gnyis po gang yang rung ba til mar dang sbyar ba'i 'jam rtsi nyi ma phyed phyed tsam na btang ngo/ /'jam rtsi mas btang ba de nang du mkhris pa dang 'dres nas phyir mi 'byung
302a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i mtshan ma ni skom dang che ba dang/ tsha ba che ba dang/ mdog dngar ba dang/ rmong bag du 'dug pa dang/ mdog 'gyur ba dang/ mun par mthong ba dang/ rims kyis 'debs pa rnams yin par shes par bya ste/ de la ni kha ba dang/ mngar ba'i sman dang sbyar
302a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i ni ru ha mas btang bar bya'o/ /'jam rtsi mas btang ba de bad kan gyi nang du 'khyil te phyir ma byung ba'i mtshan ma ni snyom pa dang/ rims grang mos thebs pa dang/ skyid zhan pa dang cham pas btab pa dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ lus lci ba dang/
302a5(mdo 'grel): brgyal ba dang/ rab tu na ba yin par shes par bya ste/ de la ni bska ba dang/ kha ba dang/ tsha ba'i sman chang dang/ ba gcin las gzhi blangs la/ bo son cha dang/ skyur dang/ til mar dang/ bcas pa'i ni ru ha mas btang bas zhi bar bya'o/ /'drangs ches ba
302a6(mdo 'grel): la 'jam rtsi mas btang nas phyir ma byung ba'i mtshan ma ni/ skyug bro ba dang/ brgyal ba dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ snyom pa dang/ gzer ba dang/ rmya ba dang yan lag brdung brdung ba snyam byed pa dang/ gzhan yang ma zhu ba'i mtshan ma rnams 'byung
302a7(mdo 'grel): zhing lus tsha bar byed de/ de la ni sman rno ba bskol ba'i nang du lan tsha'i phye ma btab pa blud de zhu bar gyur pa dang/ bkru sman 'jam po btang la dar ba las gzhi blangs pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba phan no/ /'jam rtsi mas btab pa de phyi sa dang
302b1(mdo 'grel): gnyis 'dres nas nang du gsogs shing phyir 'byung du mi 'dod pa'i mtshan ma ni phyi sa dang gcin dang/ rlung 'gags pas nyams thag pa dang/ lus lci ba dang/ lto sbo ba dang/ ro stod 'dzings pa rnams yin par shes par bya ste/ de la ni snum pa dang dugs dang/ reng bu
302b2(mdo 'grel): mas btang ba dang/ dur byid dang/ bilba la sogs gong du smos pa'i sbyor bas ni ru ha dang/ a nu bas nams btang ngo/ /yang na rtug pa 'gags pa'i cho gar bshad pa bzhin bya ste zhi bar bya'o/ /kha zas ma zos te ltogs pa dang/ gzhang tshe ste ltogs pa dang/ thug pa
302b3(mdo 'grel): 'thung ba 'am/ yang na nyung ngu 'thung ba 'jam rtsi shugs drag pos mas btang bar byas na ro stong du 'byung zhing de nas mgrin par 'byung ste/ mgo bo'i bug pa sna tshogs su 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byung ba ni nas dang/ dur byid dang/ rgya shug dang/ rgya sran dang/ 'di
302b4(mdo 'grel): rnams pa gcin dang/ til mar dang/ tshul bzhin du bsgrubs la ni ru ha dang 'jam rtsi mas btang bar bya'o/ /'jam rtsi mas btang ba de mgul bar byung la ni mgul ba bsdam ba dang/ bcing ba dang/ bkru sman btang ba dang/ skyug pa 'joms shing sman gyis bzlog par bya'o/ /
302b5(mdo 'grel): 'jam rtsi de ma tshos par btang na ni gzhang gi nang du yog pa ltar 'dug cing/ rgyun sran rnams su tshul bzhin mi 'gro ste/ de yang zug gzer che la rmong bag du 'dug cing g.ya' ba dang/ skrang bar byed do/ /de la ni sman rno ba mas btang ba 'am/ de bzhin du arga'i lo ma bskol
302b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i til mar dang bsgrubs bsams btang ngo/ /'jam rtsi nang du gtong khar rlung legs par ma byung ste/ spu bu'i kha nas sngon rlung song ngam/ yang na rgyun srang rnams 'gags te 'gror ma 'dod pa 'am/ yang na sman lhag ma ma lus par btang ste/ de'i rjes la sbugs su
302b7(mdo 'grel): zhugs nas rlung 'khrugs par 'gyur te/ na zhing zug par gyur pa de la ni bsku byug dang/ gzhang gi phyogs su dugs bya ba dang/ rlung 'joms pa'i sman sbyar ro/ /'jam rtsi nang du brtang thabs su bcug ste/ phyung ba'i dus su yang ring thabs su phyung ngam/ spu bu yon por btang
303a1(mdo 'grel): ngam/ gtong zhing nad pas lus 'gul skyod byas na/ rked pa dang/ gzhang dang/ rje dar dang/ brla dang/ chu so rnams su rengs shing nad kyis nyams thag par 'gyur ste/ de la ni rlung 'joms pa'i bza' ba dang/ dugs dang/ bsku byug dang/ mas btang ba
303a2(mdo 'grel): rnams kyang rlung la phan pa'i sman dang sbyar ba btang na phan no/ /'jam rtsi gtong bzhin du bcing ba lhod dam grol te mar phyir bor te/ rlung nang du zhugs nas brang dang mgo bor zug gzer skye zhing rlung gi stobs chen ni gong ma'i gnod pa rnams kyang skyed par 'gyur te/ de
303a3(mdo 'grel): bas na de la ni bilba la sogs pa rtsa ba lnga 'am/ yang na po son cha la sogs pa 'am/ sha ma dur byid la sogs pa sbyor te de gsum gang yang rung ba gcin dang sbyar ba mas btang ngo/ /'jam rtsi mas btang ba de btsir drags na ni khong pa dang/ mgul bar 'gro bar
303a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ de la ni sman mas btang ba dang/ bkru sman btang ba dang/ mgul ba bsdams pa'i las rnams bya'o/ /de ltar smon khrus la sogs pas lus dag par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu sman pas lus kyis nyams stobs dang/ me'i drod chung ba las bza' ba dang btung ba mi
303a5(mdo 'grel): mthus la rnams bsgrims nas bsrung bar bya ste/ ji ltar sgong gzhon nu 'am 'bru mar gyis gang ba'i snod bzhin bsrung bar bya'o/ /de ltar slon khrus kyis lus dag pa'i nad pa de la ni thog mar kha zas mngar ba dang/ de'i 'og tu skyur ba dang lan tshar bcas pa
303a6(mdo 'grel): sbyin no/ /de'i 'og tu mngar ba dang/ kha ba sbyin no/ /de'i 'og tu bska ba dang tsha ba sbyin no/ /de ltar ro rnams gcig la gcig mi mthun pa sbyin no/ /ji ltar snum pa dang rtsub pa bzhin no/ /rim pa de ltar byas pa'i sbyor bas lus nyams tha mal bar sbyar bar bya'o//
303a7(mdo 'grel): lus kyi nyams tha mal ba zhes bya ba ni las thams cad nus shing nyams rtogs brtan pa yin te/ rang bzhin gyi lus zhes bya'o/ /cho ga grub pa'i gnas las sman mas btang ba'i chogs dang phyin te sos par bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so// //
