303b1(mdo 'grel): de nas sman gyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ de la thog ma sman sa yul ji lta bu las btu bar bya zhen dro grang mnyam pa'i yul dang thang mnyam pa'i yul dang thang mnyam pa dang/ sa mdog snum pa dang/ gnag pa dang gser gyi mdog ltar 'dug pa dang/ de dag
303b2(mdo 'grel): ? phyogs gang gtsang zhing snyi ba dang/ chu g.yas phyogs su 'bab cing rtswa ku sha dang/ b+hu ti ka la sogs pa yod pa'i sa dang/ gshol la sogs pas rmos pa'i sa las skyes pa blangs la/ shing chen po'i sgrib ma la sogs pas gnod pa byas pa dang/ de bzhin du
303b3(mdo 'grel): dung khrod dang/ mchod rten dang/ lha khang dang/ mchod rten rnying ba'i drud du skyes pa dang grog ma'i gnas su skyes pa'i sman rnams dang spang ste/ de bzhin du srin 'bu la sogs pas zos pa dang/ nyi mas tshig pa dang/ nags tshig pa'i nang du skyes pa dang/ 'byung po gnas
303b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i shing drung du skyes pa dang/ shing chen po'i lo ma dang/ yal ga la sogs pa las 'bab pa'i chu phog pa dang/ shing gi lo ma las nyi ma 'bab pa'i dugs kyi sa phog pa'i sman dang/ 'di rnams lta bu spangs te/ rtsa ba chen po byang phyogs su bstan te zug pa'i
303b5(mdo 'grel): sman rnams dus ji lta ba bzhin brngas pa dang/ mdog dang dri la sogs pa dang ldan pa rnams blangs na rab tu bsngags so/ /de nas sman pa bdag nyid lus khrus dang gtsang sbra dang smyung ba byas la bkra shis pa'i cho ga 'don cing shin tu gus pa dang bcas pas gnas
303b6(mdo 'grel): dag zhing shis pa las skyes pa'i sman rnams bcud dang/ yon tan 'dus kyi bye brag shes par bya ste lo gcig tshun chad kyi sman sar pa btu zhing dpyad par bzang ngo/ /bu ram dang/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ 'bru thams cad dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bi dang ga dang/
303b7(mdo 'grel): ming du smos pa de dag ni rnying pa bzang ngo/ /de la ba lang la sogs pa'i 'o ma thams cad dpyad pa'i tshul ni ba gzhon zhing nyams stobs dang ldan pa khrag la sogs pa'i lus zungs ma nyams pa dang/ spu dang/ rwa dang rmig pa la sogs pas brgyan pa/
304a1(mdo 'grel): nad med cing be'u btsas nas yun ring du lon pa'i 'o ma dang/ gcin dang lci ba la sogs pa blang ngo/ /lan tsha ma gtogs pa smin thams cad khu ba dang phye ma dang/ bskol ba dang/ spangs pa grang mo dang phan Ta dang/ de dag 'di ltar
304a2(mdo 'grel): btags par bya ste/ sbyor ba lnga po de dag kyang gong ma bzhin du nus pa che ba yin no/ /de la rang gi khu ba zhes bya ba ni sman de ma thag btus la brdungs te tshogs kyis btsags pa'i rang gi khu ba'o/ /phye ma zhes bya ba ni sman btags pa'i phye ma gzhan la
304a3(mdo 'grel): gdab pa'i ched du byas pa'o/ /yang na sman skam po btags pa'i phye ma la yang bya'o/ /bskol ba zhes bya ba ni sman thams cad pa 'am/ cham chom brdungs pa cho ga bzhin du chu dang lhan cig bskol ba la bya'o/ /spangs pa'i grang mo zhes bya ba ni sman
304a4(mdo 'grel): rnams chu grang gi nang du bcug la bsil ba'i sar nub gcig bzhag te tho rangs btung ba'o/ /phan Ta zhes bya ba ni chu bskol ba dron po'i nang du sman bcug la brdungs te mnyes la bsros te bcags te btung ba'o/ /rang gi khu ba la sogs pa de
304a5(mdo 'grel): dag kyang nad kyi stobs che chung la brtags te cho ga bzhin du ran par btang ngo/ /de yang drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bus bshad pa na re sman gyi tshad ran ba zhes bya ba ni nges pa med de/ nad kyi bye brag dang lto sra snyi dang/ nyams stobs che chung dang/ dus
304a6(mdo 'grel): dang yul gyi bye brag shes par byas nas sman yang de bzhin du brtag par bya'o/ /'on kyang rang gi khu ba btung ba'i 'bring tshad ni srang bzhi'i tshad tsam ni ran ba yin no/ /zhes bshad do/ /phye ma bskol ba'i tshad ni sman gcig chu srang bcu drug dang bskol
304a7(mdo 'grel): te bzhi cha gcig lus pa btung ba'o/ /sman bskol te bsgrangs pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba srang drug gi nang du sman gcig bcug nas nub gcig spangs pa blud do/ /phan Ta ni chu srang bzhi'i nang du sman srang gcig bcug la nub gcig spangs
304b1(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /mar bskol ba'i tshang ma smos pa rnams ni sman gyi phye ma'i bzhi 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang/ de'i bzhi 'gyur gyi chu dang bskol lo/ /chu nyi tshe dang bskol ba yin na ni mar ci tsam pa'i bzhi cha'i phye ma dang/ de'i bcu drug 'gyur gyi chu dang bskol ba'o/ /sman bskol
304b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i khu ba dang sbyor ba yin na ni mar gyi brgyad cha'i phye ma dang lhan cig bskol ba'o/ zhes zer ro/ /bskol te tshos pa'i tshad ni sman gyi tshigs ma lag pa la mi 'byar te dril tu btub pa 'am/ yang na mer bcug te sgra med pa dang/ gang gi tshe mdog dang dri dang ro
304b3(mdo 'grel): rnams ma gyur te ldan pa'i tshe na ni tshos pa'i tshad yin te de ma thag byung ngo/ /mar chos pa'i tshad ni lbu ba zhi pa'o/ /til mar chos pa'i tshad ni lbu ba byung ba'o/ /lde gu'i tshad ni gang du btub cing chu nang du bcug na nang du 'bying ba'o/ /tshos pa'i tshad kyang rnam
304b4(mdo 'grel): pa gsum ste/ chos pa dang po tshigs ma dang dangs ma 'dres pa'o/ /chos pa ran pa'i tshad ni dangs snyigs phyed pa'o/ /rab tu tshos pa ni snyigs ma cung zad cig mdog nag por gyur la/ de yang dril du btub pa'i tshad do/ /rab tu tshos pa de ni snum shas
304b5(mdo 'grel): chung zhing nus pa zhan pa yin no/ /tshos pa dang po ni drod nyams par byed do/ /tshos pa ran pa ni blugs pa la sbyar ro/ /rab tu tshos pa ni lus bsku ba la sbyar ro/ /tshos pa ran pa ni btung ba dang mas btang ba gnyis la sbyar ro/ /ma sha drug la shan gcig shan bzhi la
304b6(mdo 'grel): zho gnyis de bzhi la srang gcig /de'i bzhi 'gyur ni ku d+ha ba zhes ste srang bzhi'o/ /de'i bzhi 'gyur la bre'u chung gang ngo/ /bre'u chung bzhi la a d+ha ka ste bre 'bring ngo/ /bre 'bring bzhi la bre bo gcig go /bre bo che bzhi la ba ha zhes bya ba'i tshad do/ /ku d+ha ba la sogs
304b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshad bstan pa de dag ni phye ma dang sman bskol ba'i nang du gdab pa skam po'i tshad bstan pa yin gyi/ gal te sman rlon pa 'am/ sman khu lta bu ni nyis 'gyur du skyed de sbyar ro/ /gang du sman gyi srang tshad nges par ma smos pa rnams ni chab snyams te sbyar ro/ /
305a1(mdo 'grel): sha na gnyis la zho gcig yin te/ de'i ming gi rnam grangs ni pA te ka dang/ ko la dang/ ba ta dang/ tra kU ma ste/ de dag ni ming gi rnam grangs so/ /zho gnyis la karsha gcig yin te de'i ming ni ak+Sha dang/ pi tsu dang/ pa ni twa la dang/ su par+Na
305a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ ka pa la gra ha dang/ karsha dang/ bi d+ha ba da dang/ tindu ka dang/ pa ni dang ma ni ka dang/ de dag ni karsha'i ming gi rnam grangs so/ /karsha gnyis la shu ste zhes bya ba yin te/ de'i ming ni atA mya ka dang bi tsu zhes bya ste ming gi rnam grangs so/ /karsha bzhi la srang gcig
305a3(mdo 'grel): ste de'i ming la pa la dang/ pra bun tsa dang/ bilpa dang/ mushTi dang/ a sa dang/ tsa turti ka dang/ de dag ni srang gcig gi ming gi rnam grangs/ /srang gnyis la khyor gang khyor do la snyim gang/ snyim pa do la phul gang/ a da ka zhes bya ba bre 'bring gi ming gi rnam
305a4(mdo 'grel): grangs la/ Ad+ha kam dang/ b+ha dzA na dang/ ka nas te de dag ni bre 'brid gi ming gi rnam grangs so/ /dro na te bre bo'i ming ni kumpa dang/ g+ha d+ha dang/ ma na ste de dag ni ming gi rnam grangs so/ /srang brgya la tu la zhes bya ste/ de'i nyis 'gyur la khur cig ces brjod do//
305a5(mdo 'grel): ri gangs can dang/ ri 'bigs byed ri bran sna tshogs kyis bskor ba ni sman sna tshogs pa'i gzhi yin te/ de yang ri gangs can ni byang phyogs na gnas te de la ni bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i sman sna tshogs skye'o/ /ri 'bigs byed ni lho phyogs na
305a6(mdo 'grel): gnas te/ de la ni dro ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa sna tshogs skye'o/ /cho ga grub pa'i gnas las sman gyi cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa rdzogs so// //sman pa'i bdag po seng ge spas pa zhes bya ba'i bu sman pa chen po pha gol zhes bya bas
305a7(mdo 'grel): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po mdzad pa las/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i gnas lnga pa'o/ /sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po las mchog bzhi bcu pa'i cho ga'i le'u brjod par bya ste/ de yang thog mar byis pa gso ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad
305b1(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o/ /dang po byis pa btsas ma thag tu mar dang rgyam tshar ldan pa'i chus lus bkru bar bya'o/ /de nas mngal nas byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa la/ ba la dang 'bru mar gyis bkru'o/ /de'i 'og tu byis pa'i rna ba'i drung du rdo gnyis brdungs pa'i sgra
305b2(mdo 'grel): bsgrag go /de nas byis pa'i g.yon phyogs nas sngags 'di brjod do/ /A dga dA dga t+sa ma b+ha ba si/ h+ri da yA da byi dzdza ya so/ /at+ma be su na mA si/ sa dza ba shar Na sha taM/ sha tA pu sha ta bar shos/ d+hirg+haM yu ra b+ha sa nu hi/ nak+Sha tra Ni tri sho rA tri ra ha shsha da twa bi rak+Sha tu/ de nas
305b3(mdo 'grel): byis pa de nad med cing bde bar gyur pa dang/ lte ba'i rtsa ba sor gcig la the gus bcings te/ de nas sor bzhi lus pa dang bcad la/ the gu gong du ske ba la brtod te bzhag la skam mo/ /de'i 'og tu lte ba la ru rta til mar dang ldan pas bsku'o/ /de'i 'og tu
305b4(mdo 'grel): shing 'o ma can rnams sam/ yang na sman dri zhim po rnams tshu dang bskol ba rno 'jam tsam gyi nang du gser dang dngul bsregs te nang du bsnyugs la des lte ba bkru'o/ /de la lag pa g.yas pa'i ma tshogs ma'i steng du ras bal snum can gyi lan
305b5(mdo 'grel): gnyis lan gsum cung zhig mnan te bzhag ste/ mgo bor das dkris te bzhag go /de nas blo dang tshe dang nyams stobs skyed pa'i phyir/ bi sha la dang/ bra hmi dang/ shu dag dang/ shangka puShpa dang de rnams btags pa'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang lde gur
305b6(mdo 'grel): byas te/ thun tshad ha re nu ka'i tshad tsam bya'o/ /yang na gser dang/ shu dag dang/ mu men dang/ a ru ra dang/ 'di rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na gser dang skyu ru ra'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba btang ngo/ /mngal
305b7(mdo 'grel): gyi mi gtsang ba'i dri ma dag par bya ba'i phyir shu dag dang rgyam tsha mar dang sbyar bas slon bya'o/ /byis pa btsas pa'i las dang cho ga lhag ma rnams ni skye dgu'i bdag gis bshad pa bzhin du byas na snying la gnas pa'i rtse rnams 'phel zhing
306a1(mdo 'grel): rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zhag gsum pa 'am bzhi pa nas bud med kyi 'o ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'o ma mi 'byung ba'i zhag dang po la ni mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sman a namta bsres te sbyar ba la sngags kyis btab ste byis pa la
306a2(mdo 'grel): dus gsum du sbyin no/ /zhag gnyis pa la ni sman lag shma na dang mar sbyar ba sbyin no/ /zhag gsum pa la ni zhun mar nyi tshe blud do/ /nam gyi mtshan stod la ni zhun mar ram ma'i nu zho lag mthil gang tsam sbyin no/ /'o ma 'am mar sar ni dus gnyis
306a3(mdo 'grel): su blud do/ /nu zho ni ma nyid kyis blud na snyams stobs 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /'o ma mang ba dang bu la mnyen gshin cing brtse ba'i nu ma mnun pa'i mam gnyis bya ste/ de yang yan lag lhag chad med cing smad pa ma yin pa dang/ tshangs par spyod pa dang
306a4(mdo 'grel): rigs mnyam pa dang/ nad med cing rang bzhin du gnas pa dang/ dar la bab pa dang/ bdag nyid kyi bu tsha sngar skyes pa shi ma myong ba dang/ lto 'dun chung ba rnams las bya ste/ ma ma de gnyis kyang bza' ba dang btung ba phan pa bsten par bya'o/ /de la nu
306a5(mdo 'grel): zho nyams pa'i rgyu ni bsres pa dang khro ba dang smyung bar 'dug pa dang/ lus kyi rtsol ba drags pa rnams yin no/ /nu zho skyed pa'i phyir bu ram chang ma gtogs pa'i chang dang srog chags gsher san 'dus pa'i sha khu dang gang yang 'o ma dang 'o ma 'phel
306a6(mdo 'grel): bar byed pa'i sman bsten par bya'o/ /mya ngan la sogs pa ni 'o ma bri bar byed pa'i rgyu yin no/ /kha zas mi mthun pa rnams bsten pa dang/ bkres par 'dug pa dang/ sems gzhan du gyur pa dang/ sbrum pa'i dus su lus zungs rnams nyams par gyur te/ des
306a7(mdo 'grel): nu zho ma rungs par byas te byis pa'i nang skyed par byed do/ /bud med nu zho bskams shing med par gyur na ni ra'i 'am ba'i 'o ma yang yon tan de dang 'dra bas blud par bya'o/ /yang na 'bri ha ti la sogs pa rtsa ba chung ngu lnga gong ma'i 'o ma dang bsgrubs pa 'am/
306b1(mdo 'grel): yang na zir? rnam gnyis li khar dang ldan pa blud par bya'o/ /khyad par du zhag drug gi bar du bsrung ba dang gtor ma yang bya ste/ de bzhin du de'i nye du rnams kyis kyang gnyid mi log par dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas zhag bcu tshang ba dang/ rang rang gi rigs
306b2(mdo 'grel): dang mthun pa'i cho ga byas te/ btsos pa'i mal las blang bar bya'o/ /de nas lha la mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas byis pa'i ming gdags so/ /lus mdog mdzes par bya ba'i phyir ldong ros dang/ ba bla dang/ gi wang dang/ a ka ru dang/ tsan dan rnams kyi byugs pas lus bsku'o/ /
306b3(mdo 'grel): ming btags pa yang rgyu skar dang/ rang lha dang/ nye du rnams gang yang rung ba las cha dras te 'am/ yang na yi ge mnyam pa las ming gdags so/ /de nas gzugs kyi bye brag bshad pa la brten nas che brtag par bya'o/ /phyis pa gso shes pa'i sman pas shar ram/ byang du
306b4(mdo 'grel): mgo bstan par bya'o/ /gos bkrus pa gtsang la gnyer ma med cing 'jam pas bskon te rtsa'i mal stan la bzhag ste/ gos dang stan rnams la gdon 'joms pa'i sman gyis bdug pas bdugs te/ de yang bya rog gi dug dang/ dur byid sbyar bas bdugs na rab tu
306b5(mdo 'grel): bsngags so/ /shang shang te'u dang/ bse rwa gcig la sogs pa'i rwa na yod pa'i nor bus byis pa bsrung ba'i ched du rtag tu gdags so/ /sman bra smi dang/ in+d+ri zhes bya ba sha la dang/ dzi ba ka la sogs pa'i sman de rnams gang la dga' ba'i sman gyis lag pa gnyis dang mgul
306b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ spyi bo rnams su gdags so/ /khyad par du shu dag dus su rtag tu drung du bsten na tshe ring ba dang/ yid gzhungs pa dang/ dran pa dang/ bde legs su byed cing gdon rnams las bsrung bar byed do/ /de nas byis pa nad med cing zla ba drug gam bdun nam brgyad lon pa dang dgun gyi dus
306b7(mdo 'grel): su nyin zhag dge ba la ma ma'i sar bzhag nas dbugs dbyung zhing spro ba skyed de/ rna ba gnyis dbug par bya ste/ sman pas khye'u yi rna ba g.yas pa thog mar phug la bu mo'i ni g.yon pa dang por dbug go /de yang sman pa'i lag pa g.yon pas khas blangs te/ lag pa
307a1(mdo 'grel): g.yon pas rna bshal? bzung la de'i dbus su mkhur tshos dang cung zhig nye bar nyi ma'i des su bstan na/ sha ma bzhin du shin tu srab par snang ba de na lha'i bug pa zhes bya ba yod de/ der le brgan rtsi'i thig le'i mtshan ma btab
307a2(mdo 'grel): ste/ lag pa gcig gis dal gyis lan gcig dbug ste gong 'og dang ngos gnyis su mi yo bar bya'o/ /gal te yo ba lta na ni de dag tu ka li ka zhes bya ba dang/ mard+ha ni zhes bya ba dang rak+ka ta zhes bya ba'i rtsa rnams yod do/ /de dag tu phog na mdog dmar ba dang/
307a3(mdo 'grel): na ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ skrang pa dang/ tsha ba 'ur 'ur bor 'dug pa dang/ drag tu na ba dang gnya' rengs pa dang/ pa ta na ka zhes bya ba'i rlung nad du 'gyur ro/ /gal te de dag tu gyur na ni de dag gis bye brag shes par byas nas myur du gso bar bya'o/ /gnas ma nor bar phug
307a4(mdo 'grel): na ni khrag mi 'byung la nad med cing dmar ba la sogs pa'i skyon yang med do/ /'bugs pa'i khab de yang skud pas btags la mar gyis bskus te phug la skud pa drang bar bya ste/ de nas yang til mar chos pa'i rgyun gyis bu gar blugs so/ /de ltar rna ba shal chug zin
307a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'og tu phan pa'i zas sbyin no/ /de nas bal gyi 'da' bas rna ba g.yon gyi bu ga glan la zhag gsum gyi bar du bzhag go /rma 'tsho ba dang rim gyis dal bus bu ga bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas byis pa de'i so skyes pa dang/ rim gyis bu zho de las bzlog par bya'o/ /'o
307a6(mdo 'grel): ma ni gong du smos pa bzhin sbyar ro/ /kha zas kyang yang zhing nyams brta ba rnams sbyin no/ /byis bcu zho mi 'thung ba la ni shing pi ya la'i rkang dang/ ma du ka'i me tog dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ 'bras yos dang/ /ba ra dkar po dang/ 'di rnams la tur byas te byis pa la byin na
307a7(mdo 'grel): tshim zhing nyams stobs skyed do/ /bilpa gzhon nu dang/ sha khar dang/ sug smel dang/ 'bras yos kyi phye ma dang de rnams kyi skyo ma blud na/ me drod skyed do/ /da ha'i me tog dang/ sha khar dang/ 'bras yos kyi phye ma dang/ skyo ma blud na sla tsha ska sla ran par 'byung ngo/ /gal
307b1(mdo 'grel): te/ byis pa de nad byung na gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i sman 'jam po sbyin no/ /nad gzhan gyi brla gnyan gyis 'dres pa las na yang bkru sman gyis zhi bar bya'o/ /ji ltar byis pa'i blo gzhan du gyur pa na yang/ sdangs par 'gyur ba'i pag mi bya ste/ gal te sdangs par gyur na ni gdon
307b2(mdo 'grel): gyis zin pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /byis pa de gos kyi rlung yab kyis g.yab pa dang/ gzhan gyi sgom zhing reg pa las kyang bsrung bar bya'o/ /bri hma dang/ yungs kar dang/ shu dag dang/ thal tres dang/ ru rta dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ pi pi ling dang/ 'di rnams dang tshul bzhin bskol ba'i
307b3(mdo 'grel): sman mar blud na/ skad gsal ba dang/ yid gzhungs pa dang/ dran pa myur bar byed do/ /de bzhin du tshe ring ba dang/ sdig pa zhi bar byed pa dang/ gdon 'joms pa dang/ 'byung po dang/ smyo byed rnams las zlog par byed do/ /shu dag dang/ som ra tsha dang/ mandu ka par ni dang/ shad
307b4(mdo 'grel): ke puShpa dang/ nye'u shing dang/ brahma so ma zhes bya ba ni nA dang/ sle tres dang/ brahmi dang/ 'di rnams srang re re cham chom brdungs te/ mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ 'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang/ tshul bzhin bskol te mar lus pa ni yan lag brgyad pa'i mar zhes bya
307b5(mdo 'grel): ste/ de las ran bar blud na skal pa ldan pa dang/ tshe ring ba dang/ tshig gsal ba dang/ yid gzhungs pa dang/ dran pa gsal bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /ra'i 'o ma dang/ a ru ra dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ pa ta dang/ shu dag dang/ shi tru dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ de rnams mar dang/
307b6(mdo 'grel): lhan cig bskol te/ mar lus pa ni dbyangs can zhes bya ba'i mar yin te/ de las ran par 'thungs na/ skad gsal ba dang/ yid gzhungs pa dang/ dran pa myur ba dang/ me drod skyed par byed do/ /shu dag dang/ sle tres dang/ nye'u shing dang/ a ru ra dang/ shing gi ni dang/
307b7(mdo 'grel): pi dang ka dang/ bca' sga dang/ a pa marga dang/ 'di rnams mar dang lhan cig bskol te 'thungs na yang phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/ /gser dang/ ge ri kar+Ni ka dang/ shu dag dang/ ru rta rnams lhan cig sbyar ba 'am/ k+Sha ri ki dang/ gser lhan cig sbyar ba 'am/ gser
308a1(mdo 'grel): dang mats+tsha ak+Sha zhes bya ba ganda durba dang/ shangka pu pi dang/ de rnams lhan cig sbyar ba 'am/ yang na gi ri kar+Ni ka dkar po dang/ gser dang/ shu dag dang/ de rnams lhan cig sbyor ba 'am/ sbyor ba bzhi po de dag gang yang rung ba sbrang rtsi
308a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ mar dang sbyar ba'i ldi gu byis pa da lo gcig gzer du ldag tu bcug na lus kyi nyams stobs dang/ mdog dang/ blo gsal bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /shu dag dang/ shing mngar dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ a ru ra dang/ dong gra dang/ ting mus dang/ ru rta dang/ pi pi ling
308a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ zir dang de rnams kyis lde gu byin na yang tshig gsal bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /byis pa gso ba'i cho ga'i le'u dang po rdzogs so// //de nas byis pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ de la byis pa gso ba ni rnam pa gsum
308a4(mdo 'grel): du bshad de/ 'o ma dang zas de gnyis ka'o/ /de gnyis la skyon med na ni tha mal bar gnas shing nad med pa yin la de gnyis skyon dang bcas na ni nad 'byung ba yin no/ /'o ma skyon med pa ni chu'i nang du bcug na chu dang lhan cig tu 'gyur ba ni skyon med cing dag pa
308a5(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /de la ma'i nu zho rlung gis ma rung na ni 'o ma chu'i nang du blugs na steng du 'byung zhing ro bska ba dang/ spu ba dang bcas pa dang/ rtsub dang byis pa'i bshang gci sri zhing 'gag par byed do/ /mkhris pas ma rungs pa'i rtags ni 'o ma bsregs na dro zhing ro skyur
308a6(mdo 'grel): ba 'am/ tsha ba dang chur blugs na po shar shar po snang ba dang byis pas 'thungs na lus tsha ba skyed do/ /bad kan gyis ma rungs pa'i rtags ni 'o ma'i ro lan tsha bro zhing ska ba dang/ chur blugs na 'og nas byid ba dang/ spyi bag nal nal bor 'dug pa yin no/ /nad
308a7(mdo 'grel): gnyis 'dres pa ni ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /gsum 'dres pa ni 'dus pa zhes bya'o/ /'o ma'i rang gnyis pa ji lta ba bzhin pa'i 'o ma blud na byis pa la yang nad de dag skyed par byed do/ /de la byas pa chung ngu na ba'i mtshan ma ni yang dang yang du drag tu ngu ba dang/ yang na byis
308b1(mdo 'grel): pas rang nyid kyi lag pas lus la lhag par nyug pa 'am/ yang na gang du dag par mi bzod pa der na ba yin no/ /gal te mgo bo na na ni mig 'dzums par byed pa yin no/ snying mi bden ni lce dang mchu sos gnon zhing dbugs mi bde la bu tshur 'chang bar byed pa yin no/
308b2(mdo 'grel): khong pa mi bden bshang gci 'gag stod du rgyug /nu zho mi 'dod/ rgyu ma khru lu lu zer/ lto sbo/ /ro stod sgu gsus pa mtho bar 'dug pa rnams yin no/ /chu so dang pho mtshan du mi bde na ni bshang gci 'gag sdang zhing phyogs kun tu lta ba yin no/ /de ltar mi bden
308b3(mdo 'grel): nu zhom nun pa'i ma ma la nad gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du gso ba bya ste/ rlung gi bdag nyid kyis nu zho ma rung bar gyur pa la ni rtsa ba bcu ba bskol ba'i khu ba zhag gsum blud do/ /yang na tsi tra ka dang/ shu dag dang/ pa tha dang/ pu tse shel dang/ ru rta dang/ la la pud dang/
308b4(mdo 'grel): thang shing dang/ ko nyon tse dang/ bri shtsi kal dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bca' sga dang/ de rnams bskol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /de nas rlung 'joms pa'i sman mar blud do/ /btung bar ni chang gi dangs ma blud do/ /de'i 'og tu snum dang ldan pa'i bkru sman btang ngo/ /de nas sman
308b5(mdo 'grel): mas btang ba'i las bya ste/ dugs la sogs pa rlung 'joms pa'i sman yang btang ngo/ /ra sna dang/ ting mu sa dang/ ko nyon tsi dang/ thang shing dang de rnams phye mar byas te mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin ba'am/ yang na sman da rnams tshul bzhin bskol te khar dkar
308b6(mdo 'grel): po dang sbyar ba blud do/ /mkhris pas nu zho ma rungs par gyur pa la ni/ sle tres dang/ nye'u shing dang/ pa ta la dang/ nimpa dang/ tsan dan dang/ phal tes dang/ de rnams bskol ba'i khu ba ma ma dang byis pa gnyi ga la blud do/ /yang na 'bras bu/ gsum dang/ 'bras
308b7(mdo 'grel): gang dang/ tik+ta dang/ pu tse shel dang/ thal tres la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang/ ba tal la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang/ shug pa'i sde tshan dang/ sde tshan gyi sbyor ba de dag gang yang rung ba mar dang lhan cig bskol ba'i sman mar blud nas de'i 'og tu mkhris pa la
309a1(mdo 'grel): phan pa'i bkru sman btang ngo/ /sman bsil bas bsku ba dang byug ba la sogs pa yang sbyar ro/ /bad kan gyi ma rungs par gyur pa yang shing mngar dang lce myang tsha dang ldan pa'i mar gyis byis pa la blud do/ /de'i 'og tu rgyam tsha
309a2(mdo 'grel): dang shing mngar dang/ pi pi ling rnams sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus slon bya'o/ /yang na po son cha'i me tog gi lde gus ma'i nu ma dang/ byis pa'i so dang/ mchu la bskus na byis pa bde bar skyug par 'gyur ro/ /ma la ni skyug sman drag pos slon du
309a3(mdo 'grel): gzhug go/ ldan pa'i nang la ni gla sgang la sogs pa bskol ba blud do/ /de bzhin du rgya spos dang/ sri thI ki dang/ sgron shi dang/ dug mo yungs dang/ de rnams bskol ba yang blud do/ /yang na bong dkar po dang/ gla sgang dang/ shu dag dang/ tsha ba lnga dang de
309a4(mdo 'grel): rnams bskol ba blud do/ /nu ma'i zho la nad gzhi gsum gyi mtshan ma ni ma zhu ba be'u snabs 'byung zhing dri nga la chu dang 'dra bar slan ter 'byung ba dang/ phyis sri ba dang/ mar yang dang yang rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba dang/ lbu ba dang bcas shing nad
309a5(mdo 'grel): mdog sna tshogs su 'byung ste/ gcin mdong kyang ser ba dang/ bska bar 'byung ba dang/ rims kyis 'debs pa dang/ kha zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang skom dang che ba dang/ skyug bro dang/ sgregs pa skyur bor 'byung ba dang/ bya rmyang byed pa dang/ yan lag chag
309a6(mdo 'grel): pa snyam byed pa dang/ yan lag skyod cing 'debs pa dang/ 'khun pa dang/ lus 'dar ba dang/ mgo ba khor ba dang/ sna dang/ mig dang/ gdong tshos pa la sogs pa'i nang skye bar 'gyur te/ gzhan yang de dang 'dra ba'i nad mang du 'byung/ de'i ming ni nad
309a7(mdo 'grel): shin tu mi bzad pak+Shi ras ka zhes bya ba yin no/ /de lta bu'i nad pa la ni ma bu gnyis ka la skyug sman bya ste/ thug pa rkyang rkyang po la sogs pa'i rim pa yang sbyar te/ shu dag la sogs pa'i sde tshan yang sbyar ro/ /yang na ser po gnyis la sogs pa 'am
309b1(mdo 'grel): yang na bong dkar bo dang/ pA thA dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bu tse shel dang/ gla sgang dang de rnams bskol ba 'am/ yang na ba thA dang/ bca' sga dang/ spe te ba dang/ pu tse shel dang/ te dzo ba ti dang/ thang shing dang/ thal tres dang/ gla sgang dang/ murba dang/ dug mo yungs dang/ de rnams bskol ba'i khu ba
309b2(mdo 'grel): blud na yang nu zho'i skyon sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /dus la mkhas pa'i sman pas nad gzhi ji lta bu'i rjes su 'brel ba'i nad kyi gso ba la yang ci rig par bya'o/ /byis pa de thog ma so skyes pa'i dus su nad thams cad slong bar bya'o/ /khyad par du rims dang/ khong 'khru ba dang/ lud pa lu
309b3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ skyug pa dang/ mgon pa dang/ mig rnag 'jag pa dang/ mig mchu sha skyes pa dang/ me dpal la sogs pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar byis bskal tshigs bye ba'i dus dang/ rma bya cod pan skyes pa'i dus dang/ byis pa so skyes pa'i dus de ni dam rungs pa thams cad slong
309b4(mdo 'grel): bar byed do/ /skyon gyi rang bzhin las na ji ltar 'byung ba dang/ nad ji ltar shes che zhing stobs che ba dang/ dus dang yul la sogs pa rnams brtags nas sman pas sman sbyar bar bya'o/ /nad gzhi 'khrugs te rims la sogs pa rnams su gyur ba ni/ sman yang de dag nyid
309b5(mdo 'grel): kyis gso bar bya ste/ sman gyi thun tshad chud tshad du btang ngo/ /lus chung ba dang/ sdug ma myong ba dang/ zas thams cad la bsten te brtag tu 'o ma dang mar las goms par byas pa'i byis pa'i lus ni snum ba yin te/ de bas na 'bral sman 'jam po'i slon sman btang ste/ de yang
309b6(mdo 'grel): nu zho rims bar 'thur du bcug na skyug par 'gyur ro/ /'o ma dang kha zas gnyis kyis 'tsho ba'i byis pa la ni skyug sman thug pa sla ba dang bsres pa blud la skyug du gzhug go /zas nyi tsher 'o cha ba'i byis pa la ni skyug sman mar dang sbyar ba btang ngo/ /gal te mas btang
309b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i sman zos pa yin na ni mas btang ba'i bkru sman bya'o/ /sna sman rdub pa'i sman dang/ sna'i bkru sman yang bya'o/ /bkru sman la sogs pa gong du bshad pa de dag ma ma la yang sbyar ro/ /murba dang/ tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum dang/ rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang/ 'dzam bu'i
310a1(mdo 'grel): shun pa dang/ thang shing dang/ yungs kar dang/ pA thA de rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang lde gur byas te ldag tu bcug na nu zho'i skyon sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /pi pi ling dang/ danda ka'i me tog dang/ skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu dang/ de rnams kyi bye ma dang/ sbrang rtsi
310a2(mdo 'grel): sbyar bas so rtsa bskus pa 'am/ yang na bya lA bi dang/ sreg pa'i sha skam zhib tu btags ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas sa rtsi bskus na byis pa'i so rtsa myur du bde la skye'o/ /shu dag dang 'bri ha sti rnam gnyis dang/ pA thA dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ bong dkar po dang/ gla sgang dang/ sman mngar
310a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i sde tshan dang/ de rnams mar dang lhan cig bskol te mar lus pas so rtsa bskus na so bde bar skyed do/ /skyar ba dang/ sre ya ni dang/ bri ha ti dang/ kriN par+Ni dang/ shu ti dang/ de rnams sbrang rtsi dang mar dang lhan cig lde gur byas te ldag du bcug na/ pho ba'i me drod skyed pa'i
310a4(mdo 'grel): mchog yin te/ rlung nad lugs bzhin 'byung zhing tshad par 'khru ba dang/ rims dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ mig ser dang/ skya rbab dang/ lud pa las rgyal bar byed do/ /khyad par du byis pa'i nad thams cad la bsngags te/ nyams stobs dang mdog gsal bar byed do
310a5(mdo 'grel): bcod dang/ da ta ki dang/ gser phrom dang/ ku Ta ? Ta dang/ mung+ga par+Ni dang/ ba sha par+Ni dang/ mung+ga'i 'bras bu dang/ bilba gzhon nu dang/ ras bal gyi sa bon dang/ 'di rnams chu dang lhan cig bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mar dang thal sman gyi khu ba dang/ zhog chu dang ldan par lhan
310a6(mdo 'grel): cig bskol te mar lus pa las ran par blud na so las gyur pa'i nad myur du 'jig par byed do/ /de bzhin du nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa yang sel bar byed do/ /zhes drang srong 'gro ba skyong gi bshad do/ /so las gyur ba'i byis pa'i nad la ni ha cang gso ba mi bya ste/ so
310a7(mdo 'grel): skyes pa'i nad ni rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /byis pa de nyin par lhag par gnyid log pa dang/ chu grang 'thungs pa dang/ bad kan skyes pa'i nu zho bsten pa'i rgyud bcud dangs ma rgyu ba'i spu gu rnams bad kan gyis 'gags te/ de las kha zas yi gar mi 'od ba dang/ cham
310b1(mdo 'grel): pas 'debs shing sna chu 'dzag pa dang/ rims kyis 'debs pa dang/ lud pa rnams skye bar 'gyur te/ des na byis pa'i lus skram par 'gyur zhing zad pa dang/ lus snum zhing mig dang gdong dkar bar 'gyur te/ de las rgyam tsha dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ sha ri ga sha dang/ bA thA dang/
310b2(mdo 'grel): gi rig dam+ba ka dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas kha zas yi ga rim 'ong ba dang/ lus skem pa la sbyar ro/ /shing a sho ka dang/ pu tse shel dang/ tsha ba rnam lnga dang de rnams kyi phye ma 'am/ yang na rgya shug dang/ da ta ki dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma dang/ phye ma
310b3(mdo 'grel): de gnyis gang yang rung ba mar dang sbyar ba byin na phan no/ /sti ra dang/ shu dag dang/ bri ha ti rnams gnyis dang/ bu tshang rdo dang/ pi pi ling dang/ rgya spom dang/ lcang ma dang/ utpal dang/ kha spru ba dang/ kha khra'i rtsa ba dang/ gla skang dang/ de rnams zho gnyis dang/ mar srang bcu drug dang/ lhan cig
310b4(mdo 'grel): bskol te bsgrubs pa las ran par blud na rgyun srang dag par byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /yang bri ha tI dang/ a shwo g+hand+ha dang/ byi'u rug pa dang/ pi pi ling dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma'i sbyor ba'i sman bskol ba'i nang du btab ste/ mar dang yang bskol la mar lus pa las ran par
310b5(mdo 'grel): blud na yang phan yon gong ma dang 'dra'o/ /shing mngar dang pi pi ling dang/ seng phrom dang/ dug mo yungs dang/ utpal dang/ tsan dan dang/ bal bu dang/ thal tres rnam gnyis dang de rnams mar dang tshul bzhin bskol te mar lus pa las ran par 'thungs na lus skem
310b6(mdo 'grel): pa las rgyal bar byed do/ /bu bran shing dang chu nas skyes pa'i shing mngar dang/ ga bra rtsa ba dang/ pi pi ling dang/ thing shing dang/ a shwa gand+ha dang/ ra mnye ba rnam gnyis dang/ ra sna dang/ brangs rtsi ba dang/ ji ba ka dang/ dam+ba gnyis dang/ bi dang ka dang/ de rnams cham chom
310b7(mdo 'grel): brdung ste mar dang ri bong gi mgo bo bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ tshul bzhin bskol te mar lus pa las ran par 'thungs na/ lus skem pa las 'phel zhing brtas par byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /shu dag dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ rgya spos dang/ a ru ra dang/ tsa rong dang de rnams ra
311a1(mdo 'grel): thug gi gcin dang chang dang/ 'bru mar dang de rnams lhan cig bskol ba'i mar gyis bskus na phan no/ /rgya skyegs kyi khu ba bre? gang dang/ de dang mnyam pa'i til mar dang/ de'i gzhi 'gyur gyi zho ga chu dang/ a shwa gand+ha dang/ skyer pa dang/ thang
311a2(mdo 'grel): shing dang/ ru rta dang/ gla sgang dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ murba dang/ pu tse shel dang/ shu ti dang/ ra sna dang/ shing mngar dang/ de rnams cha mnyam ste cham chom brdungs pa dang lhan cig bskol te til mar lus pa ni rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i til mar zhes bya ste
311a3(mdo 'grel): des bsku byug byas na nyams stobs dang/ rims dang/ glo gcong zad byed dang/ smyo byed dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ brjed byed dang/ rlung sel bar byed do/ /gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po rnams 'joms te bud med sbrul ma la yang bsngags so/ /bong nga
311a4(mdo 'grel): dkar po dang/ karta sriM gi dang/ pi pi ling dang/ de rnams kyi bye ma sbrang rtsi dang lde gur byas te ldag go/ bong nga dkar po sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba gcig pus kyang lud pa dang/ rims dang/ skyug bro ba dang/ brla gnyan gyi nang rnams la phan no/ /byis pa gang nu zho 'thungs
311a5(mdo 'grel): pa yang slon pa ni bri ha sti rnam gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i khu ba 'am/ tsha ba rnam lnga'i phye ma dang/ mar dang sbrang rtsi dang de rnams lde gur byas te byin no/ /pi pi ling dang/ lan tsha rnam lnga dang/ bi dang ga dang/ marda ra zhes bya ba ni b+ha tra ka dang de rnams mar dang/ sbrang
311a6(mdo 'grel): rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/ yang na tsha ba gsum dang/ srog chags sha lya ka dang/ gong dang/ shwa bid dang/ rma bya dang de rnams gang rnyed pa bsregs te snag tshar byas pa las mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na seng ldeng dang ka gu ba dang/ pal bu dang/ ru
311a7(mdo 'grel): rta dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dang/ mar dang lhan cig bskol te/ mar lus pa 'thungs na byis pa'i nang skyug pa sel bar byed do/ /gal te byis pa de ma'i khong nas so skyes pa byung ngam ya so dang po skyes pa byung na mi dge ba yin te/ de
311b1(mdo 'grel): la ni bram ze la zhi ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /byis pa'i bad kan 'khrugs te rkan las mdzer 'gyur zhing skrang zhing 'og tu 'bab par gyur na/ nu zho mi 'dod cing/ gcin sri ba dang/ lto sbo ba dang/ khong 'khrug pa dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ kha dang/ lkog ma dang/ mig na ba dang/
311b2(mdo 'grel): gza' ba 'degs mi nus pa dang/ skyug pa yin te de la ni de nad tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te skrad bar bsku zhing 'bab pa bteg par bya'o/ /rkan bskams pa la ni pi pi ling dang/ bca' sga dang/ ba'i gcin bu dang/ rgyam tsha dang de rnams lhan cig sbyar ba
311b3(mdo 'grel): 'am/ mang na bca' sga dang/ skyer pa dang/ zi gaM ra dza dang/ n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o ma dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma dog la'i nang ba lang gi gci khu dang bsres ba blugs la bsros te/ des n+ya gro d+ha'i lo ma dang bsgos te spyi bo'i steng du bkab la bcings te bzhag go/ dog le'i nang du ba
311b4(mdo 'grel): lang gi gci khu dang sman mar sbyar bas dar la bsgos te rkan dang kha la bsku zhing glan par bya'o/ /a ru ra dang/ shu dag dang/ ru rta dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa nu zho dang bcas pa lhan cig byis pa la glud na rkan 'bab ste skrang zhing sha 'dzer 'byung
311b5(mdo 'grel): ba las grol bar byed do/ /byis pa'i lus dri mas yogs pa 'am/ lus rab tu rdul ba'i dbang gis gzhang gi nang du khrag dang bad kan las gyur pa'i rma zangs ma'i mdog lta bu shin tu g.ya' ba dang bcas pa 'byung ste de'i rgyus brlag nyan gzhan gyi nang
311b6(mdo 'grel): mang du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la kha cig na re ma tri dza zhes bya ba'i byis pa'i gdon yin no/ /zhes smra'o/ /gzhan dag ni srul po'i gdon yin no zhes kyang zer ro/ /byis pa'i rgyab dang/ zad dang/ gzhang dang rked bar gong ma'i nad de 'byung ba yod de/ de ni ming med cing
311b7(mdo 'grel): smad pa yin no zhes kha cig smra ste de lta bu'i nad la ni skyu ru ra dang/ 'o ma dang sbyar bas bkrus la dag par bya'o/ /de bzhin du mkhris pa dang bad kan 'joms pa'i sman gyis yang dag par bya'o/ /yang na tsan dan dang/ ba ra dkar po dang bcas pa'i chu grang mos
312a1(mdo 'grel): khong ba nas btung bar blud do/ /skyer khaN+Ta dang sbrang rtsi sbyar bas rma la byug go/ bi dang ri dang 'bras bu gsum dang/ rgya shug dang/ shing blak+Sha bskol ba'i khu bas blugs par bya'o/ /nag tshur dang/ gi'u wang dang/ spangs ma dang/ ldong ros dang/ ba bla dang/
312a2(mdo 'grel): skyer khaN+Ta dang/ de rnams btags pa'i phye mas rma ba gdab pa 'am/ yang rma nyid skyur dang btags pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na shing mar dang/ dung dang/ stang zil zhig tu btags pa 'am/ yang na thal tres dang/ dung gi snying po dang de gnyis kyi phye ma 'am/ yang na a
312a3(mdo 'grel): sa na'i shun lpags zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma 'am/ sbyor ba de dag gang yang rung ba rma la gdab bo/ /gang du dmar zhing skrang ba'i shas che ba der ni srin bu pad+mas khrag 'jib tu gzhug go/ gzhang gi nang du byung ba'i smad pa'i nang ku Ta ka zhes bya ba de la ni mkhris pa'i
312a4(mdo 'grel): rma gso ba'i sman thams cad rab tu bsngags so/ /pA thA dang/ bi dang ka dang/ ser po rnam gnyis dang/ gla sgang dang/ ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ ba sbru ba'i rtsa ba dang/ bilba dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ bri lci ka li dang/ de rnams mar dang lhan cig lde gur byas pa zos na byis pa nang
312a5(mdo 'grel): ma tri dza zhes bya ba dang/ ma zos te nang du gyur pa las grol bar byed do/ /nad la phan pa'i sman gang yang rung nu ma la byugs te byis pa 'thung du bcug na nad las rgyal bar byed do/ /de nas cung zad na bkru bar bya'o/ /byis pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so// //
312a6(mdo 'grel): de nas byis pa gdon gyis zin pa gso ba'i le'ur bshad par bya ste/ sngon lha chen po mahA de bas rang gi bu gzhon nu gdong drug bsrung bar bya ba'i ched du skyes pa'i gzugs can lnga dang/ bud med kyi gzugs can bdun te de ltar gdon gyi lus sprul par
312a7(mdo 'grel): gyur te/ de la skyes pa'i gdon rnam pa lnga ni/ skem byed kyi gdon dang/ byi sha ka zhes bya ba dang/ lug mgo can gyi gdon dang/ khyi'i gdon dang/ yi dags kyi gdon ni lnga po de dag go/ bud med kyi gzugs can gyi gdon ni bya'i gdon dang/ sprul bo'i gdon
312b1(mdo 'grel): dang srul po bsal byed kyi gdon dang/ srul po'i mthong byed ces bya ba'i gdon dang/ gdong 'khur ba lta bu'i gdon dang/ nam gru'i gdon dang/ nam gru skyem pa'i gdon dang/ bdun po de dag go/ gdon de rnams kyis thog mar zin pa'i spyi'i rtags ni rtag tu du ba dang
312b2(mdo 'grel): rims kyis 'debs pa dang/ sdang ba dang/ glal ba dang/ smin ma 'degs pa dang/ dman bar 'dug pa dang/ kha nas dbu ba 'dzag pa dang/ gyen du lta ba dang/ mchu la sos 'debs pa dang/ mtshan mo gnyid mi log cing du ba dang/ 'khun ba dang/ nu zho mi 'dod pa dang/ skang
312b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba dang/ rang gi ma ma'i lus la blo bur sen mos 'brang ba rnams te/ de dag ni gdon spyi'i mtshan ma yin no/ /de skem byed kyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags kyi mig ya gcig mchi ma 'dzag cing yang dang yang mgo sprug pa dang/ lus kyi gzhogs phyed nyams
312b4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ lus kyi khongs rengs ba dang/ rdul pa dang/ gnya' ba ma phon por 'degs pa dang/ so 'khrigs pa dang/ nu zho mi 'dod pa dang/ sdangs bzhin du du ba dang/ skad 'gags pa dang/ kha yo bar 'gyur pa dang/ kha chu 'dzag pa dang/ shas cher bar snang la lta ba
312b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ khrag dang zhag gi dri bro ba dang/ rtag tu skyo zhing yid mi bde ba dang/ byis pa de yang dang yang khu tshur 'chad ba dang/ mig dang za 'gram dang/ smin ma ya gcig 'gul ba dang mig gnyis ka dmar ba yin te de zin na ni nges par lus nyams ba 'am
312b6(mdo 'grel): 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de la byi sha ka'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni 'du shes nyams pa dang/ skra yang dang yang 'bal ba dang/ mgo lud cing gnya' ba gug ba dang/ glal zhing rkyang bar byed pa dang/ gshang gci 'byung ba dang/ dbu bas slon pa dang/ nam mkha' la lta ba dang/ lag pa
312b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ smin ma dang rkang pa rnams kyis gar byed pa dang/ rang gi lce dang nu ma la sos 'debs pa dang/ rims drag pos 'debs pa dang/ mtshan mo gnyid mi 'ong ba dang/ rnag dang khrag gi dri bro ba rnams yin no/ /de la lug mgo can gyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni/ spo ba dang/ lag
313a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ rkang pa gnyis 'gul ba dang/ spubs skyug pa dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ khu tshur 'cha' ba dang/ skad gsang dma' ba dang/ mdog 'gyur ba dang/ 'khun pa dang/ tshad pa bad kan du 'khru ba dang/ skyug pa dang/ lud pa lu ba dang/ skyigs bu 'byung ba
313a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ nub mo gnyis mi log pa dang/ mchu la sos gnon ba dang lus 'khums pa dang/ khong rengs pa dang/ ra thug gi dri bro ba dang/ bar snang la lta zhing rgod ba dang/ rkang lag rkyong ba dang/ rims kyis 'debs pa dang/ brgyal ba dang/ mig ya gcig skrang pa la sogs pa'i nad
313a3(mdo 'grel): rnams dang ldan pa yin no/ /khyi'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni lus 'dar ba dang/ ba spu langs pa dang/ lus rdul ba dang/ mig 'dzum pa dang/ lce phyir 'byin cing sos gnon pa dang/ skad 'dzer ba dang/ skyug pa dang/ bshad ba'i dri bro ba dang/ khyi bzhin du zug pa rnams yin no/ /de la yi dags
313a4(mdo 'grel): kyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni ba spu ldang ba dang/ yang dang yang ldang ba dang/ bab bab du du zhing lus tsha ba dang/ lud pa lu ba dang/ tshad par 'khru ba dang/ skyul ba dang/ glal ba dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ brkyang bskum byed pa dang/ lus bskams pa dang/ khong rengs pa dang/ mdog 'gyur
313a5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ khu tshur 'cha' ba dang/ mchi ma 'dzag pa dang/ mtshan ma de dag dang ldan na byis pa gdon gyis zin pa yin no/ /de la bya'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni/ rkang lag gnas nas nyams pa dang/ tshad par 'khru ba dang/ lce dang rkan dang lkog mar rma byung ba dang/ tshigs su 'brum
313a6(mdo 'grel): bu 'byung zhing tsha ba dang/ na ba dang/ smin pa dang/ de yang tshigs rnams su yang dang yang 'pho ba dang/ nyin mtshan du 'brum bu des chu ser 'dzag pa yin te/ khyad par du kha dang rkub tu yang smin pa dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ bya'i dri bro ba dang/ rims kyis 'debs pa rnams yin no//
313a7(mdo 'grel): srul po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni/ skyug pa dang/ lus 'dar ba dang/ sgom pa dang mtshan mo gnyis mi 'ong ba dang/ skyigs bu dang/ lto spo ba dang/ khod 'khru zhing phyis sla ba dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ gcin 'gags pa dang/ yan lag gnas nas nyams pa dang/ spu
313b1(mdo 'grel): zing zhes byed pa dang/ bya rog ltar lus rdul bro ba rnams yin no/ /srul po bsril byed kyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni lus 'dar ba dang/ du ba dang/ 'phred mig tu lta ba dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ rgyu ma 'khru ba dang/ zhag dang rnag gri dri bro ba dang/ rtsib logs ya gcig drang zhing dro ba rnams
313b2(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /de la srul po mthong byed kyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni skyug pa dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ lud pa lu ba dang/ gnyid chung ba dang/ khong 'khru ba dang/ phyi sa'i mdog 'gyur ba dang/ dri nga ba dang/ shas cher lus skem pa dang/ mthong ba zhan pa dang/ mig na ba dang/ g.ya' ba dang/ mig
313b3(mdo 'grel): mchu'i sha skyes pa'i mig nang 'byung zhing skrang ba dang/ skyigs gu dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ nu zho mi 'dod pa dang/ lus mdog 'gyur ba dang/ skad drag tu 'don pa dang/ 'dar ba dang/ nya 'am skyur ba'i dri bro ba rnams yin no/ /khur ba lta bu'i gdon can gyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni lag pa
313b4(mdo 'grel): dang rkang pa dang gdong rnams mi mdzes shing mi sdug par 'gyur ba dang/ drag tu 'don pa dang/ lto ba'i steng gi rtsa rnams nag por 'gyur zhing mdog nag pas khyab par 'dug pa dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang/ rkang lag mi bde ba dang/ ba gcin gyi dri bro ba rnams yin no/ /nam
313b5(mdo 'grel): gru'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni/ mdog sngo bsangs su 'dug pa dang/ rna ba dang mig nyed pa dang/ lud pa lu zhing dbugs mi bde ba dang/ mig phan tshun 'gul ba dang/ kha yo zhing dmar ba dang/ ra thug gi dri bro ba dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ skem pa dang/ phyis ser por 'byung zhing sla ba rnams
313b6(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /de la nam gru skem byed kyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni/ rims kyis lus zad pa dang/ skra 'bal ba dang/ zas mi 'dod pa dang/ skad gsang dma' ba dang/ mdog 'gyur ba dang/ byi sa'i mdog sna tshogs su 'dug pa dang/ lto ba la thor bu 'byung zhing sra pa dang/ du ba dang/ bya rgod kyi
313b7(mdo 'grel): dri bro ba dang/ yun ring du na ba dang/ lte'i thor bu de yang zlum por 'dug pa dang/ bshang gci sna tshogs snang ba dang/ lce'i dbus dmar zhing dkar mdog sngo bsangs su 'dug pa de ni spang bar bya ste/ kha zas mang du zos kyang nyams stobs yongs su zad cing skom dang kyis zin te/ mig
314a1(mdo 'grel): skong du bros pa ni nam gru skem byed kyis khyer ba yin par shes par bya ste/ de dag ni bud med kyi gzugs can gyi gdon bdun yin no/ /gdon de dag ni mi la ci'i phyir 'tshe zhing 'jug ce na/ mchod pa 'dod pa'i phyir 'jug pa yin no/ /de la 'tshe
314a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i bdag nyid ces bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni byis pa'i sna chu 'dzag pa dang/ lce 'gas pa dang/ sprid pa rtag tu 'byung ba dang/ lus mi bde ba dang/ mchi ma 'dzag pa dang/ mdog sdug pa dang/ skad gsang dma' ba dang/ dri nga 'byung ba dang/ lus zungs
314a3(mdo 'grel): zad pa dang/ rang gi bshang gci mi sped par nyed pa dang/ lag pa gnyis bskor zhing bdag gam gzhan la rdeg pa dang/ de bzhin du mtshon dang shing la sogs pas kyang de ltar rdeg pa dang/ me 'bar ba'i nang du 'jug pa dang/ chu'i nang du mchod pa dang/ khron pa'i nang du
314a4(mdo 'grel): bab tshol du 'jug pa dang/ gzhan yang de dang 'dra ba'i rnam par byed pa dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ rmong bag tu 'dug pa dang/ kha nas rul dri bro ba dang/ rtag tu skyug pa dang/ bu ga'i sgo kun nas khrag 'dzag pa dang/ 'chi ltas 'byung ba de dag dang ldan
314a5(mdo 'grel): pa de ni yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni/ bud med dang dben par 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i tshig smra ba dang/ dri zhim po dang/ phreng ba dang/ rgyan la dga' ba dang/ snying dga' ba dang/ sems zhi bar gnas pa yin te/
314a6(mdo 'grel): des zin na ni dka' ba yin no/ /gtor ma 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni/ sgyid zhan pa dang/ kha myang zhing ldag par byed pa dang/ mchu dang/ lkog ma dang/ rkan skam pa dang/ ltogs pa'i tshul du lta ba dang/ du ba dang/ dman pa'i sems kyis rgyug
314a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ kha zas slong zhing byin na 'drangs shing ngoms par mi 'gyur te/ de ni gso sla ba yin pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can gyi gdon la ni dud pas bdug pa dang/ grub pa'i sngags yang dang yang bzlas pas zhi bar bya'o/ /'dod pa la dga' ba dang/ gtor
314b1(mdo 'grel): ma 'dod pa la ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gtor ma sbyin no/ /de la gsor rung ba'i gdon la ni khang thog dben par chag chag dang/ skyang nul bya ba'i steng du byis pa bzhag la zhag gsum gyi bar du me ma shi bar bzhag ste thal bas byis pa'i mdza' nas bskor nas me tog dang
314b2(mdo 'grel): lo ma dang 'bras bu dang/ kha zas dang yungs kar gyis chal bar bkram la gdon 'joms pa'i yungs kar dang ske tshe'i 'bru mar gyi me mar spar na sdig pa sel bar byed do/ /las byed pa'i g.yog kyang 'khrig pa dang/ sha dang chang las ldog par bya'o/ /de nas byis pa mar rnying bas
314b3(mdo 'grel): bsku byug byas na/ chu dro 'jam tsam gyis khrus byas te/ de'i 'og tu ba bla dang/ nim+ba dang/ agni man+tha dang/ dong ka dang/ ba ri b+ha tra zhes bya ba manda ra dang/ ka Ta ka dang/ 'dzam bu dang/ ta ma la dang/ bu di ka dang/ lcam pa dang/ a pa marga dang/ pi pi ling dang/ shig tru mngar po dang/ ka
314b4(mdo 'grel): ka dzang+ga dang/ ge ri kar+Ne ka dkar po dang/ ka pit+tha dang/ 'o ma can gyi shing lnga dang/ ka rany+dza dang/ ka dam+ba dang/ de rnams sbyar ba'i dud pas bdug go /yang na gung dang/ stag dang/ sprul dang/ seng ge dang/ dred dang de rnams kyi lpags pa mar dang bsres pa'i dud pas bdug pa 'am/ yang
314b5(mdo 'grel): na pu ti ka ra sh+dza'i rtsa ba la sogs pa'i yan lag bcu pa dang/ yungs kar dang/ shu dag dang/ go bye dang/ tingmus dang/ ru rta dang/ de rnams mar dang/ sbyar ba'i dud pas bdugs na yang gdon thams cad las rnam par grol bar byed do/ /yang na yungs kar dang/ nim+ba'i lo
314b6(mdo 'grel): ma dang/ a sha khu ra'i rtsa ba dang/ shu dag dang/ stag pa'i lo ma dang/ de rnams mar dang sbyar ba'i dud pas bdugs na yang/ gdon thams cad sel lo/ /yang na glang gi rwa dang spu dang/ rus pa dang pags pa dang/ byi la'i rtug pa dang/ nim+ba'i lo ma dang/ nim+ba'i thang chu dang
314b7(mdo 'grel): pu tse shel dang/ spra tshil dang khri ha tI rnam gnyis dang/ ras bal gyi sa bon gyi rus pa dang/ nas so ba dang/ ra'i spu dang/ thang shing dang/ yungs kar dang/ rma bya'i sgro dang/ sh+ri bis zhes bya ba ko nyon tse'i thang chu dang/ phub ma dang/ mi'i skra dang/ shing kun dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma
315a1(mdo 'grel): ras ma'i snod kyi nang du ra gcin dang spangs te/ dud pas bdugs na gdon thams cad dang rims mi bzad ba rnams la phan no/ /yang na dur ba dang/ a mra'i tshig gu dang/ rgya spos dang/ na le sham dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ dong gra dang/ kri sh+ki
315a2(mdo 'grel): par+Ni dang/ gla sgang dang de rnams btags pa'i phye ma mar dang rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i khu ba 'o ma dang tshul bzhin bskol te mar lus pa las ran bar blud na gdon las rgyal bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /ra sna dang/ a shum ti'i lo ma dang/ rtsa ba lnga pa dang/ ba? la
315a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ gla sgang dang/ de rnams bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ thal tres dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ pA thA dang/ bi dang ka shing mngar dang pa yassya dang/ shing kun dang/ thang shing dang/ pi pi ling dang/ mu la dang/ dug mo yungs dang/ de rnams btags pa'i phye ma dang/
315a4(mdo 'grel): mar lhan cig bskol te mar lus pa las ran par blud na byis pa la rtag tu phan pa yin te/ nad thams cad dang gdon 'brog cing me drod skyed pa dang stobs dang mdog ster bar byed do/ /thal tres dang/ mur dang/ brahmi dang/ shang khi ni dang/ ru rta dang/ shu dag dang/ yungs
315a5(mdo 'grel): kar dang/ a shwa gand+ha dang/ byi'u rug pa dang/ de rnams mar dang lhan cig bskol ba'i mar lus pa de las btung ba dang byug pa byas na gdon thams cad 'jig par byed do/ /gang yang 'byung po'i rig sngags kyis sman mar la bzlas par bya'o/ /sa gtsang mar dkyil
315a6(mdo 'grel): 'khor khru gang bar byas te ba lang gi lci bas byugs nas 'bras brus pa dkar po chag brums med pa'i snod kyi nang du bkang la yon dang bcas pa der bzhag go /du ba med pa'i me snod dang bcas pa dang/ chu snod dang bcas pa dang/ gu gul dang/ mar dang me tog
315a7(mdo 'grel): dkar po dang/ gtor ma dang/ spos dang dur ba dkar po dang/ yungs kar dang/ bsreg blugs kyi rdzas de dag kyang bzhag la/ de nas sman pa gso gtsang ma kha dog gsum dang ldan pa 'am/ yang na gos dkar po gyon te la shar du bltas nas dkyil 'khor gyi
315b1(mdo 'grel): sar 'jug bar bya ste/ gro ba'i dum bu blangs nas gro ba la gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags gi zang gis khris pas dkris la chog bzhin du bskrubs na 'byung po dang gdon thams cad las rgyal bar byed do/ /lag shman dang/ sa ha de ba dang/ mAg dan+ti
315b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /dam+bi? ra dang/ kha sral dang/ karka ti sh+riM ga dang/ ku ba kha bo dang/ bri ha ti dang/ kha ra nas? dang/ be sha la dang/ ma he ki sha dang/ nye'u shing ba dang/ de rnams btags te rig sngags kyis btab nas gro ba'i nang du bcug ste/ byis pa byang phyogs su kha ltar bcug la mgul du
315b3(mdo 'grel): gdags so/ /de dag ma 'byor na zar ma'i skud pa sra ba la mdud pa bor te sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /byis pa bsrung ba'i phyir dang por rang byung chen po la phyag bya ste/ sngon gyi drang srong chen po rnams kyis zhi bar byas pa yin pas gdu bu'i bsrung ba'i skud pa gdags par
315b4(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /in tra pra ti sa ram du b+hyam/ ye tsa tas nu tsA ri Na/ badzra rA sha ni d+har b+hud ta me g+ha bin dA nu swa ri Na e ra ba Na/ skan d+ha gtam/ ye na ya ti pU ra Na da ram/ ya ma b+hi ba so to rA dza ya dza ta syA nu tsa ri Na/ me tsa sum ka ra sriM hoSh+Na/ ga dza ba dzi sA mA nA nA/ kA lA k+Sha ka la ya si ka
315b5(mdo 'grel): shai stam da k+Sha/ b+h+ri ku Ti mu kha shag ti mud gar/ ha ste tsa kha dag bra sA d+hA ra shu ye/ pA sha ratna ka ro rA dza/ to brid sA ga rA la ya/ sha rad bra ga na kAr/ yo tsa ta sya na nu tsA re Na/ mA ho ra n+yi man tam be ge na/ k+Sho ba yan ti/ ser ma pa ti/ dA nA d+hI po b+he sha b+ha na sartha yak+Sha de po/ /bU ba nE nA/
315b6(mdo 'grel): ra shtsa ye/ b+hu ta stya ba nu tsA rA sA dA/ A did? tya b+ha sA b+ho ru/ tra ma tu tra shtsa shi nA bA bai te/ sarba na ma sA tam/ i mam pra ti sa kri yam/ dIr gA mA yur ro gan tsA/ da bA dA sa na tu/ san ti de b+ha ga ban pra hma swa ste na rad ta/ pa ra b+ha u swasti be dang shtsa yag n+ya shtsa ig ni sha ma u tsa/
315b7(mdo 'grel): swasti ti sh+ri ri ta b+hi ra ha la/ shmE mi d+hak+Sha ma tyi ta/ swa sti duSh+Ta shtsa pushTa shtsa/ ba su h+rI b+hu da d+hi re ba tsa/ swasti ru tri pa sha ba kA shu/ skan d+ha shag ti d+ha ra b+hu ti/ swasti snya ta tsa/ su bar na shtsa ma hA la/ swasti da bA shtsa rak+Sha shtsa/ ma tsA de ba pA ma ga ma/ dur bya h+ri da ni/ du(mdo 'grel): Sha swa na ma na tsi na ti
316a1(mdo 'grel): ta ni tsa/ duSh+Ta d+hi na ma b+ha yang kri to/ /bA tsa pra ti hi/ te ma ya/ rak+Sha pra ti sa rA/ tyU b+hya ma/ b+ha de yang ba bA gA te nI/ nir brid ta ma ni ru de go /dzi ba bar she sha tam su khi/ snum khur dang/ nas kyi khur ba dang tshod ma dang/ swasti ka dang/ u lo pi la sogs
316a2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ mi sri ka dang/ kurma dang/ bu da stu nga dang/ yung ba dang/ kri sa ra dang/ ya ba ka dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ til btags pa'i phye ma dang/ lan tsha dang/ zho dang/ zan don dang/ nis ba ba dang/ 'byung po'i zas can dang/ 'o ma dang/ sha khrag rjen pa dang/ btsos ba dang/ nya
316a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ phye dang/ chang dang/ a sa pa'i chang dang/ dri dang/ phreng ba dang/ 'bras bu dang/ gser dang/ gu gul dang/ bog dkar po'i bdug pa dang/ byi'u rug pa dang/ zim thig le dang/ ni rkun thi? dang/ me tog lo ma dang bcas pa dang/ de rnams pags dang bcas pa'i
316a4(mdo 'grel): gtor ma byas la byis pa'i khyim de nyid kyi phyogs bzhi nas sbyin par bya ste/ de bzhin du bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo dang/ lha'i gnas dang/ ba lang gi lhas dang/ shing gcig gi drung dang/ chu mi dang de rnams las nam sros pa'i dus su mar me dang bcas
316a5(mdo 'grel): par btang ngo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor zlum po 'am/ gru bzhir byas te ba lang gi lci bas la ma ltung bar byugs la rtsa dar ba dang/ me tog yid du 'ong bas brgyan te/ de'i steng du 'byung po'i bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa bkod la 'byung po'i phyogs su
316a6(mdo 'grel): kha shar du bdag ltas la/ rig sngags 'di brjod te gtor ma sbyin no/ /de la sngags ni/ oM na ma(mdo 'grel): a bi ba ra kas/ na ma(mdo 'grel): ku rung b+ha ya/ nam sab ta nam ma tri nam na ma(mdo 'grel): skan d+ha ya/ hi li ti/ mi d+ha li ti/ hid tA/ pa li ni swAhA/ de ni bzhugs su gsol pa dang/ bud med kyi
316a7(mdo 'grel): gzugs can gyi gdon spyan drangs pa yang yin no/ /sngags des khyer ba gang gi chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/ bdag gi lus la gtor na bdag nyid bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /gdon de rnams 'dus pa dang gtor ma la so so'i bden pa'i dmod pa dang ldan pa'i
316b1(mdo 'grel): sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ pra dza ba tau tsa ya sya tyam/ a mi ri shA ri/ d+harmA rA dzA ya sya tya ma/ ta pa si shu/ d+hA nA d+hI pa ti ya tshe tya ma/ dzA la d+hI be/ ya sya tyam/ ag ni ho tre shu sya tya ma yang sh+rI tri ye shud tsa pa ti pra sta/ su yang sya tya ma/ i shI ri tsa ma hA ram? ni/ a te tu sya tya sa ma ye gu
316b2(mdo 'grel): tya ka sya da tya ba ti na/ dar sha ya dwa ma swa ru pa ni/ sya tya ma rak+Sha te sartha shi/ a man tri tra ma ya syo mya ru sya mya ru be pre tI ts+tshu da/ ba lI tsha su ba h+ri tre sarbaM sarba ko ma ka gra he/ dar sha ya dwa ma swa ru pA Na/ ba lan tsa bri te gra ya sta ma/ de nas de'i 'og tu mnyam par bzhag ste/ rigs kyi
316b3(mdo 'grel): gsang sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM lA ni lA/ khA lA khA lA/ na gu la gra ha kA ri ka se nu nu se na/ mA tA tsa ma hA se na ya sha swa ma kri ta mA lAk+Sha ta sha ra/ e tA stu gra ha mA ta ra/ ku mA ra ba tsa nA sh+ri gram pra mun tsan du shi/ shum ti mA ma/ ka la kal po dza la sha ka ti/ king ki ni dza la b+hu shi ta/ ku mA
316b4(mdo 'grel): rA ba tsa nA/ d+hu ti ma/ sam pra ta mu tsa ta ma shi shu pa ta ka kur ku Ta tsha Tam/ gan d+ha bar h+ri da ra shi khi sha ra stam bashtsa te mu tra mud tsa ta mA tu ra shi shu gan da d+hu pa mAM y+yo ts+tsha Tika mA ra te pra yats+tsha tri/ na s+tha ta bya ma ta da gra ya/ swang grA ti ma g+ha tsa ma tsi ra ma/ da tra sarba ku mA ra nam sad ga ta
316b5(mdo 'grel): gan mA da na/ ngag te rba tsa ba ta rak+ta shu ga ni ba sa ni/ ku mA ra sya la yaM ta tri/ yA ta ba lam bi mun tsa ta sha na mu kha d+ha sha k+Sho/ /be tra si ka la bri do bar/ bi ra ku mA ri di ba ti/ ste ba pu sto pi shi dya tyam bra ha ma no bra hma na nan tru/ sarba pe di ba da mA bar/ yak+Sha rA kA sa nA g+ha nam gan d+har
316b6(mdo 'grel): bA a su nga yo ra pi/ pi shA tsa b+hU ta sang ga nA ma/ bya di ma/ tsA mA ri shA rA/ ag n+ya ba ya ti skan d+ho/ /ga mya trA mA gan da ma da nam/ gra ho ya ko ba yod da tyam/ ku mA ra swa ya sha smi ni/ ta ni tsu ta sa prek+Shi pra ma b+ha ya pa di sha d+ho b+ha be dang/ de ltar gtor ma btang ba'i 'og tu me la sbyin sreg
316b7(mdo 'grel): gis mchod par bya ste/ de yang bca' ba dang/ bza' ba dang/ me tog la sogs pa ser skya dang/ dmar po la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ dri rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ gu gul gyi bdug pa dang/ seng ldeng la sogs pa'i yam shing bya'o/ /yang na tsan dan gyi shing gis bya ste/
317a1(mdo 'grel): de yang grangs brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /gdon thams cad las grol bar byed pa'i me dbyug pa lta zhes bya ba'i rig sngags brjod par bya ste/ oM bra hma bya ta na lam de bam/ ha syag bya pa ti tsam kam/ de ba nas pra mu kha ma swA ti swAhA/ a ba
317a2(mdo 'grel): ha ra d+hu dza ma/ sa hi bad tyam ha na tan si/ pA dA ka sa bak+Sha na/ twam yag nya shtsa yu pa s+thtsa/ twam hi d+ha ra ma btang/ ga ti hi ran n+ya rA tA de ba stA ma/ twam hi be dang bi dang ga ti/ dur brid tA nA ma/ be na ya sha yA twa ma/ hi ud pa di ta su re/ da ha sa gra ha de ba twa ma/ i dam duSh+Ta sa bri gra
317a3(mdo 'grel): ha/ ag ni ye swAhA/ twam ti shan ti ka ro ba na ni/ stam ma ru ta ro dam ha ri prad dA na g+ha di ri shi/ dI mA ma ni gri hya gu hyam kam/ ud ma da ya ti/ te dza swa tsA/ na ma(mdo 'grel): sham tsA tid ku ru/ duSh+Ti g+hA b+ha ra sna sta ma/ swa ma swa rbo pa tra be shu tsa/ yA kri tri na ho mye na shi g+hA ma shan ti padz+nya
317a4(mdo 'grel): ya de a hi b+ha ni ti de ba nam/ twam hi bag tram pu ra ta nam/ te nas ya te na de bA shad/ i ma sa d+ha ya/ me gra ham/ na ma stu he bya bA ha dan di/ da ha da ha/ dar sha ya dar sha ya te dza// //
317a5(mdo 'grel): ta dza mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ a pad+ma ra mud g+ha Ta ya/ ku mA ra bi shA tsa/ rai ba ti ro da na tra sa na/ bi trA sa na/ kam pa na/ ud kam pa na/ bI dzra bad de ba yak+ShA gan d+ha ra ba/ b+hu tA nA ma/ nA ga rak+Sha sa/ san dar dzan/ b+han rda na/ bi d+hu gra sar ya/ b+ha na b+ha nA/ a ga na d+ha na Ta/ a ga ni
317a6(mdo 'grel): bI tya na ma te/ dza sa swa na/ u na mA na da ya swAhA/ b+hur b+hu ba ya swAhA/ di ba ta te dzas swAhA/ ya ma ye swAhA/ sbyin sreg 'dis ni byis pa'i gdon mdza' dag 'jig par byed do/ /de bzhin du gtor ma dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ bdug pa dang/ khrus kyi tshul sngags kyi rgyud
317a7(mdo 'grel): rig par sbyar bar bya'o/ /bu ti ka rany+dza'i shun pa dang lo ma dang/ 'o ma can gyi shing ga shun pa dang/ lo ma dang/ sku ba dang/ bi la sha dang/ syo na ka dang/ bilba dang/ ka pi tha dad de rnams cha mnyam ste nub mo bskol la byis pa rnams la nub mo khrus byas na shis
317b1(mdo 'grel): pa yin no/ /gzhan du na gdon gyis zin pa las brla brnyan gyi nad ldan pa lta bu'i nad gso ba byung na ni/ byis pa'i nad gso ba las bshad pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba rnams bya'o/ /byis pa gdon gyis zin pa gso ba'i le'u gsum pa rdzogs so// //de nas
317b2(mdo 'grel): gdon gyi dmigs shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ thog mar sman pas nad pa'i shes pa dang/ smra ba dang/ spyod pa dang/ stobs ci 'dra ba las gdon gyi rtags shes par bya ste brjod par bya'o/ /de yang skyes bu gang gis spyod tshul dang/ rang bzhin dang 'gro ba dang/
317b3(mdo 'grel): byed pa rnams lha dang lha ma yin dang/ dri za la sogs pa gang gi rtags dang/ mthun par byed pa de'i mtshan nyid shes par bya ste brtag go /de la lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa/ gdon gyi rigs rnam pa bco brgyad yod do/ /de dag kyang rgyu med par ni gdon 'jug mi
317b4(mdo 'grel): nus te/ rgyu de yang gang zhe na/ 'phral gyi rkyen dang/ sngon gyi las las gyur pa yin te/ de yang shes rab nyams pas chags pa dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug la sogs pa shas cher skyes pa dang/ chos lugs nyams par byas pa dang/ brtul zhugs nyams pa dang/ spyod lam
317b5(mdo 'grel): log par byed pa dang/ bla ma la sogs pa mchod par 'os pa la mi mchod pa dang/ bdag nyid kyi gzhung lugs nyams par byas pa dang/ bdag nyid gsod par byed pa dang/ rgyu de dag byas pas gdon gyis glags rnyed de skyes bu'i lus la 'jug cing gnod par byed do//
317b6(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang gdon gyis glags rnyed par byed pa'i rgyu ni sdig pa'i las rtsom pa dang/ sngon mi dge ba'i las byas pa dang/ bdag nyid gcig pur grogs med pa khang stong dang/ dur khrod dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ mcho rten la sogs pa'i drung du mtshan mo brten cing gnas pa
317b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ mtshan mo gcer bur rgyu ba dang/ de bzhin du bla ma mchod par 'os pa smod pa dang/ dus dang cho ga ma yin par 'khrig pa spyod pa dang/ mi gtsang bas lha mnyes par byed pa dang/ gzhan gyi bud med bu btsas ma thag pa la ma 'dres par spyod pa dang/ sbyin srog dang/ sngags
318a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ gtor ma dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa la yo byad mi 'byor pa dang/ mdor na mdo'i gnas su nyin par gyi spyod lam bstan pa log par byed pa las gdon 'jug cing gnod par byed pa yin no/ /de la lha'i gdon ni zla ba yar ngo'i tshes
318a2(mdo 'grel): gcig dang/ tshes bcu gsum la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin gyi gdon ni yar ngo'i tshes bcu gsum dang mar ngo'i bcu gnyis la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /dri za'i gdon ni tshes bcu bzhi dang/ bcu gnyis la 'jug go /klu'i gdon ni tshes lnga la 'jug par
318a3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /gdon sbyin gyi gdon ni zla ba yar ngo'i tshes bdun dang bcu gcig la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon ni yar ngo'i tshes lnga dang/ tshes brgyad dang/ bco lnga la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /srin po dang sha za'i gdon ni zla ba mar ngo'i tshes gcig dang
318a4(mdo 'grel): dgu dang bcu gnyis la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /yi dags kyi gdon ni gnam stong dang tshes bcu la 'jug pa yin no/ /bla ma rgan pa la sogs pas smod pa byas pa las byung ba'i gdon ni phal cher tshes brgyad dang dgu la 'jug go /gdon de dag phal cher nam
318a5(mdo 'grel): sros pa'i dus su 'jug pa yin no de la skyes bu lha'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni bzhin mdangs pad+ma kha bye ba lta bur 'dug pa dang/ zhi ba'i mig lta bu dang/ mig khro ba dang/ smra ba nyung ba dang/ rdul dang/ bshang gci 'byung ba dang/ zas mi 'dod pa dang/ lha dang
318a6(mdo 'grel): bram ze la mchog tu 'dzin pa dang/ gtsang sbra che ba dang/ saM skri ta'i skad du smra ba dang/ yun ring po nas mig 'byed pa dang/ lus dri zhim pa dang/ gzhan la mchog ster zhing bkra shis pa la sogs pa'i tshig sbyin pa dang/ phreng ba dang/ gos dkar po dang/ 'bab
318a7(mdo 'grel): chu dang/ ri bong dang/ khang pa mthon po la dga' ba dang/ gnyid med pa dang/ gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa dang/ mtshan ma de dag dang ldan na lhas dbang du byas pa yin no/ /de la lha ma yin gyi gdon gyis thebs pa'i rtags ni/ mig yon por lta ba dang/ rang
318b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin ma rungs pa dang/ lha dang bla ma dang/ bram ze rnams la zhe sdang ba dang/ 'jigs pa med pa dang/ rims kyis snyems pa dang/ dpa' zhing brtan pa dang/ khro ba can dang/ rtsol ba zhan pa dang/ drag po dang/ skem byed dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang po yang bdag yin no/
318b2(mdo 'grel): zhes smra ba dang/ sha dang chang la dad cing dga' ba ni lha ma yin gyi gdon yin no/ /dri za'i gdon gyis thebs pa'i rtags ni/ rang gi spyod pa la dga' zhing lus dris zhim pa dang/ rtag tu snying dga' zhing glu gar la dga' ba dang/ de bzhin du khrus dang/ skyed mos
318b3(mdo 'grel): tshal dang/ gos dang phreng ba la dga' zhing byug pa dmar po la mos pa dang/ sgeg pa dang/ 'gying ba 'dod pa ni dri za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags so/ /klu'i gdon gyis zin ba'i rtags ni mig dmar ba dang/ khro ba'i dang tshul dang/ mig har har bor dgrad pa dang/
318b4(mdo 'grel): yon por 'gro ba dang/ mi brtan zhing 'gul ba dang/ rgyun du dbugs rgod pa dang/ lce yang nas yang du 'byin pa dang/ kha'i gra la lcas byug pa dang/ 'o ma dang/ bu ram dang/ khrus la dga' ba dang/ kha bub tu nyal ba dang/ gdugs mthong na 'jigs pa ste de ni
318b5(mdo 'grel): klu'i gdon gyis zin pa'i dbang du byas pa'o/ /gdon sbyin gyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni mig dgrad cing dmar la 'bur ba dang/ lus dri zhim pa dang/ gzi mdangs shin tu bzad ba dang/ gar dang gtam dang/ glu dang/ khrus dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa la dga' 
318b6(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ nya dang sha la sred pa dang/ spro ba dang/ dga' ba che ba dang/ stobs che ba dang/ nad med pa dang/ lag pa'i rtse mo 'gul zhing khyed cag rnams la nor la sogs pa ci zhig sbyin zhes sma ba dang/ gsang ba'i tshig mi thung pa dang/ sman pa dang/ bram ze la spyod pa dang
318b7(mdo 'grel): khro bag chung ba dang/ 'gros myur ba dang/ 'di dag ni gdon sbyin gyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags so/ /tshangs pa srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni rgod cing gar la dga' ba dang/ las drag po byed pa dang/ rgyu med par rdeg pa dang/ dmod pa dang bcas pa'i
319a1(mdo 'grel): tshig ngan pa sma ba dang/ 'gros myur ba dang/ lha dang bram ze dang sman pa la sdang ba dang/ shing ngam mtshon la sogs pas bdag nyid la bsnun pa dang/ kwa ye kwa ye zhes bod par smra ba dang/ bstan bcos dang rig byed sngon thos pa 'don pa
319a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ de dag ni tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni khro mig tu lta ba dang/ khro gnyer dang ldan pa dang/ rtags bag tu byed pa dang/ gzhan la rdeg pa dang/ rgyug cing 'gro ba dang/ skad kyi bor 'don
319a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ gdong 'jigs su rung ba ston pa dang/ kha zas ma zos kyang stobs dang ldan pa dang/ gnyid med pa dang/ mtshan mo rgyu ba dang/ ngo tsha mi shes pa dang/ gtsang sbra med pa dang/ dpa' ba dang ma rungs pa'i las byed pa dang/ tshig rtsub po smra ba dang/ khro ba dang/ khrag
319a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ phreng ba dmar po dang/ bud med dang/ sha dang chang la dga' ba dang/ khrag gam sha mthong na rkan gtog cing mchu lhag pa dang/ kha zas za ba'i dus su rgod pa dang/ 'di dag ni srin po'i gdon gyis mtshan ma'o/ /sha za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i cha rtags
319a5(mdo 'grel): ni/ sems tha mal par mi 'dug pa dang/ sa gcig la mi gnas pa dang/ kun tu rgyug pa dang/ zas kyi lhag ma dang/ glu dang/ gar dang/ sha dang chang rnams la dga' ba dang/ dmod mo dang bcas pa'i tshig ngan pa smra ba dang/ bzhin mdog zhan pa dang/
319a6(mdo 'grel): rgyu med par dud mo 'debs shing sen mos lus 'brud pa dang/ lus rtsub pa dang/ skad nyams pa dang/ bdag sdug go zhes smre sngags 'don pa dang/ 'brel pa dang mi 'brel ba'i tshig tu smra ba dang/ dran pa nyams pa dang/ gnas la dga' ba dang/ mi
319a7(mdo 'grel): brtan pa dang/ gcer bur byung ba dang/ dri ma can dang/ srang kha na 'dug pa'i gos ci rnyed pa gon pa dang/ rtswa phreng bar byas nas lus la brgyan pa dang/ shing la rta zer te zhon pa dang/ mi gtsang ba lud phung gi steng du 'dug pa dang/ zas mang du za ba
319b1(mdo 'grel): ste 'di ni sha za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /yi dags kyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni gzugs dang bya ba dang dri yi dags dang 'dra zhing 'jigs skyen pa dang/ zas mi 'dod pa dang/ rtag tu rtsa gcod pa dang/ 'di dag ni yi dags kyi gdon gyis zin
319b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /grul bum gyis gdon gyi zin pa'i rtags ni tshig mang po smra zhing glal ba dang/ gdong nag pa dang/ mi sdod par 'gro ba dang/ rang gi rlig pa cher skrang zhing 'phyang ba ni grul bum gyi gdon gyi mtshan ma'o/ /byad stems kyi gdon gyis zin
319b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i rtags ni shing dang bong ba thogs shing 'gro ba dang/ srang kha'i phyag dar gyi dum bu gyon pa dang/ gcer bur rgyug pa dang/ stabs mig tu lta ba dang/ rtsa'i rgyan byed pa dang/ dur khrod dang/ gnas stong pa dang/ srang dang/ shing gcig gi drung du brten pa
319b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ til gyi zas dang/ sha dang chang la chags pa ste 'di ni byad stems kyi gdon gyis zin pa yin no/ /g.yengs byed kyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni/ tshig rtsub ba smra ba dang/ zas mi 'dod cing chu nye tshe slong pa dang/ sdangs shing mig dmar bas lta ba dang/ tshig
319b5(mdo 'grel): drag pa 'di ni/ o kir Na zhes bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /ro langs kyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni/ dri dang phreng ba la dga' ba dang/ tshig bden par smra ba dang/ tshig yongs su 'dar ba dang/ gnyid che ba ni ro langs kyi gdon gyis zin pa yin no//
319b6(mdo 'grel): sngon gnyen shi ba 'drer gyur ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni/ mthong ba mi gsal pa dang/ bzhin zhan pa dang/ rkan bskams pa dang/ mig dang rdzi ma 'gul ba dang/ gnyid che ba dang/ me'i drod chung ba dang/ g.yon phyogs su gos gyon pa dang/ til dang/ sha
319b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ bu ram la dga' ba dang/ tshig 'khrul pa dang/ 'di ni sngon gyi gnyen shi ba'i gdon gyi zin pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /bla ma dang rgan pa dang grub pa rnams kyi dmod pa las byung ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni/ spyod lam dang zas la sogs pa gdon so
320a1(mdo 'grel): so'i rtags dang/ ji ltar mthun pa yin pa de ltar ngos gzung bar bya'o/ /mdor na byis pa'i tshogs kyi rjes 'brang ba'i gdon dang/ gcer bur 'dug cing skra gyen du rdzes pa dang/ sems sdug bsngal gyis gdungs ba dang/ yun ring por
320a2(mdo 'grel): gdon gyis zin pa ni spang bar bya'o/ /gdon gyi dmigs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas gdon nad de dag gso ba'i le'u brjod par bya ste/ gang gi lus la 'khrig pa dang gtor ma la sogs pa 'dod pa'i gdon rnams kyis mi
320a3(mdo 'grel): gtse bar 'dod pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ gtor ma dang/ brtul zhugs dang/ dka' thub dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bsam gtan dang/ sbyin pa dang/ shes rab dang/ snying rje la sogs pa rnams bsten na rgyal bar byed do/ /gdon gyis mi brdzi'o//
320a4(mdo 'grel): shin kun dang/ tsha ba gsum dang ba bla dang/ gla rtsi dang/ sgog pa dang/ arka'i rtsa ba dang/ spang spos dang/ a dza lo mi dang/ go lo mi dang/ 'bam po dang/ shu dag dang/ g+hand+ha bri yaM ku dang/ ku kU ti dang/ sarba gand+ha zhes bya ba g+hand+ha ku li dang/ ka na zhes bya ba ka ka dang/ ba la
320a5(mdo 'grel): ka dang/ ram nye ba 'o ma can dang/ badzra kro d+ha dang/ sle tres dang/ kar ka ta sh+riM gi dang/ mo ha na ba li li dang/ lig bu mig dang/ yungs kar dang/ gzhan yang gdon 'joms pa'i sman ji snyed pa dang/ bong bu dang/ rta dang/ khyi dang/ lug dang/ rnga mo dang/ rik+Sha dang/ go d+ha dang/
320a6(mdo 'grel): sre mo dang/ reg 'byam dang/ gung dang/ bya la dang/ ba lang dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ rgya mtshon gnas pa'i srog chags kyi pags pa dang/ mkhris pa dang/ so dang/ sen mo dang de rnams mar rnying pa 'am/ sar pa 'am/ til mar ram gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig
320a7(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs te/ des btung ba dang/ snar blugs pa dang/ bsku mnye dang/ phye ma'i dud pas bdug pa dang/ ri lur byas te de la mig sman dang/ snar phye mas bud ba dang/ bsku ba dang/ bskol ba'i khu bas blugs pa la sogs pa ci rigs par byas nas gdon smyo byed dang/
320b1(mdo 'grel): brjod byed dang bcas pa zhi bar bya'o/ /ha sti pi pi ling dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ yungs kar dang/ srog chags go d+ha dang/ sri mo dang/ byi lo dang/ dza sha dang/ de rnams kyi mkhris pa lhan cig btags pa'i phye ma sna nas btang ba dang/ bsku byug  
320b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ blugs pa la sogs pa byas na gdan 'joms so/ /yungs kar dang/ shu dag dang/ shing kun dang/ bri yang ku dang/ ser po rnam gnyis dang/ bcod ka ni dkar po dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ shTi ta kaTa bi dang/ nim+ba'i lo ma dang/ ka rany+dza ka dang/ sh+ri ya'i sa bon dang/
320b3(mdo 'grel): thang shing dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ de rnams btags pa'i phye ma dang/ mar ci tsam pa'i bzhi 'gyur gyi ba gcin dang/ bskol ba'i sman mar ni don grub kyi sman mar zhes bya ste/ de las ran par btung ba dang snar blugs pa byas na/ gdon thams cad 'joms shing
320b4(mdo 'grel): khyad par du lha ma yin gyi gdon sel te/ gshed byed dang/ bkra mi shis pa dang/ dug dang/ smyo byed dang/ rims dang/ brjed byed dang/ sdig pa rnams 'joms so/ /sman de nyid kyi phye mar gcin dang sbyar te btung ba 'am/ snar blugs pa dang/ byug pa dang/ khrus dang/ dril
320b5(mdo 'grel): ba rnams byas na gong du bstan pa'i yon tan thams cad dang khyad par du rgyal po'i sgor yang dgos pa'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ shu dag dang a shwa g+hand+ha dang/ ser po rnam gnyis dang/ shing kun dang/ kun dong gi
320b6(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba dang/ ka rany+dza'i sa bon dang/ shi ri shi'i me tog dang/ ka pid ta'i 'bras bu dang/ shun lpags dang/ rgyam tshwa dang/ ta ga ru dang/ ru rta dang/ so na ka'i rtsa ba dang/ ge ri kar+Ni dkar po dang/ de rnams btags la ra gcin dang legs par bsgos te ba lang gi mkhris
320b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang bsres te ri lur byas la sbyin na/ rma red pa dang/ smyo byed dang/ mun thibs zhes byed pa dang/ mtshan mo mi mthong ba dang/ dran pa stor ba dang/ chus khyer te brgyal ba dang/ dug mnga' la sogs pas phog pa dang/ sprul gyis mche bas zin te brgyal ba dang/
321a1(mdo 'grel): de rnams la mig tu bsku pa dang/ snar blugs pa dang/ bsku ba byas na zhi bar byed do/ /ras bal gyi sa bon dang/ rma bya'i sgro dang/ bri ha sti dang/ ma hA de ba la phul ba'i me tog rnying pa dang/ po son cha dang/ shing tsha dang spang spos dang/
321a2(mdo 'grel): byi la'i rtug pa dang/ 'bras kyi phub ma dang/ shu dag dang/ mi'i skra dang sprul gyi pags pa rjes pa dang/ glang po che'i so dang/ glang gi rwa dang/ shing kun dang/ na le sham dang/ 'di rnams cha bsnyams te/ btags pa bsregs pa'i dud pas bdugs na
321a3(mdo 'grel): skem byed kyi gdon dang/ smyo byed dang/ sha za dang/ lha'i gdon gyis thebs pa rnams sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /yang na bca' sga dang/ pi pi ling dang/ na le sham dang/ ga ta pra tra dang/ gur kum dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ kaN+Ta kA ri dang/ yung ba dang/ skyer
321a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i rtsa ba dang ru rta dang/ yungs kar dang/ yungs nag dang/ bal ka dang/ dug mo yungs dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ sgog skya dang/ a ru ra dang/ ba ru ra dang/ pu shel tsi dang/ pu tse shel dang/ shu dag dang/ spangs ma dang/ shing mngar dang/ ba bla dang/ tsan dan
321a5(mdo 'grel): dmar po dang sdug smel dang ldong ros dang/ shug pa dang/ pog dkar po dang/ rgya spos dang/ me tog ma du ka'i shing dang/ bri yang ku dang/ bong nga dkar po dang/ skyer khaN+Ta dang/ dbyi mo rnams cha bsnyams ste/ zhib rab tu btags la de rnams spyir bsdoms
321a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i bzhi 'gyur gyi mar rnying pa dang/ gcin gyi sde tshan mdo'i gnas su bstan pa las gcin mar dang cha bsnyams te re re nas bskol la gcin du mar lus pa btsags pa ni gdon khrus 'debs pa'i mar yin no zhes sngon gyi mkhas pa 'dod de/ de
321a7(mdo 'grel): las ran par 'thungs na gdon sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /yang na spos dang/ shing mngar dang/ ka rany+dza dang/ rgya skyegs dang/ ba to la'i rtsa ba dang/ btsod dang/ shu dag dang/ pa to la dang/ shing kun dang/ yungs kar dang/ kaN+Ta kA ri dang/ ser po rnam gnyis
321b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ g+hand+ha pri yi ku dang/ pu tse shel dang/ rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ btso 'bras dang/ thang shing dang/ bi dang ga dang/ i dza g+hand+ha dang/ sle tres dang/ ang ko la dang/ ko sha ta ki dang/ shig tru dang/ nim+ba dang/ gla sgang dang
321b2(mdo 'grel): du gam yungs dang/ ru rta dang/ shi ri sha'i me tog dang/ sa bon dang/ gi ri kar+Ni dang/ dan+ti dang/ kru trug tres dang/ bilba rnams cha bsnyams te zhib tu btags la de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i bzhi 'gyur gyi mar rnying pa dang/ gcin rnam brgyad dang/ re re nas
321b3(mdo 'grel): gong ma bzhin du bskol la/ gcin du mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni gdon khrus legs pa'i mar chen po zhes bya ste/ cho ga bzhin du legs par sbas la/ de las btung ba dang/ mig bsku ba dang/ snar blugs pa dang/ lus bsku ba byas na gdon
321b4(mdo 'grel): yin no cog thams cad dang/ smyo byed dang/ mje dang/ rims rnams sel bar byed do/ /dus gang dang gang gi nyin zhag la gdon gyis zin pa'i nyin zhag de dang de'i dus su/ lhag par gtor ma dang/ sbyin sreg la sogs pa sman pas ji lta ji ltar rigs pa bzhin
321b5(mdo 'grel): sbyar ro/ /gzhan yang khrus dang/ gos dang/ sha dang/ tshil dang/ chang dang/ 'o ma dang/ bu ram la sogs pa gdon gang la dad cing sred ba de'i tshe de la sbyin no/ /gdon thams cad la ni rin po che rdo rje dang/ baiDUrya dang/ margad la sogs pa dang/ su ma na la sogs pa me
321b6(mdo 'grel): tog dri zhim pa'i phreng ba 'am/ yang na sman gyi rigs dri zhim pa dang/ phreng ba dang/ mon sran sde'u dang/ mon sran na gu la sogs pa'i 'bru dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ zhun mar dang/ khur ba dang/ la tu la sogs pa sbyin te sbyor ba de dag ni gdon gyi cho ga spyir bstan pa
321b7(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /de la lha'i gdon dang/ drang srong dang/ rgan po dang/ grub pa dang/ bla ma dang/ gdon lnga po de dag la ni lha khang nas gtor ma sbyin no/ /de las kyang lha'i gdon la ni byang phyogs su ltas te sbyin no/ /lha ma yin gyi gdon la ni dus ji lta ba bzhin du nub phyogs su
322a1(mdo 'grel): kha ltas te/ bzhi mdo nas gtor ma sbyin no/ /dri za'i gdon la ni ba lang gi lam nas gos dang rgyan dang bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin no/ /sngon gnyen shi ba 'drer gyur pa'i gdon dang/ klu'i gdon la ni 'bab chu'i ngos nas gtor ma btang
322a2(mdo 'grel): ste/ de las kyang klu'i gdon la ni shar lho'i mtshams su kha ltas te gtor ma btang ngo/ /gnod sbyin gyi gdon la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas sam/ yang na chu bo gnyis 'doms pa'i mdo las btang ngo/ /srin po'i gdon dang/ tshangs pa srin po'i gdon la ni
322a3(mdo 'grel): lam gyi bzhi mdo dang/ nags tshang tshing 'jigs su rung ba'i las lho phyogs su kha ltas te gtor ma sbyin no/ /tshangs pa srin po'i gdon la ni shar phyogs su kha ltas te sbyin no/ /sha za'i gdon la ni gnas stong pa nas nub phyogs su kha ltas te gtor ma sbyin no/ /de la
322a4(mdo 'grel): lha'i gdon la ni gtor ma shin tu gtsang zhing dge bar bshams la/ de yang me tog dkar po las byas pa'i phreng ba dang/ a ka ru la sogs pa dri zhim po dang/ 'bras kyi 'o thug dang/ 'bras chan dang/ zho dang/ gdugs dkar po dang bcas pa 'dod pa yin no//
322a5(mdo 'grel): shing kun dang/ yungs kar dang/ shu dag dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ 'di rnams srang phyed phyed btags pa'i phye ma mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ mar bzhi 'gyur gyi ba gcin dang lhan cig bskol te mar 'ba' zhig lus pa las btung ba dang/ snar blugs
322a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ bsku ba byas na lha'i gdon las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du shu dag dang/ shing kun dang/ sgog skya dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma gcin dang btags te/ snar blugs pa dang/ mig tu bskus na yang lha'i gdon las thar ro/ /lha ma yin gyi gdon la ni
322a7(mdo 'grel): shing tog ji snyed pa dang/ pu shel tsi dang/ pad+ma dang/ utpal dang sbyar ba'i gtor ma sbyin no/ /klu'i gdon la ni sum na la sogs pa'i me tog dang/ 'bras spos dang/ bu ram dang sbyar ba'i snum khur dang/ bu ram dang sbyar ba'i 'bras chan dang/ zas mchog ces bya
322b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i 'o thug dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ 'o ma dang/ sa nag po dang/ nA ga ge sar dang/ shu dag dang/ pad+ma dang/ gu gul dang/ pu shel tse dang/ utpa la dmar po'i 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i gtor ma sbyin no/ /gseng phrom dkar po'i lo ma dang/ rgya spos dang/ nA ga ge sar dang/ yungs
322b2(mdo 'grel): kar dang 'di rnams chu grang mo dang btags te/ snar blugs pa dang/ mig bskus na klu'i gdon las thar ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi gdon la ni 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ 'bras chen bsres pa'i zas dang/ gu gul dang/ sgron shing dang/ pad+ma dang/ pu shel tsi dang/ gos dang/
322b3(mdo 'grel): gsor brgyan du byas pa 'am/ ma byas pa 'ang rung ba'i gtor ma sbyin no/ /mar dang/ 'o ma dang/ ba gcin dang/ cha bsnyams te bskol ba las btung ba dang/ snar blugs pa dang/ bsku byug byas na gdon sbyin gyi gdon la phan no/ /a ru ra dang/ ser po rnam gnyis dang/
322b4(mdo 'grel): sgog skya dang/ na le sham dang/ shu dag dang/ nim+ba'i lo ma dang/ 'di rnams btags par gcin dang sbyar te/ snar blugs pa dang/ mig la bskus na yang gnod sbyin gyi gdon las grol lo/ /tshangs pa srin po'i gdon la ni nas phye bre do las byas pa'i snod bkang ba dang/
322b5(mdo 'grel): bum pa gang gi chu dang/ til btags pa'i phye dang/ gdugs dang gos dang/ gur kum la sogs pa'i byug pa dang ldan pa'i gtor ma sbyin no/ /seng ldeng srang nyi shu bskol ba'i nang du tsha ba gsum dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ shing kun dang/ shu dag dang/ shu ti dang/
322b6(mdo 'grel): yungs kar dang/ nim+ba'i lo ma dang/ sgog skya dang/ de rnams kyi phye ma mar srang nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ ba gcin mar gyi sum 'gyur dang/ lhan cig bskol la de las yang btung ba dang/ snar blugs pa dang/ bsku byug byas na phan no/ /srin po'i gdon la ni til
322b7(mdo 'grel): btags pa'i phye ma dang/ me tog dkar po dang/ 'bras dang/ mon sran gre'u la sogs bsres pa'i chan dang/ sha btsos pa dang/ sha rjen pa dang/ nis pa sa dang/ khrag dang bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin no/ /ka rany+dza dang/ sh+ri sha dang/ pra tra la nag po gnyis kyi rtsa ba
323a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ shun lpags dang/ me tog dang 'bras bu dang/ bilba'i rtsa ba dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ shing kun dang/ dug mo yungs dang/ sgog skya dang skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang ha cang mi sla mi ska tsam du sbyar te/
323a2(mdo 'grel): snar blugs pa dang mig tu bskus na srin po'i gdon la phan no/ /yang na sman de dag nyid mar dang gcin mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang lhan cig bsgrubs te bskol la mar lus pa dang/ btung ba dang snar blugs pa dang/ bsku byug byas na srin po'i gdon
323a3(mdo 'grel): zlog par byed do/ /sha za'i gdon la ni bu ram chang dang/ til gyi tshigs ma dang/ til gyi phye ma dang/ zho dang/ la phug dang/ lan tsha dang/ mar dang 'byung po'i zas 'bras dang/ sran ma sha la sogs pa bsres pa'i chan dang/ phye las byas pa'i zan dang
323a4(mdo 'grel): bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin no/ /ser po rnam gnyis dang/ bcod dang/ shu ti dang/ lan tsha dang/ dod gra dang/ shing kun dang/ pri yang ku dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ sgog skya dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ shu dag dang/ pra Ta li dang/ ge ri kar+Ni ka dkar po dang/ sh+ri
323a5(mdo 'grel): sham me tog dkar po dang/ 'di rnams ba gcin dang/ de'i bzhi cha'i mar dang lhan cig bskol te/ de las btung ba dang/ bsku byug byas na sha za'i gdon sel to/ /yang na sman de nyid ra'i gcin dang btags te mig tu bsku ba dang snar blugs
323a6(mdo 'grel): pa yang phan no/ /lha'i gdon dang drang srong gi gdon dang sngon gyi gnyen shi ba 'drer gyur ba'i gdon dang/ dri za'i gdon dang de dag la ni sna sman rno ba btang bar bya ste/ 'jam pa'i bag sman mar la sogs pa spyad par bya'o/ /sha za'i gdon ma gtogs pa'i
